item.text: @#/ /rgyud 'bum tha pa bzhugs so//
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra maN+Da a laM ka ra nA ma ma hA tan tra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ bla ma dang 'jam pa'i
dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma la spyi bos gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dang / nor bu
dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i cod
pan khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur bar brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi ye shes rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud cing las sna tshogs mdzad pa ma lus shing lus pa med

pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rdo rje'i las mdzad pa/ thugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa dus gsum du gnas pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsten cing bsngags pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dang ldan pa/ kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dril bu btags pa/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i dar gyi ba dan dang / me tog gi chun po dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas bklubs

shing nye bar mdzes pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad legs par yongs su dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi khang 'od mtha' yas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtsug lag khang me tog gi 'khri shing mchog gi snying po'i rgyan gyis bkod pa/

'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho rab tu bkram pa'i sprin nam mkha'i khams yongs su khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ mtha' las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas 'khrungs pa'i dbus/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po 'od gsal

ba'i gzhal med khang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/ rdo rje snying po'i rgyan/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrung mi 'gog 'gog par mi 'gyur ba'i yan lag gi spyod yul

yang dag pa'i mtha' gsal ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul/ chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po'i khang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po sa chen po'i dam pa la bzhugs so/ /de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing mdun du bdar

te chos ston par mdzad do/ /thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa yongs su dkar ba chos thams cad kyi tshul rnam par dag pa'i sgo ston par mdzad do/ /de nas yang bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi nyi ma/ rnam par rgyal ba'i dam tshig 'byung gnas rdo rje snying po/ chos thams cad ngo bo

nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ rgya mtsho ltar zab pa/ las sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes thob pa sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje nam mkha' lta bu/ sku chen po rdo rje'i sku/ mtha' las 'das pa'i sku/ sku rin po che chos kyi sku/ sprul

pa'i sku/ las mnyam pa nyid kyi sku/ byang chub kyi sems don yod pa/ yongs su bsdus pa/ dge ba 'phel ba/ rgyal po chen po snang ba tog /bzhad pa po/ chos dang ldan pa/ shes rab 'khor lo/ skad thams cad pa/ sna tshogs pa can/ srung ba

po/ gnod sbyin can/ mtshams sbyor ba/ gtsug tor du gyur pa/ mchog ldan/ rdo rje can/ 'khor lo can/ ye shes can/ khyab bdag chen po/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du legs par bzhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad yang dag par 'du bar byed pa/ rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa' nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje'i byin rlabs kyi ye shes snying po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i

rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba chen po'i dam tshig nam mkha'i khams thams cad du spros pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa mngon par byang chub par gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rnam par dag pa de yis chos

thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa nam mkha' thams cad la khyab pa po/ gzugs thams cad yongs su mthong ba'i ye shes kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can 'dul ba'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad don yod pa'i bka'

lung mdzad pas sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid bla na med pa'i las sna tshogs pa can/ rnam snang mi 'gyur mi bskyod pa/ /rin chen tog ste 'od byed pa/ /'od dpag med pa rgyal ba'i mgon/ /don yod pa ni las kun byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la rab tu gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa brnyes pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bya

ba grub pa'i ye shes yang dag par rjes su thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag ba/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnyis su med cing mnyam pa nyid

dmigs pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pa mthar phyin pa/ stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yul du gyur pa/

sangs rgyas kyi yul mnyam pa nyid la dmigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po nyid la byin gyis brlabs nas/ phyogs dang mtshams rnams su kun tu gnas so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang

phyug gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams spyan drongs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur ba chen po rab tu

dgyes pa'i zhal ras kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams spyan drang ba'i don du rdo rje se gol brdabs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba'i snying po chen po 'di ched du brjod pa/ bud d+ha sa mA dzaHAHhAHoM hUM badzra sa mA dzaH de nas de skad ces

brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyud rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin yang dag par mthong ngo / /de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang

mdzad la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyis lhan cig yang dag par sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje blo'i ye shes yongs su bskyed de gnas thams cad du rnam par gnas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes

'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i snying po bdag la yod pa de ngas bshad par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs shig /b+h+ru~M/ de nas/ mi bskyod de bzhin gshegs pa dang / /rin chen 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

'od dpag med/ /don yod grub pa de bzhin gshegs/ /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang lhan cig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dpal gyi be'u la rab tu zhugs so/ /zhugs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor lo la bde ba thams cad

yang dag par ston no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad zhal bzhir gyur te/ zhal bzhi po rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i khams mtha' med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul chos kyi tshul mngon par brtags pa 'di nyid dbyangs kyis

ched du brjod pa 'di lta ste/ rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas

gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /zhe

sdang rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /gti mug rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /nga rgyal rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems

dpa'i gnas so/ /mi khom pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /yid sim pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni

'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /lus rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /ngag rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /yid rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang

yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /dri rnam par dag

pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /reg rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /dngos

po thams cad rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /de'i rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas gsang sngags thams cad kyi dbang phyug gsang sngags thams cad kyi 'dren pa po/ sngags thams cad kyi bla mar gyur pa/ thams cad gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba/ bstan pa la

brdzi ba med pa/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i snying po bka' stsal pa/ b+h+ru~M/ 'jam dpal gang la las chos thams cad bsdus pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di lan cig tsam yang thos na de'i byang chub kyi snying po la thug pa'i bar du sgrib pa thams cad dang chod pa dang

nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang las kyi sgrib pa chen po nye bar bsags kyang nam yang dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ngan song rnams su ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa rnams byas pa tsam na yang sdug bsngal med cing zad par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis 'di

'chang ba dang / nyi ma re re 'don pa dang / klog pa dang rgyun ma chad par tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de ni skye ba 'di nyid la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob nas chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad la dga' zhing mgu

la rab tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po skye ba bcu drug na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa'i tshul de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par byang chub pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di ston par mdzad do/ /rdo rje brtan pa nyid kyi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang / don gcig pa

nyid kyis don mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang / rang bzhin rnam par dag pas chos nyid mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang / rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyis las thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang

chub pa'i byang chub chen po ste/ 'jam dpal gang la las chos kyi gnas bzhi po 'di nyan par byed pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / sgom par byed na ji srid byang chub snying po la gnas kyi bar du sdig pa thams cad la kun tu spyod pa thams cad kyang sdig pa thams

cad las 'das par 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par byang chub par 'gyur ro/ /A~M/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal bas

bsdus pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa'i phyir 'dod chags spros pa med pa'o/ /zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa'i phyir zhe sdang spros pa med pa'o/ /gti mug gi spros pa med pa'i phyir gti mug spros pa

med pa'o/ /chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad spros pa med pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med par rig par bya'o/ /'jam dpal gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan

pa dang 'dzin cing 'don la klog par byed na de 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams bsad bar gyur kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par 'gyur ro/ /hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan

'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa slar yang chos thams cad spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag

pa'i phyir 'jig rten na yul thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten na sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten na chos

thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'jig

rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan par byed 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byed na de 'dod pa thams cad kyi nang na gnas kyang pad+ma lta bur 'dod chags

kyi skyon blo bur ba'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro/ /hrIH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khams gsum pa thams cad kyi bdag po de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i 'byung gnas ye shes snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ dbang bskur byin pas khams gsum po thams cad kyi rgyal srid yongs su thob par 'gyur ro/ /don gyi sbyin pas thams cad kyi

bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi sbyin pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /zang zing gi sbyin pas thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid bde ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /trA~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya brnyes pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'chang ba de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ba dang / gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su gzung bas chos thams cad thob pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang / thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su gzung bas ting nge 'dzin

thams cad thob pa'i don du 'gyur pa dang / rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung bas sku dang gsung dang thugs thams cad rdo rje mchog tu 'grub pa'i don du 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan par byed 'dzin cing 'don la 'chad

cing sgom par byed na/ de dngos grub thams cad dang phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / ye shes thams cad dang / las thams cad sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gi dngos grub thams cad so sor thob par 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro/ /aH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang rdo rje'i yi ge'i 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka'

stsal pa/ rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa nye bar gzung ba'i phyir chos thams cad mtshan mas dben pa dang / smon pa las nye bar grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad smon pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o/ /a~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i nang du gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang 'khor lo chen por 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / don mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /

chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / las mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas 'khor lo thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i

cho ga rgyas pa'i snod de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga

rgyas pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su gzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / rjod pa dang sgom pa sngon du 'gro ba'i las kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /o~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i nus pa'i

de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal ba/ sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba 'dul

ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad chos nyid nyid pas khro ba chos nyid nyid dang / sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro ba rdo rje nyid de de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i byang chub ste/ haH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mnyam pa

nyid la rab tu gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mchog ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid dang / thams

cad kyi don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don nyid dang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang / thams cad las nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o/ /hrIH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po bdag nyid thams cad pas sems can thams

cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po dang / rin po che thams cad kyis dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rin po che'i snying po dang / ngag thams cad la rab tu 'jug pas sems

can thams cad chos kyi snying po dang / las thams cad byed pa'i sbyor bas sems can thams cad las kyi snying po'o/ /hrIH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das shing mu med pa'i mthar phyin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang mu med cing mthar phyin pa'i chos dang /

slar yang 'di'i rtog pa dang yongs su mthar thug pa byin gyis brlab pa'i don du chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid yongs su mthar thug pas byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' med

pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mu med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gcig pa nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad gcig pa nyid dang / shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mthar thug pa'i phyir chos thams cad yongs su mthar thug par 'gyur ba ste/ 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan par byed 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byed na de ni dag cing mthar phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i

spyod pa mthar phyin pa la gnas pa nyid kyis sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid myur du thob par 'gyur ro/ /b+h+yoH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa/ chos thams cad spros pa med pas slar yang bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rdo rje chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dam pa thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus las grol ba'i mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/

byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po mchog tu grub pas bde ba chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bde ba chen po mchog tu grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po mchog tu grub

par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mchog tu grub pas bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa

mchog tu grub pas khams gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang phyug mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang phyug mchog tu grub pas ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su skyob

pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i mchog shin tu bde ba chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ro/ /swa~M/ de rgyu ci yi phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas pa mchog rnams gnas gyur pa/ /de srid mnyam med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi

'da' byed par nus/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs/ /ye shes byin gyis brlabs kyis 'grub/ /las ni thams cad rnam dag pas/ /srid pa dag par 'gyur phyir ro/ /chags sogs kyis 'dul 'jig rten ni/ /kun nas srid par rtag

sdig byed/ /de dag rnam par sbyang don du/ /srid pa'i bar du rang 'dul byed/ /ji ltar pad+ma legs dmar ba/ /tshon gyi skyon gyis ma gos ltar/ /bag chags skyon gyi srid pa ru/ /rtag tu 'gro phan gos mi 'gyur/ /'dod chags chen po rnam dag pa/ /bde ba

chen po nor chen po/ /khams gsum dbang phyug thob nas su/ /de dag don ni brtan par byed/ /haH/ 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re bzhin du nang par langs te/ gang 'don pa dang nyan pa dang

'dzin pa dang / rjod par byed na/ des bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur zhing bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dngos grub mchog tu gyur pa skye ba 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur ro/ /hU~M/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur

pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di dag ni nges par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo ste 'di ltar/ oM namaHsar+b+ba bud d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA~M/ o~M bo d+hi tsit+ta badzre/ oM sa man+ta b+ha dra tsAr+ye d+hi/ o~M tsin+ta ma Ni/ o~M a ni ro d+he/ o~M dzA ti bi bar+t+te/ o~M dzA ti pa ri

war te/ o~M ma hA rA gA ng+har+m+mate/ o~M bir+ya ka ba tse/ o~M sar+b+ba gA mi ni/ o~M badzra dr-i D+ha ka btsi te hU~M phaT/ o~M sar+b+ba ta thA ga te/ o~M swa b+hA ba shud d+he/ o~M pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA dz+nyA na bi shud d+he/ o~M karma bi sho d+ha ni hUM/ o~M ni su~M b+ha badzri Ni hUM phaT/ o~M karma rA ge /o~M badzra hUM badzre/ o~M hU~M

sar+b+ba gA ma Ni o~M hrIH/ o~M a kA ro mu khe oM pradz+nyA+e pA ra mi te/ o~M a m+ba hUM/ o~M A~M/ o~M sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta kA ya a gre /o~M sarba ta thA ga ta/ bAka bi sho d+ha ne/ o~M sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzre aH/ o~M s+pho Ta ya sar+b+ba a pA ya ban+d+hanA ni pra mo k+Sha ya sarba a pA ya ga ti b+h+yaHsar+b+bas ma ya

badzra hUM phaT/ sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags so/ /de brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'am de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma

bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa'i sems can gyis bri ba dang bklag pa dang brjod pa dang rim gror bya ba dang bla mar bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang mchod par bya bar yang nus pa ma yin no/ /gzhan du na gang

gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na yi ge gcig tsam yang thos nas sems can de sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par rig par bya na slar yang mtha' dag ma lus pa rdzogs pa lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal sems can

gang la la gang gA'i klung gi bye ma brgyad cu snyed kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la phyag byas bla mar byas rjed par byas mchod par byas na/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan par nus so/ /gang du na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i sa'i

phyogs de mchod rten du gyur par 'gyur te gang zag de yang phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yid la gzung ba 'am/ glegs bam du bris par gyur na de bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /de la bdud sdig to

can gyis bar du mi gcod do/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang / gzhan yang lha rnams kyis phyi bzhin rjes su 'brangs te/ de srung ba dang skyob pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur zhing tshul ma yin pas dus byed par mi 'gyur la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams

cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang yid la 'dod pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta bu'i phan yon mang po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs so/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos rdo rje'i snying po thams cad kyi rgyan theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba chen po gsang ba'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug dam pa chen po

'khor los sgyur ba chen po bzhis yongs su bskor ba rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i snying po 'di phyung ngo / /mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod nas ma skyes pa'o/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /spros pa thams cad spangs

pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas yongs su dag pa'o/ /thams cad kyi sems gsal ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings yongs su rgyas pa'o/ /aHb+h+ruM trA~M hrIHhUM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje yi ge'i tshig 'di brjod pa tsam gyis chos

kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad de snyed nyid du shin tu gsal ba rgya chen pos snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang bsdu bas byon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor

chen po'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad par bya yis nyon cig de legs par nyon la

rab tu yid la gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab ye shes la zhugs la/ de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po chen po la byin gyis brlab par byos shig /de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar zhugs te/

byin gyis brlabs nas de las 'thon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar rnam par gnas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung gnas/ rdo rje snying po'i rgyan byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje chen po snying po'i rgyan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/ /rdo rje snying po

gsang chen po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun ldan dge/ /rdo rje snying po dang mtshungs pa/ /khams rnams thams cad rnam par sprul/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdud rtsi dang / /gzhan yang bcud len dang mtshungs pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /rdo rje

kun gyi rang bzhin grong / /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi ni rnam par mdzes/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dar dang me tog chun pos spras/ /grwa yi cha rnams thams cad dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /rdo rje'i

thig rnams kyis spras pa'i/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /de yi'ang phyi rol du bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi yi ni 'ong / /khyad par ji lta ba bzhin du/ /sngags pas kun nas yongs bskor bya/ /de ltar rnam bzhi'i rnam pa

dang / /ji srid grong ni rnam pa bdun/ /sbyor ba bdun dang yang dag ldan/ /dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /sgo dang sgo khyud rin chen ni/ /yang dag mtho ba legs par gnas/ /de yi grong gi nang du ni/ /rab zhugs 'khor lo 'dra ba ru/ /rdo rje thig gis yongs su bskor/ /ka ba brgyad

kyis nye bar mdzes/ /rdo rje ka mdun gnas rnams su/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa'o/ /de ltar 'khor lo rnam pa gnyis/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pa/ /tshad mdzes pa yi snying po che/ /rdo rje 'khor los rnam par brgyan/ /gru bzhi pa dang zlum

po nyid/ /gru gsum rnam par yang dag byung / /zla phyed rnam pa dang mtshungs pa/ /dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi slar yang / /slob dpon rdo rje yang dag 'byung / /shes rab chen pos rab brtag bya/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /pad+ma chen po 'dab

brgyad pa/ /pad+ma rA ga'i 'od mtshungs la/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan gzhag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni ngos kun tu/ /shes rab can gyis gzhag bya ba/ /dam tshig mchog bzhi rnam bzhi

ni/ /bzhin du yang dag bri/ /rdo rje chen po seng ge'i khrir/ /'khor lo can gyi khyab bdag gzhag /gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / /gzi brjid phung po skal ba che/ /rnam par 'phro byed rnam rgyal nyid/ /de bzhin gtsug tor lnga po ni/ /sangs

rgyas skyob pa thams cad la/ /yongs su bskor nas snam bu la/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song na ni/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhi po ru/ /mi bskyod la sogs rnam pa bzhi/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bri/ /mi bskyod pa yi dkyil 'khor

ni/ /zla 'od lta bu'i mdog tu bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sogs rgyal po/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug rnams/ /rdo rje slob dpon stobs po che/ /shes rab chen pos dgod par bya/ /rin chen 'byung gnas dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje rin chen sogs kyis dgang / /rdo rje

chos sogs gsang ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor tshe dpag med pa'o/ /rdo rje las la sogs ldan pa/ /don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /gnyis pa 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /rnam gzigs la sogs sangs rgyas rnams/ /dkyil

'khor kun tu der ni bri/ /rdo rje snying po rgyal po che/ /khyab bdag gsang ba'i chos dbang phyug /'dod pa'i don kun grub pa'i phyir/ /'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya/ /blo gros rgya mtsho mi zad blo/ /byams pa bdag nyid chen po dang / /nam mkha'i snying po grags chen po/ /

kun tu bzang po nyid dag dang / /phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che/ /kun nas 'bar bas 'khrug pa'i 'od/ /'jam dpal dbyangs ni rigs kyi mchog /sangs rgyas sras bzang dri ma med/ /sgrib pa thams cad nges par sel/ /de nas sa yi snying po mchog /nam mkha'i

mdzod ni mdzod dam pa/ /lag na rin chen bla na med/ /ngan song kun ni 'joms pa ni/ /dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya/ /dpa' bo 'di dag gsang ba che/ /dkyil 'khor 'di dag bri bar bya/ /'khor lo de ni dor nas ni/ /blo gros ldan pas phyir song ste/ /shar

du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya bzhin du dgod/ /'khor lo mdzes pa'i dge legs can/ /rdo rje dpal be'u pad ces bya/ /gtsug tor rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /rdo rje pad mas rnam par brgyan/ /lhung bzed dang ni 'khar gsil dang / /chos

gos kyang ni khyad par du/ /shAkya seng ge ji srid par/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu gsungs/ /gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod pa/ /de rnams blo ldan brtan pas bri/ /byang du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog de bzhin te/ /pad+ma ud pal

nyid dang ni/ /spyi blugs pags pa'i g.yang gzhi dang / /dbyug gu'i shing ni mkhas pa yis/ /ma myos pa ru bri bar bya/ /slar yang lho ru song nas ni/ /phya na rdo rje bdag nyid che/ /slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis/ /phyag rgya 'bad pas bri bar bya/ /rdo rje paT+Ta sha

dang ni/ /dril bu rab tu mdzes pa dang / /dbyug gu dang ni tho ba dang / /dbyug pa rdo rjes mtshon pa dang / /lcags sgrog dang ni rtse gsum yang / /'di dag dpa' bo'i phyag rgya'o/ /dkyil 'khor nub tu song nas ni/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo dang ldan/ /gsang ba'i

chos ni dam pa'i mchog /brtson 'grus chen po'i phyag rgya bri/ /ud pal 'khor lo rdo rje dang / /ral gri yang ni khyad par du/ /thod pa dang ni dgra sta nyid/ /rma bya dang ni seng ge nyid/ /phyag rgya 'di ni brtson 'grus che/ /mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya/ /

'khor lo'i grwa ni legs gnas par/ /rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs bri/ /phyi yi 'khor lo'i grwa ru ni/ /rdo rje bdug pa zhes bya sogs/ /bdag nyid chen po 'bad pa yis/ /mchod pa 'di dag bri bar bya/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su/ /gzugs kyi

rdo rje la sogs min/ /gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni/ /khyad par du ni ro nyid dang / /reg dang chos kyi dbyings dang ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya/ /sgo yi nang ni thams cad du/ /sgo skyong ba ni dgod par bya/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ru/ /rdo rje shugs

kyis song nas ni/ /bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi/ /yum rnams 'bad pas bri bar bya/ /nam mkha'i spyan zhes bya ba ni/ /sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba dang / /shes rab pha rol phyin ma yang / /phyag rgya kun dang yang dag ldan/ /ji srid de bzhin gshegs rig ma/ /

thams cad shar du dgod par bya/ /de nas blo gros ldan pa yis/ /byang gi phyogs su song nas ni/ /gos dkar ma dang sgrol ma che/ /khro gnyer can dang grags 'dzin ma/ /khyad par du ni dpal bdun dang / /mda' bdun dang ni dbyangs can ma/ /de la sogs

pa'i lha mo rnams/ /bran dang bran mor yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin pho nya pho nya mo/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya lhan cig bri/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /lho yi phyogs su rab phyin la/ /mA ma kI dang lcags sgrog dang / /khab rtse rdo rje'i mtshan ma mchog /de ltar bris

nas blo ldan gyis/ /nub kyi phyogs su song nas ni/ /der ni phyin nas shes ldan gyis/ /skra can stobs chen bri bar bya/ /de bzhin 'dam bu mda' rgyu dang / /lha mo zla mdzes 'od zer 'dra/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi mtshams rnams su/ /de bzhin nye ba'i skra can ma/ /

'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya/ /rab bkra nor gyi blo gros dang / /'gugs byed pho nya lnga dang ldan/ /grwa yi cha ru bri bya ba/ /rdo rje mdung rtse zhes bya sogs/ /sgo yi nang ni thams cad du/ /sgo skyong ba ni rnam par bri/ /gzhan gyis mi thub lha mo che/ /de bzhin ral pa gcig

ma mchog /rdo rje dregs mo lha mo che/ /rdo rje kum b+hi yang dag bri/ /de nas blo ldan dkyil 'khor ni/ /thams cad las ni 'thon nas su/ /shar gyi cha ni thams cad du/ /sngags pa mnyam par gzhag pa yis/ /khro chen gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /de bzhin mi g.yo zhes

bya dang / /khams gsum rnam rgyal snying po ni/ /mnga' bdag brgya phrag lnga yis bskor/ /shar du bris nas sngags pa yis/ /de nas byang gi char song ste/ /rta mgrin khro bo chen po dang / /skar ma'i spyan ni khyad par du'o/ /khro gnyer rim pa rnam bsgyings pa/ /

khro bo blo ldan brtson 'grus che/ /pho nya bran rnams thams cad dang / /ma mo stong gis yongs bskor bar/ /'jig rten mgon gyis bka' stsal to/ /de nas blo gros ldan pa yis/ /lho yi phyogs su song nas su/ /der ni phyin te brtson chen po/ /khro bo chen po

stobs po che/ /rdo rje mtshan pas legs mtshan pa/ /shes rab chen pos dgod par bya/ /khro bo zla ba'i thig le dang / /de bzhin khro chen rdo rje 'chang / /khro bo gzegs ma stobs po che/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / /rdo rje sa 'og sa 'og dang / /de bzhin

'jigs pa'i mig can dang / /rkang pas bsnun pa'i rdo rje mchog /gsang dang rab gsang rjes 'gro dang / /bran dang pho nya rjes 'gro ba/ /rjes 'gro can blo khro bo ni/ /stong phrag gsum dang phyed kyis bskor/ /de ltar bris nas blo ldan gyis/ /nub kyi phyogs su phyin

nas ni/ /der ni song ste brtson chen po/ /gshin rje mthar byed ces bya ba/ /gdong drug pa la lag drug pa/ /khro bo yi ge bdun zhes bya/ /khro bo'i gtso bo stong phrag ni/ /bdun dag gis ni yongs bskor ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor cha ni thams cad du/ /khro bo

gtum po thams cad bri/ /de nas blo ldan 'ongs nas su/ /rang rgyal rgyal ba thams cad ni/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya/ /de nas sngags pa 'ongs nas ni/ /rgyal ba nyan thos bri bar bya/ /de nas thams cad bris nas su/ /de rnams tshangs sogs lha

de dag /dkyil 'khor kun tu rnam par bri/ /dbang phyug che dang khyab 'jug dang / /zla ba nyi ma zhes bya dang / /gza' brgyad dang ni 'jig rten skyong / /rgyal chen rigs ni bzhi po dang / /de bzhin sum cu rtsa gsum nyid/ /'thab bral rnams dang

dga' ldan rnams/ /'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams/ /tshangs chen rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med

rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba rnams dang / 'og min rnams dang / dag pa'i gnas pa rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mtshams

su dgod par bya'o/ /de nas dbang ldan du dbang ldan dang / dbang por dbang po dang / mer me lha dang / gshin rjer gshin rje dang / bden bral du bden bral dang / chur chu lha dang / rlung du rlung lha dang / lus ngan du lus ngan rnams dang / phyi rol du khor

yug chen po'i ri'i rgyal po bri bar bya'o/ /rab dga'i nang du rgya mtsho chen po bdun dgod par bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o/ /lhor rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o/ /

nub tu khro bo'i rgyal po chen po gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o/ /byang du rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya chen po rnam par dgod par bya'o/ /de lta bu'i gru bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po dar dang me tog gi chun po dang / sgo khyud dang / gdugs dang /

rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas bklubs pa/ de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor chen po bris la bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i phyi rol du 'gro ba lnga po gzhag par bya'o/ /de bzhin du dbus su ri'i rgyal po lhun po'i tshad dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du ma

rnam par bsams nas/ de'i steng du rdo rje seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhag par bya'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor rim gyis bkod nas nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyi tshogs mchod nas nye bar zhugs te/ dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang dam tshig

gis bcings nas mnyes par byas te/ mchod pa dang dbang bskur ba dang byin gyis brlab pa dang spro ba dang / bsdu ba la sogs pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya'o/ /de bzhin du bsgom pa las blang ste de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad dang rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid ni rnam par snang mdzad nga'o zhes bsgom par bya'o/ /de lta bu las langs nas de'i snyems pa 'chang zhing snying rje dang byams pa'i 'dren byed dang mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' las 'das pa rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i

sprin thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sprin gyis kun nas bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'bab pas rdo rje sems dpa' hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya rang gi lus la zhugs nas/ phyogs thams cad hUM gi yi ge'i sgras rab tu bsgrag par bya'o/ /

bsnun pa bzhis rol pa dang bcas pas phyag rgya la bzlas pa bya ste/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ cho ga bzhin du rdo rje slob dpon gyis bkug nas bcug ste bcings la dam tshig la gzhag par byas nas rdo rje se gol gyi sbyor ba dang kun nas 'bebs pa'i phyag

rgyas bdag nyid la dbab ste/ snying po 'di bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag mtshungs so snyam du bsam par bya'o/ /de la 'di ni thams cad 'bebs pa'i snying po bzhi por 'gyur ro/ /a A a~M aHbdag byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas

slob dpon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag mtshungs pa yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje lcags kyu'i se gol gtogs nas sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o/ /de la snying po ni 'di yin te/

badzra sa mA dzaH/ A gats+tsha A gats+tshan+tu/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ sar+b+ba bo d+hi satwa pa ri br-i tAH prat+ye kar+ha ha te swA hA zhes so/ /oM badzra sa mA dzaH/ A gats+tsha/ A gats+tsha/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA badzra yo gI shwar/ sa t+pa na yaiH/ swa hA a hAH/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud dang gzugs rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor du 'dus nas byon par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgya chen po bdag nyid rnam par bsgoms nas ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa bton la cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan par byas nas sgo bzhi po rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas te/ las

chen po dam pa'i phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzhug par bya'o/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ su ra ta badzra badzra satwa dzaHhUM baM hoHa d+hi tiSh+than+tu/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA maN+Da la~M zhes so/ /de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag gsol ba 'debs lags kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ sems can thams cad kyi

don mdzad du gsol/ bdag la dngos grub thams cad stsal du gsol/ ji ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul kun nas bkang ste byin

gyis brlab par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /de nas 'dir rdo rje snying po'i rgyan chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas par 'gyur ba ni de nas gos dmar po phrag par gzar te de bzhin de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar nas/ sngags 'dis snyan gsan dbab par bya ste/ sa ma ya hoH/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya badzra a d+hiSh+ThA naM ku ru mAM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sa ma yeShu me a d+hi tiSh+than+tu sar+b+ba bud+d+ha mAM pra be sha yan+tu/ pra ti pA la

yan+tu/ pU dzA ny+tsa me pra yats+tshan+tu/ pra piSh+Tosmi/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra maN+Da/ a laM kA re ma hA badzra maN+Da le pra ti ba la yan tu mAM stu dzany+tsa me pra yats+tshan+tu/ de nas slob dpon gyis de'i thal mor me tog dkar po'i phreng ba sngags 'dis btags nas nang du me tog bzhi dang sor mo'i rtse mor

me tog re re bcug la de nas sngags 'di brjod cing gzhug par bya'o/ /hU~M d+h+waM hrA+oM kruM shruM dzruM baHkaH pra~M khiM shrIM dzruM hAM mAM/ a d+hi tiSh+ThamAM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya sa twa pra bi shA mi/ de nas slob dpon gyis de'i gdong g.yogs bcings la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i khams rab tu khyab pa'i sbyor bas de bcug la sngags 'dis me tog gtor bar bya'o/ /sngags ni sa ma yo haM sa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya hUM/ gang la me tog rnams lhung ba de nyid de'i lhar byin par bya'o/ /

de nas cho ga bzhin du sngags 'dis dbab par bya'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ta Ta ta Ta/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ badzra hUM bi kri ta bing+tsa dz+dzi hwA du rdAn ta da ma ka /ha si ta laM bo da ra/ ka ha ka ha/ tsu lu tsu lu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ aT+TAT+Ta hA sa/ da ra bi da ra/ badzra badzrong+ga ta/ badzra

ne tra/ badzra shro tra/ badzra g+h+rA Na/ badzra daMSh+T+ra kiny+tsi rA ya si pra bi sha /badzra pA Ne hrI da ya mA bi sha /mA bi sha /g+hUr+N+Na g+hUr+N+Na/ pUr+N+Na pUr+N+Na/ g+hur+N+Na pa ya/ g+hUr+N+Na pa ya/ b+h+rA ma ya b+h+rA ma ya/ pA ta ya mo Ta ya/ a be sha ya/ dzalpa dzalpa/ dzalpa pa ya dzalpa pa ya/ la g+hu la g+hu/

sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA dz+nyA ka ra pra ba ra/ d+har+m+ma la b+d+ha/ bi dza ya/ he he badzra dz+haM kA ra hU~M kr-i ta swA hA/ dbab pa'i dam tshig go/ /de ltar phab nas kye khyod kyis gang dge ba'am mi dge ba mthong ngam zhes dri'o/ /da nas de de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'am dge ba'am

mi dge ba bdag gis 'di lta bu mthong ngo zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas slob dpon gyis de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du yongs su gzhag la mig bcings pa bkrol la dbang bskur ba'i don du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas

la de'i dbus su kha dog thams cad kyis pad+ma chen po 'dab ma brgyad pa yid du 'ong ba'am/ seng ge'i khri rang nyid kyis bris te de nas de la dar gyi bgo ba dang / me tog bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod la khyad par du gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang gdugs

dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa nye bar mkho ba dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga bo che dang / dung la sogs pa dang gar dang / glu rnams kyis legs par mchod nas cod pan lnga'i dbang bskur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje slob dpon gyi

go 'phang la sngags 'dis rab tu gzhag par bya'o/ /o~M sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzro Sh+NI Sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa o~M badzra sa twa a b+hi Shiny+tsa o~M badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ o~M badzra pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ o~M badzra badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa spyi bo dang / dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang / snying ga dang / lte ba dang /

rked pa nas rje ngar gyi bar du yi ge'i phyag rgya bkod la rang gi lha'i gzugs kyi sbyor bas blta bar bya'o/ /de de ltar dbang bskur nas rigs dang mthun pa'i ming byas nas rdo rje'i cho ga rnams bslab par bya'o/ /de la rdo rje'i gnas tshig rnams ni 'di dag ste/ rang bzhin

gyis dbyer med pa'i phyir rang gi lus rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis lta ba'i thibs po thams cad nges par 'joms par 'gyur ro/ /rig pa la 'jug pa'i phyir ma rig pa rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis dmigs pa'i dngos po yongs su shes

pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /hU~M/ mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir mtshams med pa'i mtha' rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis blta bar gyur pa thams cad nges par rig par 'gyur ro/ /o~M/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'dod chags kyi

mtha' rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'di 'dod chags dang bral ba'i ched du 'jug go/ /ha/ byams pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir zhe sdang gi mtha' rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'di nyes pa thams cad gcod pa'i ched du 'jug go /maiH/ shes rab sgron ma

mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir gti mug gi mtha'i rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis mun pa bsal bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /ra~M/ sems can thams cad sems can gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sems can mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i don dang sems can gyi rang bzhin

rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro/ /hrI/ sems can thams cad sems gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sems nges pa la 'jug pa'i don dang sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba mngon par rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro/ /a/ sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas

gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i don dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro/ /o~M/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjes

su rtogs par 'jug pa'i don dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro/ /A~M/ bdud kyi las thams cad sangs rgyas kyi las te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'di las thams cad rjes su rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / las thams cad las yongs

su 'das pa'i don du 'gyur ro/ /hU~M/ ngag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'di sgra ji bzhin pa thams cad rjes su rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / brjod pa las 'das pa'i chos rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro/ /r+d+ha~M/ chos

thams cad ma skyes pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'di 'chi 'pho med pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang 'chi ba'i las 'da' ba'i don du 'gyur ro/ /ma~M/ chos thams cad ma byung ba ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'di 'gog pa med pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / chos

thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i don du 'gyur ro/ /kha~M/ 'di la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa/ /bdag gis de nyid rab rtogs te/ /bdag gis de nyid rab brtags nas/ /sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams

cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / gter thams cad dang / 'khor lo thams cad dang / rdo rje thams cad dang / ral gri dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / dngul chu dang / bcud len rnams dang / gyen du 'gro ba dang / rkang 'og dang mi snang ba dang /

rig pa 'dzin pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams des myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /hU~M/ yid ni rtse gcig gyur pa yis/ /sangs rgyas rjes

dran bsgoms nas ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs bsgom par bya/ /sbyor ba de yi bka' drin gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med 'gyur/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab gsal

ba'i/ /kun tu bzang po phyag rgya che/ /legs par mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom/ /lo ni phyed kyi sbyor ba yis/ /kun tu bzang po 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya che/ /legs par mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom/ /rgyal po'i dbang bskur nyid dam ni/ /

yang na dbang phyug thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che/ /de ni rang gis brtan por bsgom/ /'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug kyang / /thob na dngos grub gzhan ci smos/ /rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya gang / /de bzhin nyid kyi 'od gsal ba/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas de

bsgoms pas/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor brtan por 'gyur/ /de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems kyi mchog bsgom pa phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes nyid yin no/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya che/ /legs par mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom/ /phyag rgya kun gyi bdag nyid

kyi/ /dam pa'i don nyid thob par 'gyur/ /gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya che/ /dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya/ /gsang ba'i rgyal srid thob 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /gdugs dkar gtsug tor chen po ni/ /dam pa'i don du bsgom

par bya/ /gtsug tor ye shes thob 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya che/ /de ni yang dang yang du bsgom/ /chos kyi rgyal srid rnam rgyal nyid/ /mdor bsdus pas ni thob par 'gyur/ /rnam rgyal gtsug tor phyag rgya yi/ /

dam pa'i yi ge bsgom par bya/ /legs par rab gnas 'od zer can/ /dngos grub ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /gtsug tor rnams kyis legs bshad pa/ /phyag rgya de rnams bdag

nyid mchog /de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na/ /lhag pa'i lha ni gcig pu nyid/ /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/ /rang 'byung mchog tu mi 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug go 'phang mchog /sangs rgyas ye shes dri

ma med/ /bdag nyid chen po thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnams so/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi yi ge'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes de la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam

par dpyod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo ste rnam par 'byed pa'i don du shes par bya'o/ /o~M pa~M/ a zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do/ /A+o~M a A a~M aH/ pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste don dam par chos thams

cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par blta bar bya'o/ /oM pa~M/ na zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi ming dang gzugs dang shes rab dang chos dang bcas pa la dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do/ /o~M na~M/ da zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba

dang zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor brjod do/ /o~M daM/ sa zhes bya ba ni thogs pa med pa las yang dag par 'das shing / yongs su nyon mongs pa dang rnam par spong ba dang zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med

pa'i sgo nas phung po dang / khams dang skye mched la sogs pa don dam pa'i bden pa la nye bar len pa/ mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go/ /oM sru~M/ ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i phyir chos

thams cad kyi sgor rnam par blta'o/ /o~M taM/ ka zhes bya ba ni las kyi rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bya'o/ /o~M ka~M /ma zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang dran pa med cing snying rje che ba dang shes rab rno ba las byung ba'i phyir chos thams

cad kyi sgor gsal bar bshad do/ /o~M ma~M/ ga zhes bya ba ni zab mo gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /o~M ga~M /dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba las yongs su rgal ba'i rang bzhin mi phyed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar

bya'o/ /o~M dza~M/ d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings yongs su mi phyed pa'i rdo rje yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /o~M r+d+ha~M/ sha zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /o~M sha~M/ kha zhes

bya ba ni gang zag dang chos kyi bdag med pa nam mkha' ltar gsal zhing chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go/ /o~M kha~M/ k+Sha zhes bya ba ni g.yo ba skye ba med pas mi zad pa'i ye shes so sor dmigs te/ chos

thams cad yongs su dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /o~M k+Sha~M/ nga zhes bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /o~M ngaM / tha zhes bya ba ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pas

sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /o~M tha~M/ D+ha zhes bya ba ni mthar phyin pa dang mur thug pa med pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rab tu spangs pas zad pa dang mi skye ba'i ye shes thob pa'i mchog tu byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor

bshad do/ /o~M D+ha~M/ dz+ha zhes bya ba ni dri ma'i rnam par dmigs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /o~M dz+ha~M/ lus rnam par 'byed pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te rdo rje snying po'i lus so sor thob pa'i phyir chos

thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /o~M kA~M /sems rnam par 'byed pa ni nyes ba dang rmongs pa dang bag la nyal ba rab tu spangs nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /o~M a~M/ ngag rnam par

'byed pa ni ngag gi spros pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /o~M bA~M/ tsha zhes bya ba ni grib ma ma dmigs shing rang bzhin gyis dang ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /o~M tshaM/ g+ha zhes bya ba ni gcig tu 'dres

pa ma dmigs pa'i don dam par gnyis su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /o~M g+haM/ Ta zhes bya ba ni ca co dang bral ba dang rdo rje snyems pa 'dzin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do/ /o~M ToM/ pha zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad dbu ba rdos pa lta bu'i

tshul gyis gsang ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i phyir chos kyi sgor bshad do/ /o~M pha~M/ Da zhes bya ba ni 'tshe ba las grol ba'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba grub pas so sor thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /o~M DaM/ Sha zhes bya ba ni tsha sgom dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams

cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /oM Sha~M/ chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i phyir nye bar zhi ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go/ /o~M u~M/ tshul bzhin ni nges par 'byung ba'i don du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la 'jug pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta

bar bya'o/ /o~M yo~M/ de kho na nyid ni spros pa thams cad rnam par spang ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go/ /o~M ta~M/ ma skyes pa'i chos rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do/ /o~M hu~M/

yongs su gzung ba med pa ni 'thab pa dang rtsod pa spangs pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /o~M hrA+oM/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ni mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /o~M ka kha ga g+ha nga / rang

bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid gzung ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gnas so/ /o~M tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ snang ba ni gsal zhing 'bar ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /o~M Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ bsgom pa ni chos thams cad kun tu sbyor ba dang bral ba yang dag par sdud

pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /o~M ta tha da d+ha na/ gzhi med pa ni chos thams cad ma 'dres pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go/ /o~M pa pha ba b+ha ma/ byang chub ni chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /o~M ya

ra la wa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni blo bur ba thams cad nges par dor ba'i mtshan nyid dang chos kyi dbyings so sor thob cing mngon par shes pa lnga dang ye shes mkhyen pas sangs rgyas kyis yongs su thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /o~M sha Sha sa ha/ rnam pa

thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa rnam par 'byed par byed pa'o zhes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sgo rnam par nges pa'o/ /de nas rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas par gyur pa ni/ sngon

bzhin nges par byas nas ni/ /phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid bsgoms nas/ /ri rab chen po gru bzhi pa/ /rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /de yi steng du rdo rje che/ /de yi steng du pad+ma gzhag /'dab ma brgyad pa ches bkra ba/ /rnal 'byor gnas zhes rnam par bshad/ /

dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa/ /yongs su rdzogs par bdag nyid kyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad nyid bsgoms na/ /de nas bskal pa'i mthar thug gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya che/ /'od zer gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ /rnal 'byor thams

cad bsgom par bya/ /mnyam med sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs/ /b+ha ga chen po rnal 'byor che/ /rnal 'byor pa gnas mi zad pa/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag bsgoms nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che/ /

sems can kun la thams cad du/ /gang tshe rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na/ /de tshe dngos grub lag na gnas/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal chos/ /gdod nas dag cing ma 'dres pa/ /gang tshe ye shes mthong ba ni/ /de yi tshe na dag par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas

thams cad mdor bsdus pa/ /sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis/ /gang tshe rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na/ /sna tshogs las ni byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes so// //'khor los sgyur ba rgyal po che/ /kun

mchog sa yi dbang phyug ni/ /rdo rje sbyor bas bsgoms na ni/ /mnyam med 'khor los sgyur ba mtshungs/ /gzi brjid phung po phyag rgya che/ /legs par mnyam par gzhag pa bsgom/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs shing mdzes/ /pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /

rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms nas ni/ /rang nyid gzi brjid phung por 'gyur/ /gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi/ /phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni/ /'od zer gsal ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /sems can dag pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rnam par gsal ba'i gtsug tor

rgya/ /ral gri 'bar ba'i 'od kyis 'khrugs/ /zag pa med pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mnyam med gsal ba'i gtsug tor mtshungs/ /rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya che/ /legs par mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom/ /rgyal ba'i gtsug tor sbyor ba yis/ /

de yi rnam pa'i spyod yul 'gyur/ /rdo rje dam tshig ye shes che/ /legs par mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom/ /kun tu bzang po sogs gzugs kyis/ /mnyam med rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /rdo rje

sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /byang chub sems dang mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /gtsug tor lnga ldan stobs po che/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya che/ /don dam par ni bsgoms na ni/ /

'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed na/ /skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /rdo rje chags pa'i phyag rgya che/ /legs par mnyam par gzhag pa bsgom/ /skye dgu thams cad chags 'gyur na/ /bud med gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /rdo rje legs pa'i phyag rgya che/ /

dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya/ /legs so ba ni rab gsol bas/ /bud med thams cad tshim par byed/ /byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// //rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya che/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /dpral ba'i phyogs su

gnas pa bsgom/ /de yis dar thod dbang bskur thob/ /rdo rje gzi brjid phyag rgya che/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /snying gar gnas pa bsgom par bya/ /kun mkhyen ye shes ster bar byed/ /rin chen tog gi phyag rgya che/ /legs par mnyam par

gzhag pas bsgom/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa mchog /sgrub po dam pas rdzogs par byed/ /rdo rje bzhad pa phyag rgya che/ /legs par mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom/ /rdo rje bzhad pa ltar gyur te/ /de ni skye dgu dga' byed 'gyur/ /dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i

ye shes so// //pad+ma bde chen pad+ma la/ /dag pa'i chos ni mnyam gzhag pas/ /dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya/ /mnyam med rdo rje chos dang mtshungs/ /shes rab ye shes rdo rje rno/ /bsgoms pas de ni rdo rje 'chang / /shes rab pha rol phyin dag pa/ /stong

nyid sbyor bas bsgoms na ni/ /dam pa'i don du bsgom bya de/ /mnyam med 'jam dbyangs dang ni mtshungs/ /rdo rje rgyu yi phyag rgya che/ /legs par mnyam par gzhag bsgoms nas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo kun mchog rtse/ /mdor bsdus nas ni de yis bskor/ /rdo rje

smra ba'i phyag rgya che/ /dam pa'i don du bsgoms nas ni/ /rdo rje bzlas pa'i nus pa yis/ /ldem po'i ngag ni de yis 'chad/ /chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// //rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya che/ /dam pa'i don du bsgoms na ni/ /kun nas kun nas rang nyid kyis/ /

rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur/ /rdo rje bsrung ba byams pa che/ /rdo rje chos zhes grags pa ste/ /chos kyi sbyor bas bsgoms na ni/ /rdo rje bsrung ba dang mtshungs 'gyur/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin brtson 'grus che/ /khro bo chen po stobs po che/ /dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par

bya/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin dang mtshungs 'gyur/ /rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya che/ /lus ngag yid kyis de bzhin du/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin par 'gyur/ /las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// //sgeg mos mngon par dga' ba ster/ /phreng

ba yang ni dbang bskur ba/ /glu mas mdzes pa'i sgra dbyangs byed/ /gar mas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/ /dri mas bzang po'i dri yin te/ /me tog byang chub yan lag nyid/ /sgron mas mtha' dag gsal ba'o/ /bdug pas bdug pa dag la brtson/ /lcags

kyus dbang phyug 'gugs byed na/ /skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /zhags pas dbang po 'ching 'gyur na/ /gdug pa'i sems can smos ci dgos/ /lcags sgrog gis ni 'phrog byed dang / /tshangs sogs dbang phyug chen po'ang 'ching / /'bebs pas

thams cad 'bebs 'gyur na/ /dman pa'i mi dag smos ci dgos/ /'di nyid kyi ni sbyor ba yis/ /chos kyi yi ge mchog gi ni/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes rab sbyor bas/ /sbyar te myur du bsgrub par bya/ /'di yi sbyor ba shes par bya/ /phyag rgya'i 'khor lo khyad

par du/ /spyi gtsug snying ga rkang pa'i bar/ /yi ge yis ni yongs gang par/ /gzugs brnyan gcig gi go 'phang gyur/ /sems rtse gcig 'gyur bsam gtan gyis/ /sa la rab gnas pad+ma ni/ /dbang chen gyi ni gnas zhes bshad/ /

dbang po gnyis ni mtshungs sbyor bas/ /dbang phyug kyang ni bsgrub par bya/ /dbang chen dag ni gru bzhi pa/ /dbang chen gyi ni las su bshad/ /chu ni zlum par shes par bya/ /pad+ma'i mtshan mas rnam par mtshan/ /zhi bar byed pa'i las dang ldan/ /zhi ba'i

don du de bshad do/ /me ni gru gsum shes par bya/ /sum mdo yi ni gnas su gnas/ /dbang du bya ba bsgrub don du/ /pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba'i 'od/ /mngon spyod la ni brtson 'grus che/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor brjod bya ste/ /ral gri yi ni phyag rgya'i dbyibs/ /

dbyar gyi sprin dang mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /ser dang dkar dang de bzhin dmar/ /nag po yang ni khyad par du/ /dang po'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /tha ma'i bar du rab tu brtag /dang po rdo rje rab tu gzhag /de yi rjes su rin chen te/ /pad+ma dang ni las rnal

'byor/ /grub pa'i go 'phang rim par bshad/ /phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rtag pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bka' stsal pa/ gnyis dang gnyis su med pas yongs su dag pas chos thams

cad rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /rtag pa yongs su dag pas chos thams cad zhi ba dang mtha' dang mtha' med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /zad pa'i sgo dang zad pa'i mtha' dang zad pa'i mur thug pa dang ldan pas chos thams cad zad pa dang / 'dod

chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi mtha' rnam par dag pas chos thams cad la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /mig lnga la yang dag par 'das pas chos thams cad nam mkha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /

sems can thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba nyid kyi phyir/ chos thams cad dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /byang chub kyi sems dang

tha mi dad pas chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid med pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab

pa'o/ /'tshe ba med pas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /skad cig ma nyid pas chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba'i mtha' dang ldan pas chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas

btab pa'o/ /sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' de bzhin nyid pas chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /gdod ma nas yongs su dag pas chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam pa

nyid pas chos thams cad chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /spros pa'i dmigs pa rnam par bral bas chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /re ba thams cad las rnam par grol bas chos thams cad smon pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas

btab pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis na chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /phung po lnga yongs su 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid kyis na chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /rang bzhin gyis bdag med pas

chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /shin tu mi g.yo ba'i phyir chos thams cad zhi ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /don dam pa'i bden pa yang dag par 'du ba'i phyir chos thams cad bden pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /'tsho ba rnam par

mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /mchog tu mthar phyin pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'khrug pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' bcad pa'i phyir chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin

gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /'jal ba'i dbang du byed pa dang dbang du bya ba med pa'i phyir chos thams cad sgro 'dogs pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /byed pa pos byas pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /rang bzhin gyis ma byung

ba'i phyir chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /'gag pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas skye ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /

rtog ge kun tu spyod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /gzugs rnam par lta ba med pa'i phyir chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /gnas yongs su bcad pa'i phyir chos thams

cad nye bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /mi mthun pa'i phyogs nye bar mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad la rjes su sbyor ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad med pa'i phyir chos thams cad las kyi rnam par smin pa

med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /skye ba dang gnas pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /nam mkha' dang khyad par med pa'i phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /mtshan

nyid gcig pa'i phyir chos thams cad gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /snying po med pa'i phyir chos thams cad phung po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /snying po dang bcas pa med pa'i phyir chos

thams cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang mnyam pa nyid thob pas chos thams cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /mtha' gcig tu 'jig rten gyi lam rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad

'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /lha rjes su byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad phyag rgya chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /mtha' gcig tu chos la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /thams cad kyi

las sna tshogs byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /thams cad dam tshig thams cad rjes su bsgrub pa'i phyir chos thams cad dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad

sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /chos thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phyir lam gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / theg pa chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / /gsang sngags kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / phyag rgya'i phyag

rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / ye shes thams cad kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyag

rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang /

chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o/ /muH/ 'jam dpal phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi tshig de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshig thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa theg pa chen po'i tshig ste/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyag rgya nyid kyi phyag

rgya'i tshig gang gis/ phyag rgya'i tshig 'di rnams kyis kyang chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong skyed par byed do/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /a a~M aHA~M/ sngags pas phyag rgya 'di lta bus rgyas btab na de bzhin

gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya yang dag par 'du'o/ /hU~M/ myur du ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /kha~M/ de nas da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyor ba thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes su gyur pa ni/ snying gi

dbus su rtag bsgom bya/ /pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par/ /de yi steng du rtag bsgom pa/ /yi ge yi ni gtso bo mchog /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/ /kha ba ba mo'i 'od 'dra 'od/ /

dpa' bo kun+da zla ltar dkar/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar 'od gsal/ /zhi ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin sku/ /kun mkhyen ye shes kyis gang ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /ra sA ya na dang mtshungs mchog /kha yig mkha' 'drar shes par bya/ /thig

le nA das rnam par spras/ /gsang ba chen po mchog tu mdzes/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag /de yi steng du 'od zer che/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje rdo rje lta bur gnas/ /spyi bor rtse mo lnga dang ldan/ /de yi steng du rtag bsams pa/ /yi ge

mchog gi go 'phang ngo / /man ngag mchog las shes bya ste/ /gzhan du na ni nga mi smra/ /sangs rgyas mkhas pa thams cad kyis/ /mdor bsdus nas ni 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par grol ba gsum thob nas/ /thob 'gyur 'di ni gzhan du min/ /lce ni rkan

la sbyar bar bya/ /sna yi rtse mor yi ge hU~M/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /phyag rgya'i go 'phang tshig gis ni/ /shes rab ldan pas rang sems bsgom/ /snang ba med cing spros med pa/ /shin tu mchog tu phrar shes bya/ /khyab bdag bsod nams

ye shes dngos/ /bsam bya bsam gtan brtson byas te/ /mig dang sgron ma'i 'od bzhin du/ /ra yig 'bar ba dang ldan pa/ /mgrin pa 'bad pas gcum nas ni/ /dkar po ser po sngon po'i 'od/ /dmar po yang ni bdag gis spro/ /'bar ba 'di dag 'bad pa

yis/ /'di dag yang dag nyer mtshon bya/ /snying gar gsal bar byas nas su/ /de bzhin thams cad spyi bor song / /gnas de las ni 'thon nas kyang / /dbang po thams cad dgang bar byas/ /de las 'thon nas 'jig rten ni/ /mtshungs par kun nas

thams cad du/ /slar yang de ru 'ongs nas ni/ /de ni 'jug par rab tu bsam/ /yid kyis de ltar bsgoms na ni/ /rang nyid 'khor los sgyur lta bur/ /dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas/ /legs par mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom/ /dbang po lngas ni

dmigs nas yang / /mi rnams lus ni dag par 'gyur/ /ji snyed bud med yon tan dang / /ldan pa kun du gnas pa ni/ /bkug nas bcug ste bcings nas su/ /dbang du bya ste bsgrub par bya/ /de rnams lhan cig yongs brten nas/ /sngags pa mchog gi

dngos grub thob/ /gsang ba mchog tu dgyes pa na/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa ste/ /zhi ba'i chos kyi rim pa mchog /shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub gang / /de 'grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /mchog ni rtag par shes

par bya/ /bar mas phun sum tshogs pa ste/ /stong pa nyid dang mtshan med mchog /smon pa med pa zhes su grags/ /chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog /kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs par byed/ /sa bcu yi ni stobs dag gis/ /pha rol phyin pa thams cad thob/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgoms nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de nyid 'di ni bcud kyis len/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog /theg chen mchog tu yid 'ong ba/ /stong nyid bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye

shes mchog /gang gis rtag tu sgom byed na/ /de yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /yon tan mchog las skyes par 'gyur/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /bud med lus ngag yid sbyor bas/ /yongs reg A liM ga tsum+bas/ /mchog gi dngos grub thob

par 'gyur/ /bud med kha dog ljang gu gang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /de tshe de ni sngags pas bsten/ /mnyam med gsang ba'i ye shes mtshungs/ /bud med gang zhig kha dog dkar/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i 'od/ /de dang lhan cig sngags pas

bsdad/ /dam pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /bu mo gang zhig kha dog dmar/ /ut+pa la yi rgyan 'chang ma/ /sngags pas de dang lhan cig gnas/ /shes rab pha rol phyin mtshungs 'gyur/ /bud med in dra nI la mtshungs/ /gsang ba rdo rje rjes su sbyor/ /

rig 'dzin rnams kyi rgyal po ni/ /stobs chen grub par de 'gyur ro/ /gsang chen ma ra ka ta mtshungs/ /gang gis rtag tu bsten pa ni/ /de yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /myur du gsang ba'i dam par 'gyur/ /bud med pad+ma rA ga 'dra/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par

brgyan/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /rdo rje 'dzin ma lta bur bsgrub/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog /bsam pas rtag tu bsgom pa ni/ /mnyam med sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag

pa bzhi/ /mchog gis gnas kyis bsgoms na ni/ /rnal 'byor mchog gis mi ring bar/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'gyur/ /yang dag spong ba rnam pa bzhi/ /legs par mnyam par gzhag pa bsgom/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /mnyam med

'jig rten dbang phyug mtshungs/ /so so yang dag rig pa bzhi/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms na ni/ /rdo rje sangs rgyas ting 'dzin mchog /mnyam med 'jam pa'i mchog dang 'dra/ /mi 'jigs pa ni rnam pa bzhi/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /dbang

po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu ste/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi ni rkang pa bzhi/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms na ni/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /tshangs pa yi ni gnas bzhi po/ /tshad med pa

yi sems kyis ni/ /rdo rje sbyar bar bdag bsgoms na/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'grub/ /sbyor ba'i bdag nyid dbang po lnga/ /dam pa'i don gyis bsgoms na ni/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /mnyam med rdo rje sangs rgyas mtshungs/ /yid kyi stobs ni

rnam pa lnga/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms na ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba brtson 'grus che/ /stobs 'dzin lta bu nyid du 'gyur/ /byang chub yan lag rin chen bdun/ /gsang sngags sgom pas bsgoms na ni/ /rtog pa'i ye shes sbyor ba yis/ khyab bdag chos

kun 'dzin par 'gyur/ /'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi lam/ /kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byed pa/ /de ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/ /'jig rten shes rab rab tu 'da'/ /rjes su dran pa rnam pa drug /bdag nyid rtse gcig gis bsgoms na/ /sngags pa rdo rje

'dzin pa ru/ /sngags pa dus mi ring bar 'gyur/ /stobs bcu po ni yang dag bsgoms/ /bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor da nyid kyis/ /bsod nams ye shes yongs rdzogs te/ /rtag tu stobs bcu'i dam par 'gyur/ /pha rol phyin bcu yongs su rdzogs/ /stobs

rnams dang ni dbang rnams dang / /sa rnams kun ni des bskyed nas/ /myur du mtshan ma dag par 'gyur/ /rnam grol gos kyis bsgribs nas su/ /de yi nu ma shin tu bsnun/ /rje ngar gyis kyang de bzhin du/ /mchu yis mchu ni yongs su gzung / /'bad pas dam

du A ling ga /byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje ye shes brtson 'grus che/ /rdo rje dbyings su bdag brtan pas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs ka ra Na/ /rnal 'byor shes pa de bsten bya/ /bud med rnams kyi dam tshig 'grub/ /rdo rje sems dpa'

mtshungs par 'gyur/ /bud med rnams kyi b+ha gar bsnun/ /ling ga myur du gang bar 'gyur/ /sbyor ba 'di ni mkhyen pa yis/ /stobs chen sangs rgyas rab tu grub/ /gsang ba 'di ni dam pa ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa'o/ /gsang ba 'di yi sbyor ba yis/ /

yi ge'i dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i/ /chos su grags pa gang yin pa/ /de rnams sgom byed gtso bo ni/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tshogs pa'o/ /ma 'dres pa yi chos brgyad/ /sangs rgyas chos su grags pa ste/ /de rnams

bsgom pa dang ldan pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster byed/ /bsam gtan bzhi po thob nas ni/ /gzugs med pa yi rtag par yang / /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug ldan pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa po/ /byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun/ /

chos ni mchog tu rmad byung ba/ /de rnams bsgom pa dang ldan pas/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyob pa'o/ /sngags rnams thams cad rab 'grub cing / /sbyor ba thams cad thams cad du'o/ /des na 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid bsgom

par bya/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i lam/ /ye shes rin chen rab rnyed dka'/ /mchod dang dbang bskur byin brlabs pas/ /rnyed 'gyur gzhan du ma yin no/ /bshags dang gsol ba gdab pa dang / /bdag nyid dbul ba de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas sogs

la yi rang zhing / /de bzhin yongs su bsngo ba dang / /byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed/ /khyad par du ni dus kun du'o/ /thog ma bar dang phyem red du/ /ji lta bzhin du rjes bsgoms pas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsgrub bya ste/ /'di la the tshom yod ma yin/ /

'gro ba sems kyis spro ba ni/ /brtan pa'i snying por legs par bshad/ /stong nyid de bzhin nyid las byung / /rdo rje sems dpar de bshad do/ /'gro ba thams cad bkug nas su/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sbyar bar bya/ /don yod ye shes dag pa de/ /rdo rje rgyal po

mchog ces bshad/ /rdo rje chags pas chags gyur nas/ /rang bzhin gyis ni brtan par 'gyur/ /'gro ba ma lus lus med pa/ /de yi sems ni chags par bshad/ /chos rnams kun ni rang bzhin gyis/ /rnam par dben zhing gnyis su med/ /gang tshe

dag pa'i bdag nyid mthong / /de tshe rdo rje legs par bshad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi po yis/ /ming dang brda ni sbyar ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /sdom pa mchog tu dam pa'o/ /khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs
