par byas pa ste/ /sa dang pha rol phyin mchog gtso/ /rdo rje dbang bskur las byung ba/ /de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes te/ /rnyog pa med cing yi ge med/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid mchog /brtan pa rtag pa nyid du 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i mdzod

ni mdzod chen po/ /chos rnams thams cad dbang sgyur ba/ /yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje che/ /rdo rje tog ni bla na med/ /ye shes snang ba rin chen che/ /rmad du byung ba nges par mthong / /de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba ni/ /rdo rje bzhad pa zhes su grags/ /chos

kyi bdag med las byung ba/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog /chos nyid dam pa bsam du med/ /rdo rje chos zhes bya bar dran/ /rdo rje blo gros snang ba che/ /shes rab ye shes dri med mchog /zag med shes rab chen po pa/ /de ni rdo rje rnon por bshad/ /sangs

rgyas rnams kyi chos 'khor lo/ /gnyis su med las byung bar mtshon/ /yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel ming / /rdo rje rgyu zhes nges par bshad/ /dgongs pa'i skad ni spros pa'i mchog /yul rnams kyis ni bshad pa ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bzlas pa che/ /

de ni rdo rje smra bar bshad/ /sems can kun gyi don la sbyar/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che/ /gdod nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor che/ /de ni rdo rje las su bshad/ /bla na med pa'i byams pa che/ /bsrung ba'i bya ba gong na med/ /dag pa'i

chos ni brtson chen po/ /rdo rje bsrung ba zhes su grags/ /shes rab thabs kyi khro bo che/ /sangs rgyas kun dang rjes mthun pa/ /nyon mongs thams cad za ba che/ /de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin brjod/ /lus ngag yid ni yang dag sbyor/ /sgrib pa med cing yi ge bral/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /de ni rdo rje mtshams sbyor bshad/ /rdo rje ye shes rnal 'byor che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs po che/ /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/ /rig pa mchog ces bya bar bshad/ /de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i glus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs par mchod nas glur blangs pa/ o~M sar+b+ba bud d+ha par me shwa ra bu shud+h+ya la li hoH/ su b+ha gaH/ su ra taH/ ma hA ma hA A di ma hA bo d+hi bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ yo gI shwa ra ta thA tA b+hA bi twAt+ma ka ta thA ga ta/

byang chub sems bskyed las 'khrungs pa/ /sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa'i chos/ /gdod nas zhi ba la phyag 'tshal/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa po/ /rdo rje can kun la phyag 'tshal/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa rdo rje che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub la phyag 'tshal/ /mi dmigs go 'phang la gnas pa/ /mtha' las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal/ /'dren pa rnams kyi stobs po che/ /hUM gi yi ge ma lus pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mtha' dag dang / /shin tu yongs su mya

ngan 'da'/ /'jig rten dbang phyug mgon bzang po/ /rdo rje ye shes dri ma med/ /rnam par dag pa rdo rje mchog /dngos grub thams cad rab gsol byed/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyi mgon/ /dus gsum bsam pa dbang sgyur ba/ /sems can rnams la

phan don du/ /'byung ba khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /rdo rje snying po rgyan las dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su rdzogs // //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar zhugs

te/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya'i don ched du brjod pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /rdo rje snying po zhes grags pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa'o/ /gru

bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par mdzes/ /sgo khyud rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan dang / /phyag rgya dang ldan rab tu mdzes/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /'khor lo gnyis ni rab tu gnas/ /rtsibs brgyad pa dang bcu drug rtsibs/ /rnam par dbye

ba legs par brtag /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor nang gi ni/ /lte ba'i gnas su legs brtags pa/ /pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa/ /ge sar gtams pas rab tu mdzes/ /de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /khyab bdag rnal 'byor dbang phyug che/ /rnam par snang

mdzad brtson chen po/ /sems can kun la rjes brtse bas/ /de yi nye 'khor kun du ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad rnams dgod/ /shar du dgod bya 'khor lo can/ /gtsug tor dkar po nub tu gnas/ /gzi brjid phung po lho ru'o/ /rnam par rgyal ba byang du

gnas/ /dbang ldan rnam par gsal bar bri/ /mer ni steng 'gro dgod par bya/ /steng 'gro chen po bden bral du/ /rlung du rgyal ba chen po gnas/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rnal 'byor ldan pas 'di dag bri/ /mi bskyod pa ni shar du dgod/ /

lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /nub tu 'od dpag med par 'gyur/ /byang du don yod grub pa'i ming / /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten pa'o/ /dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bri/ /thams cad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas/ /

'khor rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la'o/ /phreng ba rnam par dgod bya ba/ /rang gi phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar/ /rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i/ /lha mo 'bad pas dgod par bya/ /rdo rje bdug pa la sogs bri/ /de bzhin gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs/ /

rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa/ /sgo srung 'bad pas bri bar bya/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor la gnas par/ /kun du bzang sogs rim bzhin bri/ /rang gi phyag rgya'i 'khor rnams dang / /pho nya yi ni 'khor dag dang / /khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang / /de bzhin pho nya pho nya ma/ /

rgya mtsho yi ni dkyil 'khor ni/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba'o/ /phyi ru phyi rol rdo rje'i ming / /dkyil 'khor la ni 'bad pas bri/ /dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas su/ /'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po bri/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen ming / /dbang po la

sogs lha thams cad/ /ma mo kun dang sring mo rnams/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang klu/ /de bzhin lha rnams thams cad dang / /brtson 'grus chen po nam mkha' lding / /'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas su/ /khyad par du ni mchod par bya/ /

me tog bdug spos rol mo sogs/ /de bzhin bza' dang ston mo sogs/ /phreng ba'i rgyan ni sna tshogs kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi cho ga yis/ /mchod pa kun gyis thams cad nas/ /'khor lo kun gyi cho ga yis/ /sangs

rgyas thams cad mchod par bya/ /de nas slob ma thams cad gzhug /yongs su dag pa khyad par du/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed nas su/ /byang chub bslab pa rjes spyod pa/ /cho ga shes pa'i sngags pas gzhug /'dren pa rnams la mchod du gzhug /rdo rje'i dbang

bskur sbyor ba yis/ /dbang bskur ba ni de nas sbyin/ /seng ge'i khri yi steng du ni/ /dar dang me tog chun pos spras/ /dkar po'i gdugs dang rin chen che/ /bla re rgya che 'bar ba dang / /de yi g.yas kyi drung du ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni gzhag par bya/ /ba dan rnam pa

sna tshogs dang / /sna tshogs ras kyis rab mchod pa/ /g.yon gyi drung du thams cad nas/ /'bad pa yis ni gzhag par bya/ /rin chen sman kun gyis gang ba'i/ /bum pa legs par gzhag byas te/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur gyis/ /de la rang gis dbang bskur

bya/ /rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba/ /mkhas pa yis ni slar yang bya/ /kun gyi cod pan dbang bskur gyis/ /yang dang yang du dbang bskur bya/ /chos kyi cod pan dbang bskur dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa ni/ /sna tshogs las kyi dbang bskur sbyin/ /chos

kyi dbyings dang mnyam mtshungs pa'o/ /chos kyi sku yi dbang bskur ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sgron ma sbyin/ /de ltar slob ma dbang bskur ba/ /khyad par du ni sngags pas bya/ /de la dam tshig cho ga yis/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya/ /slob dpon brnyas par

mi bya zhing / /sgrub po kun la smad mi bya/ /sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad la/ /'da' bar mi bya smad mi bya/ /'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang / /grub mtha'i rigs pa thams cad la/ /smad par mi bya blang mi bya/ /de la mngon par dga' ba spangs/ /sdig pa thams cad

rnam spang zhing / /de bzhin bsod nams thams cad bsdu/ /bza' dang ston mo du ma la/ /bza' bar mi bya smad mi bya/ /'dod pas bcom ldan sems pa ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sras bdag skyes/ /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/ /nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas

thams cad chags las 'khrungs/ /de bzhin zhe sdang rmongs las 'khrungs/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kun dang / /dbu ma'i gnas la gnas nas su/ /de nyid dam tshig shes nas su/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yong mi spong / /lus can kun la 'tshe mi bya/ /khyod kyis

ser sna mi bya ste/ /phrag dog bya bar mi bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos ni spang mi bya/ /byang chub sems ni mchog tu bde/ /chang gi btung ba spang bya ste/ /pha rol bud med rnam par spang / /thams cad mkhyen pa yongs mi dor/ /rtag tu srog chags gsad mi bya/ /sems can

kun la snying rje dang / /byams pa yang ni rnam par bsgom/ /sems can rnams la phan pa ni/ /yang dang yang du yongs bsdu bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa/ /dam tshig de nyid 'di dag ni/ /slob ma rnams la rjes brtse bas/ /mkhas pa yis

ni bstan par bya/ /de nas phyag rgya rjes bcing ba/ /bzhin du bstan par bya/ /phyag rgya 'di dag khyad par gyi/ /mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya/ /thal mo brtan par bsdam par bya/ /me tog zum pa'i tshul du mdzes/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad

kyis/ /pad+ma'i thal mo zhes su bsgrags/ /rtse mo thams cad legs brkyang ba/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya zhes su brjod/ /re re'i mtshams su nges bcings pa/ /de ni rdo rje thal mor brtags/ /sor mo thams cad nges bsdams pa/ /rdo rje bsdams pas legs bcings pa/ /

sor mo brkyang ste steng du bstan/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed/ /khu tshur nang du byas nas ni/ /gnyis ka sbyar bas yongs su brtag /'khor los sgyur sogs phyag rgya'o/ /dam pa sbyin pa yin par bshad/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis/ /dam

tshig phyag rgya 'di yin no/ /ming med nang bcug khu tshur gyis/ /kun gyi rtse mor yongs su brtag /rdo rje'i rnam pa legs par sbyar/ /rdo rje chen po zhes su bsgrags/ /mthe chung srin lag khu tshur las/ /gung mo legs par brkyang nas su/ /mdzub mos mthe bong

yongs su sbyar/ /'khor los sgyur ba nyid gsol byed/ /brkyang pa'i rtse mo sbyar ba ni/ /gdugs dkar zhes ni rab tu grags/ /srin lag dang ni mthe bong sbyar/ /gung mo gnyis ni brtag par bya/ /gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya che/ /gzi brjid phung po nyid gsol

byed/ /de nyid ral gri lta bur sbyar/ /rnam par rgyal ba zhes su grags/ /de nyid rgyal ba zhes bya ba/ /rdo rje ldan pa de bzhin gshegs/ /khu tshur snying po ldan byas pas/ /gtsug tor rnam pa'i 'byung gnas te/ /thub dka' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /steng du

'gro ba zhes su bshad/ /rdo rje bsdams pa yongs su sbyar/ /dam tshig kun gyi 'byung gnas te/ /gung mo'i rtse mo mchog tu sbyar/ /mthe'u chung dang ni mthe bong brkyang / /lcags kyu mda' yi sbyor ba yis/ /legs so ba ni sbyar bar bya/ /gung mo rdo rje rin chen rtse/ /

bye ba gzi brjid mchog gi mchog /rgyal mtshan gnas su nges par sbyar/ /bzhad pa'i gnas su sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che/ /dbu ma pad+ma lta bur bskum/ /ral gri 'dzin pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /'khor lo sbyar ba'i 'khor los sgyur/ /kha ru phye ba'i phyag

rgya che/ /rdo rje smra ba nyid du 'gyur/ /las kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya che/ /gar mtshungs rdo rje sna tshogs can/ /chos yongs sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje bsrung bar brtag par bya/ /mche ba gnyis ni rnam par gtsigs/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin zhes su bshad/ /khu tshur bcangs

pa khu tshur gyi/ /rdo rje thal mo snying gar gzhag /rdo rje sgeg mo zhes su grags/ /yongs su sbyar ba spyi bor gzhag /rdo rje phreng ba zhes su brjod/ /thal mo sbyar ba gdong du dgrol/ /rdo rje glu mar rjes su bsgrags/ /'gyed cing 'dud pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de ni rdo rje gar

mar bshad/ /pad+ma'i thal mo gdong du dbye/ /spyi bor yongs su sbyar la gzhag /snying gar mthe bo bsnyams pa dang / /rab tu brkyang ba byug pa'o/ /lag pa steng du yongs brkyang ba/ /gzugs kyi phyag rgya nyid du 'gyur/ /lag gnyis rna ba'i lam du gzhag /sgra yi

phyag rgya nyid du bshad/ /dri ni byug pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dri yi phyag rgya zhes su brjod/ /gdong du snyim pa phye ba ni/ /ro yi phyag rgya zhes su bsgrags/ /mkha' la myur ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /reg pa reg pa zhes su bshad/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ni yongs su sbyar/ /mdzub mo

lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las/ /de nyid zhags pa'i dbyibs dang ni/ /lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par brtag /bzhi pa rdo rje dril bu zhes/ /rdo rje 'bebs par rnam par brtag /phyag rgya kun dang nye ba'i rgya/ /blo gros ldan pa rang gis brtag /thal mo yongs su sbyar la bsdam/ /

mdzub mo gnyis po bskum nas ni/ /rin po che yi rnam par bcing / /kun du bzang po blo ldan gyis/ /de las rtse mo rtse mo bskum/ /sems kyis byams pa bsgoms nas so/ /mdzub mo sbyar la bcug nas ni/ /ral gri'i rnam par brtag pa ste/ /'di ni

nam mkha'i snying po yi/ /phyag rgyar sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags/ /de nas ral gri'i mtshon cha yi/ /rnam pa ru ni nyer gnas pa/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rnam 'gog par/ /thams cad kyis ni yongs su brjod/ /gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje thal mo rab tu

brkyang / /pad+ma'i lta bur rnam par brtag /pad+ma'i lag pa blo ldan gyis/ /de nyid me tog zum tshul dang / /ut+pal rnam par ltar mdzes pa/ /'di ni pad+ma sgrol ba'i rgya/ /pad+ma'i mgon po zhes su grags/ /mche ba gtsigs pa dang ldan pa'i/ /kha dang 'dra bar

legs par brtag /'di ni rta mgrin phyag rgya ste/ /kha yi phyogs su rab tu brtag /pad+ma'i thal mo dpral ba yi/ /khro gnyer du ni nye bar sbyar/ /rdo rje thal mo 'bebs pa che/ /dpal gyi snying po rin chen ldan/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i rnam pa bzung / /thal mo

legs par rab tu brkyang / /mi zad blo gros phyag rgya che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtags/ /gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rin chen rdo rje snying gar gzhag /nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya ste/ /nam mkha'i mdzod nyid ster bar byed/ /rdo rje chen po legs

par brkyang / /mthe chung mthe bong nges par bcing / /lag pa gnyis ni nges par brtag /blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyar 'gyur/ /rdo rje thal mo steng du bsgreng / /mdzub mo gnyis po sbyar bar bya/ /'di ni rdo rje snying po'i rgya/ /rdo rje snying pos bka' stsal to/ /khu tshur nang

du byas nas su/ /mdzub mo gnyis po rtse mo bya/ /'di ni 'jam dpal phyag rgya ste/ /rdo rje ral gri zhes su brtag /de nyid shag ti'i rnam pa ni/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan gyi'o/ /gshin rje mthar byed mdung rtser 'gyur/ /mdung rtse chen por rab tu brtag//

mdzub mo bskum par byas nas ni/ /gung mo'i steng du yongs su gzhag /zhags pa'i rnam pa rab ldan pas/ /gshin rje yang ni 'jigs par byed/ /de nyid ral grir byas pa ni/ /skra can ma ru rab tu bshad/ /khu tshur thams cad nges bcings te/ /mdzub mo

gcig ni bskum par bya/ /'di ni nye ba'i skra can rgyar/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje bsdams pa steng bcings te/ /dbu ma gnyis ni rnam par spang / /mdzub mo rdo rje'i rnam par bya/ /mthe'u chung dang ni mthe bong brkyang / /'di ni rdo rje 'dzin chen

po'i/ /phyag rgya don kun sgrub byed yin/ /mdzub mo mthe bos bsdams pa ni/ /mA ma kIr ni yongs su bshad/ /mdzub mor lcags sgrog rnam pa las/ /gung mo'i dbu ma rdo rjer bya/ /'di ni rdo rje lcags sgrog rgya/ /rdo rje lta bur yongs su bshad/ /rdo rje chen po rtse

lnga pa/ /khro bo gzegs mar rnam par bshad/ /mchog gi rtse mo rtse gcig bya/ /rdo rje rtse mo nyid kyir bshad/ /lag na rin chen phyag rgya ni/ /lag gnyis legs par brkyang bar bya/ /sor mo pad+ma'i dbyings su bya/ /skul byed lha mor yongs su bshad/ /thal mo

yongs su sbyar ba las/ /mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong dag /mig gi tshul du sbyar bar bya/ /sangs rgyas spyan gyi rnam par bshad/ /bkra shis kyi ni skyil krung bca'/ /rnal 'byor rig pas lus bsrang ste/ /lag gnyis lhung bzed 'dzin 'dra ba/ /bsam gtan phyag

rgyar rab tu bshad/ /'di ni rnam par snang mdzad rgya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /mi bskyod pa yi sa la reg /rin chen tog gi mchog sbyin bshad/ /bsam gtan phyag rgya 'od dpag med/ /ngo bo nyid kyi don rtogs byed/ /don yod gzigs pa'i phyag rgya

ni/ /mi 'jigs 'jigs pa med pa sbyin/ /blo ldan rnal 'byor skyil krung gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bdag /mnyam par bzhag pa phyag rgya kun/ /'ching ba 'am ni 'ching du gzhug /'jig rten pa yi phyag rgya la/ /lag pa gcig ni rab brkyang ste//

dbang ldan gyi ni rtse gsum pa/ /mthe bos mthe'u chung mnan par bya/ /lha yi dbang po'i rdo rjer 'gyur/ /lag pa g.yas pas brtag par bya/ /me yi oM yig lag pa dag /mthe bo gung mo nyid la gzhag /gshin rje'i rdo rje dbyug pa ste/ /mdzub

mo dang ni mthe bong sbyar/ /de nyid khyab 'jug 'khor lo ste/ /'khor lo'i yi ge dgod par bya/ /lag pa gcig gis thod pa ni/ /ma mo rnams kyir yang dag bshad/ /sor mo gnyis bsgreng ral gri ni/ /srin po bdag nyid chen po'i'o/ /mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar

ba ni/ /chu lha'i zhags pa nyid du bshad/ /mdzub mo dang ni gung mo dag /rgyal mtshan lta bur legs par brkyang / /rlung lha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya ni/ /lag pa gnyis kyis rab tu brtag /dbu ma gcig pu legs brkyang ba/ /dbyug to'i phyag rgyar rab tu bshad/ /

gnod sbyin kun gyi dbang phyug ni/ /lus ngan bdag nyid chen po'o/ /mchod phyir thogs kyi phyag rgya ni/ /tshangs pa yi ru legs par bshad/ /drag po'i gsal shing shes bya ste/ /lha mo'i ba Te sa ru brjod/ /tshogs bdag gi ni sna ru bshad/ /zla ba'i bdud rtsi'i dkyil

'khor ro/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer stong phrag ni/ /lag pa gnyis kyis bstan par bya/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /dbang po'i rdo rje mtshon cha ltar/ /'di ni lha rnams kun gyi rgya/ /dpa' bo kun gyis rab tu gnang / /dri za rnams kyi phyag rgya ni/ /glu len lta

bur rab tu bsgrags/ /dga' byed dbang phyug phyag rgya che/ /rdza rnga'i sgra dbyangs rab tu 'bar/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod phyir/ /lha chen pos ni rab tu brtags/ /ting ting shag 'dzin sbyor ba yis/ /mi'am ci rnams kyir brjod bya/ /pi wang bsgreng

ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /dbyangs can gyir ni rnam par bshad/ /rtag tu dun du b+hi sgrog pa/ /rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyir brjod/ /lag gnyis gdengs ka'i tshul byas pa/ /klu rnams kyir ni legs par bshad/ /gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'gyed dang

'du ba'i de bzhin no/ /lag pa'i zhags pa nges bcings pas/ /de ni phyag rgyar rab tu bshad/ /'di rnams dam tshig phyag rgya ru/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams legs par gsungs/ /las kyi sbyor ba 'bad pa yis/ /'di rnams kyang ni phyag rgyar bshad/ /

phyag rgya dor nas sems kyi ni/ /rin chen yang dang yang du bsam/ /rnam par rtog med gdod nas zhi/ /chos dbyings mnyam zhing mi mnyam pa/ /stong pa mkha' 'drar shes nas su/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /'di dag thams cad ma skyes shing / /rmi lam

lta bur rab tu gnas/ /dri za'i grong khyer lta bur snang / /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten yang dang yang / /mig 'phrul lta bur shin tu ni/ /'gro ba thams cad rab tu gsal/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa ru/ /srid pa thams cad mdor bsdus pa/ /bdag med pa

zhes mthong nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun dang dpa' bo yis/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu brag ca dang / /lbu ba chu yi chu bur dang / /gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jig rten ni/ /de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis dgongs/ /thams cad mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar/ /zo chun

khyud mo ji bzhin du/ /gar gyi gnas kyi tshul 'dra ba/ /zla ba gnyis dang mtshungs par blta/ /rtag tu glog gi phreng ba 'dra/ /sbrang bu'i sgra dang mtshungs par gnas/ /'khor ba shin tu bslang ba ste/ /rgod ma'i kha dang 'dra bar gnas/ /'di ltar shes shing

rtogs nas ni/ /bsgom pa'i stobs kyis rang nyid kyis/ /sems ni legs bsgrub rnal 'byor pa/ /de la phyag rgya rab tu bshad/ /stong pa mtshan ma med pa dang / /smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin las/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni/ /dam tshig gsum ni brtags

pa'o/ /phyag rgya sngags dang lha nyid dang / /de nyid gsum ni rab tu gnas/ /bdag nyid sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /mtshan nyid gcig tu rnam par gnas/ /de 'di dam pa'i phyag rgya ru/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bka' stsal to/ /phyag rgya yi ge bral ba ste//

rnam pa med cing snang ba med/ /dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la/ /dngos po'i de nyid nyid du bshad/ /dngos med dngos po'i rang bzhin yin/ /dngos med nyid kyang dngos po yin/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol/ /rnal 'byor ye shes

mchog tu bde/ /rtog ge med cing snang ba med/ /'khrul pa med cing yi ge med/ /stong pa nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i sems/ /gang tshe de ltar nyid gyur pa/ /de tshe phyag rgya rnams dang sngags/ /lha nyid du yang rab tu brtag /sngags las phyag rgya ma mthong

zhing / /phyag rgya las kyang sngags min la/ /rang nyid lha yi rnal 'byor ni/ /gnyis med sngags dang phyag rgyar brtags/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las phyag rgya'i rim par phye ba'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed

par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas 'og min gyi gnas nas byon te/ dga' ldan gyi gnas su bzhugs nas dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la chos bstan nas zas gtsang gi rigs

la mngon par gzigs te/ mngon par byung bar mdzad nas byang chub kyi snying po dag la nye bar mnan nas nye bar 'khod de/ bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal bar bstan nas byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs par gyur te/ bzhugs nas kyang kun nas 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin

sngon du 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin bye ba brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje se gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing gsang sngags 'di gsungs so//

o~M sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra sa mA dzaHA kar+Sha ya sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA na hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rnams legs par byon te/ chos kyi dbyings su spros nas phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab 'byam

rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams khyab ste/ nam mkha'i khams na gnas pa thams cad til gyi gang bu ltar 'dzam bu'i gling du 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis bkug cing bcug ste/ bcings nas dbang du mdzad de/ de nyid kyi

thugs kar rab tu gzhag par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas byin gyis brlabs te/ sngags 'dis rang gi sems so sor rtogs pa mdzad do/ /o~M tsit+ta pra ti be d+haM ka ro mi/ de'i rjes thogs

nyid la sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku las chos kyi sku rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba sems rin po che nges par byung ste/ spros par mdzad do/ /de nyid sems 'od

gsal ba/ thugs rje chen pos khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnyog pa spangs pa nam mkha' ltar gdod nas zhi ba/ de las thugs rje chen po la mngon par phyogs par byas nas sems can gyi khams

thams cad la rnam par gzigs te/ mi shes pas rga ba dang / 'chi bas rnam par khyab pa'i 'jig rten la gzigs nas slar yang sngags 'dis byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa nye bar bstan pa/ oM bo d+hi tsi t+ta ut+pA da yA mi/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs

nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar sems 'od gsal ba de yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar rnam par gzhag go/ /legs par rnam par dag pa'i nam

mkha' ltar dri ma med pa/ spros pa thams cad spangs pa me long lta bur brtan par byas nas gnas te/ byang chub kyi sems chen po la sngags 'di brjod do/ /o~M dz+nyA na rasmi bi sr-i dza hU~M/ de ni rjes thogs nyid la 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs pa zla ba'i dkyil

'khor las rnam par phyung ngo / /de phyung nas kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du zhugs te/ shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gsal bar byas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ri bo'i rtse bsnyil te rab tu rtogs par byas nas gcig tu 'dres te/ rdo rje'i sku chen

po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar rjes su zhugs nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rab tu gnas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs so/ /o~M tiSh+Tha badzra slar yang sngags 'dis spros pa/ o~M

s+pha ra badzra slar yang sngags 'dis bsdus so/ /o~M sang ha ra badzra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ye shes rdo rje'i snying po 'di ched du brjod pa/ o~M dz+nyA na badzra/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos sngags 'dis byin

gyis brlabs pa/ o~M sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badzra hU~M/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid brnyes pas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa/ o~M badzra At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan pa nyid

du nye bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs gzigs nas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par mdzad do/ /o~M ya thA sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sta thA a haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'i rgyu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku bdag nyid sems can gyi khams thams cad du nges par bstan to/ /de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mthong nas

lha dang mi rnams kyis mngon par byang chub pas bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa zhes sgra bsgrags so/ /de nas tshangs pas gsol ba btab ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor nas de dang des 'dul ba'i skye bo btul te gang gis slar ldog pa med pa nyid du gyur

to/ /'di rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bsgom pa'i rim pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bstan te sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa nye bar bsgrubs nas de'i thugs ka las rdo rje phyung ste/

nyid kyi phyag tu gzhag par gyur te/ de nas 'od zer rnam par phyung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i skur byin gyis brlabs te mtshan nyid

thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar dang phreng bas dbang bskur ba/ zla ba'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer can du byin gyis brlabs te rnam par gnas so/ /de nas thugs ka nas phyung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten te/ de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga dang / rgyab dang drung du rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje las la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i phreng bar rnam par gnas so/ /de bzhin du sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams

dang bdug pa la sogs pa'i lha khyad par du nges par bskyed cing gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang lcags kyu la sogs pa'i lha rnams bskyed de 'di dag gi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/ /

sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje snying po zhes su gsungs/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /sgo khyud dang ni kha khyer dang / /rta babs kyis ni so sor spras/ /de yi dbus su khri chen po/ /kun nas yongs su gru bzhi

pa/ /de yi steng du pad chen po/ /ge sar ldan zhing rab mdzes pa/ /de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs dgod par bya/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni drung kun du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi nye

'khor du/ /'khor los sgyur ba la sogs bri/ /phyi yi gnas ni thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas sras po rnam par dgod/ /kha dog ser po gzi brjid che/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor rab 'bar ba/ /thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan/ /brgyan pa

de dag dgod par bya/ /rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang chu'i lha'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /

dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bas na/ /chos kyi 'khor lo zhes su brjod/ /de yi phyi rol gnyis pa la/ /zlum po ru ni rtogs par bya/ /ri mo mang po sna tshogs pas/ /sgo dang sgo khyud brtag par bya/ /rta babs

rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /de yi dbus su pad chen po/ /ge sar ldan zhing rab mdzes pa/ /'dab ma brgyad kyi ka ba'i mdun/ /dkyil 'khor brgyan kyis brgyan pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /rgyal ba thams

cad dkar por mchog /kha ba ba zho ltar dkar gsal/ /shel dang zla ba lta bu'i 'od/ /kun+da zla ba ltar dkar brtan/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par/ /de yi nye 'khor thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas sras po rnam par dgod/ /thams cad zla ba ltar

dkar zhing / /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs zla ba 'dra/ /zla ba 'bar mtshungs mnyam med pa/ /chu yi ming zhes bya ba yi/ /rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las chu lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// //de nas bcom ldan

'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos me lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/ /rdo rje ye shes gzi brjid mtshungs/ /rdo rje gzi brjid ces su brjod/ /gru gsum

rnam pa nyid du bya/ /sum mdo ris kyi rnam pa mtshungs/ /'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs 'jigs pa'o/ /kha dog dmar po stobs po che/ /'jig pa'i dus kyi me 'dra ba/ /rtag tu pad+ma rA ga mtshungs/ /de yi dbus su gzi brjid che/ /nyi ma'i kha dog stobs po

che/ /rdo rje rtse gsum sna tshogs pa/ /sum mdo'i snying gar gzhag par bya/ /bal po se'u'i me tog mtshungs/ /ya ba'i me tog dag dang 'dra/ /pad+ma pad+ma rA ga mtshungs/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo yang dag par/ /bzang po mtshal dang mtshungs 'dra ba/ /rgya

skyegs bcud dang 'dra bar gnas/ /de yi nye 'khor thams cad du/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras/ /khro bo dang ni mngag pa dag /mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya/ /de dag thams cad kha dog dmar/ /gzi brjid khams la 'od ldan pa/ /'od zer

dmar po rab 'phro ba/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par/ /thams cad dmar po'i mtshon cha can/ /dmar po'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /dmar po'i gos kyis bkab pa'i lus/ /phreng ba dmar po mchog 'dzin pa/ /'di ni gzi brjid gter zhes bya/ /

dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba'o/ /rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las me lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs // //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos slar yang rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang

dag bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/ /rlung gi khams dang 'dra bas na/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes su bshad/ /zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa 'dra/ /dbyar gyi sprin gyi 'od dang mtshungs/ /a ta sI yi me tog 'dra/ /in dra nI la'i 'od dang

mtshungs/ /de yi dbus su pad chen po/ /bai DUr+ya yi 'od dang 'dra/ /shin tu gnag pa'i mig sman mtshungs/ /sngon dmar gyi ni rnam par gnas/ /de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo rab 'bar ba/ /rgyal po 'khyil pa 'bar ba'i

gzi/ /mtshan mo nag mo lta bur gnas/ /ut+pal sngon po 'dab ma'i tshul/ /stong pa nam mkha' lta bur gnas/ /de yi nye 'khor thams cad du/ /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras rnams bri/ /khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang / /de bzhin pho nya pho nya mo/ /thams

cad sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /de bzhin nag po'i gos gyon pa/ /kha dog nag po thams cad du/ /ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs bsnams/ /gdugs ni rnam pa du ma'i dbyibs/ /kha dog sna tshogs legs 'bar ba/ /bla re rgyas pa mnyam pa ni/ /kha dog nag

po sna tshogs pa/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bsgom par bya/ /dkyil 'khor chen po 'di lta bu/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes skyob pa/ /bris nas shes rab can gyis bsgom/ /gal te dngos grub rang 'dod na'o/ /rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi

rgyud chen po las rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang bsdu bas byon pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba

btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bskyed du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/ sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga mchog

tu gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa/ sgeg mo sogs pas mchod pa kun/ /yang dag mdor bsdus byas nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen por/ /bdag gis rtag tu bsgom par bya/ /sngags kyi yi ge yang dag ldan/ /'dod pa ster ba'i sku ru bya/ /sgra dang

gzugs dang de bzhin sbyor/ /yi ge'i phreng ba de bzhin te/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sngags pas thams cad rnam par bsam/ /hU~M| sngags pas snying gar son pa bsgom/ /gsang sngags dge ba brjod nas su/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i

rigs dag pa/ /dung gi sgra ru rab tu brjod/ /dril bu'i sgra ni rab gsal ba/ /pad mo rnal 'byor dbang phyug go/ /dus min sprin gyi hU~M gi sgra/ /tsa Ta tsa Ta'i sgra 'phro ba/ /rdo rje rin chen dbang phyug gi/ /sgra ru de bzhin gshegs rnams gsung / /nor bu las kyi rigs

kyi yang / /rnga chen sgra ru rab tu bshad/ /pi wang gling bu de bzhin glu/ /gar gyi rgyan gyi sgra dang ni/ /rdza rnga'i ngar sgra hU~M gi sgra/ /spyi yi nyid du rab tu bshad/ /rtog pa kun la rnam par sbyar/ /sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las rnams dang / /de nas gzugs kyi bzlas

pa mchog /ji bzhin rab tu bshad/ /dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang / /lha rnams dbang du bya ba ste/ /de la rang gi tshul rab sbyar/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rab tu sbyar/ /de rjes rnam pa kun gyi mchog /rtag tu lus chen bsam bya

bsam/ /lha yi sku gzugs bsgom par bya/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya rab nges pa'i/ /phyag rgya'ang snying gar son zhes bya/ /rang gi rigs rim cho ga yis/ /de yi lus ni 'od gsal zhing / /sgron ma'i 'od ltar gsal ba'i khyim/ /de ltar kun nas thams

cad du/ /kun nas ba spu'i rtse dag nas/ /'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng dge bas/ /gzugs kyi bzlas pa zhes su bshad/ de nas sbyor ba'i bzlas pa ni/ /gsang sngags sgrub pos brtsam par bya/ /mchod dang byin brlabs dbang bskur mchog /spro la sogs

rim thams cad du/ /sbyor ba'i bzlas pa gtso bo 'di/ /'bad pa yis ni rab tu bshad/ /snying ga mgrin pa mchu lce min/ /rkan dang spyi bo nyid ma yin/ /nang min phyi dang gnyis par min/ /chos ni 'ba' zhig kho na la/ /bzlas pa'i sgra yang 'byung ma yin//

'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor che/ /shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba/ /bsgom pa'i bsngags pa de nyid ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi gnas su bshad/ /de nas steng du mdor bsdus te/ /snying ga'i dkyil 'khor rab zlum pa/ /zla ba gang ba ltar

bsam bya/ /dri ma med cing legs par gnas/ /de la yi ge rnam par dgod/ /tshig gi phreng ba ma chad pa/ /mu tig phreng ba ltar brgyus pa/ /char sprin gyi ni me 'dra'i 'od/ /de tshe thams cad gsal bar byed/ /lha yi lus ni snang byed cing / /ji lta ji

ltar yi ge'i phreng / /mchog gi lus la rab 'jug pa/ /de lta de ltar sngags kyi lus/ /lha yi bdag nyid nyid du 'gyur/ /mthu stobs lha dbang thams cad ni/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug las cher lhag /bzlas pa de nyid mchog 'di ni/ /sangs rgyas

kun gyis bsngags pa'o/ /ji ltar sems ni bsgom pa yis/ /de ltar dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las bzlas pa'i de kho na nyid kyi le'u'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa rin po che bka' stsal pa/ mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam med mchog gi chos nyid can/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad/ /yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa/ /dri med

mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can/ /yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de/ /dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bsgrun du yod ma yin/ /dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams/ /sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams

nges par stsol/ /rtag tu dri ma med pa thugs rje'i shugs las byung / /smon lam grub pa 'gog pa med pa'i chos nyid can/ /'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa/ /thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang / /tshad med tshad dang

bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang / /khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi/ /thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yong mi 'gyur/ /e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid

mchog dang ldan/ /mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes pa/ /khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad/ /mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med pa rab mkhyen pas/ /dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol/ /

'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yang dag yon tan rgyas pa ste/ /lan cig tsam zhig brjod pas kyang / /gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs de kun bstod na/ /rab yangs dngos grub stsol

'gyur te/ /bskal par gnas shing bsgal bar bskul/ /lus ni g.yo ba med pa ru/ /bdag nyid brtan par byas pa yis/ /mgon po chen po rnam snang mdzad/ /mi bskyod rin chen 'byung gnas dang / /rgyal ba dag pa 'od dpag med/ /don grub rgyal

po thams cad du/ /dngul chu bcud len de nyid dang / /mchog kyang rab tu stsol bar byed/ /dngos grub yid 'ong ma lus pa/ /rgyas pa'i don dang phun sum tshogs/ /re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /yid la 'dod pa ster bar byed/ /ye shes tshe dang stobs

dang shugs/ /mchog tu dge ba stsol bar mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs // //de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas

pa bka' stsal pa/ tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med/ smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga med/ ji ltar bshad pa cho gas bslab pa'i gnas nye bar gnas bzung ste gang yang rung ba'i yid dga' bar ji ltar rung ba'i dkyil 'khor byas te/ me tog sil ma bkram la

bdug spos kyis bdugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la ji ltar nus pa'i me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par byas te/ sngags 'dis yid kyis kyang sdig pa bshags te/ oM sar+b+ba pA pA ta kA yi ka bA tsi ka ma na sod

b+hU tAn rA ga dwe Sha mo ha ma da mA na d+hiSh+The na yang kr-i rta~M tan tre kA li kaM hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT sar+b+ba pA pAM s+pho Ta yA mi swA hA/ oM sar+b+ba pA bAM pra ti de sha yA mi swA hA/ de'i rjes thogs la bdag nyid kyi dngos po dbul bar bya ste/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA nAn At+ma b+hA ba ni ra yA ta yA mi/ sar+b+ba

ta thA ga taHpra ti gr-ih+NaM tu mAM swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba ni/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na sa~M b+hA rAn a nu mo da yA mi swA hA/ yang dang yang du byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags kyis bya ste/

oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta b+ha dra ma hA badzra sa ma ya~M ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da yA mi swA hA/ de nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs la zla ba'i kha dog can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa sa bcu'i dbang phyug nor

bu rin po che chen po'i pad ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri'i steng du bdag nyid bsam par bya'o/ /oM bud d+ho ha~M/ sngags 'dis bdag yongs su dag par byas te/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba ta thA ga tAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ sngags 'dis bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings yangs pa 'od gsal

ba'i snang bar shin tu gnas par bya ste/ oM d+har+m+ma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ de nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ 'jig rten thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi skur

bdag nyid sngags 'dis gnas par bya ste/ oM pra b+he shwa ro ha~M/ de bzhin du rim pa 'dis chos kyi dbyings rgya chen por spros nas bdag nyid sangs rgyas nyid do/ /zhes nga rgyal bskyed la bdag skye dgu ma lus pa'i dpung gnyen du byas la/ chos kyi dbyings yangs pa 'od gsal

bar lhag par gnas par bya ste/ nye bar rgyas par thun mtshams bzhir bzlas pa brtsam par bya ste/ thun mtshams gsum du dus ji lta bar yi ge la rjes su gzhol ba'i yid kyis 'bum phrag nyi shu bzlas par bya zhing nyi ma re rer stong phrag brgyad dam stong phrag re bzlas te ji

srid mtshan ma thob pa de srid du'o/ /tsan+dan dang ga pur dang / gur kum la sogs pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor byas te/ nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod pa byas nas cho 'phrul gyi zla ba'am sa ga'i nya gang ba la mar gyi mar me stong phrag brgyad sbar la rdo rje skyil krung

gis gnas te sna ma'i me tog gam me tog pad+mas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / mchod rten la mchod de ji srid 'brug gi sgra sgrogs pa ma thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bdag la gsal bar 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/ /

de nas sreg blugs 'bum phrag gcig dgang bar byas pas mtshan ma thams cad gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /bye ba phrag bzhi bzlas pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /de nas sgrub pa chen po byed par 'dod pas de bzhin

gshegs pa'i mtho gang ba'i tshad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten byas la mchod rten re re'i mdun du stong phrag re re bzlas pa'am/ yang na dri'i mchod rten gyi drung du 'bum lhag pa'i bye ba phrag bdun bzlas so/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang pa'i tshad kyi mchod

rten nyi ma re re la re re ji srid bye ba phrag bdun bzlas pa rdzogs pa de srid du bya'o/ /tha ma yang mchod rten 'bar ba'i 'od des sgrub pa'i lus la zhugs pas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs nas ji srid dag pa'i gnas kyi dbang phyug chen po la

sogs pa'i lha rnams me tog gi char 'bebs par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci la sogs pa 'ongs nas kyang stod par byed cing ji srid a bI tsi mnar med pa'i bar gyi
sems can dmyal ba thams cad bsil bar 'gyur ro/ /rnams kyang kyi sdug bsngal las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /sdug bsngal ba rnams kyis sems can rnams la gdung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyis mngon par gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i rjes la lus dang ba gser gyi mdog lta bu dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam pa can dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes thob pa dang / kha dog dang / tshe dang / stobs dang / shugs dang / dbang phyug

la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba dang / 'khor los sgyur ba ltar che ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par bstod cing steng du 'gro ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i

'jig rten gyi khams kyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor ba dang / lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba dang / phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis legs par mchod cing grub pa thams cad 'od kyis ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i stan phyed ster bar 'gyur ro/ /gzi brjid dang gzugs dang dpa' bas rig pa 'dzin

pa thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yang so sor thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad 'dul ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /phyi ma'i mthar tshe byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa mthong bar 'gyur

ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bya ba nges par ston par 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa'i sprin thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// //sgrub pa'i thabs gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par bya ste/ gi wang ngam ldong ros pad+ma'i snod du gzhag la ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum byung ba de srid du

bzlas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ba dang / mi snang ba dang / rig pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur ba nyid do/ /rig pa 'dzin par gyur nas nyi ma stong shar ba'i kha dog dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam par skra li zhing 'khyil ba dang / gdu bu

dang ldan zhing lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing rig pa 'dzin pa'i grub pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba dang / bskal pa chen po'i mthar gnas pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/ /rim pa 'dis rtse gsum bsgrubs

na dbang phyug chen por 'gyur ro/ /mchod phyir thogs bsgrubs na tshangs par 'gyur ro/ /'khor los khyab 'jug tu 'gyur ro/ /grog mkhar gyi rtse mo'i sa bzung ste sa srungs kyi bu byas la de la zhon te bzlas na dbang por 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor byas

te de'i steng du bsdad na nyi ma dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zla ba'i ste 'di nyid kyis lha'i bye brag gang gi mtshan ma bzung ste/ des de'i longs spyod la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rim pa 'dis dngul chu'am bcud len gang bsgrubs pa de

'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gal te ma grub na de'i tshe sgrub pa lan bdun bya'o/ /bdun byas pas ci nas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bas bka' stsal pa/ 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas ri lhun po'i tshad

tsam gyi ri bo yang hUM zhes brjod pas ltung ba dang / rgya mtsho skems pa dang / ljon pa drungs nas 'byin pa dang / bum pa nam mkha' la 'phen pa dang / glang po che rengs par byed pa dang / pha rol gyi sde mngon par 'joms par byed pa dang / bar snang na gnas pa

thams cad ltung bar byed do/ /sems can thams cad 'bebs par byed do/ /sgrub pa po las gang dang gang sgrub par 'dod pa de dang de thams cad byed do/ /yang zla ba gcig tsam mi smra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyid bsgoms

na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' la gnas shing 'chag par byed do/ /me 'bar ba dang / glog 'gyu ba la sogs pa ston par byed do/ /gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ro/ /'jig

rten gyi khams stong phrag kyang g.yo bar byed do/ /sgrub pa pos bye ba bdun bzlas nas 'di dag thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ /rim pa 'dis lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / snam sbyar dang / 'khar gsil las gang yang rung ba bzung nas ji srid rig pa 'dzin par

gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang / sprul pa du ma byed pa dang / 'dod na 'chi ba dang / skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nye bar gnas par byed do/ /

sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad kyang byed do/ /sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad kyi mchod rten 'bum phrag gcig byas te rma med pa'i ral gri blangs la/ cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed la nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod

de brgyad pa'am bcu bzhi pa'am nya gang ba la skyil krung bcas te ji srid du ral gri 'bar ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes thogs nyid la rnga bo che rnams kyi sgra grag go/ /steng nas me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /lhan cig pa ji snyed pa dang bcas pa steng du

'gro'o/ /rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro/ /ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin pa chen po'i 'khor los sgyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i cha lugs dang rgyan 'chang ba 'dod dgu rgyu ba dang / skad cig tsam gyis

'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par spyod pa dang / rga shi med pa dang / nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba mthong ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mchod pa'i char 'bebs pa dang / bskal pa chen po stong

phrag tu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang 'khor lo'am pa Ti sa blangs te 'bum phrag nyi shu bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang dpal gyi sgor song ste/ nim pa'i lo ma tsha ba'i mar khu la btags pa 'bum phrag gcig sreg blugs bya'o/ /

lha ma yin gyi 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te ma grub na 'bum phrag gnyis sam gsum du sreg blugs bya'o/ /lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad bsregs bzhin du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /

'ongs nas kyang sgrub pa po la zhu bar byed de/ kye skyes bu dpa' bo 'jug tu gsol zhes smra'o/ /de nas grogs dang bcas pa 'jug par bya'o/ /ral gri'am 'khor lo de bzung nas lha ma yin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /sa 'og gi rdzas rnams

kyi mnga' bdag lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad kyi bdag po/ gsang sngags grub pa gzhan thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi dbang phyug sa 'og thams cad kyi bdag po lha ma yin chen po'i sprul pa byed pa po bskal pa chen por gnas pa/ khyab

'jug gi 'khor lo hU~M zhes bya ba brjod pa tsam gyis rlag par byed pa/ khyab 'jug kyang hU~M zhes brjod pa tsam gyis rlag par byed na gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'bum phrag sum cu byas te mchod

rten re re'i mdun du stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzla bar bya'o/ /thams cad la nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la tha mar me tog can gyi lcags las byung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa mtho gang tsam pa bzung nas cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed pa la skyil mo krung bcings te/ ji

srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /de blangs pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi mnga' bdag dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha thams cad 'dul bar byed pa/ bskal pa bye

ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'tsho ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong rdzu 'phrul gyis gnon pa dang / mchod pa'i sprin brgya stong phrag gis mchod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de rnams la nyi ma re re zhing mchod pa chen po'i

sprin gyis mchod par byed do/ /sgrub pa'i thabs rgyas pa gzhan yang mchod rten 'bum phrag drug cu byas te/ sngon du bsnyen pa byas la bye ba bzlas pa'o/ /de nas mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pa'i ro blangs la khrus byas nas nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod de ji

srid ma langs pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o/ /langs nas dngul chu dang bcud len dang mi snang ba la sogs pa thams cad de la ster bar byed do/ /gal te mi ster na ji srid kha las lce ma byung ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o/ /de nas mtshon rnon pos de gcad par bya'o/ /de

gzung bas nyi ma stong gi gzi brjid can rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba stong phrag drug cu'i 'khor can/ tshe bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag drug cu 'tsho ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / ri bo lhun po bye ba phrag stong

sgul ba dang / gling stong phrag 'phen pa dang / rgya mtsho stong phrag skems pa dang / lha'i 'jig rten brgya stong phrag bsdigs pa dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams lhung ba dang / skra li zhing 'khyil pa dang / lo brgyad

gnyis pa'i rnam pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa ste/ sreg pa'i bskal pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'gro zhing rga ba dang / 'chi ba med par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin

du yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / dpag bsam gyi shing dang / bum pa bzang po dang / nor gyi char pa dang / nam mkha'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po dang / rin po che chen po'i lag pa dang / nor rgyun gyi rtog pa chen po dang / sems can gyi re ba thams cad rjes su 'gengs

pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid dang / rin po che thams cad kyang bsgrub par bya'o/ /de la 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bsnyen bkur

ba rin po che'o/ /de nas sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang tsan+dan dkar po las pad+ma sor drug pa'i tshad byas la pad+ma de lag par bzung nas zla ba drug tu skyil krung bcings te nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod nas thun mtshams gsum mam bzhir grangs mi gzung bar bzlas par

bya'o/ /zla ba drug yongs su rdzogs pa dang pad+ma 'bum phrag bdun sreg blugs bya'o/ /zla ba nya nas bsgrub pa brtsam par bya ste/ nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la skyil krung bcas nas mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o/ /tho rangs kyi tshe rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur

ro/ /skra li zhing 'khyil ba dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam par rgyan gyi tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong phrag shar ba'i 'od dang mtshungs pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag du ma'i 'khor can/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor ba/

tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig tsam gyis rnam par rgyu ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin du mas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par mchod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du ut+pa la'i sgrub pa dang / tsan+dan

dmar po'i pad+ma'i sgrub pa yang ngo / /sgrub pa gzhan yang 'byung ste/ shel dang / pad+ma rA ga'am/ mu tig gi 'bras bu'am/ rin po che yongs su rtog par byed pa pos yongs su brtags pa la bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad tsam pa'i mchod rten 'bum tsam byas te/

gang yang rung bar grangs mi gzung bar ji srid bdag yongs su dag par mthong ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /de'i rjes su mngar gsum gyis sbags pa'i pad+ma 'bum dang / sna ma'i me tog 'bum phrag gsum dang / a ga ru'i yam shing 'bum dang / tsan+dan

gyi yam shing 'bum phrag gsum dang / til dang 'bras 'bum phrag bzhi dang / zho zan 'bum dang / mar gyi sreg blugs stong phrag gsum dang / sman thams cad pa'i sreg blugs 'bum phrag gcig byas la sbyin sreg yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dkar po'i tshes lnga la

bsgrub par bya'o/ /skyil mo krung bcas te nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la ji srid nor bu rin po che 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /'bar nas kyang rig pa 'dzin pa gzhon nu gdong du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /skra li zhing 'khyil pa dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam

pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gsal bar byed pa rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi slar 'khor los sgyur ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i dngos grub byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rig pa 'dzin pa zhes brjod

do/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur bar byed do/ /skad cig tsam la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can bskor nas slar de nyid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te 'dod na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mngon par rdzogs par byas te lus de nyid

kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sgrub thabs kyi le'u la bris sku dang / shing lham dang / mu tig gi phreng ba yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i cho gas bsgrub par bya'o/ /thams cad du 'grub par

'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang mchod rten bye ba phrag stong byas te 'bum phrag bdun bzla bar bya'o/ /yongs su rdzogs pa dang me tog can gyi lcags sam/ lcags lnga'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa sor bcu'i tshad dam/ bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad tsam cho 'phrul

gyi zla ba phyed la mtshan thog thag lag pas rdo rje de bzung nas mdun du khri'i steng du lag pa bkab la ji srid 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o/ /de bzung nas rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa 'khor los sgyur ba chen po nyi ma bye ba brgya phrag dang rjes su 'tsham pa rdo rje 'chang ba ltar

gzi brjid dang ldan zhing 'od gsal bar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu zhing dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams la ci bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur/ lha ma yin rnams skrag pa dang / srin po rnams 'joms pa dang / sems can thams cad de'i ci

bsgo ba byed par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzas kyi bya ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u

yongs su rdzogs // //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad slar yang ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po ka k+Sha sbyar ba ste/ mtha' yas pa kha sbyar ba zhes bya ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po gsang sngags kyi ka k+Sha pu Ta bka' stsal pa/ de

nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes su skyob/ /gsang sngags ka k+Sha sbyar zhes bya/ /gsang chen mchog tu rmad du byung / /gru bzhi pa la tshad mdzes pa/ /kun nas yongs su bzang zhing dag /re mig bzhi bcu zhe dgu pa/ /mdor bsdus nas

ni sngags pas bya/ /dang po'i phreng bzang gnyis la ni/ /a sogs blo gros ldan pas dgod/ /ka sogs lhag ma'i re'u mig la/ /sngags pas mdo ru bsdus te bri/ /sbyor ba ji bzhin yi ge kun/ /bzhin du dgod par bya/ /re'u mig stong pa dag la

ni/ /k+Sha yig dang ni rdo rje bri/ /rim pa 'di dag bkod nas ni/ /rang sde'i 'og tu 'bar ba mchog /dang po dbyangs la de'i rjes su/ /yi ge phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa/ /ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha/ /dag cing chu yi dkyil 'khor ldan/ /'di rnams myur du

'grub par byed/ /pad+ma'i rigs kyi lha nyid do/ /don kun grub par yang dag ldan/ /me yi dkyil 'khor zhes su bshad/ /'bar ba'i me dang mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /kha tsha Tha tha pha ra Sha/ /dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor ldan/ /ga dza Da da ba la sa/ /dngos grub

kun byed rlung gzugs ldan/ /dbyar gyi sprin ltar shin tu 'jigs/ /g+ha dz+ha D+ha d+ha b+ha wa ha/ /steng 'gros dngos grub byed por brjod/ /slar yang nga nya Na nam/ /chos kun dbang du byed pa mchog /thog ma'i dbyangs yig gang yin pa/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs stobs

bcu/ /khyad par yan lag bcu gnyis bshad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bcu gnyis/ /ma ning yi ge bzhi po spong / /r-i r-I l-i l-I zhes bya ba/ /dbyangs dang sa bon de bzhin sngags/ /de dag yi ge ru yang bshad/ /dbang du byed pa'i sde tshan kun/ /thig

le sgra gtsug zla phyed ces/ /rjes dbyangs kyi ni phreng zhes bshad/ /sangs rgyas de bzhin byang sems kyi/ /yi ger brjod pa de bzhin zhing / /gsal byed ces kyis gsal ba'o/ /de bzhin ya ra la wa rlung / /me dang dbang chen chu dag ste/ /'byung ba chen po khams

rnams so/ /rlung me bdud rtsi'i bcud ces bshad/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam cha dbye bas/ /thams cad nyid kyi lam shes bya/ /phyag rgya dang ni dkyil 'khor sngags/ /ting 'dzin mdor bsdus bshad pa'o/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med/ /chos rnams kun gyi

sdom du brjod/ /stong pa mtshan med smon med pa/ /rnam par thar pa gsum du bshad/ /phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/ /mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya/ /da ni sngags kyi ka k+Sha'i sbyor ba la/ rab tu btus pa sbyar ba dang phral ba bshad par bya'o/ /yi ge

rnams kyis byang chub spyod/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang mya ngan 'das/ /lhan cig nyid du sbyar bar bya/ /dbyangs rnams yig rnams bsdus par bshad/ /mtshan nyid kyang ni rab bshad bya/ /dbyangs ni byang chub gzugs nyid de/ /gzhan dang lhan cig sbyar bar

bya/ /de la nges par sangs rgyas nyid/ /ster ba nyid du legs par bshad/ /thog mar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang sngags dri ma med pa 'byung / /thog mar dbyangs ni thig le ldan/ /rdo rje'i steng du yang dag gnas/ /'bar ba'i phreng can rab zhi ba/ /

rnam par 'phro ba nyid du gnas/ /zla ba'i dbus su bsgom bya ba/ /kun gyi ye shes 'od chen po/ /kun du 'gro ba rab tu thob/ /thams cad du yang rnyed par dka'/ /de nyid bral ba rtag pa ste/ /yi ge med cing dbyer med pa/ /byang chub sems zhes rab tu bshad/ /

dung dang kun+da zla ltar dag /gnyis pa'i sgra dang yang dag ldan/ /de ni shin tu ring por shes/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod pa ste/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa rnams/ /dro ba'i bzhi pa sbyar ba ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhes su bsgrags/ /dbyangs dang yi ge khyad par

can/ /mtshan nyid rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /rang gi phyag rgya sogs ldan pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab stsol byed/ /da ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sngags kyi de nyid 'dir bshad bya/ /thog mar spyod pa byas nas ni/ /gnyis pa smra ba po ru bshad/ /

bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis kun nas mnan/ /gsum pa me yi ming can no/ /rgyud med pas te cung zad pa/ /bzhi pa yis ni gsal bar byas/ /drug pa'i sgra dang tha dad min/ /de yi steng du thig le gnas/ /chos kun nam mkha' dang mtshungs par/ /yang dang yang

du bshad pa yin/ /de ni lnga par shes par bya/ /yi ge lnga pa stobs po che/ /yi ge lnga yi stobs lnga'i bdag nyid las skyes gtso/ /mthu stobs chen po khyab bdag srid pa'i bdag nyid skyes/ /mthu stobs chen po srid gsum las rab grol byed pa/ /yi ge lnga ni

'gro ba drug las grol ba'i bdag /mngon shes drug kyang rab tu ster byed dri ma med/ /de nyid bcom ldan spyod pa ste/ /mi bskyod pa zhes rab tu grags/ /byang sems rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /bstan pa'i sems dpa' rang byung ba/ /chos kun

gyi ni de bzhin nyid/ /gang bsgrags de nyid thams cad du/ /'bar ba me yi sa bon ldan/ /spyod pa yi ni steng du gnas/ /de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni/ /rin chen 'byung ldan zhes su bshad/ /chos rnams kun gyi byed pa ni/ /med pa nyid du'ang bshad

pa'o/ /me yi sa bon yang dag ldan/ /bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis spyi bo ru/ /mnan pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med/ /de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni/ /sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan/ /don yod pa yi snying por grags/ /

sde lnga pa yi bzhi pa ni/ /dngos dang dngos med rab rtogs byed/ /'bar ba me yi sa bon gyis/ /'khor lo'i dbus su rab tu gnas/ /drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan/ /thig le sgra yis rnam par spras/ /'khor los sgyur ba ye shes che/ /rnam par

rgyas pa'i nor ster byed/ /gang zhig sde lnga pa yi mtha'/ /sgyu ma'i chos la rab tu gnas/ /de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni/ /gdugs dkar zhes su bshad pa'o/ /brgyad pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan/ /byams pa zhes ni grags pa ste/ /de nyid bcom

ldan rnal 'byor ni/ /spyi bor thig le mnan pa'o/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs dang ye shes che/ /mA ma kI ru de bsgrags so/ /lnga pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan/ /'jam pa'i dpal zhes rab tu grags/ /spyod pa'i gar mkhan rab rtogs ming / /sdig pa thams

cad rengs byed de/ /sdig kun rnam par sbyong byed pa/ /rnam par sel ba rnam shes bya/ /sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa ni/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs chen dang / /gshin rje mthar byed khro bo che/ /yi ge gsum ni stobs chen po/ /thog mar dgu pa yi ni dbyangs/ /de

yi dbus su spyod pa gzhag /tha mar sna tshogs zhes bya sbyar/ /sku gsum du ni rnam par bsgom/ /tha ma'i sde tshan gsum pa ni/ /gang yin kun tu bzang por bshad/ /sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni/ /sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba'o/ /de nyid bcom ldan mgon

po ni/ /nam mkha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags/ /rdo rje khro bo stobs po che/ /de nyid rab tu grags pa'o/ /'di kun thams cad stong pa ste/ /rgyu ni rab tu spangs pa'o/ /dbyangs lnga dang ni yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad hU~M mdzad do/ /gang zhig bzhi pa'i sde dang

po/ /me yis rab tu gsal bar byas/ /bzhi pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan/ /gzi brjid phung po stobs po che/ /de nyid gang dang ma sbyar ba/ /sgrol ma zhes su rab tu grags/ /bzhi pa yi ni gnyis pa gang / /shes rab pha rol phyin par nges/ /thig

le lhan cig yang dag ldan/ /sgra dang ldan pa'i mchog tu gyur/ /sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa gang / /me nyid dang ni yang dag ldan/ /bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag mnan/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal pa'i mchog /de nyid bcom ldan shes bya ba/ /spyod pa'i

gar mkhan zhes bya'i mtshan/ /de yi rjes nyid la ni me/ /dgu pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan/ /me dang dbang chen du brjod bya/ /gsum pa'i dbyangs kyis mnan pa yi/ /sde tshan dang po'i dang po'i yig /de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ni/ /'jig rten mgon

po thub pa che/ /ye shes rgya che bsgrub par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed/ /sde tshan lnga pa rin chen mchog /bzhi pa'i sa bon dam pa de/ /'og tu me yi yan lag 'bar/ /khro gnyer can zhes rab tu grags/ /dbang chen yi ge dag pa la/ /thig

le sgra yis rnam par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas spyan zhes rnam grags pa/ /sdig pa thams cad 'phrog par byed/ /sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni/ /nam mkha'i spyan zhes brjod pa'o/ /sgyu ma'i chos la rab gnas nas/ /gsod pa'i don du rab gsol byed/ /mA

ma kI zhes bya ba'i ming / /rig pa mchog tu gsang ba ste/ /rgyu mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams kyi/ /dri ma med pa stsol bar byed/ /gnyis pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan/ /'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya/ /dbang chen sa bon yang dag ldan/ /

'gro ba'i rdo rje rengs byed na/ /gdug sems gzhan kun lta ci smos/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyar byas pa/ /rang gi sa bon gnas shing 'phro/ /'gro ba thams cad skrod byed na/ /gdug sems can gzhan smos ci dgos/ /de nyid me dang ldan pas ni/ /dbang

dang dgug pa'i las rnams dang / /bgegs dang dgra rnams zhi ba ni/ /khyad par mi g.yo ba yis byed/ /don dam bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs/ /rnam snang mdzad bya gnas las 'byung / /gzhan gyi dmag dpung 'joms pa ni/ /rgyu ni me yis gsal byas pa/ /

drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan/ /thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis drangs pas/ /ti se man dA ra la sogs/ /de yi phye mar rlog par nges/ /rdo rje la gnas 'khor lo yi/ /dbus

gnas 'gro kun rengs par byed/ /gnas nas bskyod par byed pa yis/ /'byung po rnams ni dbang du byed/ /rtag pa'i gzugs su gnas nas ni/ /mi g.yo ba yi snying gar son/ /chos kyi dbyings mtshungs thob nas ni/ /bdag gi bdag nyid bsgom par

bya/ /rlung gi sa bon rin po che/ /spyod pa'i steng du yang dag ldan/ /me las byung ba med la gnas/ /'gro ba thams cad 'bebs par byed/ /sde tshan dang po'i dang po gang / /sa yi yi ge steng du gnas/ /sde tshan lnga pa'i tha ma ni/ /drug pa'i sgra yi steng du gnas/ /

'og tu me yi sa bon ldan/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ste/ /sa gsum thams cad 'bar bar byed/ /me yi phyogs su gnas nas ni/ /phyag rgya'i bdag nyid thams cad bsgom/ /rlung lha me lha yang dag sbyor/ /rgyu ni byed pa mtshungs pa'o/ /rnam par snang

mdzad ye shes che/ /de nyid kho na bsgrub par bya/ /dbang chen me ni sbyor ba las/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i go 'phang gnas/ /ye shes rgya chen bsgrub par bya/ /yang na phun sum tshogs pa'i don/ /rig pa 'dzin dang sangs rgyas nyid/ /rnal 'byor ye shes phun sum

tshogs/ /skye ba 'di la 'grub 'gyur te/ /'di la the tsom mi bya'o/ /dbyangs dang yi ge thams cad la/ /sbyor ba'i dbye bas rnam par dbye/ /tshig dang ngag gi tshad rnams dang / /ting nge 'dzin dang sngags 'byung ba/ /slob dpon man ngag las shes bya/ /gzhan du

bya ba ma yin no/ /rdo rje snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud chen po las rdo rje ka k+Sha'i sbyor ba mdor bsdus te bstan pa ste rgyas par slob dpon gyis mngon par spyad par bya'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor

gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsung gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba btab bo//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gi rjes nyid la/ 'brug gi sgra mtha' yas pa'i legs par bsgrags pa/ nam mkha'i mdzod kun nas rdo rje rgya che ba tshangs pa

chen po'i sgra yongs su rdzogs pa'i don dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor so sor yongs su rtogs pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /

gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor che/ /zlum po kun nas bzang po ste/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gnas/ /de yi steng du pad chen po/ /'dab ma brgyad la ge sar can/ /de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /yi ge mchog gi go 'phang nyid/ /bdag gi dngos grub bsgom

par bya/ /ngag gi dbang phyug 'od chen po/ /snying gar zla ba der pad+ma/ /de yi steng du dung brtag bya/ /dung gi dbus su lce yin te/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin dge ba'o/ /de yi steng du rin chen pad/ /yang na sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan yang / /'bar zhing rkan gyi mthar

khyab pa/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni rab 'bab pa/ /ba yi yi ge spyi tshugs pa/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni steng du gnas/ /bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'dzag pa ni/ /bzhin du bsam par bya/ /zla ba phyed dang zla ba gsum/ /zla ba bzhi'am zla ba nyid/ /zla

ba brgyad du rab mchog bsgoms/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po bsgrub par bya/ /skyil krung gis ni nyer gnas te/ /dang po'i sbyor ba'i dbang phyug skyes/ /chos kyi dbyings ni mtha' dag tu/ /thams cad du ni yongs su gang / /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bsgom par

bya/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa'i/ /ji snyed rig pa thams cad ni/ /lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyi/ /phyag rgya de rnams bdag nyid mchog /de rnams thams cad bdag nyid kyi/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor la

'jug bsam/ /dung gi sgra ni gsal ba bsam/ /pad+ma'i khams la yang dag rten/ /pad+ma'i ge sar thig le las/ /sgra yi rang bzhin rdul phran rnams/ /mgrin par son nas sgra gyur te/ /sgra ni dbyangs nyid lhag pa'o/ /slar yang lce ru son pa dang / /yi ge

mchog tu dge ba'o/ /lce yi yi ge cher 'bar ba/ /gcig nas gcig tu rdo rje'i tshul/ /kun nas rab tu 'od gsal ba/ /rdo rje'i ngag ni dam pa'i don/ /sgra yis nam mkha' kun gang bar/ /sgrub pos mdo ru bsdus te bzla/ /de bzhin du ni snying gar sgra'am/ /

lce la 'od zer nges 'phros nas/ /mchu'am so las rab bkra ba'i/ /gal te 'od zer mthong na ni/ /de tshe grub par rnam par shes/ /grub pa'i ngag ni dam pa'i don/ /yang na lha ni gzhan pa yi/ /ngag gi sgrub thabs chen po mchog /rang lce rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsam/ /

bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yang / /'bar ba'i sgron ma dang mtshungs pa/ /rang gi snying gi dbus kyi cha/ /yi ge mchog tu phra ba yi/ /a yi yi ge mnga' bdag mchog /rnam par bkra ba nyi ma bzhin/ /rang gi sde pa'i mthar thug mtshungs/ /yi ge yi ger

yongs su gzhol/ /phra mo mnyam pa'i mthar thug ni/ /'bar zhing thig le dang mtshungs shing / /snying gi dkyil 'khor gsal byed pa/ /de yi 'bar ba rab phra ba/ /ji srid rkan gyi bar du son/ /slar yang yi ge thams cad ni/ /yang dang yang du gsal byed cing / /

lce la rdo rje 'bar ba ni/ /rdul phran lta bur byed bzhin pa'i/ /rdo rje 'bar ba stong phrag dag /yang dang yang du rnam par 'don/ /'jig rten kun du de song ste/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /yi ge'i rang bzhin rnam bkra ba/ /rang gis 'gro ba snang byas

te/ /slar yang 'ongs nas rang gnas su/ /'jug pa ru ni yongs su brtag /ji srid phyogs kun song ba yi/ /yi ge kha ru rab tu 'jug /lus la lus can gyi gzugs brnyan/ /sems kyi phyag rgya legs par bsam/ /de nas sgra dang yi ge ni/ /lte

bar song ste yongs su gnas/ /lte ba ru ni pad+ma mchog /pad+mar rdo rje dri med mdzes/ /de yi steng du dung chen po/ /rab tu 'phro ba nyid du gnas/ /de las 'bar ba'i rnam pa'i sgra/ /brang gi gnas nas yongs su byung / /slar yang mgrin par son nas su/ /rdo rje lce

la yang dag reg /'gram pa sbyar ba'i dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dri ma med/ /kha ba ba zho ltar dkar 'od/ /bcud len bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'dra/ /rdo rje lce ni mtha' dag rnams/ /yang dang yang du gsal bar byed/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi rtser son

te/ /slar yang snying ga nyid du song / /thig le las ni gug skyed gyur/ /gug skyed ri mo ring po can/ /cha shas rnam bzhi 'dus pa las/ /de ni yi ger rnam par shes/ /yi ge las ni sgra skye zhing / /sgra las nA da de las dbyangs/ /dbyangs las ngag tu rnam par

'gyur/ /yi ge las ni cha shas tshogs/ /tshig rkang dang ni ngag tu 'gyur/ /tshig rkang las ni tshigs bcad dang / /de bzhin du ni gA thA dang / /phreng 'dzin rgyun chags de bzhin te/ /'di ltar sngags dang rig sngags dang / /rang gi snying por rab 'jug 'gyur/ /

de nas bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor che/ /blo gros ldan pas brtan byas te/ /dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang / /dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya/ /bzlas pa 'di yi sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad du ni brtan par bya/ /yid bzhin gyi ni ngag 'grub bo/ /

rmad byung mchog tu rnyed dka' ba'i/ /yang na lha ni gzhan pa yi/ /ngag 'grub thams cad skyob rnams kyi/ /yi ge gcig pa gsang chen po/ /ngag gi sgrub thabs mchog tu dge/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni/ /legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /

rang snying za bar rdo rje che/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /de las bstan bcos thams cad ni/ /nges pa gdon pa nyid du bya/ /ngag grub pa yi ye shes 'dis/ /thams cad mkhyen pa thob par byed/ /bstan bcos thams cad rab 'don cing / /de nyid

kyang ni 'chad par byed/ /sems can kun gyis thams cad du/ /dngos po cung zad gang bsams pa/ /de dag thams cad rnam shes te/ /skad cig tsam la smra bar byed/ /rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba las ngag gi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs // //de

nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad slar yang 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs chen po mchog gi dbang phyug la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang

sngags kyi mdzod kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas de de bzhin no zhes bka' stsal nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun nas 'khor lo'i dbang

phyug gi rgyal po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim par phye ba'i cho ga rgyas pa bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'am yang na/ /

rtsibs bcu drug par rnam par bri/ /lte bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgod/ /'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /mtha' ru rin chen rnam pa bdun/ /mkhas pa yis ni spel bar bya/ /de yi lte bar bdag nyid ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba stobs po che/ /sangs rgyas

kun gyi sku chen po/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i mchog /de yi phyag rgya bgrang las 'das/ /skad cig ma ni nyid la 'thon/ /'gro ba thams cad snang byas nas/ /sngags kyi dbang phyug nyid la gzhug /'khor lo'i dngos grub gzi brjid che/ /'khor los

sgyur bar bdag nyid 'gyur/ /chung dang che dang dbang phyug dang / /rang dbang 'dod dgur spyod pa dang / /kun du 'gro ba nyid dang ni/ /kun gyi dbang phyug phun tshogs 'bras/ /rga dang 'chi ba med thob cing / /nges par 'khor los sgyur dang mtshungs/ /gser gyi 'khor

lo rin po che/ /de bzhin dngul dang shel nyid dang / /me tog can gyi lcags kyang rung / /rang gi lag gis bzung nas su/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya/ /'khor los sgyur ba gzi brjid che/ /mtshan

rnams kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /de ltar bdag nyid bsgoms na ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de la de'i sngags kyi tshig tu gyur pa ni/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a ba lo ki ti/ muSh+Ti tsakra warti dz+wa la dz+wa la d+hu na bi d+hu na trA sa ya mA ra ya/ uts+tshA Ta ya ha na

b+hany+dza proM khi ni kuN+Da li ni/ a pa rA dzi tA s+t+ra d+hA ri Ni hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /oM oM a pa rA dzi tA d+hi ka swA hA/ snying po'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM a pa rA dzi tA d+hi ka swA hA/ cho ga'i snying po'o/ /'khor los sgyur ba rang grub ste/ /

sangs rgyas nyid kun thob nas ni/ /ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs/ /yang na dbang phyug dam pa kun/ /dpa' bo thams cad ster byed na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i sgrub thabs so/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /nam

mkha' la ni yongs su bsgom/ /gzi brjid phung po ye shes che/ /sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /gnyis su med 'byung sems kyi mchog /dkyil 'khor mchog tu rmad 'byung ba/ /de ni me yir shes par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub

rab sgrub byed/ /de yang 'khor lo 'dzin rgyal po/ /'khor los sgyur ba legs 'bar ba/ /de la de bzhin rin chen bdun/ /'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma re rer bkra shis bsgom/ /gzi brjid

phung po sku chen po/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba/ /'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs dpa' bo ni/ /snang ba shar ba lta bur gnas/ /de yi phyag rgya rtag tu bsam/ /nam mkha'i rnam par legs par gnas/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa/ /'od zer phreng bas

rnam par khyab/ /de dang bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgom/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed/ /kun du kun nas thams cad du/ /dngos po kun las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs/ /kun du 'gro ba nyid dang ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad

nyid dag dang / /rdo rje can kun nyid dang ni/ /gzi brjid mchog kun thob gyur nas/ /gzi brjid phung po 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de la sngags kyi tshig tu gyur pa ni/ oM ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a ba lo ki te mUr+t+ti te te dzo rA shi dz+wA la dz+wA la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ da ra da ra/ bi d+ha bi d+ha hU~M hU~M phaT phaT

swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /oM te dzo rA shi swA hA/ snying po'o/ /oM dz+wA la te dzo rA shi hU~M phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /dag pa'i sngags tshig 'di rnams kyis/ /nyi ma'i ye shes rab tu gsal/ /kun du 'gro ba bsgrub par bya/ /rig pa 'dzin pa nyid thob 'gyur/ /gzi

brjid phung po'i gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// //kun nas snang ba zhes bya mchog /yi ge gsum pa stobs po che/ /gser gyi kha dog legs 'bar zhing / /gtsug tor steng son 'od gsal ba/ /sngags pa rang bdag gis bsgom bya/ /kun nas snang ba

lta bur 'gyur/ /oM AHhU~M/ gsang sngags rtse mo dam pa 'di/ /bsgoms pa tsam gyis thams cad du/ /brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi/ /'gro kun kun nas snang bar 'gyur/ /kun nas snang ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// //chos kyi 'khor lo phyag

rgya che/ /legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /sangs rgyas kun nyid kun gyi mchog /chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor byed/ /'khor lo 'di ni rtsibs bcu gnyis/ /rtsibs bcu gnyis pa yongs su gnas/ /rnam gsum gsum ni yongs bskor ba/ /

bya ba'i don du dag pa ster/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po/ /nam mkha'i khrugs na gnas pa ste/ /chos kyi dbyings ni khyab pa ni/ /legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /'gro ba brtan dang g.yo ba ni/ /'di kun rten cing 'brel 'byung ba/ /'di ni

chos kyi phyag rgya che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed/ /de yi sngags su gyur pa ni/ /oM d+hu na pA ta ya ts+tshin+da tsakre Na badzri Ni hU~M/ gsang sngags 'di ni dpal ldan mchog /chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis med 'char/ /skad cig tsam gyis thams cad du/ /dam

pa'i chos ni rab skor byed/ /chos kyi 'khor lo sgrub pa'i thabs so// //pad+ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs legs 'bar ba/ /rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog bsgrubs na/ /nyon mongs rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /snying gnas rdo rje gzugs

brnyan 'dra/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /de yi snying la rdo rje me/ /dri ma med pa skye bar 'gyur/ /nyon mongs rtag tu yongs zad cing / /dgra rnams kun las rgyal bar byed/ /bden pa bzhi ni rtogs pas na/ /bden pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /

sngags ni/ oM kle sha a sha ni hU~M phaT/ 'di ni nyon mongs rdo rje'i sngags/ /drag cing drag po'i gzhan gnon pa'o/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang ster byed na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /nyon mongs rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs so// //dbang chen dkyil

'khor la gnas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin stobs po che/ /bdud bzhi las ni rnam rgyal ba/ /legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /bden pa bzhi yi khu tshur che/ /lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid/ /khu tshur sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi/ /gnyis med skye ba'i mtshan nyid de/ /rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /rang nyid sangs rgyas yin no zhes/ /brtan dang g.yo ba'i 'gro ba ni/ /'di dag thams cad ma skyes par/ /rdo rje khu tshur bsgoms na ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de la sngags

su gyur pa ni/ /oM bi dza ye haH/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur che/ /shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba/ /sngags pas rtag tu bsgoms na ni/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'thob/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// //dngos

po thams cad gyen 'phags pa/ /gdod nas zhi zhing mtshan nyid med/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su'o/ /rdo rje rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgom/ /'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis/ /'di yis 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ /'khor

los sgyur ba nyid du ni/ /'jig rten kun gyi thams cad du/ /kun nas phun sum tshogs pa kun/ /bkug nas gus pas sbyin par bya/ /sngags ni/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la dI pya dI pya ung+ga toSh+NI Sha d+hu na d+hu na hU~M/ steng 'gro'i gtsug tor zhes bya bar/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo kun

gyis gsungs/ /'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// //sangs rgyas rang bzhin phyag rgya che/ /legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /tshad

skyob gdugs dkar chen po ni/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i kha dog cher 'bar zhing / /chu yi dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa/ /dri med puN+Da rI kar gnas/ /ri mo bdun gyis yongs su gang / /bcud

kyis len gyi mchog lta bur/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag bsgom par bya/ /dngos grub 'di yi sbyor ba yis/ /sems can rnams la thams cad du/ /re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /'di ni gtsug tor gdugs dkar che/ /sngags ni/ oM ma ma ma ma hU~M ni/ 'di ni

bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni/ /ye shes che dang stobs mgyogs 'gro/ /dpa' bo thams cad thob 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min/ /gdugs dkar po'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// //zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs

ral gri ni/ /sngags pas snying gar bsgom par bya/ /rang gi bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin chen pos/ /nam mkha'i mthongs rnams yongs gang ba/ /bdag nyid gnyis med ngo bo yis/ /rnal 'byor gcig tu bsgom par bya/ /sngags

kyi yi ge 'khor lo che/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /sngags pas snying gar bsgom par bya/ /rgyal ba dam pa nyid du 'gyur/ /sngags ni/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa lo Sh+NI Sha dz+wa la dz+wa la ban+d+ha ban+d+ha da ma da ma dru ma dru ma da ha da ha na hU~M/ rgyal ba'i gtsug tor ral gri che/ /

shes rab ye shes dri ma med/ /sngags pas kun nas bsgoms nas ni/ /rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// //sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /seng ge'i khri yi steng

du bsam/ /yang na rdo rje'i gdan la gnas/ /kun du gtsug tor che 'bar ba/ /snying gar yongs su bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni/ /yi ge dam pa yi ni gnas/ /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/ /chos kyi sku ni mchog tu che/ /'di ni

bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni/ /kun du gtsug tor stobs po che/ /skad cig de la 'grub 'gyur te/ /rdo rje sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin no/ /sngags ni/ oM badzra ban d+ha hU~M/ gsang sngags 'di ni dam pa gtso/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur byed/ /rtag

tu rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na/ /de ni kun gyis dbang bskur ro/ /kun gyi gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// //rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rim par phye ba
