bas rab tu gnas/ /thams cad so sor gsal bar byed/ /sprin gyi dkyil 'khor mchog rmad byung / /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya/ /rdo rje smra ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// //de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang

dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma'i sbyor ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya/ /de yi dbus su go cha che/ /rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /de yi dbus su brtson chen po/ /rdo rje bsrung ba yang dag bri/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /rgyan

rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po/ /kha dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che/ /thams cad bsrung ba mchog tu dge/ /phyag rgya sngags dang yang dag ldan/ /gsang ba chen po'i go 'phang mchog /de yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che/ /sha Sha'i sde yi mthar gnas mchog /mgon

po'i rgyur ni mngon par brjod/ /steng du nA das brgyan par byas/ /kun nas kha dog du ma yis/ /yongs su bskor bar bsgom par bya/ /sngags kyi phreng ba yongs su ldan/ /glog gi phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /mchod pa thams cad

rab bsgrub bya/ /rdo rje bsrung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// //de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /khu tshur dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dkyil

'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /rdo rje pad+ma yid 'ong ba/ /gzi brjid chen po gser gyi mdog /'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba/ /de yi steng du gzi brjid che/ /rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa po/ /kun+da dung dang zla ba dkar/ /

khu tshur de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs khu tshur/ rdo rje nyid du mnyam nyid mchog /gnyis su med pa mchog gsang ba/ /khu tshur gyis ni sdud par bshad/ /de sngags mchog tu dga' ba ni/ /brjod du med nyid stsol mdzad pa/ /sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum

pa ni/ /'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i sku/ /'di yi sngags la rnam par gnas/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur mchod par bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor ro// //de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /

dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba ni/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas byang chub stsol bar mdzad/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor mchog /de bzhin gru bzhir bris nas ni/ /sgo khyud la sogs rnam par spang / /rtse

gsum paT+Ti sa dang ni/ /dung dang pad+ma sogs pas brgyan/ /thog mar dbang phyug chen po dgod/ /rtse gsum pa yi phyag rgyar ldan/ /khyu mchog la zhon mig gsum pa/ /stag gi pags gyon phyag bzhi pa/ /thal bas byugs shing mgo bo la/ /ral pa'i tshogs ni rab

'phyang ba/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ /phyag 'tshal ba ni 'di bri'o/ /de yi sngags ni/ oM tri sa sru~M hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni cher gsang ba/ /bdag nyid chen po dbang phyug che'i/ /dbang phyug chen po'i dkyil 'khor

ro/ /dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid la dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su nag po chen po gzhag par bya'o/ /lag pa stong gis gar byed pa dang ldan pa'i dga' byed dbang phyug dang lhan cig phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum pa'o/ /lag pa stong gis gnas pa'o/ /rang gi sngags ni/ oM ma hA

kA la hU~M b+h+yoH/ oM nan di ke shwa ra hU~M b+h+yo/ 'di bzlas na dngos grub thams cad byed do/ /dga' byed dbang phyug dang / nag po chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nyid kyi ni cho ga yis/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi thig gdab bya/ /der ni pad+ma yang dag bri/ /pad+ma'i dbus su sbrang rtsi byed/ /

la sogs ming po gsum bri'o/ /gzhu yi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin/ /sbrang rtsi byed dang rgyal ba byed/ /de bzhin nyid du'ang sgrub byed do/ /me tog mda' dang yongs su ldan/ /rang gi ming rtogs mtshan ma can/ /sngags ni/ oM ma d+hU krita sna~M/ oM swa~M/ oM

d+h+wa na swa/ gsang sngags 'di ni 'dod gzugs can/ /dbang du byed pa thams cad sgrub/ /sbrang rtsi rdo rje la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bris nas dbus su thig bzhi gdab bo/ /dbus su tum bu ru'o/ /shar gyi 'dab mar rgyal ba'o/ /lho ru rnam

par rgyal ba'o/ /nub tu mi thub pa'o/ /byang du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o/ /de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ji lta ba bzhin du gsang sngags dgod par bya'o/ /oM tuM bu ru hU~M/ oM dza ye hA~M/ oM bi dza ye hA~M/ oM a dzi te hA~M/ oM a pa rA dzi te hA~M/ dga' ba 'di

dag lag g.yon du/ /khu tshur g.yon pas rab grub stsol/ /'di yi phyag rgya nyid gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtags/ /lag par dgod pa rab bshad bya/ /ji lta ba bzhin du/ /tum bu ru ni mthe bor dgod/ /sdigs mdzub la ni rgyal ba gnas/ /

rnam rgyal gung mo nyid la'o/ /mi thub de bzhin ming med la/ /gzhan gyis mi thub mthe'u chung la/ /lag pa'i dbus su yi ge oM/ /dgod bya de nyid lag pa'i rgyab/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i mthar thug tu/ /dgod par bya ba mchog tu bshad/ /sbyor dang rnam par dbye ba yang / /

phyag rgya kun spyod yongs su bsdu/ /so sor brtan par bya ba nyid/ /sor mo rnams la khyad par du/ /dbang dang dgug dang rmongs la sogs/ /rengs byed la sogs bzhin/ /las rnams dag ni thams cad du/ /sngags pas mnyam par gzhag ste bya/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mtshan rnams kyis legs par bstod pa mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das mnyes par mdzad

pa/ byang chub sems ni rdo rje che/ /sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /dgra bcom 'dod chags bral ba dang / /legs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas mchog /blo gros dag pa ye shes che/ /thams cad mkhyen pa kun rig mchog /mchog gi dbang phyug dpa' ba

che/ /thog ma tha ma med khyab bdag /ma 'dres ma 'dres pa yi don/ /shin tu phra ba mchog sbyin rgyal/ /rdo rje can chen rnal 'byor che/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog /mi bskyod pa dang mi zad mgon/ /chos dbyings gzhan dang gzhan min pa/ /rin chen 'byung

gnas rdo rje mchog /dbang bskur kun gyi bla ma'i bla/ /theg chen che ba'i mchog gi mchog /dpa' bo mchog tu dpa' ba'i mchog /zab cing yang la phra ba dang / /thams cad thams cad de bzhin gshegs/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po che/ /tsha skyob dkar po

stobs po che/ /gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid che/ /phul byung phul las phul du byung / /rgyu med mchog gi mchog dpa' mchog /gzi mchog gzi brjid byed mtshungs pa/ /rgyal ba rgyal ba mchog nyid dang / /legs pa'i rgyal po bdag nyid che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems

chen po/ /rdo rje rgyal po lcags kyu che/ /rdo rje chags pa mda' chen po/ /rdo rje legs pa legs grub mdzad/ /rdo rje rin chen che mchog mchog /rdo rje gzi brjid legs brjid mdzad/ /rgyal mtshan chen po rin chen tog /rdo rje bzhad pa legs bzhad mdzad/ /'jig

rten dbang phyug pad+ma che/ /shes rab ye shes legs rno mdzad/ /chos kyi 'khor lo chos chen po/ /sems dpa' smra ba legs bzhad mdzad/ /sna tshogs las ni rgyal po che/ /rdo rje bsrung ba legs bsrung mdzad/ /khro bo chen po gnod sbyin che/ /rdo rje mtshams sbyor

mtshams sbyor sel/ /phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas kun khyod la/ /dang po'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog /legs so rdor can rnal 'byor che/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dge/ /snying po'i rgyan zhes mtshan gsol ba/ /'di dag thams cad legs par gsungs/ /sangs

rgyas rnams kyi byang chub sems/ /ye shes snying po shin tu mdzes/ /gsang ba chen po mchog tu gsang / /sba bya shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mdo/ /brjod du med cing yi ge bral/ /rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rgyas pa 'di yongs su rdzogs // //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi

dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

so/ /de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das ma yang snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po 'di skad cig nyid la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes rdo rje la zhugs par gyur to/ /

zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po shes rab ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar mdzad cing brtan par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs de las 'thon te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa ma

lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas/ sems can thams cad kyi'ang shes rab dang ye shes rnam par sbyangs te/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas bzhug cing rjes su mnyes par byas nas legs par mdzad nas rnam par

gnas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin legs par yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas mngon par dbang bskur te/ gzi brjid dang / tog dang / bzhad pa dang / de dag la nges par sbyar te mchog gi dbang phyug chen po las rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis

chos rtogs pa la yang rab tu gnas nas rnon po dang / rgyu dang / smra ba'i sems dpa' rnams la'ang thugs brtan par mdzad de/ yongs su dag nas yang pad+mo'i sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i dbang phyug chos nyid gzhi med pa la sbyar nas sna tshogs

pa'i las kyi bdag po dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bsrung ba dang / khro bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje mtshams sbyor ba rnams sems can gyi khams mtha' dag yongs su smin pa dang / byin gyis brlabs te

slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar rjes su zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes la bzhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o zag med shes rab bdag /sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi/ /shes rab

shin tu dri med sems/ /sems dpa'i lus su bdag gyur to/ /dri med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam dpyad na/ /e ma'o chos ni bsam med nyid/ /bdag gi dbang du rnam par gnas/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'thon nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug gi lus su mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la yongs su bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye 'khor kun tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / 'od

kyi dkyil 'khor dang / byin gyis brlabs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mdor bstan pa'i

chos kyi tshig bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni legs so legs so/ /legs par rab tu nyon la yid

la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni nang gi lus dang / phyi'i

lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su blta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /lus la

zad pa'i rjes su blta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /lus la mi gnas pa'i rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do/ /nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi'i tshor ba dang / phyi nang gi tshor ba dang / nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang gi sems dang / nang gi

chos dang / phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su blta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su blta zhing rnam par

spyod do/ /chos la zad pa'i rjes su blta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /chos la mi gnas pa'i rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do/ /rtag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang / chos mnyam pa nyid kyis gnas so/ /

oM ka~M oM tsa twA ri smr-i t+yA pas+tha nA nA hU~M/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dun pa skyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems rab tu 'dzin to/ /smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/ /

sdig to mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa la sogs pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/ /'bad do/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems rab tu 'dzin to/ /smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/ /dge ba'i chos skyes

pa rnams 'phel zhing rgyas par bya ba dang / yangs par bya ba'i phyir dang / bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/ /'bad do/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems rab tu 'dzin to/ /smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/ /chos rnams thams cad don dam

par mi spong ba dang / mi spong ba ma yin pa'i ched du rtogs par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos 'di bka' stsal to/ /oM samya ka pra hA Na sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sa ma tA a d+hiSh+Tha aHraHhU~M/ yang dag par spong ba rjod pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom par byed do/ /brtson 'grus dang / sems dang / spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom par byed do/ /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dam pa dang / kun rdzob kyi sgo'i chos thams cad sgyu ma sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du 'jug go zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bas bka' stsal to/ /oM r-i d+hi pA da pA ra mi te la bA pa ra hU~M hU~M/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol

tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /dbang po lnga ni dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad

mnyam pa nyid la dbang sgyur bas spros pa med pa'i dbang po 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /oM in+d+ri yA ba bo d+ha pradz+nye i sheny+tsa nA ma n+ya nA ya ga tA ya AHhU~M/ dbang po mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /stobs lnga ni dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /

dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs so zhes bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa/ stobs thams cad rtogs pa/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba/ gdod ma nas dag pas 'di bka' stsal pa/

oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA ba la aHhU~M hU~M baH/ stobs 'phel ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi ni/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms so/ /oM brah+ma bi ha ra d+hiSh+ThA na ga~M ma~M dru~M k+kha~M hU~M trA~M/ chos

thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa byin gyis rlob pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / don so

so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du so so yang dag par rig pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bka' stsal to/ /oM pra ti sam+bi daHswa hU~M/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

mnyam pa nyid do/ /rjes su dran pa drug gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa'o/ /chos thams cad gcig tu rjes

su dran pa ni chos thams cad don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid med pa rnam par spyod pas mnyam pa nyid kyi sgo zhes bya ba 'di ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur bas bka' stsal to/ /oM sar+b+ba a nu smr-i ti bud+d+ha~M sa~M pa dA di shi hU~M hU~M hU~M/ rjes su dran pa drug gi shes

rab bo/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa

yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag mnyam pa nyid skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bka' stsal to/ /oM sar+b+ba tA bo d+h+ya~M ga

sa ma tA su pra tiSh+Thi te d+h+ru ba~M/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i

dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /lam zad mi shes pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po la 'jug pa legs par so sor rig pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so/ /oM Ar+yA Sh+ThA~M ga mArga ma Ta/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gsum ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / gsog dang gsob kyi rnam pa dang / rang bzhin med pa'i rnam pas chos thams

cad mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs pa sems rtse gcig pa ste/ 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces brjod do/ /de la mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ gang la mtshan mar mi byed pa dang / 'dod pa med pa dang / shes pa med pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /

rnam par bral ba'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces

bya'o/ /chos thams cad rtogs nas smon par mi byed do/ /lha'am lha las gzhan gang yang rung ba don du mi gnyer zhing gsol ba 'debs par yang mi 'dod pa ste/ dngos po thams cad la ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo yis kyang ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di

nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo gsum nye bar rtogs par bya'o/ /oM kha sa maHsar+b+ba d+har+m+mAHkha~M/ de la stobs bcu ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang

po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa so sor mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran

pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mngon par shes pa lnga mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /oM da sha ba la sa ma tA thA/ stobs bcu

mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam

par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/

nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar

bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa

thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das

te 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o/ /chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa/ bsam gtan med cing /

bsam gtan med pa ma yin pa/ snyoms par 'jug pa med cing snyoms par 'jug pa ma yin pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /oM sa man+ta b+ha dre sar+b+ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he r+d+ha~M Sha~M kha~M/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /mi

'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i

tshogs gzhan ci yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas de la bdag med pa thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par

spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos

dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas nas de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i

tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la brten na bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro/ /gang yang bdag gi lam 'phags pa'i nges par 'byung ba'i

lam du bshad pa de yis nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ yang dag par sdug bsngal zad pa dang / yang dag par sdug bsngal mthar bya bar ga la 'gyur zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs

su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba la sogs pa ji ltar gyur pa thams cad yongs su spros te brjod par bya'o/ /mi 'jigs pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid de ngar 'dzin pa

dang nga yir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /oM bai shA ra d+ya sa ma tA prAp+ta a a a~M aH/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'dod pas dben pa/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang

bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting

nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms su gnas te/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin can bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan

pa'i bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med/

sdug bsngal ba yang med/ btang snyoms pa dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du

shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye

mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag

par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /

rnam par thar pa brgyad po dang mnyam pa nyid rjes su thob nas dngos por rtog par mi byed/ dngos po med par rtog par mi byed/ chos thams cad gnyis su med par rtogs so/ /'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mnyam pa nyid do/ /oM a nan+taHbi mok+Sha

mu khe shu~M/ dngos po thams cad mthar gyis gnas pa'i rnam par thar pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de la pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin

pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thams

cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / spros pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rin po che'i pha

rol tu phyin pa dang / pad+ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ bstan pa'i rjes su rtogs pa'i sbyor bas so/ /oM sar+b+ba pA ra mi ta ar+tha pa ri pU ra Ni/ oM prA~M hU~M ta~M/ thams cad kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de la sa bcu po gang zhe na/ rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sa dang / dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba dang / sbyang dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / mngon du gyur pa zhes bya ba dang /

ring du song ba zhes bya ba dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba dang / sa thams cad don gcig ste/ 'di ltar ye shes kyi don to/ /ye shes kyang ci yang med pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ yi ge med pa/ don yod

pa/ gdod ma nas dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ 'od gsal ba/ brjod pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to/ /oM b+hU mi bi sho d+ha ni sar+b+bar+tha pa ri pU ra Ni ba~M b+h+ru~M/ sa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa bcu gang zhe na/ byang

chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang / gzhon nur gyur pa dang / las dang po pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / skye ba nas skye bar sbyor ba dang ldan pa dang / bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs

pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa dor ba ste/ don dam par gnas pa gcig yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ltar gnas pa med pa'o/ /oM sar+b+ba bya ba s+thA na bi ga te hU~M/ rnam par gnas pa med pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba

dang / chos la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba'o/ /dbang ba dang mi dbang ba rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba thams cad la dbang ba/ dbang phyug thams cad la dbang rjes su thob pa/ chos thams cad legs par so sor rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /oM sar+b+ba ba shi te trA~M trU~M

hU~M/ thams cad la dbang ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o/ /ca co mi mnga'o/ /dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa

mi mnga'o/ /'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o/ /ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o/ /'dun pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /dran pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /

shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /'das pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma

chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ /da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste

ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /'di chos rje sa skya pa'i bsgyur 'phro lags/ rgya dpe la gtugs shing slob dpon rab zhi bshes gnyen gyi 'grel pa dang yang bstun nas/ zhus dag byas shing /

mi bcos su mi rung ba re re tsam 'grel pa dang bstun nas bcos shing zhu thug g.yar khral du blangs nas/ bu ston gyis bgyis pa'o// //dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la sa bcu rnams ci zhe na/ rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sa dang / dri ma

med pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba dang / thub par dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / mngon du gyur pa zhes bya ba dang / ring du song ba zhes bya ba dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi sprin

zhes bya ba'o/ /sa rnams thams cad don gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi don no/ /ye shes kyang don dam par ci yang med pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ 'gyur ba med pa/ don yod pa/ gdod ma nas dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ 'od gsal ba/ brjod du med

pa'o zhes pa'i don gang yin pa'o/ /oM b+hU mi bi sho d+ha ni sarbAr+tha pa ri pU ra Ni ba~M b+h+ru~M/ sa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa bcu rnams ci zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang /

byis par gyur pa dang / las dang po pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / skye ba skyed pa dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste/ byang chub sems

dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa ni don dam par na rnam par gzhag pa dang bral ba ste/ rnam par gzhag pa gcig nyid kyi phyir na 'di lta ste/ rnam par gzhag pa med pa'o/ /oM sar+b+ba bya bas+thA na bi ga te hU~M/ rnam par gzhag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /

byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang bcu rnams ci zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / stobs la dbang ba dang / chos

la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba'o/ /dbang rnams thams cad kyang don dam par dbang med pa rang bzhin rnam par dben pa/ kun rdzob tu dbang phyug thams cad la dbang rjes su thob pa ste/ chos legs par so sor rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /oM sarbA ba shi te trA~M b+h+rU~M hU~M/

dbang thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad rnams ci zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa med

pa dang / tha dad pa nyid kyi 'du shes med pa dang / so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang / 'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa

med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa med cing rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa nyams pa med pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa dang /

da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa dang / sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / thugs kyi phrin las

thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni yul thams cad du dus thams cad kyi tshe thams cad mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa ste/ stong pa nyid la yang dag par rjes su rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir na shes

rab yongs su dag pa'o/ /oM a we Ni ka bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma sam te AHbi ra hU~M kha~M/ ma 'dres pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// //de la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams ci zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor los mtshan pa

nyid de/ 'di'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil dag la 'khor lo rtsibs stong can lte ba dang bcas pa mu khyud dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil legs par gnas pa ste/ zhabs kyi mthil thams cad kyis sa gzhi la reg cing de

yang 'di'i mtho ba ni dma' ba dang dma' ba ni mtho ba'o/ /phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ngang pa'i rgyal po lta bur dra bas 'brel pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag dag dang / zhabs de dag gser gyi mdog can gyi ri mo'i phreng ba rnams kyis rkang pa brgyad pa

bzhin du mdzes pa'o/ /phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa nyid de/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i phyag dang zhabs dag ras bal 'jam po bzhin dang / skyes nas zla ba lon pa'i byis pa bzhin du gzhon sha can dang / ka tsa lin da ltar 'jam pa reg na bde ba'o/ /bdun mtho

bar gyur te phyag gnyis dag dang / zhabs gnyis dag dang / phrag gong dag dang / mgrin pa'i phyogs gcig go/ /sor mo ring ba ste 'di'i zhabs kyi sor mo rnams rim gyis ring ba nyid do/ /rting pa yangs pa ste 'di'i rting pa che zhing zhabs kyi rjes su 'tsham par yangs par 'gyur

ro/ /sku che zhing drang ba nyid de 'phye bo ma yin zhing zhom pa ma yin/ ma tshang ba ma yin/ 'thas pa ma yin/ legs par skyes pa rnam pa thams cad pa bdun dang ldan pa'i sku ste/ mtho ba 'di'i srid dang rjes su 'tsham pa'i zheng du 'gyur ro/ /zhabs 'bur mi mngon pa nyid de 'di'i

pus mo dang long bu mtho bar 'gyur ro/ /ba spu'i rtse mo gyen du phyogs pa ste/ 'di'i ba spu rnams rtse mo gyen du phyogs par 'gyur zhing ba spu rnams g.yas phyogs su 'khyil la 'khor ba mig sman gyi mdog can rnams te/ de rnams kyis gser gyi mdog can gyi sku mngon par gsal bar byed

do/ /byin pa e ne ya'i lta bu ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin pa dag zlum pa e ne ya rnams kyi lta bu'o/ /phyag ring zhing mdzes pa ste rgyas shing ma btud pa nyid du phyag mthil dag gis rang gi pus mo'i lha nga la reg pa'o/ /mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ste/ sbubs kyis rab

tu g.yogs pa glang po che'i gsang gnas lta bur 'gyur ro/ /sku mdog gser 'dra ba ste/ 'di'i kha dog gser lta bur 'gyur ro/ /pags pa srab pa ste shin tu 'jam pa gser shog ltar 'jam pa'i pags pa can du 'gyur zhing rdul med pa'i na bza' 'dzin pa'o/ /spu re re nas skyes pa

ste/ 'di'i ba spu'i khung bur spu rnams re rer 'gyur ro/ /smin ma'i dbus na mdzod spu can te 'di'i smin ma dag gi dbus na ras skud legs pa lta bu dung bcag pa'i kha dog can g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bar 'gyur te/ mdzod spu nyid kyis zhal gser gyi kha dog lta bu shin tu gsal bar

byed do/ /sku stod seng ge lta bu ste/ 'di'i sku stod du yangs pa seng ge'i lta bur 'gyur ro/ /dpung mgo zlum pa ste yongs su zlum pa'i mgrin pa can du 'gyur ro/ /thal gong rgyas pa ste/ 'di'i nye bar rgyas par 'gyur zhing gser shog bzhin du rnam par gsal ba'i mgrin pa can

no/ /yan lag so so rnams su ro rnams myong bar byed do zhes pas na ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa nyid de/ rtsa rnams yin la de rnams kyi mchog tu rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / pad kan la sogs pa rnams kyis ma dkrugs pa nyid kyi phyir yang dag par gsal ba'o/ /shing n+ya gro d+ha

ltar chu zheng gab pa ste/ skyes bu chen po'i chu dang zheng dag mnyam pa'o/ /dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa ste/ dbu zlum par 'gyur zhing gtsug tor gdugs lta bus yas bkab pa gtsug tor yang shin tu mtho ba'o/ /ljags ring ba ste snyan gyi mtha'i bar du ljags kyi rtse mos reg par byed

cing / dbu skra'i mthar thug par yang dpral ba'i mthar ljags kyis khebs pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs te 'khor stong phrag du mar dbyangs nang du ji lta ba de ltar phyi rol du'ang thos shing bya ka la ping ka'i bzhin du snyan pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /'gram pa seng ge'i lta bu ste/ 'gram pa dag seng

ge'i bzhin du zlum por 'gyur ro/ /tshems dkar ba ste dung dang kun+da dang / zla ba'i kha dog can gyi tshems rnams so/ /tshems mnyam pa ste ha cang dma' ba ma yin mtho ba ma yin mi mnyam pa ma yin pa'i rtse mo can gyi tshems rnams su 'gyur ro/ /tshems thags bzang ba ste

tshems rnams bar med pa'o/ /tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste tshems 'og tu nyi shu dang / steng du tshems nyi shu'o/ /spyan mthon mthing ste spyan dag gi sngon po gang yin pa de shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur te ri mo dmar po rnams dang / ma 'dres pa nyid kyi phyir la gang dkar po

yin pa de dkar po kho na shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /rdzi ma ba'i lta bu ste/ spyan gyi rdzi ma rnams khyu mchog gi bzhin du gang 'og ma yin pa de rnams 'og kho na dang / gang steng ma yin pa de rnams steng kho nar gnas pa ma 'dzings pa legs par gzhol ba'o/ /

sems can 'ga' zhig rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi mdog can du mthong ba 'ga' zhig rnams kyis shel gyi mdog can du mthong ba 'ga' zhig rnams kyis pad+ma rA ga'i kha dog dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis mu

tig dmar po'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis dung dang kun+da dang zla ba ltar dkar ba dang / 'ga' zhig gis kha dog sna tshogs pa dang / 'ga' zhig gis nam mkha'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig gis khru phyed dang bcu gsum pa'i tshad dang / ji srid du dpag tshad

'bum gyi tshad dam/ dpag tshad bye ba'i tshad dang / ji srid du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin mtha' yas pa rnams su snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa dang / ji

srid du me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgya mtsho rnams snang bar byed cing / chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gdul bya'i dbang las thams cad snang bar byed cing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dbyangs kyis rnam par rig par mdzad pa

dang / stong gnyis dang gsum dang / ji srid nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'i bar thams cad 'od dang / dbyangs kyis snang bar byas nas rnam par rig par mdzad pa dang / chos dang / zang zing dang / don mthun pa dang / don bya ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams kyis sems can

rnams la phan 'dogs shing / phan btags nas byang chub chen po la rab tu dgod par mdzad do/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnyam pa nyid kyis chos rnams thams cad mnyam zhing mnyam pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan mngon par 'grub par blta bar

bya'i mtshan ma yin pa mngon par 'grub pa ni ma yin no/ /byang chub mtshan nyid med pa nyid kyi phyir chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang stong pa nyid du mnyam pa'o/ /de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub dang / chos rnams thams cad kyang mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can/ zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can rnams so zhes pa'o/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta bar lak+Sha Na sam

tA d+har+m+ma te oM/ mtshan thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// //dpe byad brgyad cu rnams ci zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bur 'gyur te/ sen mo snum pa dang / sen mo mtho ba dang /

sen mo rnams zlum par gyur pa dang / sor mo rnams rim gyis phra ba dang / sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang / rtsa mi mngon pa dang / rtsa rnams mdud pa med pa dang / long bu mi mngon pa dang / zhabs mi mnyam pa med par mtshungs pa dang / glang po che'i stabs su

gshegs pa dang / seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa dang / g.yas phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa dang / drang por gshegs pa dang / mdzes par gshegs pa dang / rim gyis gshegs pa dang / che zhing yangs la yongs su gyur pa'i pus mo'i lha nga can dang / mtshan

yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gom pa snyoms pa dang / sku rnam par dag pa dang / sku 'jam pa dang / sku rnam par dang ba dang / sku zhum pa med pa dang / sku sgu ba med pa dang / kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba dang / khyu mchog ltar kun nas rab tu dang ba can dang / gzigs

pa yongs su dag cing mngon par 'dod pa la mnyam pa'i 'od can dang / dku zlum pa dang / dku skabs phyin pa dang / dku ma rnyongs pa dang / sku rked gzhu'i lag cangs lta bu dang / lte ba zab pa dang / lte ba mi yo ba dang / lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / lte ba

thogs pa med pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag shin tu rnam par 'byes pa dang / pags pa skyon dang bral ba dang / gnag bag dang sme ba med pa dang / sku brtan pa dang / phyag shing bal lta bu dang / phyag yangs pa dang / phyag gi ri mo snum pa dang / phyag

gi ri mo mi yo ba dang / mchu bim+ba lta bu dang / zhal ha cang mi ring ba dang / mnyen zhing srab la dmar ba'i ljags dang / glang po che'i nga ro can dang / snyan cing mnyan pa'i dbyangs dang / sgra phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbyangs 'jam pa dang / shangs mtho ba dang / mche ba

zlum pa dang / mche ba dkar ba dang / mche ba byin gyis phra ba dang / spyan gtsang ba dang / spyan yangs pa dang / spyan mthon mthing dang / rdzi ma gnag pa dang / smin ma stug pa dang / smin ma 'jam pa dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu dang / smin

tshugs ring ba dang / smin ma'i spu nag pa dang / smin ma'i spu phra ba dang / smin ma rjes su mthun pa dang / kha dog ma nyams pa dang / snyan mi mnyam pa med pa dang / snyan skyon dang bral ba dang / dbang po thams cad ma nyams shing skyon dang bral ba dang / sku yongs su rdzogs

shing mtho la mchog tu gnas pa'i zhal gdong dang / dpral ba can dang / dbu shin tu rgyas pa dang / dbu skra gnag pa dang / dbu skra stug pa dang / dbu skra 'jam pa dang / dbu skra dri zhim pa dang / dbu skra mnyam pa dang / dbu skra snum pa dang / dbu skra ma 'khums pa dang /

dbu skra ma 'khrugs pa dang / dpal be'u dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa dang / rgyal mtshan yang dag par gnas pa dang / dpral ba dung lta bu dang / dbu mchog tu mtho ba dang / gtsug tor yar 'phags pa dang / dbu gdugs kyi rnam pa can dang /

kun nas mdzes pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni tshad med pa'i dpe byad can mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa gsal byed dang / gsal byed ma yin pa mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad gsal byed med par mnyam pa nyid la rab tu

legs par gnas pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad sgyu ma'i chos dang ldan pa la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ dus gsum gyi dpe byad mnyam pa nyid/ rdo rje lta bu mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyi chos thams cad dang / dpe byad mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ gnyis su med

pa'i don la legs par yang dag par zhugs pa rnams so zhes pa'o/ /oM a nu byany+dza na sa ma tA su pra tiSh+Thi ta badzra dz+nyA na hU~M la~M a~M/ dpe byad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

'dus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po can la legs so zhes bya ba rnams kyis mnyes par mdzad do/ /oM byang chub sems ched khyod legs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mchog /sangs rgyas chos ched khyod legs

so/ /ting 'dzin dbang du 'jug pa yi/ /rdo rje ye shes khyod legs so/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so/ /tshad med ched du khyod legs so/ /shes rab dam pa'i ched du yang / /mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad/ /sangs rgyas snga mas ma gsungs pa'o/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba bzhi yis mngon par dgyes par mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kun khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /chos kyi sku yi mchog gi mchog /gdod ma'i sngags

kyi don nyid la/ /rdo rje ye shes stobs chen la/ /shin tu sgrib med zhi ba la/ /rdo rje chos rnams legs gnas pa/ /theg pa chen po'i go 'phang thob/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyi lha/ /gdod nas dag pa dpa' bo che/ /dbang phyug dam pa mchog gi

mchog /dam chos mchog tu 'gyur ba med/ /bde gshegs de rnams la phyag 'tshal/ /zhes pa'o/ /na ma stu te/ oM mA~M hU~M hU~M na mo stu te swA hA/ 'di ni brjod pa tsam zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod pa'o/ /zhes pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad dngos grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par mdzad du

gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad slar yang 'dus pa mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das khyod nyid kyis rigs thams cad 'khor lo bskyed par mdzad du

gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos gsol ba btab pa'i gsung gis de ma thag kho nar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bos te bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po nyon cig /ces te/

de nas 'di las yang dag bshad/ /byang chub dkyil 'khor bla na med/ /rdo rje ye shes gsang ba mchog /sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi'o/ /dben pa'i sa gzhi nyams dga' ba/ /me tog phreng bas rnam brgyan pa/ /kun tu sna tshogs cha bzang

ba/ /kun tu sna tshogs sdom par ni/ /kun nas sna tshogs bya ba rnams/ /dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya/ /ri yi mchog gam grong khyer ni/ /me tog 'bras bus rnam brgyan pa/ /der gnas sngags pas dngos grub mchog /gal te 'dod

na yang dag bri/ /gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa'i gnas/ /ri stengs rnams su kun nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bya ba rnams/ /dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya/ /ma mo'i gnas dang zhi ba'i gnas/ /dur khrod lha yi gnas su ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin

dpal bya ba rnams/ /don dam par ni bsgrub par bya/ /pad+ma'i skyed mos tshal kun dang / /chu bo 'dus pa rnams su yang / /phyag na pad+ma dpal bya ba/ /dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya/ /rgyal po'i pho brang nyams dga' dang / /rgyal po'i skyed

tshal rnams su ni/ /rdo rje rin chen de yi ni/ /rin chen bya ba rnams bsgrub bya/ /rtags gcig pa dang ba glang gnas/ /chu klung 'dus pa rnams su yang / /sna tshogs bya ba thams cad rnams/ /dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya/ /dpal ldan

rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /lha rnams gnas mchog kun tu'o/ /nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /gang du mnyam par gzhag pa der/ /rtag pa bsod nams mchog gyur pa/ /bya ba thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /phyogs kun mnyam nyid

gnas dkyil 'khor/ /shes rab can gyis thig gdab bya/ /shar lho nub dang byang rnams kyi/ /phyogs su dkyil 'khor thig brgyad po/ /de yi phyi ru 'khor lo ni/ /kha dog lnga pa cher 'bar ba'o/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis

mdzes pa ste/ /sna tshogs gos dang me tog phreng / /rnga yab sogs kyis rnam brgyan pa/ /dkyil 'khor kun la gnas pa yi/ /sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya/ /

dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bri bar bya/ /shar du bcom ldan 'khor lo can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag ldan/ /'khor los sgyur

ba thams cad ni/ /sgeg par bcas pa kun bri bya/ /lho ru gtsug tor dkar po ni/ /rin chen 'bar ba yang dag ldan/ /gtsug tor dkar po'i ngos su ni/ /rdo rje gzi brjid la sogs bri/ /byang du brtson 'grus chen po ni/ /gzi brjid phung po

stobs po che/ /sna tshogs rdo rje sogs bcas pa/ /rim pa kun nas bri bar bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyis ni/ /dbang phyug mgon po'i nub phyogs su/ /gtsug tor rgyal ba brtson 'grus che/ /rdo rje chos sogs dang bcas pa/ /thams cad sngags pas bri

bar bya/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na'o/ /dbang ldan phyogs su 'phags pa gnas/ /me mtshams su ni cher 'phags so/ /bden bral du ni rnam rgyal nyid/ /rlung du de bzhin rnam 'phro ba'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems

dpa' che/ /sems dpa' kun gyi mdun du ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /gsal zhing 'bar 'khrigs 'od zer can/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor rnams su ni/ /mchod pa rnams ni gzhag byas te/ /sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che/ /de bzhin

gzugs sgra la sogs dang / /bdug pa la sogs gsang chen no/ /sgo skyong ba ni bzhi yin te/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su/ /kun tu bzang po sogs rnams bri/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor bri bya ste/ /mchod pa byas nas snga ma bzhin/ /de bzhin

'jug pa sogs byas la/ /sgrub pa'i thabs ni brtsam par bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sogs/ /dkyil 'khor mngon sum mthong ba las/ /snga ma rtag pa ji bzhin du/ /phyi nas de bzhin bri bar bya/ /bsod nams ji bzhin dkyil 'khor

rnams/ /thams cad mtshon gyis rab brtags pa/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha ngo bos/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bri byar 'gyur/ /rang lha'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor gyis/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu grub/ /cho ga dman dang lhag pas kyang / /'grub

par 'gyur te skyon ma min/ /kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang ba/ /kun nas sna tshogs 'khor lo can/ /'khor los sgyur ba bdag nyid che/ /rin chen bdun gyi mchod pa che/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba ltar/ /dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi 'byung shes bya/ /

sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyi/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni bshad byas pa'o/ /phyag na pad+ma bdag nyid che'i/ /pad+ma'i rnam par rtag shes bya/ /rin po che yi rin chen rnams/ /dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rnam pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor dman zhing dam

tshig rnams/ /dor bar byas pa de nyid ni/ /gsang ba shes pa ma yin na/ /sgrub pa'i thabs ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad lta ba ni/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /gdon mi za

bar rtag tu bya/ /bla ma la ni yon phul nas/ /rjes su rim pas bsgrub par bya/ /brtan pa'am ni g.yo ba yi/ /rdzas rnams ji snyed thams cad de/ /rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu sogs/ /bu mo legs par brgyan byas dang / /'dod pa'i chung ma phul byas

nas/ /slar yang rin gyis bslu bar bya/ /grong dang de bzhin gtsug lag khang / /kun dga' ra sogs rgyal srid mchog /gang la sbyin bya cung zad yod/ /'tsho ba de ni sbyin par bya/ /bdag gi dngos po yongs gtong ba/ /sangs rgyas

thams cad rab mchod pa'o/ /bla ma la ni yon phul nas/ /gsang ba dam pa rmad byung ba/ /mngon par dbang bskur de nas bya/ /'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong la/ /slob ma gzhag nas yan lag kun/ /phyag rgya kun nas bcings byas nas/ /

khams kun rang bzhin rtsa ba dang / /sa bon 'bras bus dud pa yi/ /bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur te/ /sangs rgyas phreng ba'i dbang bskur las/ /spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang / /gzhogs dang de bzhin rgyab tu yang / /sangs rgyas rin chen

chen po kun/ /cod pan mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas gtsug nor bu/ /gdugs dkar steng na gnas pa'o/ /rgyal srid kun gyi dbang bskur gyis/ /yang dang yang du dbang bskur bya/ /dpal kun gyis ni mngon mtho ba/ /

zhes bya'i dbang bskur bshad pa'o/ /khams kun rang bzhin glang po dang / /rta ni mchog tu 'bar ba'am/ /seng ge'i gdan gnas dbang bskur ba/ /dpal gyi sngags ni rjod byed cing / /dpal gyis mngon mtho zhes bya ba'i/ /dam pa'i don gyi

dbang bskur ba/ /bkra shis sam ni dpal be'u/ /gang yang bris nas dbang bskur bya/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis/ /rnam rgyal dbang bskur zhes bshad do/ /tsan+dan chu dang bum pa che/ /gzhan gyis mi thub sman

blugs pa/ /kun nas dbang bskur ched du ni/ /rtag tu shes rab can gyis brtag /gzhan gyis mi thub dbang bskur mchog /dkyil 'khor gang gang bris byas nas/ /phyag rgya gang dang gang bkod pa/ /der ni de dang de brtag bya/ /de rnams phyag

rgya dam par bshad/ /dbang bskur ched du sangs rgyas rnams/ /lha de rnams ni yid du 'ong / /sman gyi dam pa mchog gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bshad/ /tsan+dan dang ni rgya spos dang / /ga pur de bzhin gur gum dang / /a ka ru dang

lha yi shing / /tsan+dan dmar po nyid dang ni/ /siM hA byA g+h+ri de bzhin mchog /kun nas sa ha de ba dang / /gi ri kar+Na tshangs mchod sbyin/ /sman gyi dam pa rnams su bshad/ /lhag gnas kun gyi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa rab 'jug cing / /

dang po rdo rje dbang bskur ba/ /shes rab thams cad rab 'jug byed/ /rin chen dam pa'i dam pa ni/ /gser la sogs kyis thams cad nas/ /sman kun dang ni sa bon kun/ /'bru rnams thams cad bzang po ni/ /sangs rgyas byin brlabs rnal 'byor las/ /

dbang bskur don du rab brtag bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che/ /dbang bskur dam pa 'od 'bar ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kun nas sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /zhes pa'o/ /dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud du ji ltar rnyed pa yongs su rdzogs so// //
rigs gzugs skal mang thos blo 'byor sogs/ /phun tshogs ldan pa dpal ldan chos rje yis/ /rgyud 'di bsgyur las cung zad ma rdzogs pa/ /dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas rdzogs par bsgyur// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pany+tsa bing+sha ti ka pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA mu kha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di

skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi zom la lha thams cad kyi mtshan mo'i gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lha dang / lha'i bu dang / lha ma yin dang /

rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi 'am ci dang / srin po dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang / 'byung po dang / log 'dren dang / sha za dang / snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshogs shin tu mang zhing rgya che ba dpag tshad lnga'i

dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa sha stag dang / dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcus bskor cing mdun du bdar nas chos ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyis yongs su bskor cing rig pa'i tshogs dang / phyag rgya'i tshogs

de dag thams cad dang / rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bar snang las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa

dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di dag ni nga'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo yin no/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /o~M byang chub kyi sems

kyi rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M yid bzhin gyi nor bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M 'gog pa med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M skye bar 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M rnam par shes pa thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M 'bar ba chen po'i chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M brtson 'grus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M thams cad du 'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i

sgo'o/ /o~M rdo rje thams cad brtan pa'i sems shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid ye shes rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M las

rnam par sbyong ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M nges par gnod mdzes rdo rje can phaT shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M 'dod pa la 'dod chags rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M mgyogs pa'i rdo rje can shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i

sgo'o/ /o~M hU~M thams cad du 'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M hrIHshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M a zhes bya ba'i sgo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M a~M ba hU~M shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M eM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /o~M de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig

rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs // //skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa//

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta gu h+yA la~M kA ra byU ha tan+t+ra rA dzA nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi pad+mo la

gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye

shes phyag rgya chen po'i dam tshig gi byin gyis brlabs kyis rdo rje'i sku chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rin po che chen po'i cod pan gyi rtse mo'i gtsug phud kyis dbang bskur ba brnyes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes las sna tshogs pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes mchod pa chen po

spro ba'i dam tshig gi gsang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor chen po dam tshig gi de kho na nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes gsang ba chen po'i snying po dang / de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes kyi mnga' bdag chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes kun tu bzang po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes dpe

med cing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nam mkha' lta bu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rigs dang / snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig pa gnyis su med par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung

dang thugs rdo rje ye shes pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po la dga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes lhag pa'i lha'i snying po mdzes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rgyan

chen po bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po la nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje ye shes chen po 'ba' zhig dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de'ang 'di lta ste/ sgo mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / nam mkha'i sgo

zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / a bo dza'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / 'gyur ba med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / gzhan yang ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi

rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i rdo rje btsun mo stong phrag brgya la'ang 'di lta ste/ mda'i mtshon cha'i lag ces bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / dbang phyug la lta ba'i rim zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / nye bar zhi ba'i bzhin ras zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / gyen

du blta ba'i bzhin ras zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / 'dod pa'i zla mtshan rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / brda sprod pa ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / 'bri ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / rol ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / 'dod pa'i mchog ces

bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / dbang phyug gi bde ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / dmigs pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / brang las skyes zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo ste/ de dag la sogs pa rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar to/ /gzhan

yang dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de yang 'di lta ste/ snying skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang / gdug pa thams cad 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang / rjes su mnyes pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya

mo chen mo dang / khrag 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang / thams cad 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo la sogs pa'o/ /gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas pa'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo rnams dang yang thabs cig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ rdo rje 'bebs

pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo dang / dam tshig gsum ldan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo dang / 'jig pa'i yan lag can zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo dang / thog ma pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo dang / gdul dka' 'dul zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen

mo la sogs pa'o/ /gzhan yang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo rnams dang yang thabs cig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ sku gsung thugs thams cad rdo rjes 'ching ba ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang / 'jigs pa'i me'i gdong zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo

dang / gtsigs shing rnam par 'gyur ba'i gdong zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang / 'jig rten gsum 'ching ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang / bskal par gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo'o/ /gzhan yang dpe med pa'i rdo rje rol pa mo chen mo rnams

dang yang thabs cig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang / kun nas 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang / 'jig rten gsum rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo

dang / rab tu dga' ba'i rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang / thams cad dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo la sogs pa'o/ /gzhan yang nam mkha'i khams thams cad rgyas par gang ba'i rdo rje'i yab rnams dang yang thabs cig ste/

de'ang 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i yab chen po dang / mkha' 'gro'i rdo rje dbang phyug dang / dri'i dbang phyug dang / stug po bkod pa dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / 'dun pa srel dang / skye bo yongs su dor ba dang / legs par sbyangs pa dang / 'dod pa'i

rdo rje dang / gdung ba skyed pa dang / 'dul bar byed pa dang / gdug pa thams cad sel bar byed pa dang / de kho na nyid kyi mgon po dang / gnas pa po dang / brtse ba can dang / chos 'chang dang / bskyod pa po dang / sbo ba po dang / 'ching ba po dang / skor

ba po dang / de dag la sogs pa rdo rje yab rnams so/ /gzhan yang mtha' yas pa'i rdo rje pho nya mo 'phrog pa'i rdo rje bran po rdo rje'i tshogs dang thabs cig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ rdo rje rlung zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje me dang / rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa dang / rdo rje chu dang / gzhan

yang rdo rje rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di lta ste/ zhi bar byed pa dang / rgyas par byed pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / mi shes pa thams cad zad par byed pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa'o/ /gzhan yang mchog tu rgya chen po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rab tu gnas pa'i mchod pa dang

ldan pa bcom ldan 'das ston pa rtag pa mchog gi mnga' bdag ste/ kun tu bzang po'i sku yi ni/ /'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khor spros/ /bcom ldan rdor 'dzin legs par bzhugs/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi sbyor bas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

skyed par byed pa'i yum gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dus pa thob ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang lhan cig tu dga' ba'i bde ba rjes su byung ste 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te/ rdo rje'i glu 'dis mngon par bstod nas zhu ba zhus pa/ sangs

rgyas kun don khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje 'byung ba khyod la 'dud/ /thugs kyi rin chen mchog khyod 'dud/ /chos kyi blo gros khyod la 'dud/ /chos rnams kun mchog khyod la 'dud/ /sna tshogs dgongs pa khyod la 'dud/ /dam tshig mchog gi mchog khyod 'dud/ /rdo rje

sems dpa' phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /grags pa chen po bdag cag ni/ /mgon po khyod la zhu ba zhu/ /sangs rgyas thams cad skyed byed yum/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni dkyil 'khor mchog /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

rdo rje'i yum rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams de skad ma smra zhig /'jig rten thams cad la khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po 'di la ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams dad par mi 'gyur zhing rang gi sems yongs

su sun 'byin la des ma mthong ba'i chos la ma dad pas rang gi sems yang dag par sun phyung ste/ mnar med pa rnams su skyes nas bskal pa stong phrag mang por mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal rjes su 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de brgya lam na mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal las grol te/ mi rnams

su skyes par gyur kyang rnam par 'gyur ba'i bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /brjed ngas pa rnams dang / blo gros chung ba rnams dang / khyi dang / bya rog dang / byi la dang / phag dang / stag dang / glang po che dang / seng ge'i nga ro 'dra bdag tu 'gyur ro/ /de dang 'dre bar mi bya zhing

blta bar mi bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed pa'i yum de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can de rnams kyi mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ gang gis 'di'i ming gzung na yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams de'i rgyus de'i las kyi sgrib pa zad de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas de dag yid dga' ba skyes nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad

ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi rgyus dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyal po sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis dran pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par

'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu bzang po chen po 'od 'phro ba gsal ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dam pa 'di bka' stsal pa/ dkyil 'khor

kun gyi yum gyur pa/ /stong nyid ye shes nyid du bshad/ /ci zhig nga yis bstan par bya/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /sems can rnams la phan bzhed pa/ /gang zhig cung zad bstan par bya/ /de kun sgyu mas sgyu ma'o/ /'gro

ba sgyu ma lta bur shes/ /des na sgyu ma lta bu yis/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bya/ /nam mkha'i khams kyis khyab pa yi/ /thams cad yum gyis yang dag 'khrugs/ /phyi rol yang ni brtag par bya/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yum rnams kyis/ /dben zhing

dga' ba'i gnas su ni/ /yid kyi legs par 'dus byas pa/ /nam mkha' la ni thig gis gdab/ /thog mar de yis dam pas so/ /de nas rnal 'byor chen pos thig /gsang ba'i yum gyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /mu khyud dag gi rnam mdun du/ /kun nas yongs

su bskor bar bya/ /dbus kyi cha ru dkyil 'khor ni/ /'khor lo lta bur bri bar bya/ /kun nas brgyad gnyis mdzes pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi yi dbus su'o/ /'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /pad+ma ze'u 'bru ldan pa bri/ /mtshams dang mtshams su 'dab ma ni/ /ji lta

ba bzhin bsnyems bcas pas/ /srad bu lnga yis yang dag 'khrugs/ /srad bu bzhi yis nye bar spras/ /sgo bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /rta babs seng ge dag gis brgyan/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs/ /bla res steng du bres pa dang / /rin chen rdo rjes

pad ldan sngon/ /dpag bsam shing gi lcug mas khyab/ /bum bzang rin chen ldan pa'i mchog /rgyan phreng glang po ldan pa ni/ /phyi rol gnas te legs par bris/ /rtog dang mi rtog rnam spangs te/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal po'i dbus su ni/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi rdo rje bya/ /

mnyam par gzhag cing spro ba yis/ /sems kyis bri ba nyid du bya/ /de nas lha mo zhal bzhi ma/ /shes rab pha rol phyin dge ba/ /phyag bzhi pa la spyan yangs ma/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni chos 'chad cing / /bzhi pa'i g.yas par rdo rje ste/ /g.yon pa pad+mas rnam par brgyan/ /

dkar dang dmar po cher sngo ba/ /sngo bsangs rin chen mchog mdzes 'od/ /gtsug na rin chen gtsug tor che/ /gtsug rgyan cod pan dam pa can/ /skal ba chen po 'od ldan ma/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs/ /gos kyis stod ni legs bsgribs pa/ /

bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor 'dzum bcas shing / /sna tshogs gos ni legs gyon pa/ /dbu ma'i zhal ras gser gyi 'od/ /zhabs gnyis dbus su 'khor lo ste/ /mdun na rin chen bdun gnas pa/ /pad+ma mchog ldan seng ge'i khri/ /zla ba rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gdan/ /nyi

ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phro ba/ /rgyab tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /dpa' bo de yis bri bar bya/ /'di yi mdun du bri bya ba/ /dpa' bo mtha' yas pa yi zhal/ /stong phrag du ma'i phyag ldan ma/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis

rnam par brgyan/ /phyag gis rdo rje pad+ma 'chang / /sna tshogs phyag rgyas phyag gzhan dkrigs/ /gtsug ldan dar gyi cod pan can/ /dbu rgyan pad+ma'i bzhin ras ma/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs/ /de 'od nyi ma lta bu'i 'od/ /dpa' bo'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/ /

dpa' bo des ni bri bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpar bdag bsgoms te/ /der ni bsnyems pas 'gro bar bya/ /dpa' bos lho ru bri bya ba/ /gshin rje'i 'dab ma mdzes pa la/ /mchog sbyin nam mkha' dge ma yang / /rin chen khri la legs par bzhugs/ /bzhin ras sngo

la spyan dkar ba/ /'dzum bcas nor bu'i 'og pag can/ /mgul rgyan rin chen phreng ba mchog /rkang gdub gdu bu rin po che/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i lag pa can/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin dgongs ma/ /de nas blo ldan rab song ste/ /nub tu yang ni de bzhin du/ /dpal

dang ldan pas legs par bri/ /chu las skyes ma yid 'phrog ma/ /dmar po'i gos 'dzin dag pa ma/ /gtsug na cod pan gyis spras ma/ /sbrul rgyan sna tshogs lus can ma/ /dar dang rin chen gyis bklubs ma/ /pad+ma 'byed pa'i sbyor ba yi/ /phyag gi lo 'dab dang ldan

pas/ /zla ba'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs/ /nyi ma du ma'i snang ba can/ /ji ltar rigs pa bri bar bya/ /de nas byang du phyin nas su/ /song ste dpa' bos bri bya ba/ /mi g.yo bzhin ras grags chen ma/ /mar gad 'bar ba mtshungs pa mo/ /dkar

po'i dar gyis yang dag bklubs/ /gtsug na nor bu cod pan bzang / /gtsug rgyan sna tshogs dag gis spras/ /rdo rje dril bu'i lag bkra ma/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang gos ldan pas/ /zla ba'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs/ /'od kyis gtams pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog /de nas

mtshams kyi 'dab ma la/ /me tog bdug pa dri ldan ma/ /rdo rje snang byed dag pa ma'i/ /mchod pa sngags rig pa yis bri/ /gzugs sgra dri dang ro dang reg /rang gi bdag po'i phyogs su'o/ /'dab ma 'dab mar thams cad du/ /bzhad dang sgeg dang dbyangs chen mo/ /

gar gyi phyag rgya grags chen po/ /sngags pas 'bad de bri bar bya/ /pad+ma las skyes 'dab ma la/ /thams cad du ni 'grub pa bri/ /sgo rnams dag ni thams cad la/ /sgo skyong ba ni rnam bzhi dang / /phyi rol du yang lha la sogs/ /ming ni yang dag bri bar bya/ /de nas khrus

byas lus byugs la/ /me tog bdug sogs kyis bdugs te/ /sna tshogs gos ni rab gyon la/ /me tog phreng dang gos kyis brgyan/ /gtsug phud cod pan dang ldan zhing / /mdzes pa'i dar gyis yang dag bklubs/ /rdo rje dril bu lag par ldan/ /sbyor ba bzang po'i rnam

gzhag gis/ /de nas thams cad dgug par bya/ /rdo rje ma mo dka' thub che/ /bzlog dang rnal ma'i phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas nas su/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas gar bya zhing / /lan gsum du ni g.yas bskor bas/ /rdo rje ma mo'i dkyil 'khor rnams/ /dam

tshig ldan pa thams cad byon/ /glu dbyangs kyi ni rgyal pos bskul/ /rang gi slob ma'i tshogs gar gyis/ /dregs pa yis ni g.yas dang g.yon/ /'gying ba dang ni 'dud par bya/ /'dir gshegs 'dir gshegs sems can don mdzad brtson pa po/ /ser sna mi mnga'

sangs rgyas tshogs mchog mtha' dag dang / /bde gshegs dam pa'i yum gyur srid pa'i skyed pa po/ /pha rol don mdzad dus la de ring bab pa lags/ /zhes so/ /de nas de dag rang nyid kyis/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas byon/ /mtshan ma dag ni bzang po

rnams/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu blta bar bya/ /rang ngam gzhan la 'bab sogs pa'i/ /mtshan ma ji ltar mthong ba na/ /de tshe nges par ma mo ni/ /bde gshegs thugs kyi dgongs par byon/ /de nas mchod yon zhabs bsil cho ga ji bzhin rab brtags te/ /de tshe

babs pa'i sems can bsod nams ldan la dri bar bya/ /gal te de ni mi smra ba na hU~M gi yi ge dang / /ldan pa'i glu dbyangs can gyis yongs su bskul ba nyid du bya'o/ /de nas shes rab ldan ma gzhug /slob ma'i gtso bo thal sbyar te/ /mig la mig dar gyis g.yogs

la/ /rab dga' bdag yin yang dag dga'/ /ma mo thams cad la dmigs te/ /der ni me tog dor bar bya/ /me tog gang la lhung gyur pa/ /ma mo de ni de yis 'grub/ /de nas ji bzhin du/ /sgo skyong ba nas brtsams nas su/ /shes rab pha rol

phyin pa'i bar/ /slob ma la ni bshad par bya/ /dam tshig thob par gyur nas su/ /sdom pa dag ni gzung bar bya/ /ma mo'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bstan par bya/ /gzhan du slob dpon blo ngan ni/ /nges par dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /

des kyang yang dag de 'grub cing / /myur du dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bgegs dang log par 'dren pa'am/ /rims dang gdon dang dug sogs kyis/ /gdungs te nad kyis rgyun du ni/ /'chi ba ru yang 'gyur ba yin/ /rdo rje slob dpon smad pa na/ rtag tu

dmyal ba nyid du ni/ /rab tu rmongs pa'i slob ma 'gro/ /mkha' las rdo rje ji bzhin no/ /des na bu kye dam tshig ni/ /khyod kyis rtag tu srung bar byos/ /ma mo kun gyi sdom pa ni/ /theg pa chen po'i cho gas gnas/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin la

bzhugs te/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi yum rnams kyi dam tshig bka' stsal pa/ /rin chen sems kyi dam tshig gis/ /rnam pa gsum ni sbyang bar bya/ /thog mtha' bar gyi sbyor ba yis/ /chung 'bring mchog gi dbye ba yis/ /de 'dra'i dam tshig yang

dag pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bka' stsal to/ /ji srid sems ni sbyangs kyi bar/ /'bad pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /bud med thams cad mthong ba na/ /lan gsum du ni bskor nas kyang / /spyi bor phyag ni byas nas su/ /lan gsum bar du gsol ba gdab/ /

bdag ni ma khyod bu yin te/ /ji srid byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub yan lag nu ma las/ /byung ma rang gi 'o mas skyongs/ /de nas sbyor ldan rab dge ba'i/ /dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par bya/ /gser la sogs pa'i bum pa ru/ /dri yi chus ni yongs bkang la/ /

dar dang ras sogs kyis g.yogs te/ /me tog chun pos mgul brgyan nas/ /rin chen sman gyis rab bkang ba'i/ /gcig lhag bcu drug bzang po la/ /ma mo'i snying po nyid kyis ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa yis/ /sngags shes pas ni dbang bskur ro/ /

slob ma zhi ba bzang po yis/ /thog mar zhu ba byas nas kyang / /zhabs gnyis la ni mgos btud nas/ /bdag ni che ge mo rdo rje/ /byang chub sems ni rnam bsgoms pa'o/ /slob dpon zhabs kyi chu skyes la/ /dbang bskur phyir ni zhu ba bgyid/ /skal ba chen po bdag

la stsol/ /slob dpon mchog tu rmad byung ba/ /dbang bskur rgyal ba thams cad kyis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa/ /des ni bdag gi sems can rnams/ /don gyi dam pa bdag gis bgyi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis don bgyid pa/ /brtul zhugs bzang

po khyod kyi drin/ /de nas dbang bskrur sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gnas/ /slob mas ye shes rdo rje yi/ /go 'phang la ni bzhag nas su/ /bum pa bzang po gcig gam ni/ /yang na bcu drug dag gam ni/ /lnga'am yang na bcu yis ni/ /dkyil 'khor

du ni dbang bskur ro/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun du ni/ /dkyil 'khor pad+ma bri bar bya/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la/ /ge sar lte ba ldan par bri/ /de yi dbus su rdo rje bri/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'od zer phreng / /de yi mdun du 'khor lo bri/ /chen po rin chen bdun gyis

bskor/ /lho yi phyogs su rin po che/ /nub tu pad+ma nyid yin te/ /byang du ral gri chen po'o/ /'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs 'od zer can/ /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /me tog bdug pa dri zhim pa/ /'od ldan pa ni skal ba che/ /sgo dang sgo ru bzhi nyid do/ /phyi

rol du yang mi 'chi kun/ /gcig nas gcig tu rgyal sgrogs pa/ /bde byed gcer bu'i cha lugs te/ /ming thos pa dang ldan pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /slob ma bsnyems dang bcas pa bzhag /chos kyi rang bzhin gtam brjod de/ /de ring khyod ni rigs

su skyes/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po che/ /rtag pa dam pa'i dbang phyug pa/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i dpal/ /dag pa'i dbang phyug kun gyi bdag /rdo rje pad+ma lag byin te/ /gnang ba bzang po rab tu sbyin/ /bu yis bya ba chen po gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun

gyi go 'phang gnas/ /der ni sbyor ba 'ongs nas su/ /gsang ba'i sdom pa sbyin par bya/ /'di ni mchog tu dga' ba ste/ /yum rnams rab tu rmad byung ba'o/ /dus su 'dod pa nyid du gyis/ /dam tshig mchog tu gyur pa'o/ /brtul zhugs bzang pos ci 'byor pas/ /

de nas yon ni phul byas nas/ /slob dpon gyi ni zhabs la 'dud/ /ma dang chung ma bu mo dang / /sring mo sring mo'i bu mo dang / /bu rnams dang ni bdag nyid dang / /rgyal po longs spyod gter dang ni/ /nor dang 'bru dang grong shing rta/ /glang po rta dang ba glang sogs/ /ma

he dang ni ma he mo/ /gzhan dang gzhan yang ci 'dod pa/ /bla ma la ni chen pos dbul/ /bya dang mi bya rdzas kyi mchog /thams cad kyang ni dbul bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan ma rnams la/ /rgyan phreng rnams dang bzhad gad dang / /sgeg dang rtse 'jo dga' ba dang / /

rab tu dga' ba'i bde chen dang / /bza' btung bca' ba la sogs pa'i/ /rnam pa du ma thams cad kyis/ /mchod nas gshegs su gsol bar bya/ /sems can kun gyi don dang ni/ /bdag gi yang ni ched cher mdzad/ /bde gshegs gang du gshegs

pa der/ /ma mo thams cad gshegs su gsol/ /shes rab ldan pas yon phul te/ /slob ma'i mchog dang bcas pa yis/ /gar byas lag pa mgor bzhag ste/ /rim gyis 'gyed dang 'dud par bya/ /de nas bzang mo rnams mnyes te/ /thams cad sgrub

par byed pa'i mchog /bdag gis skal bzang stsal nas kyang / /rang gi sras kyi gnas su gshegs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes yum chen mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs so// //

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yum bcom ldan 'das ma rnams kyis yang gsang ba 'dus pa las byung ba rang rang gi sgrub pa'i thabs rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces zhus so/ /shes rab ye shes mchog sgrub pa'i/ /sems dpa' chen pos

gsung du gsol/ /thabs kyis sems can thams cad kun/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras thob pa/ /rdo rje ye shes mchog gyur pa/ /rdo rje'i sku ste rdo rje mchog /dngos grub kun gyi bde ster ba/ /rdo rje chen pos gsung du gsol/ /thugs kyi rin chen ldan pa'i

mchog /gzi brjid rdo rje snang ba can/ /sems can rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / /'grub pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas gsungs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che/ /rnal 'byor chen po dbang phyug che/ /dpa' bo'i sbyor bas gar gnas pa'i/ /dpa' bo chen pos

bshad du gsol/ /las kun gyi ni 'bras brnyes pas/ /sna tshogs mkhyen pa dbang phyug che/ /sems can rnams kyi yab chen po/ /sna tshogs dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhes bya bas so/ /de nas bcom ldan rtag pa'i rgyal/ /dam pa'i dbang phyug kun mkhyen

pas/ /gsung mchog nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i/ /zab mo yi ni chos bka' stsal/ /'di na sgrub po gang yang med/ /dngos grub bam ni sgrub thabs kyang / /thams cad rnam par rtog las byung / /rnam rtog kyang ni dmigs ma yin/ /bdag med sangs

rgyas rnams kyang med/ /chos rnams med cing chos nyid med/ /sbyor ba med cing sems can med/ /de bzhin pha dang ma yang med/ /byed pa med cing skyong ba med/ /'bras bu med cing rgyu yod min/ /longs spyod med cing za bo med/ /shes med shes pa po yang med/ /

rnam shes med cing shes bya med/ /rdzun min bden pa'ang ma yin pa/ /des na snang ba thams cad ni/ /sgyu ma lta bu nyid las byung / /de ltar chos rnams rnam rig pa/ /grol nas gos par mi 'gyur te/ /dngos grub chen po 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bde

chen po/ /zab mo'i chos ni thos pa na/ mkhas pa gang zhig dad gyur na/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /sbyor ba 'di ni bcom ldan gsungs/ /thams cad dag par byed pa'i mchog /gsang ba'i rgyan la legs bzhugs
