nas/ /sems can rnams la bstan pa po/ /de nas yum rnams tshim gyur te/ /rang byung ba la zhu ba zhus/ /grub pa'i sgrub thabs rab sbyor ba/ /mnga' bdag rnal 'byor rnams kyis gsungs/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi yum las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de yi steng du ma nyams pa/ /nam mkha'i mtha' klas khyab pa yi/ /phyogs kun du ni rab 'phro ba'o/ /de yi

steng du gzi brjid che/ /dus mtha'i me dang mtshungs 'dra ba/ /de yi steng du sa chen po/ /gser gyi ri bo dang mtshungs pa/ /de yi steng du chur shes bya/ /zla ba gang ba kha ba 'dra/ /sngags pas cho ga bzhin du bsam/ /rin chen bzhi yi rang bzhin bzang / /stong phrag brgyad

cu rtsa bzhi yi/ /dpag tshad kyi ni tshad tsam pa/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yi rtse mo can/ /ri bo chen po cog brgyad pa/ /dbus su rdo rje'i ri bo mchog /de yi steng du rdo rje che/ /kun tu phyogs pa yongs su bsgom/ /sngo bsangs margad ta 'dra

ba/ /sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag 'khrugs/ /de yi steng du rdo rje che/ /rtse mo lnga pa rnam par bsam/ /dkar po shel dang 'dra ba'o/ /'od zer lnga yis rnam par spras/ /de yi steng du rin po che/ /chu skyes sngon po'i 'dab 'dra ba/ /sna tshogs 'od zer stong gi phreng / /

phyogs bcu nam mkha' khyab pa'o/ /de yi gtsug tu pad+ma che/ /nam mkha' khyab pa yi ni mchog /lo ma stong phrag du ma can/ /lte ba dang ni ze'u 'brus dkrigs/ /de yi mdun du nyi ma che/ /'od zer stong phrag du ma can/ /de yi steng du zla ba che/ /dkar po'i 'od zer 'bar

bas dkrigs/ /nam mkha'i khams ni gang ba yi/ /gzi brjid dkar po 'phro ba'o/ /de yi dbus su ma mo bri/ /dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang / /yongs su dag pa mkha' 'dra ma/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'phro ba mo/ /phyag gnyis ma la thugs zhi ba/ /

bsam gtan spyan ldan bsam gtan yid/ /bsam gtan mchog gi phyag rgya yi/ /ser mo gzhon nu rab bzhag pa/ /dkar po'i gos 'dzin mdzes pa mo/ /dkar po yi ni rgyan gyis brgyan/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs cod pan bzang / /gtsug gi nor bu 'od ldan pa/ /

ye shes gdan la mnyam par bzhugs/ /ba spu rnams kyi rtse bug gnas/ /rgyal ba rab tu khros pa ste/ /byang chub pha rol son par mdzad/ /de yi thugs kar rnam bsam pa/ /yi ge mchog tu mi 'gyur ba/ /yi ge rnams kyis yang dag dkrigs/ /thams cad du ni

legs 'phro ba'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mdun gnas pa/ /rab tu thal mo sbyor ba'o/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /rig sngags khro bo'i tshogs kyang ni/ /chos nyan pa yi tshul du yang / /dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag par bya/ /sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad

du/ /sgo skyong ba ni bzhi rnams so/ /sbyin pa la sogs ci rigs par/ /bcu drug po yang gzhag par bya/ /me tog bdug pa mar me che/ /ji lta ba bzhin gzhag par bya/ /lha klu de bzhin gnod sbyin dang / /dri za lha min dmyal las byung / /'di rnams thams cad lhun po la/ /

kun nas yongs su gzhag par bya/ /de nas me tog phreng ldan 'jug /dri dang me tog yang dag ldan/ /gos dkar 'dzin pa dpal dang ldan/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /shes rab 'phro dang lhan cig tu/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rjes dran pas/ /bdag dag pas

ni dag par bya/ /shes rab sbyor bas gang gnas pas/ /sgo yi drung du legs 'khod la/ /glu 'di yis ni spyan drang bya/ /thugs rje mnga' ba chos kyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas yum/ /rang gi yab kyi tshogs dang sras dang bcas te byon/ /spyon cig spyon cig lha dang srin por

bcas mchod pa'i/ /'jig rten dbang phyug yang dag byang chub thugs mnga' ba/ /spyon cig spyon cig thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'jig rten gnyen/ /chos kyi yi ge bde bar gshegs pas rjes bskos pa/ /mkha' ltar yongs dag dri med dam bca' dran par mdzod/ /ma mo

rnams ni mchog gi glus bskul byon par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma byon par mthong nas rang gi me tog gi snyim pa dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dbul bar bya'o/ /oM bdag gi mchod yon zhabs bsil 'di/ /ci bde bar yang bzhes su gsol/ /de nas

de dang lhan cig tu/ /'dres pa ru ni gyur par bsam/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA dz+nyA na sa ma ye hU~M sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ de nas 'di yis brtan par bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsa la sa ma ya ma tsa la s+t+wa~M/ de nas 'dis mnyes par bya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma na san tu sti sa ma ye hU~M/ e h+ye hi dzaH

e h+ye hi dzaH/ de nas dpag tu med pa'i ngo mtshar chen po lta ba'i phyir/ oM sarbAng+ga puN+Da ra ma hA b+ha ga bAn sa le sma ra sma ra s+pha ra s+pha ra sarbAng+gA bA yu piTh+Nu ma hA bud+d+ha samu drwan hU~M hU~M a~M/ 'di yis ma mo bskul nas su/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni 'od po che/ /dkyil 'khor ba la spro bar bya/ /de

nas gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /bsngags te me tog dor bar bya/ /oM sarbAng+ga puN+Da rI ka pra tI ts+tsha d+h+wa~M ku su mAny+dza liM hU~M aH/ de nas ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi bum pa rnams la rig sngags 'dis ji ltar bshad pa ltar legs par byin gyis brlabs

la rang gis dbang bskur rang gi snying po rang gis blang bar bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad kyi nus pa dang ldan pa dang / dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas me tog la sogs dang / /bza' dang btung dang ro dag gis/ /mchod la sngon gyi rim pa bzhin/ /

slob ma'i rgyal po gzhug par bya/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rim pa yi/ /sbyor ba yis ni dbang bskur ro/ /rdo rje rin chen de bzhin pad/ /las kyi rdo rje de bzhin no/ /zhags pa lcags kyu dril bu dang / /lcags sgrog rnga yab dang ni gdugs/ /ral gri mig sman thur

ma gnyis/ /rgyal po'i nye bar spyod pa dang / /de la rgyan rnams bstan nas su/ /dkyil 'khor der ni dbang bskur ro/ /rgyal ba'i yum gyi dbang bskrur ba/ /las kun byed par rab tu bshad/ /dam tshig gam ni sdom pa yang / /rang gi slob ma nyan du gzhug /zhi

ba dang ni rgyas pa'i las/ /dbang dang drag shul spyod pa ni/ /legs par rnam par dag sems kyis/ /ci 'dod par ni bya ba byos/ /las rnams kun gyi 'bras bu yang / /sbyor ba 'di yis 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos slar

yang las dam pa rgyas par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ji lta'i gzugs kyi snod byas la/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus su gzhag /zho dang mar gsar 'o ma ni/ /tsan+dan dmar po dang bsres te/ /ga pur dang ni

ldan byas la/ /yid la byed pas bzlas te bsgrub/ /zla ba nyi ma gzas bzung tshe/ /sbyor ba bzang po'i rnam gzhag bya/ /thog mar me ni sbar byas nas/ /'bad pa yis ni rlung gis bus/ /gser gyi snod du bsdu bar bya/ /ba ru na yi khu bas sbyar/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba la/ /

slar yang rdzas de bskam par bya/ /de nas de ru lha mo yi/ /khrag dang sa bon blugs par bya/ /de yis myur du rdzas dag ni/ /'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med/ /grub nas thog mar lha mo la/ /cung zad tsam zhig dbul bar bya/ /de bzhin du ni slob dpon la/ /skal

ba nyis 'gyur dbul bar bya/ /de nas grub pa gzhan rnams dang / /rang gi slob mar skal ba sbyin/ /de nas byin brlabs sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya dang ni lhan cig tu/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /zas kyi sa bon dang ni bza'/ /skad cig de la gzugs

brjes te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur 'gyur/ /gang dang gang gi gzugs rnams su/ /bsgrub 'dod pa yi sngags pa yis/ /de dang de yi bsam gtan gyis/ /blo gros brtan pas bza' bar bya/ /de dang de yi gzugs su ni/ /gdon mi za bar brje bar 'gyur/ /

gzhan pa yi ni rdzas dag kyang / /'di nyid kyis ni bsgrub par bya/ /mig sman gyis ni mig byugs pas/ /khor yug tu ni mi snang 'gro/ /snying la ldong ros kyis byugs na/ /yid kyi spyod yul nyid du 'gro/ /ba bla yis ni lus byugs na/ /mkha' la nye bar 'gro bar

'gyur/ /mig sman nag po blangs nas su/ /nag po'i phyogs la bza' bar bya/ /de yi bshang ba'i mar khu las/ /dud pa mkhas pas bsgrub par bya/ /de yis mig la byugs na ni/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs shing / /stobs ni dpal ldan rdo rje'i mtshon/ /

nyid 'gyur rga dang 'chi ba med/ /mig sman dang ni ba lang mar/ /ma he dang ni ra nyid dang / /mi yi mig sman nyid dag ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni blangs nas su/ /sngags pas bzung ste btso bar bya/ /mig sman chen po mchog tu bzang / /'di yis mig la byugs na ni/ /

grub pa yid du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /mi snang 'grub pa thams cad kyis/ /blo gros chen po rgyal por 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sa chen po/ /nges par thob 'gyur gzhan du min/ /rdzas kyi gnas skabs le'u 'di/ /mtshungs med chen po nyer bshad do/ /gos

dang gdugs sogs ral gri dang / /mtshon cha dam pa bsgrub par bya/ /snying po snying gar byas nas ni/ /bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po ches/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' bzhin ras mchog /de yi zhal du byas nas su/ /

de dang ldan pas bsgom par bya/ /mnga' bdag gang gis dbang phyug ltar/ /skad cig de la de 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyi ni spyi bo'i char/ /mchog gi dam pa bsam gtan bya/ /skad cig de la mchod pa che'i/ /sangs rgyas su ni de 'gyur ro/ /de yi spyi gtsug nyid du ni/ /

sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /de ni kun gyi rgyal dbang po/ /las kun byed pa'i don 'grub 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying gar bsam par bya/ /de yi dbus su snying po blta/ /de nas rdo rje rig pa 'dzin/ /mnga' bdag rdo rje'i dbang po 'grub/ /rin chen chen po cha brgyad pa/ /

snying ga ru ni mkhas pas bsgom/ /der ni snying po bsam pa yis/ /rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa/ /yid la bsgoms pas skad cig la/ /pad+ma che ldan mnga' bdag gis/ /pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa mtha'

yas pa/ /ji lta'i sbyor ba'i cho ga yis/ /mchog dang dman pa 'bring po yi/ /dngos grub dam pa bsgrub par bya/ /snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /yi ge dam pa bsgom par bya/ /ji lta'i sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /thams cad bdag tu bsgom par bya/ /de

las langs te bdag zhi bas/ /zla 'od kha ba ltar bsil ba'i/ /'od zer sprin gyis cher gtams pas/ /bsgrub bya'i spyi bor gzhag par bya/ /skad cig de la gdug pa dang / /gza' dang dug sogs rab 'phrog cing / /nyi ma gcig gam bdun nam ni/ /bsgrub bya

zhi 'gyur gzhan du min/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /snying po'i mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /'od zer ser po'i phreng mdzes pa/ /bsgoms pas de ni rgyas par byed/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /mnyam par gzhag pas lha mo bsam/ /

dmar po'i rang bzhin 'bar dag pa/ /bsgrub bya'i sems la 'phro bar bya/ /slar yang sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rang gi lus la gzhug par bya/ /'khor los sgyur ba lta bu yang / /de ni ci nas dbang du 'gro/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sna tshogs rdo rje

bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus su yi ge ni/ /ma rgad 'od 'dra bsgom par bya/ /'od zer sprin gyis yang dag 'khrugs/ /mkhas pa yis ni snying gar bsam/ /bsgrub bya la ni snying po'i 'od/ /bstims pa'i skad cig de la 'bab/ /rdo rje gar gyis gar byed cing / /

phyag rgya sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor dang / /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma sbyor ba'i/ /phyag rgyas thams cad ston par 'gyur/ /'das dang ma 'ongs ci 'dod pa/ /lce brkyang bas ni smra bar byed/ /'dod dang mi 'dod dge mi dge/ /rdo rje'i ngag gis smra bar 'gyur/ /yang na legs

par sbyor ba'am/ /grong gi'am tha mal skad dag gis/ /'dod dang mi 'dod dge mi dge/ /'tsho ba'am ni 'chi ba dang / /nyams dang mi nyams rang bzhin gyi/ /de dag thams cad de yis smra/ /de las gzhan du de mi smra/ /'di ni bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /dbang

bdag rdo rje'i dbyangs kyis gsungs/ /khros te lce rtser bsgoms nas su/ /lha mo yi ni snying po'i mchog /lcags kyu'i rnam pa spros nas su/ /phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i lan/ /rlung la bzhag ste skad cig la/ /khrag rnams thams cad dgug par bya/ /char

rgyun 'bab pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rang gi kha ru dbab par bya/ /de ni 'thungs pas sngags shes te/ /mnga' bdag rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' kun tu spyod dpal ldan/ /nyi ma'i snang ba lta bur 'gyur/ /'di nyid kyi ni rnal 'byor gyis/ /'o ma zho dang mar bzang po/ /

mar khu chu dang me tog kun/ /rlung gis dgug pa nyid du bya/ /zhags pas mgrin pa bcings byas te/ /lcags kyu yis ni snying ga nas/ /rlung gis kun nas bteg nas su/ /lha mo de bzhin gnod sbyin mo/ /mi mo de bzhin lha min mo/ /brgyad brgya kho na bzlas pa

yis/ /bud med tshul du dgug par bya/ /bsgrub bya sgrub byed ming spel nas/ /ka ba rtsig pa de bzhin khyim/ /dril bu rnams dang bum rnams la'ang / /lha mo yi ni snying po yi/ /brgya bzlas pas ni 'bebs par 'gyur/ /shes rab pha rol

phyin ma mchog /khro ba dang ni yang dag ldan/ /gsal byed kyis ni gsal byas pas/ /las rnams dag ni thams cad bya/ /dur khrod ro ni ma nyams pa/ /mar ngo'i brgyad la bsdus nas su/ /byang du phyogs te gzhag par bya/ /de yi khar ni mnyam gzhag

pas/ /gsang sngags legs par bzlas nas su/ /rdzas kyi dam pa ci rigs pa/ /ba bla mig sman rdo chu dang / /ldong ros dang yang yang na btsag /dkar rtsi sol ba nyid dang ni/ /gur gum dang ni rgya spos sam/ /ru rta shu dag ga pur dang / /tsan+dan de bzhin

a ka ru/ /sha dang khrag ni nyid dang yang / /de bzhin sor mo'i gdu bu ni/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas bzhag nas kyang / /de yi steng du bsdad la bzla/ /nyi ma shar nas de blangs pas/ /grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /dman pas dngos grub dman pa

ste/ /rab kyis rab tu rnam par bstan/ /bar mas bar mar shes par bya/ /mtshan ma med na dbang du byed/ /ces so/ /skyes bu dag ni thams cad dang / /bud med dag ni thams cad la/ /reg pa tsam gyis dbang byed cing / /mig la byugs pa yis

kyang ngo / /tsan+dan gyis ni yongs byugs te/ /gur gum gyis ni thig le'o/ /la gu yis ni bdug par bya/ /dkar rtsi sol ba btsag gis ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i ming dang ni/ /yongs su spel te bris pa yis/ /dbang ma song ba dbang 'gro ste/ /rdo rje sems

dpa'i bka' bzhin no/ /khams kyis ming ni bris pa na/ dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /sol bas yongs su 'gugs par byed/ /dkar rtsi yis ni dug 'joms so/ /li khris skad cig de nyid la/ /smyo bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /ru rta a ga rus bdug

pas/ /dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /sol bas yongs su 'gugs par byed/ /gnod sbyin mo ni nges par 'gugs/ /sha dang khrag gi bdug pa yis/ /srin mo 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog /tsan+dan sih+la'i bdug pa yis/ /lha ni 'gugs par

byed pa'i mchog /ga pur tsan+dan bdug pa yis/ /sangs rgyas mchog tu spyan 'dren pa'o/ /ga pur gang gis zos pa yis/ /gzhan du'ang de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /rig pa chen mo yi ge bzhi/ /mnyam par gzhag pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'khrugs pa dang ni

spel ba'i dus/ /nges par shi ba bsgrub par bya/ /brtul zhugs can gyis gang bsgo ba'i/ /bka' lung de yis myur du byed/ /phrag par khur de bran mo des/ /lhun po'i steng du skyel bar 'gyur/ /grub pa yi ni mchog rab kyi/ /rdzas ni blangs nas 'ong bar 'gyur/ /

gtum po nyi ma yi/ /rgyal gyi mtshan mo sol ba bzung / /gtum mo'i me tog khu ba yis/ /brtul zhugs bzang pos brtags nas su/ /pad+ma'i nang du gzhag par bya/ /de nyid mtshan mo gcig gam gsum/ /de las blangs te sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pa

yis ni mar zhu bya/ /de nas lha'am grub pa'am/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang bsngags pa'am/ /rig sngags grub pa'i grib ma'am/ /gdon mi za bar mthong bar 'gyur/ /'gro dang mi 'gro'i skye bo rnams/ /dbang ma grub pa'ang dbang du byed/ /rang gi khrag

gis ming bris la/ /de nyid kyi ni phye mas dgang / /ji srid bskams par ma gyur par/ /de srid mi de 'ong bar 'gyur/ /gang dang gang gis lha dag gi/ /rim pa 'di yis ming bris te/ /khro bo ldan pas bzlas par bya/ /de 'dis skad cig de la 'grub/ /

de yi bka' bzhin byed pa dang / /ngang gis de ni dbang du 'gyur/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa/ /gsad pa'i don du sngags rig pas/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba sa 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /zhal bzhi pa la cher 'jigs pa/ /zhags pa lcags kyu thod pa

can/ /bdag nyid myur du bsam par bya/ /gsang sngags dang ni spel ba yis/ /ming ni sol bas bris nas su/ /gdug pa de ni mnan nas kyang / /rang gi gdug pa'i sems kyis bsnun/ /'di nyid kyi ni ting 'dzin gyis/ /nges

pa ru yang nges par byed/ /khams kyi sa bon dang spel ba'i/ /khams kyis ming ni bris nas su/ /khams de yang dag mnan nas ni/ /khang pa ru ni rgyun du bzhag /de ni myur du nges 'gyur te/ /de srid du ni mi g.yor gnas/ /rma bya'i sgro'am gtsug phud

kyis/ /yongs su blangs la bsgrub par bya/ /rma bya zhes bya'i rtsa ba yi/ /mkhas pa yis ni yongs su gzung / /dmag la sngags rig pas bskor bas/ /de nas dmag dpung 'jig pa dang / /rmongs pa'am ni rengs pa'am/ /skad cig de la 'khor bar

'gyur/ /khyi dang phag dang bya rog gi/ /mig ni yongs su blangs nas su/ /mig sman dang ni mnyam por bya/ /lha mo'i sngags kyis bsngags pa yis/ /sgrub pa po yi gzugs rnams kun/ /'jig par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /tsaN+Di'i me tog bcud nyid

kyis/ /lcags kyis g.yogs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de yi kha ru nges bcug pas/ /rga shi med par rnam par rgyu/ /rims gtong gzugs ni legs bris te/ /de yi kha ru gnod byed ni/ /sbyor ba yis ni bcug nas su/ /yongs su mnan la shin tu

bzlas/ /rims gtong de yi gzugs kyis ni/ /rab tu 'dzin par gdon mi za/ /gza' 'am yang dag sam/ /gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dang / /gzhan pa yi ni nad rnams kyis/ /'dzin pa la ni dpyad mi dgos/ /gshin rje bris te

bskrad par bya/ /de yi zhal du dgra bo ste/ /rmongs pa'i bdag nyid mi 'gro na/ /de ni myur du nges par 'chi/ /gsad pa la yang 'di nyid kyis/ /yongs su mnan nas nges par bzla/ /gang du gter ni yod snyam gyur/ /der ni sngags rig pas

song ste/ /lce yongs bzung la bzlas pa bya/ /de yis gsal po'i tshig gis smra/ /tshad dang yod dang med pa dang / /bgegs dang bgegs ni ji ltar gnas/ /ji srid de ni dgyes smra na/ /de la gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /gal te bgegs ni mi smra na/ /

der ni mchod yon rab tu brtag /pus mo gnyis btsugs gus pa yis/ /nor 'dzin sangs rgyas yum las so/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu phur bus gdab/ /de nas gnas rnams bskrad par bya/ /de nas mtshams ni bcing bar bya/ /mnyam par bzhag ste bskor

bar bya/ /sbyor ba shes pas sngags 'di yis/ /de nas rdzas ni gdon par bya/ /o~M ba su de sarbAr+tha sA d+ha yA yu d+ha ra rak+Sha rak+Sha/ sargAr+tha ni tsa yaM traM traM tsa tsa Ta Ta ha ha swA hA/ yang na rig pa 'di yis kyang / /las rnams dag ni thams cad bya/ /phyogs bcing

ba dang de bzhin bsrung / /phur bu bskrad pa de bzhin no/ /rin chen gsum ni thog mar sbyin/ /cha gcig dag ni nor 'dzin la'o/ /sdug bsngal can la cha gcig go/ /grogs po rnams la de dang mtshungs/ /lhag ma rnams ni rig pas dpyad/ /dkon

mchog gsum ni legs mchod bya/ /gzhan du sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te/ /rgyal po chom rkun sogs 'jigs las/ /gal te bla ma der bzhugs na/ /skal ba bzang po gnyis dbul lo/ /gzhan pa yi ni spyan rnams la/ /rdo rje theg pa rtogs 'gyur ba'i/ /

skal ba re ni sbyin par bya/ /gzhan du dam tshig gdung bar 'gyur/ /'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor can/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi rdo rjes gsungs/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yum rnams kyis ni der btud nas/ /dpa' bo che la zhu ba zhus/ /rgyas

pa yi ni dkyil 'khor ni/ /gsungs shig gsungs shig dpa' bo che/ /yum rnams kun gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /rgyal po'i dbang phyug rab gsol pa/ /sems can thams cad 'dir 'byung ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi bdag po'i dbang phyug dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dkyil 'khor ji ltar sngar gsungs pa/ /'on kyang seng ge'i khri dang ldan/ /de yi steng du pad+ma che/ /der ni ri

bong can dkyil 'khor/ /de yi steng du nyi ma che/ /nyi ma der ni dkyil 'khor mchog /cha brgyad pa la dbus rin chen/ /de yi steng du rgyal ba'i yum/ /ser dang sngo ba'i 'od chen po/ /gser gyi ri bo dang mtshungs pas/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni chos 'chad cing / /

g.yas pa yis ni mchog sbyin pa/ /g.yon gyis rin chen lan bu mchod/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /gos ni 'phyang zhing sna tshogs pa/ /gtsug tor mu tig thor tshugs can/ /de yi mdun du rin chen bri/ /g.yon du bum pa bzang po bzhag /g.yas

pa ru ni dpag bsam shing / /rgyab tu rin chen lan bu'o/ /mtshams rnams su ni bum pa brgyad/ /gser gyi rang bzhin gzhag par bya/ /rin chen lnga yis yang dag 'khrugs/ /dri lnga dag dang yang dag ldan/ /bza' la sogs pa'i ros gang ba'i/ /bum pa

bcu drug phyi rol du/ /ser po'i gos kyis yongs su dkris/ /me tog ser po sogs kyis brgyan/ /de mdun blo ldan bri bar bya/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin dge ma/ /dmar dang ser dang ches dkar ba/ /rin chen ldan pa'i phyag sbyin pa/ /ser po'i 'od ldan phreng mdzes

ma/ /rin chen bzang po kun gyi sras/ /mkha' yi nyi zla skar ma yis/ /kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o/ /gtsug phud cod pan gos la sogs/ /phreng ba dang ldan dgyes pa mo/ /dkyil 'khor de yi lhor bri ba/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin dge ma/ /cung zad ser ba'i

rin chen lus/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /sna tshogs gos ni yongs su gyon/ /mdzes shing phreng ba'i chun po'i gtsug /gos ldan gtsug na gtsug tor mchog /yid bzhin rin chen dam pa'i phyag /g.yon pa'i skyil krung rin chen bzang / /cho ga

ji bzhin rab tu bsam/ /rgyab tu bzod pa ma zhes bya/ /cung zad 'dzum zhing ser mdzes ma/ /dmar po'i gos ni legs par gyon/ /rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgyan/ /thams cad rin chen mchog 'dri zhing / /dmar po'i gos ni 'phyang ba ma/ /gtsug na rin chen mchog

dang ldan/ /seng ge mchog gi khri la bzhugs/ /byang du brtson 'grus chen mo ni/ /rdo rje go chas brgyan pa la/ /dpa' mo rin chen dbyug gu'i phyag /g.yas pa sbyin pa'i pha rol song / /pri yang ku la sngo bsangs dkar/ /rdo rje seng ge'i khri la bzhugs/ /lhag ma rnams

ni gzhag bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor byas te rin chen ldan/ /sgo dang sgo ru sgo ba ma/ /rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /de nas phyi yi phyi nyid du/ /rin chen snyim pa'i lag pa mchog /phyogs skyong ba ni thams cad ni/ /bzhin du gzhag par bya/ /de yi phyi

rol thams cad du/ /mkhas pas klu dang gnod sbyin bri/ /rin chen bum pa bzang po dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan lag /gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /lha bshos rab tu bzang dge ba/ /bza' dang btung ba'i ro mchog dang / /mar dang ka ra nyid dang

ni/ /zho dang bu ram hwags dang bcas/ /'o ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang / /rgyal po'i bza' ba dam pa'i mchog /bza' ba la sogs rab mchog go/ /de nas sngags pas 'jug par bya/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan nas su/ /ser po'i gos 'dzin dag pa dang / /

phreng ldan dri zhim ldan pa'i las/ /sgo yi char ni zhugs nas su/ /thog mar lha ni spyan drang bya/ /phyag rgya bcings te dbyangs snyan pas/ /rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis su/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la sman slad du/ /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dran mdzod la/ /

rin chen dam pa seng ge'i khrir bzhugs te/ /'khor bcas lha dang de bzhin gshegs pa spyon/ /de nas de dag legs byon te/ /sras bcas 'khor dang bcas rnams kyang / /sems can rnams la dngos grub ster/ /sgrub pa po la khyad par du/ /de nas thal mo legs

sbyar la/ /rin chen gyis bkang me tog bcas/ /gsang sngags brjod de gtor bar bya/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /de nas rang gis dbang bskur bya/ /de yi sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /sa la lag pas reg nas su/ /bsnyems pa yis ni 'thon

par bya/ /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya/ /me tog dris ni yang dag sdud/ /ser po'i gos bzang yang dag gyon/ /lag na rin chen dri bzang po/ /dga' dang bcas te snyim pa de/ /snga ma'i sngags kyis dor bar bya/ /gang gi drung du lhung gyur pa/ /lha de de yis

'grub pa yin/ /de nas g.yas nas rnam bskor te/ /slob ma de ni 'byung bar bya/ /bzang po'i seng ge'i khrir bzhag ste/ /dbang bskur ba yi sbyor ba bya/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / /mdzes pa'i rnga yab g.yob pa yis/ /de bzhin du yang dbang

bskur te/ /bum pa brgyad dam bcu drug la/ /de yi sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /ji lta ba bzhin no/ /de nas sbyor ba der 'ongs te/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rim pa yis/ /'khor lo rin chen bzang po'i lag /rgyal ba rgyal ba'i sgra dge bas/ /

gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /lte ba ru ni dbang bskur ro/ /'di bdag gter can rin chen 'dzin/ /rdo rje rin chen 'dzin par 'gyur/ /dam tshig gi ni dam pa yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi don rgyas pa/ /'bad pas de ring blangs pa yis/ /phongs pa'i

dri ma 'phrog par byed/ /de nas dpa' bo 'chi med 'dzin/ /rin chen tshogs kyis mchod par bya/ /gzhan pa yi yang du ma ni/ /rgyal po dbang phyug dam pas so/ /de bzhin dbang bskur lnga po yis/ /skal med kyang ni bdag med 'gyur/ /gling bzhi'i dbang phyug

dpal ldan yang / /gnod pa med par thob par 'gyur/ /gsang ba las kyang ches shin tu/ /gsang ba yi ni mna' bsgags te/ /de yi bsgom dang sgrub pa'i thabs/ /slob ma la ni de nas bslab/ /gur gum dang ni tsan+dan dang / /dri dang mar me bzang po la/ /dam

tshig gis ni gsal byas pa/ /lan gsum du ni 'thung du gzhug /bu kye 'thung shig gsang ba che/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' ba dka'/ /gal te 'di las 'das gyur na/ /myur ba nyid du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /shi nas kyang ni dmyal sdug bsngal/ /rab mang ngu 'bod nyid

du gnas/ /gal te mi ru skye 'dod pa'am/ /nam zhig dngos grub thob 'dod na/ de bzhin phongs pa'i sdug bsngal las/ /ring du nges par khyod kyis skyobs/ /'di dag legs thos slob ma la/ /gsang ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya/ /ji lta'i rgyal rigs bu mo

ni/ /bzung nas gsal ba'i rnal 'byor bya/ /nyi ma bdun na nges par 'grub/ /rgyal po'i phun tshogs thob par 'gyur/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mchog /dkyil 'khor sbyor bas bsam gtan bya/ /rgyal mo cho ga bzhin bzung ste/ /sgrub pa pos ni myur du

bsgrub/ /nyi ma gsum gyis rgyal po mchog /gdon mi za bar thob par 'gyur/ /bram ze'i bu mo skal chen mo/ /nor chen la ni bsgrub par bya/ /rje rigs sna tshogs sbyor ba yis/ /mtshungs pa nyid du bsgrub par bya/ /de yis dngos grub mchog rnyed de/ /rgyal

po 'jig rten gsum gyis brjed/ /dmangs mo dpa' bo'i sbyor ba yis/ /bsgrubs na sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin rgyal mchog grub pa dang / /gnod sbyin rnams kyi dbang phyug mchog /dman pa'i sems su bshad pa dang / /mchog gis mchog

ni chen po dang / /bar mas bar ma'i dngos grub ni/ /skye ba 'di la thob par 'gyur/ /de nas las rnams bslab par bya/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa'i las/ /de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod dang / /gzhan pa yi yang sna tshogs ni/ /sems can rnams la dga' ba'o/ /

shes rab pha rol phyin dge ma/ /dkyil 'khor sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /kun+da dkar po zla ba 'dra/ /'od zer dkar pos mdzes pa mo/ /skye bo nad pa 'chi ka ma/ /de yi lus la gzhug par bya/ /de nas de ni stobs ldan 'gyur/ /brgyad gnyis pa yi lang tshor ldan/ /

nad rnams kun las rnam par grol/ /rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs/ /bstan bcos kun gyi don rig cing / /shes rab dran pa mchog dang ldan/ /de bzhin rang 'gyur rnal 'byor pa/ /nam mkha' la ni yang dag bsgom/ /mdzes pa'i rin chen

sna tshogs pa'i/ /thams cad du ni char 'bab pa/ /'di yis phongs pa rnam par sel/ /phongs pa rnams la rab tu brtag /mthe bo yi ni tshad tsam pa'i/ /nor rgyun ma yi rnam pa bya/ /lha mo la ni mnyam par gzhag /de yi mdun du gsang sngags bzlas/ /

ji srid 'bum phrag kho na ste/ /de nas dngos grub bsgrub par bya/ /zla ba gang ba'am bcu bzhi 'am/ /brgyad pa'am gzas gzung nyin par la/ /mchod pa chen po byas nas su/ /mkhas pas mtshan mo thog thag bzlas/ /de nas dga' bas gzugs brnyan de/ /

gdon mi za bar 'bar bar 'gyur/ /de nas bzung ste mdor bsdu na/ /mi yi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ /bzlas pas mtshan ma bzang byung na/ /rnal 'byor pa ni nor chen 'gyur/ /bar mas gling ni thob par 'gyur/ /tha ma yis ni khor yug go/ /thams cad

du ni bzlas tsam gyis/ /longs spyod zad par 'gyur ma yin/ /rgyal po thams cad dbang 'gyur zhing / /bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ /snying gar rnal 'byor byas nas su/ /nor bu lag par bcangs nas ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas bsgom/ /

myur du rin chen rgyal por 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di ni byas gyur pas/ /rtag tu sgom pas bsgom par bya/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i grub rnyed de/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa ji bzhin no/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal to/ /de nas sbyor ba ji bzhin du/ /yum de

rnams ni legs byon nas/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor legs gnas pa/ /ston pa la ni zhu ba zhus/ /gang du rgyal ba kun bzhugs nas/ /bla na med pa'i don mdzad pa/ /sems can kun la bde slad du/ /myur du las ni 'grub pa legs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

las thams cad kyi dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum gyi dam pa de rnams la las kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de yi dbus su gru gsum pa/ /de yi

steng du lha mo bzhag /'bar ba'i me dang mtshungs pa la/ /zhal bzhi ma la cher 'jigs pa/ /mche ba rab tu gtsigs pa mo/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can/ /rdo rje lcags kyu thod pa dang / /zhags pa g.yas dang g.yon par 'dzin/ /pags pa chen po

gos su gyon/ /khro mo mig 'bras rab phyung ba/ /mche bas mchu mnan zhal chen mo/ /de yi mdun du bri bya ba/ /mtha' ma'i zhal ni mdor bsdus pa/ /sna tshogs gtum dang drag po'i zhal/ /du ma'i phyag gis yang dag 'khrugs/ /zhags pa lcags kyu thod sogs

dang / /rdo rje can gyi sog le 'dzin/ /thod pas lus la bres gyur cing / /cod pan chen pos 'jigs byed mo/ /gshin rje dpa' bos bri bya ba/ /mtha' gdong dam pa yi ni mchog /sngon po 'bar ba'i rang bzhin khros/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /

thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can/ /stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ /ral gri rin chen thod pa dang / /rin chen dbyug gu 'dzin pa'i mchog /de nas lha mo legs bri ba/ /pad+ma'i zhal ma 'jigs chen mo/ /dmar mo phyag na nyi zla 'dzin/ /bskal pa'i me dang

mtshungs pa mo/ /g.yon pa ru ni khro mo che/ /ma bcom ma ni ska rags mgul/ /las kyi rdo rje dril ldan mchog /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /gtsug na thod pa 'jigs su rung / /rab gtum stobs dang gsal ba mo/ /sbyor ldan cho ga rig pas bri/ /

phyi rol du ni legs bri ba/ /khro bcas 'jigs pa dang bcas pa/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs chen po can/ /khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang / /phyag rgya bzang pos phyag mtshan pa'o/ /de yi phyi ru lha rnams ni/ /snyim pa rab sbyar yi dam pa/ /thams cad du ni yongs

su gzhag /'jig rten skyong ba gzhag par bya/ /sgo rnams dag ni thams cad du/ /sgo skyong ba yang de bzhin du/ /de nas gtor ma'i cho ga ni/ /sha bcas btung ba ro dang ldan/ /de nas go cha bcings gyur pas/ /thod pa'i cod pan chen po dang / /khrag

gam chang gis bkang ba'am/ /thod pa ldan pas 'jug par bya/ /thams cad 'grub pa'i ma mo rnams/ /'di yis spyan ni drang bar bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa'i/ /gsad pa'i don du ma mo rnams/ /de ring nyid du dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /'jigs

chen ma rnams thams cad gshegs/ /'jigs pa'i sgra dang cher gtum dang / /kha nas 'od zer stong phrag ni/ /mthong ba dang ni thos pa na/ mtshan mar yang ni shes par bya/ /de nas de yis ar+g+ha sbyin/ /ci bder bzhes shig 'jigs mdzad ma/ /gdug pa

chen po gsol bar mdzod/ /gdug gtum 'jigs par byed pa yis/ /de nas bdag la dbang bskur te/ /thod par gnas pa'i ro yis ni/ /srang tsam gyis ni sha zos nas/ /ma mo thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /de nas mngon spyod las rnams kun/ /dam tshig

bsrung ba yis ni bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang / /bla ma rnams la 'khyal smra ba/ /rtag tu gsod par lha mo rnams/ /bgyid par bdag ni rjes su gzung / /de nas cho ga de nyid kyis/ /slob ma'i dam pa gzhug par bya/ /khro bo'i lha la bskul nas su/ /

me tog dmar po dor bar bya/ /bdag gi me tog dam pa 'di/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /bdug pa 'di ni bzung nas su/ /gsol byed 'di ni gsol bar mdzod/ /lha mo gang la lhung gyur pa/ /de yis de la mchog gsol lo/ /de nas dbang bskrur byin

nas su/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun bzhag ste/ /thod pa ru ni gnas pa yi/ /khrag gis dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /de nas sgo ru bos nas su/ /dam tshig 'bad pas 'dzin du gzhug /rab tu gdug pa'i snying gi khrag /bzang po 'di ni 'thung zhig bu/ /zo shig zo shig

sha chen po/ /btung ba 'jigs pa chen po 'thung / /gzhan du na ni 'chi 'gyur te/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang gza' rnams dang / /gnod sbyin srin po gtum po yi/ /ring por mi thogs rab tu za/ /de nas mngon spyod las rnams ni/ /stong phrag dag ni bslab par

bya/ /de yi sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /rang nyid khro bor bzung gyur pas/ /gnod byed thams cad gsad par bya/ /dgra rnams thams cad bza' bar bya/ /gdug pa thams cad bca' bar bya/ /srin po thams cad gzhom par bya/ /mtha' yas zhal ma'i sbyor ba

yis/ /gsad dang gzung ba de yis bya/ /zhal bzhi ma yi sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad 'gugs pa'i dam pa'ang yin/ /mkha' gdong ma yis thams cad du/ /rin po che yi tshogs 'byung ngo / /pad+ma'i zhal gyi sbyor ba yis/ /chang gi dam pa btung bar bya/ /ma

bcom ma yi sbyor ba yis/ /sha ni 'gugs pa'i mchog yin no/ /nam mkha' rengs pa chen po ste/ /dmag dpung 'byor pa'i dam pa'o/ /rmugs dang rmongs pa thams cad du/ /dpyad pa ru ni mi bya'o/ /sngar bshad pa yi las rnams dang / /ma bshad

pa la ci 'dod pa/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis kun bya ste/ /thams cad du ni the tshom med/ /dur khrod kyi ni thal ba la/ /dgra bo'i gzugs ni 'bad pas bya/ /ming dang spel bar byas nas su/ /ma mo'i ral gris gtub par bya/ /de nas nyi ma bdun na ni/ /brlag par

'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /gang lus ji ltar bcad gyur pa/ /de dang de yi yan lag 'chad/ /zhal bzhi ma yi sbyor ba yis/ /sngags pa mnyam par bzhag pas bcad/ /de yi mgrin par zhags pa ni/ /mkhas pas spros te bcing bar bya/ /lcags kyus snying gar

phug nas su/ /rlung gis bskyod de drang bar bya/ /de nas de yi ming bskul nas/ /de ni shes rab ldan pas dgug /dman dang mchog gi dbye ba yis/ /'di yi 'bras bu nga yis bshad/ /mdor bsdus pas ni shes par bya/ /sngags pa'i rgyal po'i sbyor ba

yis/ /zhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni/ de yis dngos grub gsol mi 'gyur/ /nye bar 'tshe ba 'jigs rnams dang / /gdon dang gnod sbyin srin por bcas/ /mi bzad nad kyis btab nas su/ /

shi nas mnar med nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas de bzhin dbang bskur gyi/ /dkyil 'khor la bzhag yum rnams kyis/ /dbang bskur gsang ba'i dam tshig sbyin/ /gsang ba'i sgrub thabs nyan du gzhug /rang yum ma mo'i sa bon gyis/ /rang gi rnam rtog bdag

yum min/ /lta bus yab gyur bsgrubs na ni/ /nyi ma bdun na rab tu 'grub/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yab ston pa/ /kun mkhyen ye shes spyod yul te/ /drag po kun dang bde chen po/ /ye shes kun gyi mchog gi mchog /shes rab kyis ni thams cad bsgrub/ /

las rgyas pa yi dam pa'i mchog /bye brag tu ni bskul nas su/ /byang chub kyi ni yon tan gyi/ /thams cad du ni 'od gsal ba'i/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /shes rab kyi ni las dbye bas/ /gzugs dang dbyibs nyid dag gis so/ /phyag

rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i lan/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang / /bza' ba dang ni nyer spyod pa/ /gtor ma lha bshos nyid dang ni/ /shin tu bde ba'i stan nyid dang / /de dang de ni nges par sbyar/ /bzlas dang bsam gtan sa bon ni/ /rang gi lus khyab pa nyid do/ /gsang

sngags dag ni thams cad las/ /gsang sngags 'di ni rab tu bsngags/ /tshe 'dir dam pa'i rjes grub cing / /gdon mi za bar thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni bcom ldan kun rdo rje/ /ye shes 'byung gnas mnga' bdag gsungs/ /las kun gyi ni sbyor ba yis/ /'di ni sgyu

mas 'gro la bzhugs/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes mchog tu dge/ /ye shes chen pos gsung du gsol/ /gang gis mngon par rgyas btab kun/ /mnga' bdag

dus mi ring bar 'grub/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang ting nge 'dzin rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /phyag rgya rtags su yang dag bshad/ /tha snyad tsam du rnam par btags/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis kla klo'i skad/ /

phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bshad/ /'on kyang mgon po mchog gis brtags/ /lag pa'i rnam dgod mtshan ma nyid/ /gang gis yid ches legs skye rnams/ /dam tshig shes pa'i lha rnams ni/ /sgrub po rnams kyis rab bskul na/ /grub pa'i dam pa rab tu

stsol/ /dus las thams cad byon nas su/ /slar yang gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /lag pa zla ba nyi mar bya/ /shes rab thabs su rab tu brtag /de nas sngags pas yongs su sbyar/ /rang gi sa bon dag gis mtshan/ /oM pradz+nyo pA ya sa mA yo ga/ /de nas thal

mo nges par sbyar/ /phan tshun rjes su rtogs chen po/ /khu tshur shin tu gzhag par bya/ /khu tshur bsdams pa lta bur bcing / /so so ru ni sbyor bar bya/ /snying gi dbus su nges par bzung / /g.yon pa'i steng du lag pa g.yas/ /bzhag ste sor mo so sor bya/ /

lag g.yas bsgreng nas phyogs kun tu/ /'khor lo'i sbyor bas spro bar bya/ /rdo rje sgo lcags lta bur bskum/ /sor mo thams cad rtsibs su bya/ /oM sarba d+harma tsakra sa mA ye/ de bzhin g.yon pa yongs su spro/ /sor mo rtsibs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /shes rab steng du

bsgreng bar bya/ /g.yas pa yang ni de bzhin no/ /rtse mo cung zad sbyar bar bya/ /chos kyi las ni chen po byed/ /de nyid mnyam du bskums pa ni/ /las kyi phyag rgya zhes su grags/ /de bzhin ming med byas nas su/ /lhag ma rnams ni gdong du sbyar/ /phyag rgya chen

po shin tu ni/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu gsol/ /phyag rgya 'di rnams bsdams nas ni/ /rang nyid shes rab bdag por 'gyur/ /kun tu bzang po rgyal po che/ /lha dang lha min bcas pas mchod/ /ce'o/ /de nas ma mo de rnams kun/ /slar yang gtso bo

la bstod nas/ /shes rab chen po rnam bzhi yi/ /phyag rgya zhu ba rnam par byas/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi rab kyi mchog /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol cig /gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i yal ga mchog /shes rab thabs kyi lus bzang ba/ /gang zhig gsang ba'i rnal 'byor ni/ /gang gis

rnal 'byor pa bde ba/ /rdzu 'phrul 'phel dang yang dag pa'i/ /rdzu 'phrul skye ba 'dir rnyed pa/ /bcom ldan ston pas bka' stsal pa/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya rgyal ba'i gzhi/ /gang gis myur du sgrub po kun/ /rab tu bde bar gnas

pas 'grub/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /mnyes te gsang ba'i dam pa gsungs/ /phyag rgya'i pha rol phyin pa rnams/ /bde ba chen po rab tu bsgrub/ /rdo rje thal mo dam par bsdams/ /rdo rje dbus su gzhag par bya/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig ces su bsgrags/ /

gsang ba'i rnal 'byor rab tu sgrub/ /de nyid rdo rje lta bur bya/ /bskyod pas bde ba skyed par byed/ /'di ni chos 'dzin zhes bya ba'i/ /phyag rgya gsang ba sgrub pa'o/ /g.yon par thabs ni bskums nas su/ /bskyod pas bde ba 'gugs par byed/ /dag pa'i las

zhes rab tu grags/ /bde ba thams cad rab stsol byed/ /de nyid kha dang rkan la ni/ /sbyar ba chen mo zhes su bshad/ /rdo rje phan tshun yang dag sbyar/ /lcags kyu'i kha ni bskyod par bya/ /kha ni phan tshun yongs sbyar ba/ /gsang ba'i zhags pa zhes su grags/ /

de bzhin bskum par byas nas su/ /dam du bsdams te bcing bar bya/ /'di ni gsang ba bsdams pa'i rgya/ /ye shes bsdams pa rab tu 'grub/ /thams cad rdo rje ltar rdo rje/ /de bzhin bskyod cing bskor bar bya/ /de 'di gsang ba rab tshim pa/ /tshim pa'i

don ni ster bar byed/ /lhag ma phyag rgya chen po ru/ /shes bya phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa'o/ /de nyid las kyi phyag rgya mchog /las kyi dbye bas sbyar bar bya/ /zhes so/ /de nas ma mo de rnams kun/ /yid ni tshim zhing mgu ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpar mtshan

yangs pa'i/ /legs so ba ni nges par phul/ /legs so legs so gsang chen po/ /legs so legs so mchod chen po/ /legs so legs so rnal 'byor che/ /legs so legs so rab tshim mdzad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma rnams dang de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyis dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor zhu ba bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ sangs rgyas rang bzhin khyod la 'dud/ /spyod pa'i rin chen khyod la 'dud/ /dam pa'i rgyur gyur khyod la 'dud/ /sna tshogs mdzad pa khyod la 'dud/ /

dpa' bo 'dul ba khyod la 'dud/ /gsang ba'i chos ldan khyod la 'dud/ /zhi ba'i thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /mgon po khyod la bdag cag zhu/ /bdag gis dkyil 'khor zhu ba'i phyir/ /mnga' bdag rgyal dang sems can rnams/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje btsun mo'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas su/ /dbus su pha rol phyin ma dgod/ /d+hI zhes bya ba shes rab can/ /thabs dang ldan pas gsal byas pa/ /'di yis sngags pa 'jigs

med par/ /zla ba phyed kyis nges par 'gyur/ /rig pa 'di yis de yi ni/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa dang / /dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba dang / /tshim dang 'phrog dang 'bras chen po/ /zhi bas zhi ba zhes su bshad/ /brnyes ma zhes pas rgyas par bshad/ /

dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba la/ /byed ma'o dbang la drag mo yin/ /sha yi mtha' ru bdud gsod ma/ /gsod pa dang ni spel bar bya/ /'gro ba dang ni yang dag ldan/ /sor mo zhags pas dkri bar bya/ /thams cad du ni drag po dgug /drag po drag po'i go

'phang gnas/ /'di yi cho ga ldan pa yis/ /las kyi tshogs kyi mchog kun bya/ /sems la rnal 'byor legs bsams te/ /brgyad brgya kho na bzlas pa yis/ /dbang bcas nyid dam dbang chen po/ /stobs kyis mgo bo mnan nas su/ /ma mo'i tshogs

kun de yis bzla/ /dus mi ring bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzi brjid chen pos bka' bzhin du/ /mgo bos nye bar phyag 'tshal te/ /'di yi ma mo thams cad kun/ /gzi brjid kyi ni gzi ldan pa/ /sngags kyi rgyal po 'od ldan pas/ /

ji lta ba bzhin du/ /dpe zla med pa'i dngos grub byed/ /grub pa'i lam la rab tu gnas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa yis/ /'di ni ston pa chen pos gsungs/ /ma skyes skye ba med la bzhugs/ /rtag pa ston pa thams cad

pa/ /nam mkha' nyi zla dri ma med/ /de dag thams cad rab dga' ste/ /dngos po spangs pa'i btsun mo yis/ /gar dang glu dang sil snyan mchog /bzhad dang sgeg pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bud med sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul dang / /gling bu pi bang rdza rnga sogs/ /ting ting

shag dang dung sgra dang / /ro dang reg pa dri chen po/ /gzugs dang sgra sogs bde ldan pas/ /dpa' chen la ni mchod byas nas/ /snyems dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te/ /slar yang mgon po la gsol btab/ /rdo rje btsun mo'i dkyil 'khor rnams/ /mgon

po ci yi phyir mi gsung / /yab rnams kyi ni thams cad dang / /yum rnams kyi ni mdor bsdus pa/ /mchod pa yang ni thams cad de/ /bran bcas pho nya pho nya mo/ /'jig rten pa ni mtha' dag gi/ /gtso bo chen pos gsung du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gnyis su med pa rnam par 'phrul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de dag nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la gzhug pa dang / dgug pa dang / bcing ba dang /

mnyes par bya ste/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gnyis su med pa bsgyings pa dang ldan pa la mnyam par bzhag ste bzhugs so/ /de nas yang bde ba yongs su skyes pa rab tu dgyes pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad lhan cig bskyod pa dang bcas pa bran dang bcas pas

de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /mgon po dbang phyug rdo rje sems/ /rdo rje snang ba mdzes pa'i sku/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /dpa' bo chen pos gsung du gsol/ /gang gis rgyal ba kun bskyed pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa dkyil 'khor chen po'i mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /zhu ba rab tu zhus pa ni/ /gang phyir

nga la dngos med kyang / /zhu ba zhus pa thams cad thos/ /gsang ba chen po'i smon lam dang / /de bzhin snying rje'i pha rol phyin/ /dran pa med las dran pa yang / /dran 'gyur dran po bzhin gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen po/ /shes rab pha

rol phyin dge ba/ /chos dang chos min rnam par spangs/ /brjod du med pa bshad par bya/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag nyid de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po bka' stsal pa'i phyir

slar yang glu'i dbyangs 'dis zhu ba zhus pa/ chos dbyings mi g.yo bde la legs bzhugs dam pa'i thugs/ /phyogs bcu mtha' yas sangs rgyas kyis zhabs legs btud pa/ /bde mchog lha yi lha ste sa dbang 'jig rten bla/ /dkyil 'khor bde ba mchog la

bzhugs gsol bde chen gyi/ /sa gnyis gtsug gis phyag byas bde ldan pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyis/ /rnam pa kun tu gar mdzad sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa gsungs shig kye/ 'gro kun phan dgongs rab tu bzhugs gsol mchod pa chen po kye/ /cha lugs

rnam pa du mas 'gro kun 'dul mdzad kun gyi dam pa kye/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab cing bskul ba'i tshig nyid kyi thugs la bzhag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor bsgyur ba chen po rab

tu tshim pa bde ba la longs spyod pa rnam par bsgyings pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs te/ bde ba chen po 'khor los sgyur ba la rab tu gnas nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang

thugs rdo rje rnams las rab tu phyung ngo / /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ /de yi lte bar 'di dgod do/ /rdo rje chen po bsam gtan pa/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug dag dang ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yab/ /kun gyi thog mthar rab byung ba/ /de la

sogs pa'i rim pa yis/ /thams cad kun tu brtag par bya/ /pad+ma'i lo ma rtsibs la ni/ /rang gi chos dang rab tu spel/ /ma mo rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /mchod pa la sogs rab tu brtag /sgo ru sgo ba yongs su brtag /sgo yi phyi ru sgo skyong ba/ /btsun

mo lhan cig spyod bcas pa/ /kun nas lha rnams gzhag par bya/ /de nas rang gi sa bon gyis/ /klu dang gnod sbyin 'phar ma gzhan/ /dri za rnams dang mi'am ci/ /lha min mkha' lding de bzhin no/ /'jig rten skyong ba thams cad ni/ /sgo ru gnyis gnyis

gzhag par bya/ /gdon dang dug dang rims dang nad/ /sha za srin po dang / /dmyal ba brgyad po phyogs brgyad kyi/ /'khor lo'i phyi ru gzhag par bya/ /de nas 'khor lo'i mu khyud bri/ /chen po rin chen bdun rang bzhin/ /de yi sgo ru bri bya ba/ /shar

du 'dod chags skye gnas lag /zhe sdang drag po lus gnag pa/ /byang du legs par bri bar bya/ /gti mug nub tu bri bar bya/ /lho rung rgyal nyid yin no/ /sog le dang ni gos nag po/ /de bzhin dbyug gu 'jigs chen po/ /'di rnams phyag rgyar brtags

pa'o/ /de nas ji lta ba bzhin 'jug /de nas gsang ba rdo rje'i phyag rgya nges par bcings pa'i lag par gyur pas rang gi dam tshig rjes su dran pas phyag rgya de nyid kyis 'gugs pa'i rnam pa dang rdo rje'i glu 'dis bskul te dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o/ /

'dir gshegs 'dir gshegs sangs rgyas zhal ras sangs rgyas dpal/ /bde bar gshegs pa yum dang bcas pa mtha' dag gis bskor te/ /'dir gshegs 'dir gshegs pad+ma'i spyan ras pad las 'khrungs/ /dam tshig rnam dag rnams kyi dpa' bo dam

pa'i phyag /glu dbyangs rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje'i blo gros nges par bskul/ /byon 'gyur song shig song shig ces/ /'khod cig 'khod cig 'khod par bya/ /tshim zhing tshim la rab tu tshim/ /zhugs shig zhugs shig 'jug par bya/ /kwa kye zhes brjod

bskul ba yis/ /sa la gnas kun rab tu 'bebs/ /de nas me tog dor bar bya/ /bcom ldan bde bar bzhes su gsol/ /lha dbang gang la lhung 'gyur bzung / /de yi sgrub thabs brtsam par bya/ /yang na yid la gang 'dod pa'i/ /sgrub byed sgrub po dam pas

byed/ /de nyid du ni dbang bskur ba/ /rnal 'byor pa ni mkhas pas blang / /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /dar la sogs pas gdong g.yogs te/ /phyag rgya bcings pa'i lag bzang pos/ /de bzhin du ni me tog

dor/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM bdag gis brjod/ /me tog gang la lhung gyur pa/ /de yi sbyor bas dbang bskur bya/ /yang na gang 'dod rnal 'byor gyis/ /sbyor ba bsgoms te dbang bskrur bya/ /yang na bdag po'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /gal te de ni sbyor ldan 'gyur/ /gdugs

dang rgyal mtshan bla re sogs/ /b+h+r-ing ga ra yi bum pa dang / /rnga yab rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /seng ge'i khri ni bzang po dang / /gser dang dngul gyi dbyug gu dang / /rin chen dbyug gu du ma ni/ /dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bzhag /dbang bskur spro ba chen

po yis/ /de yi stan la bzhag nas su/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas dbang bskur ro/ /dbang bskur ji ltar rigs pa yis/ /gsang ba'i sbyor bas dbang bskur ro/ /thog mar sdom pa ldan pa yis/ /de ni dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug /'dir ni nga yi dam tshig zung / /

phyi dang gsang ba rnam pa bzhi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rab gsal byed/ /gdug pa thams cad gsad par bya/ /'jungs pa rnams kyi nor dbrog bya/ /lta ba ngan la du smra/ /srog chags gsod la smra bar

bya/ gzhan gyi bud med mngon bgrod par/ /ci bde bar ni phrogs shig bu/ /gzhan rdzas 'phrog par byed rnams dang / /dkon mchog gsum la 'gal byed pa/ /gsad dang gzhom par bya ba dang / /de bzhin khrag rnams btung ba ru/ /'bad pa yis ni

thams cad byos/ /dam tshig rnam pa gsum po yis/ /de nas yon ni phul nas su/ /bla ma la ni gus pa yis/ /zhabs la mgo bos nges gtugs te/ /rang lus rgyal po'i longs spyod dang / /chung ma'am yang na bu mo dang / /bu rnams dang ni bran nyid dang / /

sring mo sring mo'i bu mo dang / /ma dang rang gi mna' ma dang / /grong dang yul gyi longs spyod dang / /shing rta 'gro dang glang po dang / /rnam par bkra ba'i rta rnams dang / /nor gyis gang ba'i grong rnams dang / /ba lang ma he ra rnams dang / /lug rgod rnams dang gzhan

rnams dang / /rnga mo mdzes ma'i rnga mo mo/ /gzhan yang gzhan yang gang 'dod pa/ /ji ltar rigs pas mchod par bya/ /rim bzhin rang gi slob ma'i tshogs/ /mgon po mchod nas gshegs su gsol/ /gang gzhan rdo rje spun la yang / /de nas sgrub thabs

dam pa bslab/ /srog dang thur sel sbyor ba yis/ /sems kyi brtan pa nyid du bya/ /zla ba nya ba lta bur dgang / /cha shas dag ni bcu drug kyang / /de yi dbus su rnam bsam pa/ /gtso chen 'dod pa'i dbang phyug go/ /mdor bsdus nas ni spro bar bya/ /brtul

zhugs can gyis rang lus bsam/ /bdag nyid 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rgyal/ /'dod pa'i zil gyis mnan nas su/ /rnal 'byor can bdag dpal ldan 'grub/ /lha dbang bcas pas phyag 'tshal zhing / /nad dang mya ngan 'jigs pa sel/ /rga dang 'chi ba rnam par

spangs/ /zla ba gcig tsam bzlas pa yis/ /dpa' bos las kun byed par 'gyur/ /zhi dang rgyas dang de bzhin dbang / /drag shul spyod pa'i rim pa yis/ /dgug dang dbab pa'i las rnams ni/ /skad cig tsam zhig bskul ba yis/ /sngags pas thams

cad byed par 'gyur/ /sngags kyi sbyor bas sngags zlos pas/ /'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor gsung / /yan lag lnga las skyes pa gzung / /'byung po'i nyi ma mtshan mo gung / /lcags gsum gyis ni dkris byas la/ /rang gi kha ru gzhug par bya/ /

bdag nyid rnal 'byor ldan pas bzlas/ /de ni nang par mthong mi 'gyur/ /lhar bcas grub pa'i sems can gyis/ /thams cad rnam pa kun tu'o/ /bskal par gnas shing shes rab che/ /bstan bcos thams cad rab tu mkhas/ /gzugs dang lang tsho phun

sum tshogs/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i mnga' bdag 'gyur/ /bcu bzhi'i nyin par shi ba yi/ /rdol pa'i g.yon gyi rtsib logs ni/ /sbyor bas bzung ste 'phur 'gro mi/ /gzugs brnyan lag pa bzhi pa bya/ /zhags pa lcags kyu rtse gsum mtshan/ /g.yon par

thod pa 'dzin pa po/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /spyan gsum rnam par gtsigs pa po/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can/ /gtum ldan sta zur chen po pa/ /'jigs pa chen po'i dur khrod du/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas de bzhag ste/ /cho ga ji bzhin

mchod par bya/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can/ /khrag dang sha dang mar khu yis/ /de nas lha mo de 'grub bo/ /mtshan ma yang ni blta bar bya/ /mtshan ma yis ni dngos grub che/ /dus mi ring bar bzang po 'thob/ /

dman pas dman pa'i dngos grub ste/ /bar ma yis ni bar ma'o/ /mtshan ma med na chung ngu ni/ /rab tu 'grub par dpyad mi dgos/ /lha min bzang po dgug par bya/ /mi dang mda' ni bskul ba yis/ /de yi skad cig nyid la byed/ /khrag nyid kyis ni bris pa yi/ /

dbang du bya ba'ang 'di nyid kyis/ /de bzhin bud med thams cad dgug /'grub pa'i rdzas kyang ming nyid kyis/ /dgug pa'i sbyor bas dgug par bya/ /dmag dpung rnam par bzlog pa ni/ /rgyal mtshan rtse mor rnam gzhag go/ /rengs dang rmugs par

byed pa dang / /rmongs dang 'ching ba de bzhin du/ /gyib dang gsad pa thams cad ni/ /cho ga dag dang ldan pas byed/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams dang yab rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor

gyi zhu ba chen po 'di zhus pa dang / gang la bzhugs nas rgyal ba kun/ /yum dang yab rnams de bzhin du/ /de yi sbyor bas sbyor bdag nyid/ /sems can rnams ni snod du mdzod/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rnam dbye ba/ /gang

gis ma 'ongs mi rnams ni/ /bde bas sangs rgyas nyid la 'jog /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /'dzum dang bcas pa'i spyan rgyas pa/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa/ /gang phyir bdag nyid dkyil 'khor bshad/ /sems

can dag pa'i rdo rje can/ /bdag nyid gsang ba'i rgyan zhes bya/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags nyid de/ /bdag nyid rig sngags dam tshig kyang / /gang phyir bdag nyid sdom pa ste/ /bdag nyid bshad dang 'chad pa'o/ /pha dang ma rnams de bzhin te/ /dngos grub sgrub po las

kyi mchog /bde dang sdug bsngal khams gsum pa/ /zhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum dang yab rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de phyir gsungs shig bcom ldan 'das/ /bde bar gshegs pas gsung

du gsol/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun gyis/ /phan dang bde ba thob pa'i phyir/ /zhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum dang yab nye bar longs spyod pa rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyid

kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di byung ngo / /sngon bshad cho ga'i rim pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag bris nas su/ /de yi dbus su bdag bsam bya/ /dkar dang dmar dang 'od chen po/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis lus la spras/ /dmar po'i phreng ba gtsug

tor can/ /sna tshogs gos ni legs mnabs pa/ /dmar po'i 'od kyi bla gos can/ /phyag bzang g.yon na dril bu ste/ /bsnyems bcas 'dzum bag ldan pa'i zhal/ /phyag gzhan na ni rdo rje can/ /snying gar rab tu gsor mdzad pa/ /pad+ma rgyas 'dra'i spyan

mnga' ba/ /zhal gyi dkyil 'khor nyi shar mtshungs/ /rdo rje seng ge'i khri la bzhugs/ /dmar po'i gos ni 'phyang ba po/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bri bar bya/ /g.yon du shes rab yongs su bri/ /sngon bshad pa yi gzugs can la/ /g.yas pa'i phyag ni 'phyar

ba'o/ /lho ru sbyin pa chen mo ni/ /phyag rab rin chen stsol ba mo/ /byang du bzod pa chen mo ni/ /byams pa'i ya lad 'dzin pa mo/ /mdun du brtson 'grus chen mo ni/ /rdo rje'i lag pa cher bzang ba/ /shar dang lho yi mtshams su ni/ /bsam gtan pha rol

phyin ma bri/ /bsam gtan phyag can spyan yangs ma/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od bzang ba'o/ /bden bral du ni 'phel ma bri/ /rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgyan/ /nor gyi rgyan ni stong phrag gis/ /sems can mang po bde bar byed/ /smon lam bri bya rlung gi ni/ /

mtshams su yang dag mtshon par bya/ /dbyangs snyan pa yi ngag brjod pas/ /sems can thams cad skul bar byed/ /blo gros ldan pas dbang ldan du/ /thabs kyi ye shes slob pa mo/ /lag pa gnyis kyis gar byed pa/ /sgeg dang dga' bas 'khrugs pa bri/ /

dpa' bos shar sgor bri bya ba/ /shes rab pha rol phyin dge ma/ /ye shes lcags kyu mdzes pa'i phyag /dmar po'i dar gyis mngon par mdzes/ /dbang ni nub kyi sgo ru ni/ /'ching ba'i bdag nyid bri bar bya/ /shin tu byi ru dang mtshungs pa/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog

'dzin pa mo/ /byang gi sgo ru bri bya ba/ /stobs kyi pha rol phyin ma mchog /rgyal ba thams cad mnyes byed pa/ /dril bu bzang po 'khrol ba'i bdag /gshin rje cho 'phrul bri bar bya/ /'bar ba'i sprin gyis yang dag 'khrugs/ /phyag na rdo rje zhags

bkra ba/ /rdo rje'i glog phreng dang mtshungs ma'o/ /nga yi mdun du shes ldan gyis/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug brgyan pa bri/ /pad+ma rA ga'i 'od gsal ba/ /mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /de yi mdun du dkar po bri/ /zla ba'i 'od 'dra grags chen po/ /zla ba shar

ka'i 'od mdzes pa/ /'dzum bag can la gzhon nu'i gzugs/ /rdo rje 'dun pa cher dmar ba/ /mda' lnga dang ni gzhu 'dzin pa/ /skye ba 'joms pa dpa' bo ni/ /lag na 'khor lo gzi brjid mchog /de yi g.yon du bri bya ba/ /dkar dang dmar ba'i 'od chen

po/ /rdo rje dzang sgrogs rgyal po ni/ /dril bu 'khrol ba dang ldan pa/ /de yi rgyab tu bri bar bya/ /gser dang gur gum dang 'dra ba'o/ /lho yi phyogs su bri bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug dpal dang ldan/ /sngon po char sprin dang 'dra ba/ /lag na ral gri rin chen

ldan/ /de mdun dpa' chen 'dod pa yi/ /rgyal po bdag nyid chen po bri/ /'od zer dmar po lag na gzhu/ /rin chen 'bar bas rnam par brgyan/ /de yi lho ru bri bya ba/ /rdo rje rnam par smod pa mchog /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lag pa can/ /rab tu rno ba'i 'bar

ba'i phreng / /rdo rje dam pa 'dul mdzad dpal/ /rdo rje rin chen mchog gi tog /kha dog dkar po cher spro ba/ /gos sngon rnam par 'phyang ba bo/ /rdo rje DA ki'i dbang phyug rigs/ /lag na rin chen shin tu mdzes/ /de yi rgyab tu bri bya ba/ /dgod dang bcas pa'i

bzhin ras mchog /nga yi rgyab tu bri bya ba/ /dri yi dbang phyug dbang phyug che/ /lag na pad+ma snying gar 'chang / /ban du'i me tog rnam pa 'dra/ /de la mngon par phyogs pa yi/ /rdo rje sgrol ba spyan mdzes bri/ /dkar ser bzang po sna tshogs pa/ /lag na ut+pal

sngon po bzang / /de yi g.yon du dag pa yis/ /lag na 'khor lo ches dkar bri/ /sngon pos legs pa'i gnas thob pa/ /mchog tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin ras can/ /lo ma'i rtse mo rgyab tu bri/ /lag na yid bzhin nor bu mchog /kha dog sngo bsangs dpa' chen

po/ /sems dpa' ldan pa'i thugs chen po/ /de yi lho yi cha ru ni/ /chos 'chad mchog ni bri bar bya/ /rgyu mtshan phyag ldan rab dkar ba/ /nyi ma shar ka'i snang ba 'dra/ /nga yi byang du bri bya ba/ /stug po bkod pa grags chen po/ /shin tu ljang ba'i margad

mtshungs/ /las kyi rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa'o/ /de yi mdun du bri bya ba/ /rdo rje skyong ba yid 'phrog bkra/ /bzhad bcas rdo rje'i lag pa can/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /de yi lho ru bri bya ba/ /'gro ba'i rtse mo legs brgyan pa/ /lhang tsher nag

po bung ba 'dra/ /rdo rje'i gsal shing 'dzin pa po/ /rgyab tu rdo rje 'ching ba bri/ /lag pa yang dag sbyar bsdams pa/ /rin chen kun gyi 'od dag cing / /'dzum bcas mchog tu ngo mtshar ba/ /'khor byed g.yon du bri bar bya/ /lag na mgal me'i 'khor lo can/ /

legs sngo dar la bab pa po/ /rab rgyas pad+ma lta bu'i zhal/ /de nas sgo yi cha dag tu/ /sgo ba rnam pa bzhi po bri/ /shar du rdo rje mi g.yo ba/ /lag na rdo rje lcags kyu che/ /lho yi sgo ru rdo rje me/ /lag na rdo rje zhags pa 'bar/ /nub tu rlung ni sngon po ste/ /rdo

rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa'o/ /lus ngan du ni chu bri ste/ /zhags pa ldan pa'i dril bu 'dzin/ /de nas sbyor ldan 'ongs nas su/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni shar du bri/ /shar du mda' yi mtshon cha lag /rab 'bar pad+ma ltar 'bar ba/ /lho ru chen po dbang phyug can/ /

sngon mo dbang phyug rdo rje ma/ /lag na rin chen snye ma can/ /rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgyan/ /rdo rje nyer zhi dkar mdzes ma/ /rgyab tu rtag tu bri bar bya/ /lag na pad+ma bzang po 'dzin/ /pad+ma'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje steng zhal mdzes ma ni/ /sngo bsangs kun

kun gyi yon tan ldan/ /lus ngan du ni shes ldan gyis/ /g.yas su rdo rje rtse gcig bri/ /shar gyi mtshams su rdo rje ni/ /dus tshigs zhes bya bzang mo bri/ /dbyar gyi sprin ltar mdzes pa mo/ /lag na bdug spos grags chen mo/ /nub kyi mtshams su

ri ri ta/ /lag na me tog phreng ba 'bar/ /cung zad dmar la dkar ba mo/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /nub byang du ni bri bya ba/ /lag na yi ge sna tshogs bri/ /lag na sgron me rab dmar ba/ /cung zad sngo ba'i gos gyon pa/ /dri yi glang po ltar 'gying ba'i/ /

rol pa ldan ma mkhas pas bri/ /sngo bsangs dmar po mthon mthing 'dra/ /rab tu dgod cing mig mdzes ma/ /rdo rje'i lag pa mig mdzes ma'o/ /de yi shar du bri bya ba/ /rdo rje mchog gi 'od ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje dbang phyug bde ba ma'o/ /de bzhin lho ru bri bya ba/ /gser

sogs dang ni mthon mthing 'dra/ /rin chen sgron ma rin chen lag /'od mchog ldan pa'i lha mo ni/ /nub kyi dkyil 'khor dag la bri/ /'od kyis snang zhing mdzes pa la/ /lag na 'od zer legs mdzes pa'o/ /rdo rje brang skyes cher bkra ba/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par

brgyan/ /lag na sna tshogs gos ldan pa/ /byang du rtag tu bri bar bya/ /de bzhin sbyor bas bris nas su/ /pho nya mo yang legs par bri/ /snying skul byed pa mdzes ma ni/ /shar du legs par bri bar bya/ /rdo rje myu gu mda' ldan dmar/ /mig gnyis dang ni gos sngon po'o/ /

de dang nye bar dpa' mo ni/ /lag na lcags kyu zhags pa mchog /gdug pa 'gugs pa'i lha mo bri/ /sngo bsangs dmar la legs brjid pa'o/ /rjes su mnyes ma'i pho nya che/ /nub tu rtag tu bri bar bya/ /rgyal ba thams cad mnyes byed ma/ /pags pa'i zhags pas

lag pa mdzes/ /khrag 'gugs pa yi pho nya mo/ /byang du gnas pa bri bar bya/ /mdog gnag pa la cher za ba/ /lag na thod pa legs mdzad pa'o/ /thams cad 'phrog pa'i pho nya mo/ /me yi mtshams su bri bar bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa mchog /dmar

gnag dka' thub chen po ma'o/ /de yi byang du dpa' bo yis/ /sgo skyong stobs chen bri bar bya/ /rdo rje 'bebs ma legs dmar ba/ /lag mthil dril bu dang ldan pa'o/ /dam tshig gsum ldan spyan gsum ma/ /rtse gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa mo/ /'jigs pa'i lus

can cher gsal ma/ /'od zer dmar po 'bar bas 'khrugs/ /'bar ba'i me lce'i lag pa can/ /me yi phyogs su yang dag brten/ /lha mo chen mo thog ma ma/ /lag na rdo rje'i gtsub shing can/ /dmar zhing sngo ba bri bya ste/ /ji lta ba yi rim pas so/ /gdul

dka' 'dul ba'i lha mo ni/ /sgo skyong ba yi gnas na gnas/ /dpa' mo rdo rje dbyug gu'i lag /byin za 'bar ba dang mtshungs ma'o/ /de nas bran mo bri bar bya/ /rang gi phyag rgyas lag pa mtshan/ /'jig rten gsum 'ching bran mo ni/ /nub tu yang dag bri

bar bya/ /'ching ba chen po'i lag pa can/ /rab dmar gur gum 'od zer can/ /bran mo 'jigs pa'i me gdong ma/ /sgron bcas lag pa'i rtse mo mchog /rab gnag pa la lus chen mo/ /cho ga ji bzhin rtag tu bri/ /bran mo gtsigs shing rnam 'gyur gdong / /

'khrug pa'i tshul la rab 'jigs ma/ /lag na thod pa rlon pa can/ /shin tu dmar zhing 'od chen mo/ /sku gsung thugs 'ching bran mo ni/ /shar du yang dag bri bar bya/ /dkar zhing dmar la lus che ba/ /zhags pa lcags kyu'i lag pa mchog /de nas rol

pa mo bri bya/ /ji lta ba bzhin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes ma ni/ /mdzes shing rin chen gyis nyer brgyan/ /mda' gzhu'i lag can dmar ba mo/ /gos dang phreng ba dmar po 'dzin/ /byang du sngags pas bri bya ba/ /kun nas 'bebs ma che ba'i

mchog /mdzes pa'i lag pa 'dzin pa mo/ /bde ba 'bebs la legs par gnas/ /'jig rten gsum 'joms khro mo ni/ /rdo rje rol pa mo zhes bya/ /drag shul chen pos sdigs par byed/ /mnyam par bzhag pas shar du bri/ /rab tu dga' ba rjes rtog ma/ /

sngags pa spro bas rgyab tu bri/ /'dod chags phyag rgya'i lag pa ma/ /'gro ba'i gtso bo mnyes par mdzad/ /dga' byed ces bya bri bar bya/ /thams cad rdo rje rol pa mo/ /dga' bo'i rtse 'jo'i lag can bkra/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ni/ /sngags

pa cho ga shes pas bri/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad legs gnas pas/ /phyi rol rdo rje bri bar bya/ /rang gi rig ma g.yon du gnas/ /dbang por mig gsum bri bar bya/ /rdo rje can gyi rtse gsum 'dzin/ /g.yas pa yis ni phyag 'tshal zhing / /rang gi chung ma sogs pas bskor/ /

chu lhar tshangs pa chen po ni/ /gdong pa bzhi pa bri bar bya/ /sgo ru sgo ba chen po ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu stobs po che/ /kun nas dmar zhing cher gtum pa/ /sangs rgyas mchog tu spyan 'dren pa'o/ /lho ru legs par gnas pa'i mchog /lag na zhags pa dam pa bri/ /

sems dpa' grags pa chen po dang / /sangs rgyas rnams ni 'jug par byed/ /'ching byed drag po chen po ni/ /brtan pa'i rdo rje yang dag bri/ /bal po se'u yi me tog mtshungs/ /rags shing stan las mi g.yo ba'o/ /ne tso khug rta dang mtshungs pa'i/ /mnyes byed

mchog ni bri bar bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed cing / /rig sngags pha rol phyin rnams kyang / /rdo rje dbyug gu'i lag pa mdzes/ /zhi ba sogs kyis yongs su bskor/ /gshin rje 'khor lo'i lag pa ni/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i rdo rjes mtshan/ /ser po'i gos

'dzin gnag pa po/ /mtshon cha sogs pas yongs su bskor/ /lus ngan du ni dbang po bri/ /rdo rje'i lag pa rab tu mdzes/ /de nas mchod pa'i rnam pa bri/ /rdo rje me tog chen po'i gzugs/ /lag na me tog snyim pa mdzes/ /me tog phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /

sngags pas rdo rje bdug pa bri/ /yid sim byed pa'i dam pa ni/ /lag na bdug pa mig yangs ma/ /'khur tshos cung zad dkar ba ma'o/ /lha mo rdo rje snang byed ma/ /gser bsregs pa yi mdog 'dra la/ /lag na sgron ma mkhas pas bri/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis

rnam par brgyan/ /dri zhim lus la cha lugs bzang / /lag na dri yi snod mdzes ma/ /ut+pal sngon po'i lo ma mtshungs/ /mdzes pa'i gzugs la yid 'phrog ma'o/ /gzugs kyi rdo rje mdzes pa'i gzugs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /lag na

rdo rje me long 'dzin/ /'dzum bcas dgod pa'i dkyil 'khor can/ /sgra yi rdo rje sna tshogs lus/ /dkar dang sngo ba'i lus dang ldan/ /pi wang gling bu ting ting sogs/ /sgrogs pa shes rab can gyis bri/ /ro yi rdo rje skal chen mo/ /lag na ro yi snod 'dzin

pa/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje reg bya sngo bsangs che/ /chu skyes sngon po 'dab 'dra'i mig /rnam par gsal zhing cher dgod pa/ /rang gi dpung pa bsdams pa mo/ /bzhad pa'i rdo rje bod bcas pa/ /

rnal 'byor pas ni mdor bsdus te/ /bri bya sna tshogs gos 'dzin dkar/ /rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa ma'o/ /rdo rje sgeg mo dkar mo che/ /sgeg dang bcas shing yid du 'ong / /rked par khu tshur gnyis bzhag cing / /mdzes pa'i phreng ba'i chun po btsugs/ /

rdo rje glu mkhan legs dmar lus/ /glu len pa la rab tu brtson/ /chu skyes dmar po rgyas 'dra'i bzhin/ /glu len lag pa rab tu mdzes/ /rdo rje gar ma mkhas pas bri/ /gar dang bcas pa'i lag pa can/ /sngo bsangs dkar po cher dkar ba/ /mig che ba la 'dzum

bcas mchog /rdo rje sil snyan drag mo che/ /dur du ra yi rnga mdzes rdung / /rdo rje rnga chen lha mo che/ /rnga chen rdung ba bri bar bya/ /rdza rnga ma ni mkhas pas bri/ /rdza rnga rdung bar byed pa mo/ /lha mo mu kuN+Da rdung ma/ /mu kuN+Da ma bzhin mdzes ma'o/ /pa Ta ha ni rdung

byed ma/ /rdo rje pa Ta ha zhes bya/ /rdza rnga chen po rdung byed ma/ /rdo rje rdza rnga mdzes ma bri/ /guny+dza rdung byed dga' ba mo/ /dgod bcas pad+ma'i mig can ma/ /rdo rje guny+dza dpa' bos bri/ /las kun gyi ni dam pa 'grub/ /lag na rdo rje ting ting shag /rdo rje ting ting shag bri

bya/ /lag na rdo rje cang te ma/ /kha dog dkar mo 'od zer che/ /'khar rnga rdung ba'i lag pa can/ /rdo rje 'khar rnga ma bri bya/ /rgyud gcig pi wang sbreng ba bri/ /rdo rje pi wang sbreng ba mo/ /pi wang rgyud gsum sbreng ba'i rgya/ /pi wang rgyud gsum sbreng ba

bri/ /rdo rje 'khar khrol lha mo che/ /dmar po yi ni gos bgos pa'o/ /rdo rje gling bu rnal 'byor pas/ /gling bu 'bud pa ldan pa bri/ /rdo rje pi wang skal chen ma/ /pi wang sbreng la rab spro ba'o/ /rdo rje 'bud dung 'bad pas bri/ /dung dkar 'bud pa'i rang bzhin

can/ /dung ma lag na zangs dung 'dzin/ /'dod pa'i gzugs mchog 'dzin pa mo/ /rgyal ba'i dril bus lag pa mdzes/ /khrol ba yang dag bri bar bya/ /legs spro ba la gzi brjid che/ /rnam par rgyal la spro byed ma'o/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dmar/ /pad+ma

dmar po kha 'byed ma/ /gar gyi sgyu mas rab gnas pa'i/ /lag pa stong ldan bri bar bya/ /rin chen gar ma lha mo che/ /gar gyi bdag nyid legs par bri/ /lag na rin chen snye ma can/ /lag pa du ma gdong brgya pa'o/ /rdo rje gar ma bsnyems bcas ma/ /

lus mchu ba dan dang ldan pa/ /rnal 'byor pas ni cho ga bzhin/ /rdo rje sbyor bas rab gnas bri/ /sna tshogs gar ma skal chen mo/ /rdo rje thal mo spyi bor 'jog /'dzum bcas pa la mig mdzes ma'o/ /sna tshogs sgyu ma legs sems ma/ /smin ma sgyur ba'i mig

mdzes ma/ /spros bcas gdong gi rnam 'gyur can/ /mthong na dga' ma 'dzum pa'i bzhin/ /gdong gi dkyil 'khor sngo bsangs mchog /rdo rje mthong ma skal chen mo/ /rab tu dgod cing mig rgyas ma'o/ /rnal 'byor chen pos bri bya ba/ /rnal 'byor mig gis lta ba mo/ /

rab tu gsal bas 'khrugs pa can/ /'khor lo skor ba ltar byed ma/ /snying gar lag pa 'jog pa ni/ /sdig pa ma lus 'joms par byed/ /rdzi mar bcas pa'i mig gnyis ni/ /steng dang 'og tu 'phags pa yis/ /mthong ba 'gugs byed bde chen gyis/ /sangs

rgyas thams cad dbang du byed/ /sgo ru sgo ba chen po ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu stobs po che/ /thams cad srung zhing cher gtum pa/ /sangs rgyas mchog tu spyan 'dren pa'o/ /sgo ru legs par gnas pa'i mchog /lag na zhags pa dam pa bri/ /sems dpa'

grags pa chen po dang / /sangs rgyas rnams ni 'jug par byed/ /'ching byed drag po chen po ni/ /brtan pa'i rdo rje yang dag bri/ /bal po se'u yi me tog mtshungs/ /rags shing rnam par g.yo ba'i gdong / /ne tso khug rta dang mtshungs pa'i/ /mnyes byed mchog

ni bri bar bya/ /rig sngags pha rol phyin rnams dang / /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed/ /dbang por gzhon nu bri bar bya/ /gshin rjer gshin rje nyid yin no/ /chu lhar chu lha bri bar bya/ /lus ngan po ni byang phyogs su/ /'di dag bsdus te bri bar bya/ /

'khor gyis mdun du bdar ba'o/ /phyi ru dmyal ba brgyad po bri/ /kyang ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad la gnas pa/ /sngags pas cho ga bzhin bris te/ /phyi yi rdo rje bri bar bya/ /rang gi rig ma g.yon du gnas/ /dang por mig gsum legs

par bri/ /rdo rje can gyi rtse gsum 'dzin/ /g.yas pa yis ni phyag 'tshal zhing / /rang gi chung ma sogs pas bskor/ /chu lhar tshangs pa chen po ni/ /gdong pa bzhi pa bri bar bya/ /rdo rje dbyug gu'i lag pa mchog /zhi ba la sogs rnams kyis bskor/ /gshin

rjer 'khor lo'i lag pa can/ /rdo rjes mtshan cing rab tu mdzes/ /ser po'i gos 'dzin gnag pa po/ /dpal mo la sogs rnams kyis bskor/ /lus ngan du ni dbang po bri/ /rdo rje'i lag pa rab tu mdzes/ /mig stong pa ni che ba'i lus/ /bde sogs sogs

kyis mdun du bdar/ /dbang ldan du ni dbang ldan bri/ /me yi phyogs su me lha'o/ /bden bral du ni bden bral grags/ /rlung du rlung lha nyid yin no/ /shar gyi sgo ru dpung bzang bri/ /muN+Da Ta ni nub tu'o/ /lus ngan du ni grub pa bri/ /lho ru bdud rtsi 'khyil

pa'o/ /cho ga 'dis ni sngags shes pas/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po bris nas su/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgug par bya/ /yab yum gtso bo dam pa rnams/ /cho ga ji bzhin sngags pas gzhug /dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bdag /

rdo rje lcags kyu'i lag pa yis/ /cho ga ji bzhin bdag brgyan te/ /rdo rje sems dpar bsnyems byas nas/ /snyems dang bcas pas langs nas su/ /gsang ba'i sems dpa' dbang bskur te/ /'di yis spyan ni myur du drang / /yab dang yum bcas sangs

rgyas sras bcas pa/ /bran dang gnyen bcas nye du dang bcas shing / /dpal mchog rdo rje sems dpa' yongs mnyes pa'i/ /lha dang lha mos legs bskor 'dir gshegs shig /glu 'di yis ni bskul ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon/ /byon

nas dngos grub chen po ni/ /sgrub pa po la stsol bar 'gyur/ /yang na mtshan ma gnang 'gyur te/ /'bab pa'am snang ba blta bar bya/ /gal te bsod nams rab dman na/ /de yis ci yang mthong mi 'gyur/ /de nas slar yang gsol ba gdab/ /yang dang yang du

bskul bar bya/ /lha yi rnal 'byor de nyid kyis/ /nga rgyal yang dang yang byas te/ /mchod pa shin tu chen po bya/ /de nas mchod yon zhabs bsil yang / /gsang ba'i de nyid kyis bskul te/ /sngags kyi de nyid rig pas dbul/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag phyag na

rdo rje ni/ /mdzes pa'i shes rab kyis 'khyud sbyor ldan pas/ /yab yum sras bcas 'khor bcas pho nya sogs/ /bran bcas skye bo'i tshogs kyis bskor nas byon/ /sems can kun la phan dgyes pa/ /khyod la bdag nyid zhu ba bgyid/ /'di ni khyod kyi dus lags

pas/ /sems can don mchog mdzad du gsol/ /gsol ba btab cing bskul bas kyang / /gal te mtshan ma byung gyur na/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /de tshe slob ma 'bad pas bsgom/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i yan lag bcing / /sbyor bas dkyil 'khor nyid du

gzhug /de nas sgo ru mkhas pas bzhag /dam tshig dam pa nyan du gzhug /ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang / /de bzhin bu mo dag kyang ni/ /som nyi rnam par bral sems kyis/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bsten par bya/ /sems can thams cad gsad bya zhing / /

brtul zhugs spyod pa bskyang bar bya/ /'jungs pa rnams kyi nor phrogs te/ /skye bo sdug bsngal can la sbyin/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor mi sbyor bas/ /yang na bdag nyid kyis kyang spyad/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod bya zhing / /bla ma la ni gus par bya/ /gyi

tshig kyang smra mi bya/ /chang ni btung bar mi bya'o/ /dam tshig dus ni ma gtogs shing / /byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig dang / /gzhan yang bde bar bya phyir dang / /slob dpon mnyes par bya don dang / /dkon mchog gsum la phan pa'i phyir/ /rdzun gyi tshig

ni rtag tu smros/ /gzhan gyi bud med bgrod par bya/ /dam tshig don du sbyor ldan pas/ /gzhan pa yang ni thams cad kyang / /sems can don la brtson pas bya/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig 'di dag ni/ /blo gros ldan pas bsgrag mi bya/ /dam tshig ldan pa ma gtogs

pa/ bla ma'i bka' gnang sngags pa yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen po/ /lag na rdo rjes byin brlabs pa/ /gal te rmongs pa'i bdag nyid kyis/ /dam tshig dam pa 'di 'das na/ /rdo rje rdo rje'i mnga' bdag che/ /rgyal po 'dis ni nges par gsod/ /

kun nas 'bar ba'i rdo rje yis/ /lus kyi spyi bo 'gems par 'gyur/ /de nas 'di yis me tog gi/ /phreng ba bzang po dor bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mA tA pi tri~M pa ti ma hA su kha sa man+ta b+ha dra pra tIts+tshi da~M puSh+pany+dza li~M mr-i du dzaHhU~M bo hoHb+ha ga wan ma hA su kha sa man+ta b+ha dra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M

sa ma yo\u0f85 ha~M/ 'di yis bzung ste myur ba ru/ /rdo rje sems dpa' snying rje che/ /de ni blangs te spyi gtsug tu/ /blo gros bzang pos bcing bar bya/ /sngags pa'i rgyal pos sngags 'di yis/ /de nas mig ni rab tu dbye/ /oM badzra dzA na ma ha ne tra ud+d+ha Ta ya ti tsak+Shu Shi/

mgon po chen po ltos shig bu/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po mchog /ye shes chen po kun gyi mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po/ /rim pa ji bzhin legs bstan te/ /dbang bskur phyir ni gsol ba gdab/ /dbang bskur ba ni yid 'ong

ba/ /skal ba chen po bdag la gsol/ /gsang ba yi ni rgyan zhes par/ /rgyal bas gang sngon bka' stsal pa/ /gsang ba'i sbyor de bdag la ni/ /rgyal ba kun dngos stsal du gsol/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor bum pa yis/ /de bzhin dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /

slob ma chen po rnam pa lnga/ /der ni sbyor bas bos nas su/ /gsang ba'i rgyan zhes bya ba yis/ /dngos grub shes pas dbang bskur ro/ /gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i rnam 'phrul gyis/ /der ni mchu yis legs bzung ste/ /lce yi rtse mo mkhas pas sbyar/ /rdo rje'am

yang na chu skyes kyis/ /phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i lan/ /de nas 'dzin ma rnam par sbyin/ /de nyid la yang mkhas pas sbyin/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi sbyor ba yis/ /gsang ba'i bde ba bsgrub par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to/ /de nas yon

ni dbul bar bya/ /bla mar phyag 'tshal mchod byas nas/ /ma dang bu mo nyid dang yang / /sring mo yi ni bu mo dang / /sring mo'am yang na chung ma dang / /rgyal po longs spyod skye bo'i tshogs/ /grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer dang / /nor dang rin chen la sogs dang / /gzhan yang ci dang ci 'dod pa/ /

mkho ba'i longs spyod gus pa yis/ /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ /dngos grub kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /dkyil 'khor pa yang legs par mchod/ /pha dang spun yang mchod par bya/ /de bzhin spun zla'i bu yang mchod/ /bza' btung yid du 'ong ba dang / /gos

dang rgyan dang me tog dang / /de bzhin dri dang bdug pa sogs/ /ji ltar bdog pa thams cad kyis/ /mchod par byas te gtang bar bya/ /lha rnams dag ni thams cad la/ /de bzhin du ni mchod par bya/ /gsang sngags rgyal po gshegs su gsol/ /badzra muHzhes

brjod pas gshegs/ /de nas sngags pas slob ma'i mchog de la/ /gsang ba rnam par 'dzin la gsang ba yi/ /rgyal pos gsal mdzad rgyal ba'i gsang bdag gis/ /gsang ba mtha' dag legs par bslab par bya/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya mig yangs ma/ /blo gros

brtan pas bsgrub par bya/ /rang byin brlab pa'i rim pa yis/ /shes rab kyis ni byin gyis brlab/ /bdag nyid sems dpar legs bsgoms te/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi sbyor ba yis/ /nyi ma bdun gyis legs 'grub par/ /'gyur ba 'di la the tsom med/ /lha mo shes

rab che de yang / /rang nyid rdo rje 'chang gtso ste/ /nam mkha' kun gyi mchog dpa' bo/ /rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug rnal 'byor che/ /bdag nyid 'dod par bsgom pa yis/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod 'grub par 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug gtso

bo ste/ /de yang 'dod pa'i dbang lha mor/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug kun/ /bran dang 'dra bar 'khol bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor yid 'ong bar/ /mkha' 'gro'i sa bon bsgom par bya/ /de ni sbyor bas spros nas

su/ /rang gi snying gar gzhug par bya/ /bcug nas rin chen chen po ni/ /srid pa 'joms par bsgom par bya/ /yid bzhin rin chen rang bzhin mdzes/ /nyi ma bdun na de 'gyur ro/ /'dam skyes dmar po'i dbus su ni/ /'bad pas kun nas dri yis dgang / /dri yi

dbang phyug rgyal po che/ /bdag nyid sems dpa' yid ches bsgom/ /de nas myur du blo ldan te/ /dri za'i bdag po'i bdag por 'gyur/ /dri yis myur ba nyid du ni/ /brtan dang g.yo ba'i dug 'gugs byed/ /don yod kyi ni dkyil 'khor du/ /snying po snying gi sbyor ba

bsam/ /yid la bsams pa'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /de yi phyag rgya'ang de dang mtshungs/ /rin chen gyi yang rin chen che/ /rin chen gyi ni mig 'od gsal/ /de bzhin dri dang ldan pa ni/ /sgrub pa po yis 'grub par 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa'i dbye ba yis/ /lha

gzhan dag kyang rig par bya/ /dkyil 'khor ram ni dam tshig kyang / /bsgoms pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /rig sngags kyi yang sbyor ba yis/ /de rnams kyis ni de nyid ni/ /bsgoms na myur du nges par

'grub/ /'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor can/ /gsang ba rgyan bdag dam pas gsungs/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi mchog gi mchog /phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang / yum de rnams kyis

gsol pa/ myur du sbyor ba mchog bsgrubs pas/ /sgrub pa pos ni ji ltar 'grub/ /de dag thams cad myur du gsungs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang bdag gis/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /rig sngags kyang ni legs par sgrub/ /btsun mo mchog gi

gnas dbang phyug /dpa' bo chen pos gsung du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi yab dang yum rnams kyi zhu ba'i tshig rdo rje 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las rnam par phyung ngo / /lha rnams kyi ni snying po dang / /sngags dang phyag rgya de bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor du ni legs par bshad/ /ji ltar sngon du kha dog sogs/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung du gsol/ /sems can rnams la phan bde'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor ma yi phyag rgya dang / /mtshan ma la sogs dam pa rnams/ /de nas bcom ldan kun tu bzang / /rdo

rje dam pa gsor mdzad nas/ /lag pa'i mtshan ma bka' stsal pa/ /gang gis lha rnams mtshon 'gyur ba'o/ /lag pa zla ba nyi ma ru/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsam par bya/ /shes rab thabs kyi sa bon ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu spro/ /slar yang sdud pa'i sbyor ba

yis/ /rdo rje pad+mar rnam bsam bya/ /de nas shes rab pha rol phyin/ /sor mo'i rtse rmor dgod par bya/ /de nyid sbyor bas bsdus nas su/ /phan tshun nges par sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar ba'i/ /bde ba myangs pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /'ching ba chen pos

bcings nas su/ /lha mo'i sa bon gyis mtshan pa'i/ /gsang sngags rgyal po sngags rig pas/ /yang dang yang du byin gyis brlab/ /bcangs te 'od ldan rnam pa gnyis/ /brkyangs nas rtse mo sbyar bar bya/ /de 'di snying po zhes bya ba'o/ /gnyis pa grags pa

ldan pa yin/ /snying po yis ni mtshan byas nas/ /rim gyis snying gar bskor bar bya/ /rdo rje mnyam par sbyar byas te/ /der ni bcings pa gzhug par bya/ /'di ni dam tshig nges bya ste/ /dam tshig ma lus sgrub par byed/ /'di yis lha mo mtha' yas zhal/ /

thams cad du ni nges par 'grub/ /de nyid bsdigs pa lta bur sbyar/ /las kun byed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje gnyis ni pad+ma yi/ /sbyor bar bstan pa mchog tu rmad/ /de las phyi rol bskums pa ni/ /gsum pa ru ni 'gyur ba yin/ /snying ga ru ni snying po

bsam/ /snying dga' byed pa zhes byar brjod/ /rdo rje gnyis po de bzhin sbyar/ /dam tshig bdag byed nyid du 'gyur/ /de nyid kun gyi 'byung gnas gsal/ /chen po'i las ni byed par 'gyur/ /de nyid mdzod spur sbyar ba'i brjid/ /phyag rgya bdag nyid chen por 'gyur/ /

de nyid chu skyes rnam pa ru/ /snying gar bzhag pa snying po mchog /de bzhin rdo rje mnyam sbyar ba/ /dam tshig bdag nyid dag tu 'gyur/ /snying gar kun bsdigs sbyor ba yis/ /rab rgyas pa yi bzhin ras mchog /bsnyems pa byed pa thams cad kyang / /'dis ni las

byed 'grub pa yin/ /de nyid kha ru sbyar bas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po rab tu 'grub/ /de nyid 'od ldan rtse mo ni/ /thur du bstan te snying gar gzhag /'di ni 'gyur ba med pa yi/ /snying po'i snying po'i chos sgrub byed/ /de nyid snying gar yongs su bskor/ /snying gi dkyil 'khor

nyid du bzung / /'di ni dam tshig dngos grub che/ /bdag nyid chen pos bslab par bya/ /las kyi rdo rje mnyes pa yis/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub byed/ /dbab dang 'khor ba nyid dang ni/ /gar byed chen po de bzhin du/ /de bzhin thal mo sbyar

nas su/ /snying gar bzhag pa snying por bshad/ /spyi bor bskor bar byas pa ni/ /dam tshig ces bya bdag nyid che/ /steng du bsdigs pa las su 'gyur/ /mchod pa ma lus rab sgrub byed/ /snying po la sogs 'og tu gzung / /chos la sogs par yongs su

brtag /de nyid brkyang ste snying gar bzhag /snying po zhes su legs par bshad/ /bskor ba dam tshig zhes bya ste/ /las kyang thams cad de bzhin no/ /de las thal mo rdo rje gnyis/ /steng bsgreng snying po la sogs bzhin/ /sngon bshad lha mo thams cad kyi/ /

gsang sngags rig par shes par bya/ /gnyis su byas la g.yas min pas/ /bsgrub bya'i mgrin pa bzung nas su/ /mngon par phyogs te gzhag par bya/ /gzugs kyi snying po ches che ba'o/ /de nyid kha yi phyogs bzhag pa/ /sgra yi snying po yid 'phrog pa'o/ /de

nyid cung zad bskums nas su/ /lce yi rnam pas kha ru gzhag /ro myang ba yi sbyor ba yis/ /de nyid la yang rnam pa bzhi/ /phyag rgya sngags pas shes par bya/ /ro 'phrog pa yi las rnams so/ /de ni gnyis su byas nas su/ /g.yas pa'am ni g.yon pa yis/ /

snying gar legs sbyar sbyor bdag gis/ /reg pa'i phyag rgya ngo mtshar che/ /'di yis chos dang dam tshig dang / /las kyang rab tu skye ba yin/ /cho ga shes pas rnal 'byor sbyar/ /reg pas 'bebs pa'i mchog yin no/ /de bzhin sbyar ba so sor bya/ /g.yon pa rked par

gzhag par bya/ /g.yas pa kha yi phyogs su bzung / /khro bo'i tshul gyis de bzhin du/ /'di ni bzhad ldan zhes bya ba'i/ /phyag rgya mchog tu rmad byung ba'o/ /de'am bkrol te snga ma bzhin/ /rked pa ru ni legs par gzhag /de las langs te slar yang khar/ /mkhas

pas dal gyis bskyod par bya/ /de gnyis snying gar yongs su sbyar/ /bsnyems pas sdud dang 'gyed par bya/ /ji srid spyi bor gtugs pa yis/ /chos dang la sogs kun tu 'gyur/ /snying po la sogs sngags rig pas/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na/ /
