dngos grub thams cad thob 'gyur te/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' bzhin no/ /thal mo mnyam por legs par sbyar/ /g.yon pa'i steng du de bzhin gzhan/ /de dag snying gar bsgreng bar bya/ /de ni phan tshun shes rab yin/ /sngags pa chen pos sbyar bar bya/ /gzhan

ni sbyor bas rnam par spro/ /'di ni chos kyi pha rol tu/ /'gro ba'i chos kyi mchog tu bshad/ /de bzhin thal mo mnyam por sbyar/ /snying gar g.yon par gzhag par bya/ /'od ldan rdo rje'i gdong pa dang / /mdor bsdus nas ni sbyar nas su/ /g.yas pa thur du

'phyang bar bya/ /de bzhin steng bstan mchog sbyin no/ /me tog snyim pa yang dag sbyar/ /rdo rje gnyis ni dbus su bzhag /bzod pa gnyis po de la sbyar/ /sbyin pa dag ni phyi ru bskum/ /de ni steng du legs par bzhag /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yid

bzhin rgyal po'i 'bras bu ster/ /de ni sbyor bas so sor bya/ /g.yon pa snying gar yongs su bzhag /g.yas pa spro ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /yongs su bskor zhing bskor nas su/ /g.yas pa ru ni gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje thal mo brkyang nas su/ /rdo rje'i steng du 'od mdzes

ma/ /phyi rol bskul ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /de yi steng du gdong pa bzhag /phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin dge ma'o/ /de bzhin lag pa steng du sbyar/ /rtsibs mchog rin chen ma ru 'gyur/ /lhag ma'i bya ba de nyid kyis/ /de bzhin

zhag gcig bsam par bya/ /sbyor ba de yis bcing ba ru/ /sngags shes gtso bo sngags pas bya/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam par sbyar/ /khro mo rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /snying gar blo gros ldan pas bzung / /de ni lcags kyu'i rnam pa yis/ /bltas nas lus can

'gugs par byed/ /de las sor mo'i rtse mo rnams/ /cung zad bsnol te brkyang bar bya/ /rdo rje mche ba lta bur bsgreng / /kha sbyar sgrol byed ngo mtshar che/ /rgya 'di rnams kyis rgyas btab na/ /las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /de las thal mo sbyar

nas su/ /gzi brjid rdo rje de bzhin no/ /de ltar lcags kyus dgug pa ste/ /de yi mtha' gdong zhags pa'o/ /sog le'i thal mo nges par ni/ /'dir ni thod pa nyid du 'gyur/ /'di ni gnyis pa nyid yin te/ /las kun gyi ni dam pa sgrub/ /de bzhin bcing ba legs

bcings nas/ /rab tu sbyin pa brkyang bar bya/ /g.yas pa steng du byas nas su/ /bsad pa lta bur bcing bar bya/ /'di ni rdo rje mdung thung ste/ /srin po thams cad phye mar byed/ /'dir ni de bzhin thod pa dang / /zhags pa lcags kyu nyid dang yang / /sog le dang

ni gri thung ni/ /rdo rje thal mo'i cho gas bya/ /rdo rje thal mo so sor bya/ /lag pa g.yas pa steng du ni/ /rin chen lta bur byas la gzung / /sor mo thams cad spro bar bya/ /g.yon pa'ang de bzhin spro bar bya/ /de dag nyi zlar shes par bya/ /thal mo bsgreng ste shes rab

dang / /las kyi rdo rje rtse mo sbyar/ /'dir ni las rnams thams cad kyi/ /sna tshogs las mchog sgrub par byed/ /de bzhin dgug dang zhags pa dang / /thod pa rdo rje nyid yin no/ /de las thal mo thod pa yi/ /phyag rgya'i dbus su bu ga ni/ /sgron ma can zhes legs

bshad de/ /'di ni rdo rje ngo mtshar che/ /zhags pa lcags kyu de bzhin du/ /slob dpon blo gros ldan pas shes/ /gzungs rnams dang ni thams cad kyi/ /sngar bshad pa yi phyag rgya nyid/ /thod pa rdo rje'ang shes par bya/ /phan tshun gcig la gcig tu ni/ /thams

cad gzungs kyi phyag rgya ru/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rab tu bsgrags/ /'di rnams sbyor ba ji lta bar/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi ni rtag pa ru/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya ste/ /phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin no/ /'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor gsung / /kun bzang bdag nyid chen

po pa/ /sems can kun mchog las kyi mchog /sangs rgyas mchog gtso mnga' bdag che/ /zhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de

dag thams cad la yang dang yang du gzigs te/ sems can thams cad brtson 'grus zhan pa spobs pa dman pa la mos par gzigs nas de rnams la bka' bsgo ba/ dbang po'i ma mo rnams kyis shod/ /rang rang gi ni sgrub sna tshogs/ /de nas de rnams legs

tshim nas/ /rdo rje can la gsol ba ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de yi steng du rdo rje che/ /rdo rje la ni dang po mchog /nyi ma gser mdog dang mtshungs par/ /gsang sngags shes pas de bsgom bya/ /rang gi

lus las spros nas su/ /rang gi rnam par bsam par bya/ /de nas sngags bdag 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngags kyi de nyid bdag po cher/ /kun tu 'gro ba sna tshogs che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra ba gzhan/ /gnyis pa'i de nyid bsgom pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor pad+ma las byung

ba/ /dmar po'i gos la gzi brjid che/ /'bar ba dag ni me dang mtshungs/ /rang las spro bya thams cad du/ /'jig rten dbang phyug lta bur 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor dbang chen gzhag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor la ni cher dge ma/ /dang po'i lha mo drod dang ldan/ /

rang gi lus la nges par khyab/ /bsdus nas bdag dang 'dra ba'i bdag /yid bzhin nor bu'i snang bar 'gyur/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus son par/ /'gro ba'i sgo gtan lha mo ni/ /rang lus lus ldan thams cad du/ /ljang gu dang ni ljang ser ma/ /las kun sgrub pa'i

dam pa yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal ldan 'gyur/ /ma mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /shes rab ye shes dam pa gnas/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi dam pa ru/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /kun gyi bdag po dpal dang ldan/ /kun bzang mnga' bdag chen por 'gyur/ /

bsam gtan dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad nyid ni bsgrub par bya/ /chos kyi yi ge yang dag sbyar/ /lha min bdag por bdag 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen

po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes mchog gi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs so// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab 'khor dang bcas pa rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur

te/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la glu dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa/ thams cad khyab pa'i ye shes che/ /mkha' la rlung ltar cher gshegs pa/ /yab kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bzang / /kun mchog dam pas bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyal po mchog rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rgyas pa las nges par phyung ngo / /dbus su nyi ma chen

po ni/ /hU~M yig sbyor bas bsam par bya/ /sor mo kun gyi rtse gnas su/ /sa bon lnga yi yab dgod bya/ /tshigs kyi nang ni thams cad du/ /yi ge thams cad rnam par bsam/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la ni/ /bzang po thams cad rnam bsam bya/ /'khor lo chen po

phyag rgya'i tshul/ /lag pa g.yon par bsam par bya/ /de yi dbus su shes rab che/ /de bzhin gzhan yang dgod par bya/ /de nas spro ba'i de nyid ni/ /gsang sngags 'di yis sbyar bar bya/ /oM pradz+nyo pA yas ma yo ge hU~M a/ de nas phan tshun sbyar byas nas/ /rdo rje thal

mor rab tu gnas/ /rdo rje bsdams par byas nas su/ /rdo rje bsdams par rnam par bsam/ /de nas shes rab che bsgreng ste/ /rtse mo cung zad bskum par bya/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug snying por 'gyur/ /snying gar bzhag na snying po 'grub/ /de nyid bsdigs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /

las kyi mchog tu 'gyur ba yin/ /de nyid snying gar bsdams pa ni/ /phyag rgya chen po zhes su grags/ /thams cad kyis kyang mdor bsdus pa'i/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub byed/ /de bzhin legs par bcing bar bya/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa gnyis/ /phyi yi

rgyab tu bskum par bya/ /mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug snying dga' ba'o/ /shes rab dag ni de bzhin sbyar/ /dam tshig ces par rab tu grags/ /lhag ma rnam par spro bar bya/ /las kyi gnas 'khod chen por grags/ /shes rab dag ni zum tshul gyis/ /dri yi dbang

phyug rab dgyes pa'o/ /bzod dang brtson 'grus gdong pa gnyis/ /lo ma'i tshul du brkyang bar bya/ /dam tshig sgrub pa ster bar bshad/ /'di las rtse mo rnam phye ba/ /las kun byed pa zhes bshad de/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed/ /de nyid rtse mor snying gar sbyar/ /

bdag nyid chen po'i phyag rgya mchog /rgyal po mchog lta'i rgyal po ru/ /'di yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje bsdams pas shes rab mgo/ /dril bu'i dam pa snying po mchog /bzod dang brtson 'grus gdong sbyar ba/ /dam tshig mnyam pa nyid du gnas/ /cung

zad gdong pa bskum par bya/ /las byed pa yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /gdong pa legs par brkyang nas su/ /steng du shes rab rtse mo gcig /'di ni chen por shes bya ste/ /dbang phyug thams cad byed pa'i mchog /sna tshogs byed pa mchog gi mchog /'di yis myur du

'grub par 'gyur/ /rang gi bsdams las shes rab bsgreng / /rdo rje sra ba'i chos dang ldan/ /gdong pa phye ste rin po che/ /'di ni dam tshig ldan pa'i mchog /de gnyis de bzhin rnam par gzhag /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin dge dag /rab brkyang bzhi yi sems dpa' yi/ /

las rnams thams cad byed par bshad/ /de bzhin tshul khrims pha rol phyin/ /'di ni chen po dam pa'o/ /bsdams las bzod dang brtson 'grus dag /legs par brkyang ste bstod pa ni/ /snying po'i zla ba ltar bcings pa/ /dam tshig 'od zer 'phro ba'o/ /phan tshun

gyi ni gdong sbyar ba/ /'di ni las byed dam pa ste/ /lhag ma khu tshur ltar byas pa/ /phyag rgya chen po zhes su 'grub/ /rdo rje bsdams pa legs par bcing / /rtse mo'i rnam par sbyar bar bya/ /shes rab 'ba' zhig rtse mor bya/ /lhag ma dag ni de bzhin no/ /

lhag ma bsdams te gzhug par bya/ /snying po chos ni byed pa'i mchog /khu tshur g.yon pa g.yon du bzung / /rdo rje rdo rje can gyis brkyang / /g.yas pa'i sbyin pa brkyang nas ni/ /rna ba'i rtsa bar dgug par bya/ /'di ni las byed shes bya ste/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub

byed/ /rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang nas su/ /snying gar 'khor lo'i tshul du bya/ /g.yas pa'i rtse rmo lcags kyur bya/ /sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol son/ /de bzhin bcing ba legs bsdam bya/ /gnyis ka de bzhin lcags kyu ste/ /de ltar 'og ma bcug nas su/ /snying gar bzhag

pa las rjes 'brang / /de nyid dgug par sbyor ba ni/ /thams cad dgug pa rab tu 'grub/ /de bzhin sbyin pa bskums nas su/ /yang dang yang du brkyang bar bya/ /snying gar bskor ba zhes su bshad/ /de nyid 'og tu bstan pa ni/ /dam tshig can zhes rab tu grags/ /

rdo rje chos su bshad pa ste/ /kha ru g.yo bar byed pa mchog /las las rnam par tshim zhes bya/ /las kun byed pa'i dam pa ster/ /lag pa bcings pa las bgrol te/ /shes rab mdzod du rab tu brtag /'di ni dam tshig cher mdzes pa/ /de phyir de ltar chos mdzad do/ /

g.yas pas rab tu bsgrims pa ni/ /mi snang mdzod de des na las/ /rin chen pad+ma ldan pa'i gdong / /snying gar bzhag pa snying por 'gyur/ /bsdams nas go char byas nas su/ /bskor ba dam tshig ces su 'dod/ /'khyud pa chos ldan zhes su grags/ /bsnun pa las

byed pa ru brjod/ /bsdams las nyi ma rnam par spro/ /bskor ba dam tshig mchog yin no/ /lag pa'i mtha' ma chos chen po/ /kun sdud las kun byed pa'o/ /bsdams las sbyin pa bsgreng bar bya/ /rtse mo gsum bya gnas mdzes pa'o/ /de nyid steng du bskor nas su/ /

spros pas chos sgrub byed pa'o/ /rdo rje ba ru sbyar ba las/ /dbang bskur dam pa sgrub par byed/ /de nyid steng du spro ba ni/ /las kun byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /snying gar legs bzung snying po ste/ /mdzod spur bzhag pa dam tshig mchog /khar bzhag pa ni chos shes bya/ /

las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /'di ni bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /re ba kun rdzogs mdzad pas gsungs/ /rdo rje bsdams pa rnam par bcings/ /pad+ma'i rnam pa mchog tu bya/ /ster byed pa ni mig ltar bya/ /snying gar bzhag pa kun mchog 'grub/ /de nyid mig bzhag

las yin no/ /bzhad pas chos de dam pa'i chos/ /dam tshig gsang ba'i mig yin te/ /pad+ma'i mdzod la rab tu gnas/ /thal mo yang dag sbyar ba ni/ /snying po mchog tu rmad byung ba'o/ /kha ni cung zad phye ba ni/ /dam tshig mchog gi mchog yin no/ /snying gar shin tu

gsal phye ba/ /ma lus las ni rab tu sgrub/ /rdo rje'i nang du pad+ma ni/ /chos te mchog tu rmad byung ba'o/ /'di rnams kyis ni myur 'grub ste/ /sngags pas sngags kyis bskul bas so/ /de bzhin 'ching ba legs bcings te/ /snying gar 'khor lo nyid du bya/ /'khor lo gsum

pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rtsibs bzhes legs brgyan chos su blta/ /bskor ba las kyi rdo rje'o/ /'di rnams ji lta bzhin sbyar na/ /grub pa'i dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje bsdams pa legs bsgreng ste/ /shes rab myu gu dag tu bya/ /sbyin pa rin chen ltar byas pa/ /sems

dpa'i gnas su nges par sbyar/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /snying gar chos kyi dam tshig dang / /snying po rig sngags legs par sbyar/ /de bzhin shes rab gnyis po sgreng / /'og gi 'khrug pa de bzhin no/ /mthe chung bzang

po'i kha sbyar ba/ /kun gong rdo rje ldan par bya/ /gnas ni bzhi yi sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya bzhi ni rab tu 'grub/ /spyi bor las su bshad pa ste/ /snying gar snying po brtag par bya/ /bskor ba yis ni dam tshig ste/ /ngag gis kun bskul chos yin te/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can

gyis gsungs/ /bcings nas shes rab dag ni bsgreng / /'od ldan dag ni rtsa bar sbyar/ /'di ni dang por shes par bya/ /thams cad nas ni thams cad 'gro/ /bcings las de bzhin shes rab cig /rtse mo mche ba gdug yid 'phrog /de bzhin du ni 'di

sbyar bas/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /gsang ba'i bcing ba legs bcings te/ /rdo rje nang du de bzhin no/ /snying gar rnal 'byor pa yis sbyar/ /ji snyed las kyi ming bzang po/ /rdo rje rab grin par gzung / /kun tu bskor ba rab tu bya/ /'di yis

las rnams thams cad ni/ /byed 'gyur bsrung sogs go 'phang bzang / /lhag ma cho ga bzhin rnal 'byor/ /rnal 'byor de nyid rab tu sbyar/ /phyag rgya rtags dang mi rnams ni/ /lha rnams kun la sbyar bar bya/ /'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor che'i/ /dbang phyug dpal rdor sems dpas

gsungs/ /de nas de rnams legs tshim nas/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni thal sbyar te/ /zhu ba rdo rje bla na med/ /dpa' bo rdo rje can la zhus/ /yongs su rtog pa kun spangs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni rang byung la/ /yab dang yum ni bla na med/ /ci phyir 'di dag brtag pa

lags/ /'khor ba las ni legs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas ji ltar 'byung ba lags/ /grong gi chos ni bsten pa las/ /ji ltar thar pa rab tu 'grub/ /gang du rnal 'byor pa grol 'gyur/ /gang na 'chi ba rab tu gnas/ /gang gis rnal 'byor pa rab 'grub/ /gang las rnal

'byor pa zhes bgyi/ /gsang sngags ji ltar gsang sngags lags/ /snying po zhes bya'i snying po gang / /phyag rgyas gang phyir phyag rgyar 'gyur/ /rig sngags rig pa ji ltar lags/ /ji ltar lha rnams dgug pa dang / /gzhug pa rnal 'byor pa yas bgyid/ /rnam par grol

rnams bcing ba dang / /mnyes dang bskul ba de bzhin du/ /ji ltar gnyis su med 'gyur zhing / /tsum pa 'khyud pa nyid dang yang / /mthong nas rjes su chags pa dang / /lag pa'i dgos pa ji snyed pas/ /phyag rgya ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur/ /gar dang glu dang cher dgod pa/ /

sgeg dang smra ba ji ltar lags/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ /gtso bo ro dang reg par 'gyur/ /me tog bdug pa mchog dang dri/ /mar me gsal ba mchog gang lags/ /mchod pa thams cad ji ltar 'grub/ /ji ltar mchod pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyal bas zhu

ba 'di dag gis/ /phreng ba rdo rje can la zhus/ /zhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos zhu ba thams cad rnam par dpyod pa longs spyod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhu ba rgyas pa 'di dag phyung

ngo / /shes rab yum du legs bshad de/ /yab ni thabs la mkhas pa'o/ /'di ni bsten pa nyid kyis ni/ /grong las thar pa rab tu 'grub/ /bag chags sbyor ba dang ldan pas/ /gnyi ga dag ni gdon yin te/ /grol dang ma grol zhes su bshad/ /de ni rnal 'byor pa ru

brjod/ /gsang sngags yid du bshad pa ste/ /snying po yang ni de bzhin no/ /yid la rnam par gzhag na ni/ /gsang sngags mkhas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /thar pa chos kyi rgya mtsho yin/ /lha rnams gang la rgyas btab pa'i/ /phyag rgya 'di yis 'grub 'gyur te/ /dngos

grub bde ba bla na med/ /rig sngags ye shes ma lus te/ /rig sngags pha rol phyin par bshad/ /de shes pa ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /grub nas bde ba rnam pa gsum/ /shes rab la ni shes rab ni/ /gzhug dang dgug pa de bzhin no/ /gshegs su gsol ba btang bar

shes/ /bcings pa brtan par byed pa'o/ /mnyes pa yis ni legs tshim yin/ /bskul ba 'phro ba nyid du bshad/ /bsam pa gcig tu gyur pa ni/ /gnyis su med pa zhes su brtags/ /ro gcig de nyid bshad pa ni/ /'jig rten pa yi lha ru brjod/ /tsum pa rdo rje

rnal 'byor te/ /rdo rje ye shes zhes su bshad/ /shes dang mi shes mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdo rje'i ye shes zhes bshad do/ /shes dang mi shes mnyam sbyor bas/ /tsum pa na zhes nges par bshad/ /gnas pas rtags zhes bshad pa ste/ /rtags ni lus zhes brjod pa

yin/ /de yi 'khyud pa reg par shes/ /chags pa mthong ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa'i 'od rnams lha mo ste/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam bgrod pa'o/ /phyag rgya 'di las phyag rgya ste/ /lag pa'i dgod pa'i sbyor bas so/ /gar dang glu sogs rnams kyis ni/ /lha rnams

thams cad mnyes par 'gyur/ /'di rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas rnams/ /mchod na dngos grub thams cad ster/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa'i rgyud chen po las gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi

rgyal po yongs su rdzogs so// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dang mchod pa'i lan dang / phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan dang / gar dang gar gyi lan dang / glu dang glu'i

lan dang / sil snyan dang sil snyan gyi lan dang / rnam 'gyur dang rnam 'gyur gyi lan dang / dbrog pa dang dgug pa'i lan dang / brda dang brda'i lan dang / bri ba dang bri ba'i lan dang / blta ba dang blta ba'i lan dang / dam tshig dang dam tshig gi lan dang / dkyil 'khor dang dkyil 'khor gyi lan dang /

gsang ba dang gsang ba'i lan dang / gsang chen dang gsang chen gyi lan dang / de kho na nyid dang de kho na nyid kyi lan la sogs pa rnams dang / glu'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas sems can kun gyi don/ /ye shes kun don thams cad mdzad/ /thams

cad khyab pa sems can don/ /gnyis dang gnyis med phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'di dag thams cad gsung du gsol/ /sgrub pa po la phan dgyes pas/ /sgrub pa dngos grub dag dga' ba/ /gang gis dngos grub 'grub 'gyur ba/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos

thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la lta ba rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /me tog bdug pa dri zhim dang / /gos bzang rgyan dang bza' ba dang / /btung dang ro dang sgron ma gsal/ /mal khri stan dag yid 'ong ba/ /'di

yis sangs rgyas thams cad mchod/ /yid ni bde bar gnas par byed/ /slob dpon rdo rje can dang ni/ /khyad par du ni sgrub pos bya/ /dgod dang sgeg dang de bzhin glu/ /sil snyan gar ni rab dga' ba/ /mchod pa'i lan te shin tu ni/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgyas 'grub par 'gyur/ /

gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ /ro dang reg pa yid 'ong ba/ /'di ni mchod pa'i lan du 'grub/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bde ba che/ /phyag rgya skyes bu'i rnam pa ste/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni rang gzugs te/ /gnyis pa phyag rgya chen po ste/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni las bzang can/ /

phyag rgya rang gi bdag por shes/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni sgrub pa po/ /ji srid dbye ba stong phrag ni/ /dbye ba'i gzhi ru brtag par bya/ /zhes so/ /gar ni gar gyi sbyor ba yis/ /gar gyi lan ni gar mkhan ma'o/ /ji srid dbye ba stong phrag kyang / /dbye ba bzhi ru brtag par bya/ /kun

tu bzang po la brten nas/ /ji srid las kyi rjes 'brang ba'o/ /las kyi sbyor la yang dag bsten/ /ji srid bzang po'i rjes 'brang ba'o/ /bla 'og yang dag bskyod pa yis/ /gar dang steng gi gar bskor ba/ /rtog pa'i sbyor bas brtag par bya/ /rtog pa yis ni rab tu gsung / /

ji lta'i sil snyan rdung spyad ni/ /rdung ba'i bdag nyid can gyis dkrol/ /de las byung ba'i sil snyan lan/ /gsil bas sil snyan nyid du brjod/ /sngags kyi yi ge'i cho ga sbyar/ /ji srid las mchog spyod yul ba/ /de nas sbyor bas 'thon nas su/ /kun tu bzang por

'gro bar bya/ /sgrogs pas grub ces brjod pa ste/ /'dren pa gsum las legs par 'byung / /dbyangs rnams rnam drug shes par bya/ /glu yi phyag rgya zhes su 'grub/ /de nas sbyor bas 'thon nas su/ /ji srid mgo dang snying gar son/ /mgrin pa sna yi sbyor ba dang / /

mgul pa g.yo ba nyid kyis so/ /'gyur bas rnam par 'gyur ba ste/ /lan dang gtong ba'i cho ga rim/ /chos rnams thams cad blang ba dang / /gdon gyi tshogs rnams zlog pa ste/ /rnam 'gyur las ni slar yang 'dir/ /sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'o/ /ji srid las ni rjes

sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su 'brang / /sems dang lus kyi rnam bsgyings pas/ /gdug pa thams cad bzlog par bya/ /lag pa rkang pa'i rim pa kun/ /rnam 'gyur gyi ni lan yin no/ /dbrog pa dgug par shes bya ste/ /gtong ba dag ni dbrog

pa'i lan/ /dbrog pa mchog tu shes bya ba/ /bgegs kyi gnas ni rab gnon pa'o/ /dbrog pa'i lan ni rab bzlog ste/ /bsdigs pa'i rkang pa dgod par shes/ /brda ni dran pa'i don du ste/ /phan tshun yongs su brjod pa yis/ /'grub dang mi 'grub sbyor ba rnams/ /slob

dpon slob ma sogs pas bsgrub/ /brda lan lha mo rnams kyis ni/ /bskul dang so sor bskul ba'o/ /dri ba smra dang 'dri ba ste/ /mthong nas 'dri ba 'dri ba'i lan/ /legs pa'i gzugs mthong blta ba ste/ /lha yi ye shes spyod yul lo/ /blta ba'i lan ni de las slar/ /sbyor

ba mchog gis sbyor ba'o/ /lha dang lha mo rnams kyi ni/ /g.yas g.yon blta ba blta ba ste/ /ji snyed blta ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /sgrub par byed pa'i lan yin no/ /dam tshig sangs rgyas thams cad/ /bka' rtags byas pa nyid du 'dod/ /gang phyir thos pa 'dzin pa yi/ /sgrub

po lan du shes par bya/ /dkyil 'khor lus su bshad pa ste/ /ye shes lnga yis byin brlab pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor lan ni lha mo rnams/ /gcig tu byed pa'i dam pa'o/ /gsang ba sbas par bshad pa ste/ /gsang ba'i lan ni legs sbas pa'o/ /gsang chen sems kyi

'du shes te/ /bde ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa lha mo dang / /lha yi bde ba bde chen po/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad kyis/ /gsang chen lan du brjod pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to/ /de nas de rnams slar yang

'dus par gyur te/ yang bcom ldan 'das la legs par bskul ba/ rdo rje sems dpa' bde rab mchog /shes rab mchog rab grol ba'o/ /mchod pa'i ye shes legs 'grub pa'i/ /gsang ba chen po gsung du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos slar

yang gsang ba chen po mchod pa cher gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~MhU~M hU~M hU~M/ ga ga ri ga ga ri ga ga ga ga ri ga ri/ ra ra ra/ ga ri ga ga /te te te te/ he te te te te te/ na te te te N+NA te te/ na te te dzA tet+ta/ dzA te tat+ta/

dza te/ ri ti rA/ te ta te dzA te tI ri ra te/ ta ri ta ri/ te ta ri hU~M/ ri ri hU~M/ te dzA te te hU~M/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' kun gyi rje/ /glu yi phyag rgya rab gsal ba'o/ /de nas rol mo'i phyag rgya yi/ /

rnal 'byor chen po thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyis gsungs pa/ lha dang lha mo rgyal bdag dang / /gang gis myur du mtshungs 'gyur ba/ /oM hU~M b+h+yo g+he Ta hU~M/ oM hU~M b+h+yo g+he Ta hU~M/ g+he Ta hU~M/ g+he Ta hU~M/ ru lu ru lu/ g+he Tu g+he TuM/ g+he Tu g+he TuM/ /g+he Ta g+he Ta/ hU~M Ta nA Da yo/ hU~M Ta na Da yo/ hU~M Ta

nA Da yo/ Ta ra NAM/ Ta ra NAM/ TA Na TA Na TA~M Ta/ TAM Ta/ TA Na Ta Na TaM TA/ TA TAM/ NiT+TaM NaT+Ta/ NiTAM/ oM duHduHduHduH/ oM duHduHdUHdUHdUHdUHdUHduHduHduHduHTaM TaM/ Da d+hAM d+hAM/ d+ha d+ha d+ha d+hAM/ d+ha d+ha d+ha/ dz+ha dz+hAM/ dz+ha dz+hAM/ dz+hi dz+hAM/ dz+hA dz+hA dz+ya dz+hA/ dz+hi dz+ha/ dz+hi/ dz+hAM dz+hAM dz+hA/ dz+hI dz+hAM dz+hAM dz+hAM/ sna yi sbubs su dkrol ba dang / /

lag pa'i mthil dang kha dag gis/ /sil snyan sbyor bas bsil bar bya/ /nges par myur du rab tu 'grub/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba dang / /chang zung lta ba'i rim pa yis/ /sgeg cing dpa' ba mi sdug pa/ /dgod dang drag shul 'jigs su rung / /snying rje rngam dang zhi

sogs kyi/ /nyams kyi ngo bo legs bslabs pa'i/ /gang gis rnal 'byor can 'grub 'gyur/ /gar gyi dbang phyug gtso bo che/ /bcud ni zla ba sogs mdzes pa/ /sha sogs bza' ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / /tsan+dan la sogs byug pa dang / /me tog la sogs phreng mdzes

dang / /bud med bzang mo'i rigs rnams kyis/ /dam tshig byin brlabs sbyor ba las/ /rdzas rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /phaT yig hU~M dang bcas pa yis/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to/ /sbyor ldan kun la gnas nas su/ /g.yas

pa yi yang gar sbyor las/ /rdo rje bsdams pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /snying gar de bzhin bsgreng bar bya/ /yang ni gnyis pa nyid kyang ste/ /shes rab gang yin rdo rjer bya/ /skar ma lcags kyu de bzhin 'dir/ /'dir ni bsnyems bcas rjes su chags/ /de las rdo rje'i sbyor ba

sbyar/ /yang dang yang du dgrol bar bya/ /'di yis las rnams thams cad ni/ /byed 'gyur 'di la gdon mi za/ /de nyid snying gar khu tshur te/ /rdo rje gdong pa skar ma'i kha/ /rang gi gnas su bzhag pa de/ /dbang bskur ba ni gnyis pa'o/ /de nyid bsnyems pas cher bstan

te/ /yang dang yang du yongs su bskyod/ /de nyid 'od zer rnam pa ru/ /thams cad du ni spro bar bya/ /de nyid kha ru bstan pa ni/ /rdo rje bshad par rnam par ba shad/ /'di rnams kyis ni don rnams kun/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /de nyid pad+ma'i sbyor ba dang / /mig

gis sbyor ba gnyis pa'o/ /shes rab skar ma de nas bsgreng / /lte bar byas pa 'khor lo can/ /rdo rje smra ba lce yi rtser/ /ro rnams ma lus 'phrog par byed/ /'di dag gis ni las rnams kun/ /pad+ma'i 'od kyis rab tu bya/ /de bzhin khu tshur legs par sbyar/ /shes rab kyis

ni snying gar bsnun/ /de las gnyis pa sna tshogs che/ /snying gar yongs su bskor bar bya/ /skar ma rdo rje'i rnam pa mchog /bzod dang gzi brjid mche ba mdzes/ /de nyid dam du bsdams pa ni/ /'ching ba'i las ni byed pa'i mchog /'di rnams kyis ni thams cad sgrub/ /

phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i lan/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis/ /las kyi dam pa ma lus pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs che/ /pad+ma rin chen rdor mchog 'dzin/ /gsang ba rgyan gyis dkyil 'khor gyi/ /dpal

chen la ni zhu ba zhus/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor don phyir dang / /ma mo rnams kyi don dam ni/ /yongs su rtog pa thams cad spangs/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog dam pa'i gsang / /dkyil 'khor thams cad brgyan pa yis/ /mdzes pas bcom ldan gsung du gsol/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dang po dang ni gnyis pa dang / /drug dang lnga dang de bzhin bcu/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje rin chen chu skyes las/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor / /gsang

sngags 'dzin pas gnas lngar dgod/ /dkar dang ser po ches dmar ba/ /sngon po'i 'od zer glog las byung / /tha ma kun gyi thog ma ru/ /'od zer bzang po sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga la/ /gnas nas bsgom dang bzlas pa sbyar/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor ming yin

te/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal ba rnams kyi rten/ /brten pas sgrub po shin tu yang / /dus mi ring bar sa stengs 'grub/ /'di ni bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /kun sbyar dri ma med pa'i gtso/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che/ /skye dang 'chi ba 'joms pas gsungs/ /de nas rgyal ba thams

cad dang / /sbyor ba'i ma dang yum rnams ni/ /legs tshig rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /bde ba che la legs zhes gsol/ /rdo rje kun gyi bdag po gtso/ /sangs rgyas dbyangs kyis bstod par byas/ /rdo rje glu sogs sbyar ba yis/ /dbang bskur kun gyi mchog ldan gtso/ /dpal

ldan sangs rgyas sangs rgyas bdag po tshul/ /sangs rgyas sa ni rgyal rnams chub mdzad rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas sras po nges par mtha' dag sangs rgyas kyis/ /sbyor bas blo gros sbyin rnams legs par tshim mdzad pa/ /dpal gyi rdo rje dri med rdo rje ye shes rdor/ /rdo

rje'i snang bas 'jig rten rab tu gsal mdzad pa/ /bsdus pa'i rdo rje sbyor ba ldan pas legs bton te/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid ngo bor mdzad pa'i mdzes rdo rje/ /dpal gyi rin chen rin chen 'byung gnas rin chen sprin/ /rin chen rnams la rin chen gyis dgyes rin chen mdzes/ /mdzes

pa'i brjid ldan rin chen rgyal mtshan gyi/ /skye bo rnams kyi phongs dang sdig pa rnams bcom nas/ /dpal gyi pad+ma pad+ma dam pa'i bla ma pad sems dpal/ /pad+mas rab dgyes pad+ma las 'khrungs pad+ma yi/ /dra bas pad+ma mtha' dag nges par rgyal mdzad de/ /pad+ma'i rigs la 'jog

par mdzad pa'i pad bzang po/ /sna tshogs dpal ldan kun gyi bdag po sna tshogs mkhyen/ /sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs yum gyis ma gos pa/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul legs 'jog mdzad sna tshogs pa/ /ci dga' 'dod la rig pa dam pa gnang du gsol/ /

zhes so/ /de nas de rnams kyis slar yang sems can ma lus pa 'dul ba'i don du 'di skad ces bstod pa/ sangs rgyas tshul khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas ye shes khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas gzi brjid phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs

rgyas dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje khro bo'i yid las 'khrungs/ /sdig pa bcom pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sdig pa bsal la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /phyag na rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal/ /gtsug na rin chen gzi brjid can/ /sdug bsngal bcom pa khyod la 'dud/ /thams cad grub

la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /chos kyi dag pa khyod la 'dud/ /pad+ma dag pa rtogs pa'i phyir/ /'dod chags chags pa khyod la 'dud/ /'dod chags bral la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sna tshogs rdo rje khyod la 'dud/ /sna tshogs sbyor ba khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sna tshogs tshul can khyod la 'dud/ /

sna tshogs bde ldan phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /chos dang ldan pa thams cad du/ /nyin re zhing ni stod byed na/ /bsam pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos shes

rab dang ye shes rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /gsang ba rgyan ces bya ba ni/ /sems dpa' chen po

legs par zung / /sems dpa' chen po ni dga' bas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang phyug rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dpa' bo chen po ci gsung ba/ /rang byung ye shes pha rol son/ /chos kun dbang phyug

dpal dang ldan/ /'jig rten gsum gyi sdig 'joms pas/ /ji skad gsungs bzhin snying la ni/ /legs gzung dri med ye shes bzang / /rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ /bde ba chen po bdag gis bzung / /zhes so/ /bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces

bka' stsal pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yab dang yum gyi tshogs dang bcas pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta bu'i rdo rje la legs par gnas pa de dag thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang sngags rjes su dran par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po brda sprod pa chen po bde bar gshegs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / sgyur byed kyi mkhas pa sgra'i gzhung lugs la blo gros

dkar ba kun dga' rgyal mtshan gyis dpal sa skya'i dben gnas dam par bsgyur// //mda' lnga'i gtsug ldan yid kyi srub shing gi/ /dregs pa'i dra ba rnam par dral ba'i phyir/ /rgyud rgyal rgya mtsho'i rgyal po ltar zab 'di/ /bsgyur la 'gal gang 'di la

'phags rnams dgongs// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya gu h+ya ma Ni ti la kA na ma sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gsang ba nor bu thig le zhes bya ba'i mdo/ bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi rdul rnyog pa med pa la gus par phyag

'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs pa khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i cod pan khams

gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad legs par khong du chud pas las sna tshogs mdzad pa/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa/

thugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad rtag pa dus gsum gyi dam tshig la rnam par gnas pa'i sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsten cing bstod pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa/

kha dog rnam par bkra ba'i dril bu dang ldan pa/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i dar gyi ba dan dang / me tog gi chun po dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa dang / zla bas nye bar mdzes pa'i 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i khang na bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs

cig pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang ldan pas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / bdud kyi stobs thams cad

rab tu 'joms pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal du med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa'i de

bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'di lta ste/ dper na til gyi gang bu ltar 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su gang bar mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re las kyang gzhal du med cing grangs las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing mthong bar gyur cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag

thams cad na yang chos kyi tshul 'di nyid ston par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad nam mkha'i khams thams cad la sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje rtag tu bzhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par bgrod pa'i rdo rje'i dbyings thams

cad thugs su chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa' nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po nam mkha'i khams thams cad la 'phro ba'i rang bzhin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par yongs su mkhyen pa/ de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag gi rang bzhin dag pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa nam mkha' thams cad la khyab pa'i gzugs thams cad legs par gzigs pa'i ye shes kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'dul ba'i spyod pa'i mchog

tu gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod pa'i ye shes mdzad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i thugs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'gugs pa'i dam tshig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pa'i ye shes

kyi dbang phyug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi legs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che chen pos dbang bskur ba'i rin po che dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rin po che'i tog dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad gad chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dag pa chen po'i chos dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang / ye shes chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gsung chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las sna tshogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsrung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su skyong

ba'i rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dgongs pa phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes dang ldan pa ste/ kun tu bzang dang don yod pa/ /'chi med rab tu dga' ba'i gtso/ /nam mkha'i snying po gzi brjid che/ /rin chen tog ste

cher 'dzum pa/ /spyan ras gzigs dang dbang phyug che/ /'jam dpal kun gyi snying po dang / /brjod bral sna tshogs pa yi las/ /dpa' bo gtum po dam por 'dzin/ /rdo rje lcags kyu mda' tshim pa/ /rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan 'dzum/ /chos mdzod mdzes pa'i 'khor lo

gsung / /las dang chos dang 'jigs byed 'dzin/ /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/ /ma rungs khro dang bzod pa che/ /gnod sbyin srin po dam pa brtan/ /gzi chen dpa' bo khyab bdag che/ /u ma'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgon/ /'jug sred rgyal 'dod thub pa che/ /

'jig rten skyong dang mkha' dang sa/ /'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum pa/ /'byung chen sems can don rab mdzad/ /thams cad sems can pha chen po/ /'khor ba mya ngan 'das dang brtag /yang dag mtsho dang mchod chen po/ /sangs rgyas dag pa theg pa che/ /srid pa

gsum po'ang de yin no/ /de dag la sogs pa'i yon tan bye ba brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor te dkyil 'khor chen po de la bzhugs nas chos ston par mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten te 'khod nas thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i thig le zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par

bka' stsal du gsol/ gang gis sems can rnams la gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig de bdag gis bshad par bgyi lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad

ces bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i dam pa gang gis sems can thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de bshad par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po gang gis bdag gsang ba'i bdag por 'gyur ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad mi phyed par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad dang mi phyed par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid la ched du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod pa/ e ma'o bdag

ni thabs chen po/ /rab tu gsang ba thig le yi/ /ting 'dzin gang phyir grub pa yang / /gsang ba nyid ni zhu bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'thon nas phyag tu 'khod par gyur pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rab tu gsang ba'i thig le zhes bgyi ba ci lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje rab tu gsang ba'i thig le 'di ni

mchog tu gsang ba'o/ /ches shin tu gsang ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid sbyin pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan par byed pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde

ba rjes su rig pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su byon pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum mo/ /'di ni gsang ba'i mdzod do/ /'di nyid pad+ma'o/ /'di nyid rdo rje'o/ /'di nyid dam tshig ste/ de

nyid kyis na lag na rdo rje/ dam tshig mi shes pa'i mdun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /de'i phyir lag na rdo rje ngas 'ga' la yang ma bshad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes slar yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir gang

'ga' zhig la smra bar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /legs so rdo rje chos khyod kyis/ /rdo rje las khyod rab

legs so/ /mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mdor bsdus pa/ /dag pas rnam par bsgrubs tsam gyis/ /bde blag tu ni sangs rgyas thob/ /bde ba zad med mi zad pa/ /

skye ba 'di la 'grub par byed/ /ces so/ /lag na rdo rje des na shin tu gsang ba'i thig le las kyang mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo sde 'di legs par sba bar bya'o/ /sems can gang kha cig nye bar skrag pa dang bcas pa yod la/ gang kha cig dad pa dang ldan pas theg pa chen

po glang po che'i phrag tu zhon pa dag yod do/ /de dag las dang po la ni gsang sngags dang phyag rgya dang gsang ba thams cad bshad par mi bya zhing / gsang ba thams cad bstan par mi bya'o/ /dad pa can dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur ba thob pa dag la de dag thams cad bshad par bya'o/ /

legs par gsang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi thig le 'di ni ches shin tu gsang ba rab tu gnas pa'i slob dpon la bshad par bya'o/ /gang zhig rgyud 'di bshad pa tsam na sems can dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang / gang dag ches shin tu dga' ba skye ba de dag ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung

bstan par shes par bya'o/ /de dag la 'bad pas gdams pa dang bcas pa bstan par bya'o/ /sems can gang kha cig nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa de dag la lo rgyus tsam yang mi bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir de dag la lo rgyus tsam yang mi bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje nyon cig /sems can de dag gis lha'i ris ma mthong zhing dam tshig la rab

tu smod par byed pa de dag la gal te smras na/ lo rgyus tsam gyis kyang dmyal bar rab tu ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rdo rje kun nas 'bar rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa 'dis rigs

thams cad sreg par byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das de dag ni tshul bzhin ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par bgyi'o/ /zhes so/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nyan thos

kyi theg pa pa de dag gi nang du bshad par mi bgyi lags na/ de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis shin tu ches gsang ba'i thig le zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i snying po dkyil 'khor chen po 'di dam tshig ji srid bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad bskyed pa'i don du bka' stsal du gsol/ de

nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos spro ba'i sbyor ba'i dpa' bo'i ting nge 'dzin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad gcig tu mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos ting

nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par du ma la mnyam par bzhag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam tshig ma lus shing lus pa med pa sems can gyi khams thams

cad 'gugs pa bde ba dang yid bde ba bskyed pa'i don du ji srid ting nge 'dzin dam pa 'grub pa'i don du byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ so so'i sgrub pa'i thabs rgya che bas mdor bsdus te cho ga rgyas par gyur pa ni lag na rdo rje dang po re zhig sngags pas lag pa

gnyis a'i rnam pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsam par bya'o/ /a'i rnam pa de dri ma med pa'i gzugs la dkar ba bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin can te/ de nyid yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje lho phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil

'khor la 'khod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir lag pa gnyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du blta bar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa grub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ 'dir lag pa gnyis zla ba la rdo rje phra mo nas kyi tshad tsam dkar po 'od zer dang ldan pa sngags 'dis bsgom par bya ste/

hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ rdo rje des ci zhig bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje

nyon cig /rdo rje thal mo dam du bcings nas gsang sngags 'dis rang gi spyi bor dgrol bar bya'o/ /oM swa b+hA ba bi shud d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ de nas bdag nyid shel dag pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med cing gsal ba'i gzugs su sngags pas bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas sdom

pa gzung ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming che ge mo zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid snying po byang chub la thug gi bar du/ ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang

chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /so sor brtan par bdag gis gzung / /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon

mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i/ /sdom pa deng nas brtan par gzung / /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /de nyid so sor gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /nyin re bzhin

ni dus drug tu/ /rin chen rigs chen rnal 'byor gyi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba'o/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam chos so sor gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams

cad ldan par ni/ /de nyid so sor gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus pas/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po yi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa rab tu bskyed pa dang / /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung / /ma bsgral ba

rnams bdag gis bsgral/ /ma grol ba rnams bdag gis sgrol/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing / /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na

rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sdom pa bzung ste phyag rgya chen po la gnas nas sngags pas chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o/ /'di dag thams cad phyi rol dang nang du rtog pas brtags pa las gzhan 'ga' yang mi gnas so zhes de ltar snying la bzhag ste 'di skad ces

'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag cing rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal la gdod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid do zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ji ltar bsgom par bgyi ba cung zad bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos sems so sor rig pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang

chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje khyod kyis sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa'i bdag nyid nam mkha'i dkyil ma lus pa khyab pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mdzes pa/ dpag tshad brgya stong las lhag pa/ a la

sogs pa'i rnam pa'i yi ge/ a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/ a~M aHzhes bya ba de dag yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bdag nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam

par bsgoms pas bdag nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod de don yod grub pa'i gzugs su gnas so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar 'khod de ched du

brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod pa/ e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /thog med grub pa'i don yod bdag /ji ltar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ /bdag nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i

dkyil 'khor la 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i zla

ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu rgyas pa'i tshad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid kyi thugs kar zhugs par mdzad do/ /zhugs nas kyang gcig tu mi phyed par gyur te/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad

rab tu rgyas pa'i tshul du rnam par gnas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje byang chub kyi zla ba de bshad par bya'o/ /zla ba de'i steng du bdag nyid byang chub kyi zla ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya ste/ shin tu dri ma med pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i gzugs rnam par rtog pa

thams cad spangs pa'i mchog /gnas ngan len thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad myong ba'i don dang / ji srid nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i dri ma med pa sngon mthong ba'i zla ba lta bu ka la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 'jug pa ste/

ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ a la~M k+ShaH/ ka la sogs pa'i yi ge 'di dag skar ma la sogs pa'i gzugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu mi phyed par gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bsam par bya'o/ /yang

lag na rdo rje zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de la nam mkha'i khams thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'i tshad kyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa zhi ba 'od zer dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje de ji ltar bsgom par

bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang gcig tu mdzad nas byang chub sems dpa'

chen po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje rdo rje de sems dpa' rdo rje'i gzugs su bsgom par bya ste/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'i tshad kyi rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par bklubs pa/ lus thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gzugs

brnyan gyi tshul gyis gang zhing dang ba/ lag pa g.yon pas dril bu 'dzin pa/ g.yas pa'i lag pas rdo rje snying gar brten pa/ zhal cung zad bzhad par sngags pas bsam par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sngags ni 'di yin

te/ oM badzra At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas sems dpa' rdo rje'i gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur sngags pas sngags 'dis bsgom par bya ste/ oM ya thA sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA sta thA a ha~M/ de nas su~M gyi yi ge las

sngags pas ri rab bsams la steng dang 'og gi sgor su~M dgod par bya'o/ /de nas hU~M gi yi ge las khang pa brtsegs pa bsam par bya ste/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rdo rje 'bar ba yang dag ldan/ /kha dog sna tshogs dag dang bcas/ /sna tshogs ka bas nye bar mdzes/ /dra ba dra ba

phyed pas spras/ /zla ba zla ba phyed pas spud/ /nor bu dang mu tig gi phreng bas nye bar mdzes pa/ rin po che'i rgyan du ma dang / dar dang / 'phan dang / me tog gi chun pos nye bar spud pa/ de dag la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa sngags pas

bsam par bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du byas te/ slar yang bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su gzugs brnyan gyi sbyor bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa bsgoms te/ de nas hU~M gi yi

ge de nyid kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i lus kyi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge bkod de/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang yi ge de dag yongs su son pa las rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa zhi zhing dkar ba bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes

bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje de ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje de yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems

dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sna tshogs rdo rje khums lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

nas lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig /rdo rje de nyid 'od zer dang bcas snyems pa dang bcas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs cung zad bzhad pa'i zhal ras dang phyag gnyis rdo rje gsor bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can/ steng na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi bdag po bzhugs pa/ dpral ba dang nye bar mi bskyod pa/ g.yas su rin chen 'byung ldan/ rgyab tu 'od dpag tu med pa/ g.yon pa'i drung du don yod grub pa can/ de lta bu'i yon tan gyi khyad par dang ldan pa rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems

dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes de lta bu'i rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su bskyed nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su mthong lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes gnang ba/ legs so rdo rje sems dpa' po/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /legs so rdo rje chos khyod kyi/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /mdo sde 'di ni

legs bshad pa/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'o/ /zhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal

to/ /lag na rdo rje khyod la thams cad bshad par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas brkyang ste sngags 'dis lag na rdo rje dbab pa bskyed par bya'o/ /oM badzra A be sha A be sha aH/ de nas rdo rje dbab pa bskyed nas sems dpa' rdo rje bcings la dam tshig bsgrag par bya ste/ sa ma ya

s+t+wa~M~M`/ de nas dam tshig byin la yi ge brgya pa brjod par bya ste/ oM tiSh+Tha badzre dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ shA shwa to me b+ha ba/ hr-i da yaM me a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ sar+b+ba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma su tsa me tsit+ta~M shre yaHku ru hU~M/ ha ha ha ha hoH/ b+ha ga bAn sarba ta thA ga to badzra mA me

muny+tsa badzrI b+ha ba badzra satwa AH/ de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje me tog spyi bor sngags 'dis gzhag par bya ste/ pra tI ts+tsha badzra hoH/ sngags pas de me tog gi phreng bar bsam par byas la/ de nas phreng ba de blangs la sngags 'dis spyi bor bcing bar bya ste/ oM pra ti gr-ih+Na twa~M i ma~M satwa ma hA ba la/

de nas phreng ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bor blta bar bya'o/ /de nas sngags 'dis gdong dbye bar bya ste/ oM badzra satwa swa yan te Ar+ya tsak+Shud g+ha Ta na ta ta par ung+g+ha Ta ya te sar+b+ba tsak+Shu badzra tsak+Shu ra nut+ta r-i he badzra pA sh+ya/ de nas nam mkha'i dkyil na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong na de nas grub par shes par bya'o/ /gal te snang ba tsam mthong na yang des dngos grub la nye bar gyur pa yin no/ /de nas rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i dri'i chus sngags pas bdag la sngags 'dis dbang bskur bar bya ste/

badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ de nas pheg rdob gsum dang se gol gdab par bya ste/ badzra tu Sh+ya hoH/ de nas sngags 'dis rdo rje blang ste/ oM Ar+ya a b+hi She ka tA s+t+wa~M/ si bud+d+he badzra a b+hi She ka tA i da~M te sar+b+ba bud+d+ha twa~M gr-ih+Na badzrA~M su sid+d+ha ye/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid dam de bzhin gshegs

pa ston par mdzad do/ /gal te slob dpon du gyur na de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags 'dis bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM badzra a d+hi ba ti twa~M a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi tiSh+Tha badzra sam ya s+t+wa~M/ de nas bdag la phyag rgya 'di dang sngags 'dis dbang bskur te/ oM badzra satwa twA~M a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi

badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta he badzra nA ma/ sems dpa' gang gi ming du gyur pa'i ming de la brjod par bya'o/ /de nas brtan par bya ba'i phyir brjod pa/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung / /rdo rje sems dpa'i brtul shugs

brtan/ /de nas dngos grub thams cad kyi de kho na nyid dbab pa bskyed par bya ste/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi/ badzra e Sha twA~M d+hA ra yA mi badzra satwa hi hi hi hi hU~M hoH/ de nas bdag la rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig brjod par bya ste/ oM ma hA satwa sa ma ya s+t+wa~M ha~M/ de nas de ltar byin gyis brlabs te/ slar

yang yi ge brgya pa brjod par bya ste/ oM tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ sa ma ya satwA ha~M dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ shA shwa to me b+ha ba/ hr-i da ya~M me a d+hi tiSh+Tha sar+b+ba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma su tsa me tsit+ta~M shre yaHku ru hU~M/ ha ha ha ha hoH/ b+ha ga bAn sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra mA me muny+tsa badzrI

b+ha ba badzra satwa aH/ de nas yang de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i tshul du lag pa g.yon par dril bu/ lag pa g.yas par rdo rje snying gar bzhag la/ thams cad sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin bsgoms te/ bsgom pa'i rim pa des rdo rje sems dpa' nyid dam de bzhin gshegs pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /

'di yis ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang dga' ba zlos pa thams cad la sngags pas thog ma kho nar 'di ltar bsgoms te bya'o/ /gsang ba chen po rtog pa'i rgyal po rdo rje thig le las sems so sor rig pa la sogs pa rgyas pa rdzogs // //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi bdag pos zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de la bzhugs nas dpa' bo'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / lag na rdo rje la sogs pa de dag thams cad nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ste/ de nas de'i rjes su de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom

ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po thog ma dang tha ma med pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab par gyur to/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /rdo rje dang po kun tu bzang / /phyag na rdo rjer phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje rgyal po blo

bzang mchog /rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin gshegs/ /don yod rgyal po rdo rje mchog /rdo rje 'gugs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje chags pa bde ba che/ /rdo rje mda' ste dbang du byed/ /'dod pa chen po rdo rje che/ /rdo rje gzhu la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' mchog /

rdo rje tshim pa cher dgyes pa/ /rab dgyes rgyal po rdo rje mchog /rdo rje dgyes par phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje rin chen don bzang mchog /rdo rje nam mkha' nor bu che/ /nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje phyug /rdo rje snying por phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje gzi brjid cher 'bar ba/ /rdo rje nyi ma rgyal

ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje 'od zer gzi brjid che/ /rdo rje sgron mar phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sems can don rab rdo rje tog /rdo rje rgyal mtshan legs tshim pa/ /rdo rje tog ste rdo rje che/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje sku khyod la/ /rdo rje gad mo gad rgyangs che/ /rdo rje 'dzum pa ngo mtshar che/ /dga' zhing rab dgyes rdo

rje mchog /phyag 'tshal rdo rje dgyes khyod la/ /sems can don rab rdo rje chos/ /rdo rje pad+ma legs dag pa/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje'i spyan/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje spyan khyod la/ /rdo rje rnon po theg pa che/ /rdo rje mdzod ste mtshon cha che/ /'jam dpal rdo rje zab mo ste/ /rdo rje blo gros khyod phyag

'tshal/ /rdo rje rgyu ste snying po che/ /rdo rje 'khor lo tshul chen po/ /rab bskor rdo rje las skyes pa/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje rgyan khyod la/ /rdo rje smra ba rigs bzang mchog /rdo rje bzlas pa legs grub gsol/ /mi smra rdo rje dngos grub mchog /phyag 'tshal rdo rje gsung khyod la/ /rdo rje las rab

rdo rjes mtshan/ /las kyi rdo rje kun 'gro mdzes/ /rdo rje don yod cher yangs pa/ /sna tshogs rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje bsrung ba brtan pa che/ /rdo rje chos te cher sra ba/ /'thab dka' shin tu dpa' ba'i mchog /rdo rje brtson 'grus khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin

thabs chen po/ /rdo rje mche ba cher 'jigs pa/ /bdud rab 'joms pa'i rdo rje grag /phyag 'tshal rdo rje gtum khyod la/ /rdo rje mtshams te legs bsnyen pa/ /rdo rje 'ching ba rab 'grol ba/ /rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig mchog /rdo rje khu tshur khyod phyag 'tshal/ /khyod kyi mtshan brgya rtsa

brgyad pa/ /dge ba 'di ni gang 'dzin pa/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang la sogs/ /kun gyi dam pas dbang bskur ba'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yi/ /mtshan 'di rnams kyis yon tan tshogs/ /rtag tu dbyangs kyis stod byed na/ /de yang rdo rje 'dzin pa mtshungs/ /mtshan brgya rtsa

brgyad 'di dag gis/ /bdag cag rnams kyis mngon bstod pa'i/ /theg pa chen po mngon rtogs pa'i/ /tshul chen po ni rnam par spros/ /mgon po khyod la zhu ba bgyid/ /cho ga dam pa gsung du gsol/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mchog

gi ni/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje dbyings zhes bya ba'i

dkyil 'khor chen po'i mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ 'di dag thams cad rgyud gzhan las bshad pas na 'dir mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen po/ rdo rje 'chang chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi yab/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams nyid kyi thugs kar bcug nas gcig tu mi phyed par gyur nas spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas phyag na rdo rje'i mdun du gzhag nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

dpa' bo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul la bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi char 'bebs par byed pas bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas nyid sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol/ gang gis sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas nyid bdag gis sbyin par bgyi'o/ /de nas ci tshul gzhan nam theg pa chen po'i

tshul gyis lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje theg pa chen po'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas nyid sgrub bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan

'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ci dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas nyid sgrub bam/ 'on te gsang ba'i tshul gyis lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag

na rdo rje gsang ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub par bya ste/ lag na rdo rje ngas kyang gsang ba'i tshul des dbang bskur nas lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i tshul des nga yang yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das khyod slob dpon gang gis dbang bskur ba lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i slob dpon des dbang bskur ro/ /gang gis gsang ba'i de thob nas

sangs rgyas nyid brnyes par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gsang ba de'i rang bzhin gang lags/ des chos gang gsung bar mdzad ci sbyor ba gzhan gsungs sam/ 'on te zab mo'i tshul khyod la bstan pa lags/

bcom ldan 'das gsang ba de'i rang bzhin ma 'tshal bas ci zhig lags/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje 'dis chos ma bstan cing cung zad kyang ma bshad do/ /'on

kyang lag na rdo rje rang gi shes rab kyi tshul dang / shes rab kyi khyad par gyis bdag nyid gsang ba bsnyen pa brtsam par bya'o/ /de nas gsang ba brten pa las gang dag 'o ma'i thigs pa 'od zer dang bcas par gyur pa dang / de nas 'od zer gyi phreng ba las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi sku rnams rnam par phyung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de rnams las 'od zer gyi phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje'i gzugs dang / khro bo'i gzugs rnams dbyung bar bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das

de lta na'ang gsang ba de bsten pa nyid ji lta bu'i rnam pas 'grub pa lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje dang po re zhig ji ltar bya ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya yis nyon

cig /sngags pas re zhig bdag gi ting nge 'dzin sngon du 'gro bar bya ste/ bdag nyid bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas phyis gsang ba nyid bsten par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems

dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ji lta bu'i rnam pas lha mo de rnams bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can 'ga' zhig dad pa dang ldan pa yod pa de dag ni rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis bdag

sgrub par 'dod la/ de dag sbyor ba mi shes shing nus pa dang mi ldan pas de rnams kyi tshe zad par gyur kyang lha mo rnams kyi thugs rje'i thugs skye bar mi 'gyur zhing sems kyi gsal ba yang mi byed pa des na lag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyor ba shes par bya'o/ /de

nyid kyi phyir lag na rdo rje phyag rgya dang / sngags thams cad dang legs par ldan pas ji tsam zhig gi nyi ma'i nges pas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir lag na rdo rje rgyud 'di ni lha thams cad dang / lha mo rnams dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo rnams kyi sbyor ba legs par ldan pas sgrub par byed pa'o/ /

des na lag na rdo rje sngags pa gsang sngags kyi bdag po gsang ba'i bdag por bshad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag sngags pa ma lags pa gsang ba'i bdag po ma lags pas bcom ldan 'das

ji ltar gsang ba dang sngags rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur ba de ltar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje des na sngags pas re zhig dngos grub gzhan bsgrub par bya'o/ /de bsgrubs na las thams cad byed

do/ /bskrad pa dang / gsad pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / rengs pa dang / dgug pa la sogs pa rnams bsgrub par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyi dngos grub la sogs pa rnams kyang 'grub na dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes

bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das thog mar bsgrub par bgyi ba gang lags/ ci rig pa'i rgyal mo bsgrub par bgyi'am/ 'on te dbang du bya ba la sogs pa bsgrub par bgyi'am/ yang na ral gri la sogs pa bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das de'i phyir thog mar

dngos grub gang bsgrub pa bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes gnang ba/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/ /de'i phyir lag na rdo rje

rig pa'i rgyal mo thog mar bsgrub par bya ste/ gang gis sems can rnams la gsang ba ster bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji lta bu'i rnam pas lha mo de bsgrub par bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje rnam pa gzhan las rnam pa gang bshad pa de khyod kyis sgrub pa bzod par byos shig /de nas lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gzhan gang bdag gis bzod par bgyi/

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje sems can kim pa ka'i 'bras bu lta bu dag yod de/ phyi rol gyi gzugs phun sum tshogs shing nang gi cha dri ma bro zhing bro ba nyams pa yongs su zhu nas 'chi ba la sogs par nus pa de lta bu'i sems can gang

phyi rol gyi gsang ba bshad pa tsam gyis spro zhing nang du slar brtags pas dad pa dang mi ldan zhing nyan thos kyi theg pa dag la rab tu gsal ba de dag la rgyud 'di bshad par mi bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje de'i phyir/ lha mo thams cad kyi rang gi phyag rgya dang / sngags rnams kyis mnyes pa'i sbyor

bas de rnams bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang gis mnyes pa'i gsang sngags shes par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po

rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje 'di ni mnyes pa'i gsang sngags kyis ma yin te/ lag na rdo rje sbyor ba'i dbang gis de rnams bsgrub par bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje nyon cig /rnam pa gang gis rig pa'i lha mo dang bcas pa'i lha rnams 'grub

cing grub nas sangs rgyas nyid ster ba de khyod la bzhin du bshad par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam pa ji lta bus ni lha mo de rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid ster ba bka' stsal du gsol/

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje rnam pa gang gis lha mo de rnams 'grub pa dang / gsang ba'i de kho na gang gis lha mo de rnams kyis legs par 'grub par 'gyur ba bshad par bya yis nyon cig /de nas

bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig /sngags pa gang gis lha mo gang bsgrub par rigs pa de des bsgrub par bya ste/ rang gi phyag rgya dang sngags kyi sbyor bas lha mo de bkug nas mdun du gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid sngon

bshad pa'i rim pas rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bsgoms la rdo rje sems dpa'i sku des lha mo de mnyes par bya'o/ /de nas mnyes te gdon mi za bar dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom

ldan 'das rnam pa gang gis mnyes par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje rdo rje sems dpa'i sku des lha mo de'i gsang ba'i b+ha gar nyid kyis rdo rjes bsten par bya'o/ bsten pas bde ba nyid du 'gyur te/ de nas lha

mo de dgyes te mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar bud med rang nyid kyi bdag po la dga' bar lta ba ltar de bzhin du lha mo de'ang gsang sngags 'dzin pa de la dga' ba'i dbang gis lta bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' ba'i dbang gis tshim par 'gyur ro/ /'di bzhin du bud med gzhan bsten pas

kyang mchog ster na lha mos lta smos kyang ci dgos/ lag na rdo rje dper na rdo rje rags pas bsnun pa'i bud med bdag po gzhan mi 'dod pa de bzhin du lha mo de'ang gsang bas bsnun pa na sngags pa gzhan 'dod pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du gsang ba'i sbyor bas lha mo gang zhi ba'i tshul gyis zhi ba'i

tshul 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gang khro mo'i tshul gyis khro mo'i tshul 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang khro bo rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi tshul bzung nas rdo rje gan+d+ha rI la sogs pa'i lha mo sngags pas bsgrub par bya'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi tshul gyis sgrol ma la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas lag

na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de nas re zhig khro bo'i tshul ji ltar rnam par gzhag par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi sbyor ba de nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje gan+d+ha rI zhes bya ba

rig pa'i lha mo bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal nas gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje hU~M mdzad de dang / rdo rje gan+d+ha rI lhan cig tu sems can gdug pa can

thams cad gdul ba'i don du nges par phyung ngo / /de nas rdo rje hU~M mdzad lha mo de'ang shin tu dga' ba'i mig gis lta zhing ched du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod pa/ e ma khro bo thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje khro bo bla na med/ /mdzes ma 'di ni thob nas su/ /gdug pa thams cad gdul bar bya/ /de

nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje hU~M mdzad de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /legs so rdo rje hU~M mdzad/ lha mo 'di thob nas sangs rgyas nyid byos shig /de nas lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang gis lha mo 'di sgrub pa lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje nyon cig /gang mnyes pas de rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba lha mo thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo

rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig /rdo rje gan+d+ha rI 'di khro bo'i tshul gyis bsgrub par bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje sngags pa des rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi tshul du gnas nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings te/ rang gi lus byin gyis brlabs nas slar yang skyil krung byas la/ khams

gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags brjod par bya'o/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M hU~M phaT/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M hU~M phaT/ gr-ih+la pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM A na ya hoHb+ha ga bAn bid+yA rA dza hU~M hU~M phaT/ ces lan gsum brjod la de nas bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol

to/ /lha mo de'i snying po gang gis 'grub par 'gyur ba lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos rdo rje chen po khro bo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de nas khams gsum dral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rig pa bka' stsal pa/ gang gis lha la sogs pa'i gdon

thams cad 'jigs shing sdug bsngal bas brgya byin gyi pha rol gnon pa lta bu yang 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /'di bzlas pa tsam gyis skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /khro bo'i tshul gyis gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed do/ /thams cad skrod par byed do/ /thams cad rengs par byed

do/ /lag na rdo rje de'i phyir sngags pas tshul 'dis bzlas par bya/ bklag par bya'o/ /na ma Sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ badzra gan+d+ha ri/ a ne ka rasmi sha ta sa ha sra pra dz+wa li ta dIp+ta/ dzA yai u gra b+hISh+ma b+ha yA ni kA yai/ yo gi n+yai/ b+hIsma b+ha gi n+yai/ khaDa mu khA ye/

dwAd sha ne trA yai/ dwA da shA b+hu dzA yai/ bi kIr+N+Na ke shA yai/ a ne ka rU pi bid+ha bi shwa d+hA ri N+yai/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga ba ti ma hA badzra gan+d+ha ri tra yA NA~M rat+nA nA~M/ sa t+ye na A kaD+D+h+ya/ a kad+b+h+ya/ ba la de ba~M/ ma he shwa ra~M/ brah+ma Na~M/ in+d+ra~M/ tsan+d+ra~M/ ya ma~M/ ba ru Na~M/ ba yu~M/ ku be ra~M/ d+h+r-i ta rASh+TaM/ bi ru D+ha ka~M /bi rU

pak+Sha~M/ sha~M ku kar+N+Na~M/ kor+N+Na~M/ s+thU la kah+Na/ ma hA kA la~M/ nan+di ke shwa ra~M/ b+h-i gi ri ti/ nA ya ka~M /bi nA ya ka~M /pAny+tsi ka~M /dA ma ka~M lo ha ka~M /ShiSh+Ti/ de bi ko Ti gi ri ko Ta/ o~M kA ri/ durgA~M/ ka t+yA ya ni/ tsaN+Da ka t+yA ya ni/ e Sha ni/ nai rIt+yA~M/ kA li ma~M ma hA kA li/ b+ha dra

kA liM/ badzra kA liM/ tsUr+N+Na kA liM/ k+Shu dra kA liM/ shak+tiM/ sha li ka brti/ sha tAk+ShiM/ in+d+ra Ni/ brah+ma Ni/ kau mA rI/ ma he shwa ra~M/ su b+ha ga~M /rau dri/ tsA mu N+Da~M/ bA rA hI/ kau be rI/ ye tsa a n+ye sa ma ye na tiSh+Than+ti tan/ A brta yi Sh+yA mi shi g+h+ra~M gr-ih+Na~M/ oM la la la la/ hu lu hu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/

mu lu mu lu/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ ra~M ga ra~M ga /ra~M gA pa ya ra~M ga pa ya/ pu ra pu ra/ pU ra ya pU ra ya/ A na ya/ A na ya/ A bi sha/ A bi sha/ A be sha ya/ A be sha ya/ b+ha ga ba ti ma hA badzra gan+d+ha ri sid+d+hany+tsaN+Da badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti hrIH/ haH/ haH/ haH/ haH/ hUM phaT swA hA/ lag na rdo rje de'i phyir 'di

bzlas pa tsam gyis dgug par mi nus pa'i ri bo la sogs pa rnams kyang 'gugs par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga bka' stsal pa/ dkar ba'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te ji srid tshes brgyad kyi bar du stong phrag brgyad bzla'o/ /de nas 'grub par

'gyur ro/ /grub nas las thams cad byed do/ /gu gul gyi bdug pas bde bar 'gugs par byed do/ /'di dag thams cad phyi rol gyi lam la bshad do/ /gang zhig yang theg pa chen po glang po che'i phrag tu yang dag par zhon pa de rnams la des pa gang zhig yod/ des rdo

rje gan+d+ha rI'i sngags dang phyag rgyas bkug ste khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba bcing ste gung mo phan tshun yongs su sbyar la/ mthe'u chung 'og tu bstan te nor bu'i rnam par byas pa'i phyag rgya 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig sbyin pa'o/ /de nas rtsa ba'i phyag rgyar gyur pa na/ rdo rje thal mo dam bcings

nas/ /thal mo steng du dbye bar bya/ /gung mo dag ni rtse mor bya/ /ming med gdong ni legs par sbyar/ /mthe bong gnyis po sbyar nas su/ /rtse mo'i steng du gzhag par bya/ /'di ni bcom ldan rtsa ba'i rgya/ /de nyid mthe bong skyil krung gdan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid yongs su gtang ba'i sbyor

bas gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang ji lta bu'i rnam pas sems can dbang du bgyid par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag

na rdo rje rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sngags 'dis bcom ldan 'das ma bsgoms la brla gnyis su bzhag ste dam du 'khyud nas de'i rtsa ba'i gdong gi mchu sos bzung ste/ de'i b+ha gar rdo rje son par byas la de nas lha mo de 'di skad smra ste/ a ho su kha zhes de lta bu'i sbyor ba'i rnam pas lha mo de grub nas de nas

las thams cad byed do/ /mar gyis btags pa'i tsan+dan gyi shing gis bsreg blugs byas na tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gyur nas kyang ci bgyi bka' lung stsol cig ces smra bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshan gcig gis de dag thams cad byed do/ /de nas mi rnams dbang du bya

bar 'dod pas lha mo de nyid ting nge 'dzin gyis yungs kar skya bo la cung zad cig byin gyis brlabs la/ des bram ze la bsnun pas de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs la yang de nyid kyi cho ga'o/ /de nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis skyu ru ra la mngon par bsngags te/ rje'u rigs la byin na de dbang du 'gyur

ro/ /de nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis cud tog la mngon par bsngags te/ dmangs rigs la byin pas de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'di dag gi rim bzhin du rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i bud med rnams la byin pas kyang dbang du 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyis dur khrod kyi thal ba la mngon par bsngags te/

gang gi khyim du gzhag pa de 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis drag po'i lta stangs kyis gang la bltas pa de 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /khro bo'i lta stangs kyis gang la bltas pa de bskyod par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad dang phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang

nga lta bu yang skyod par byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sbyor ba'i rgyal po chen po 'dis 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyang skrod lags na gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje theg pa chen po'i tshul 'dis gang cung zad bsgrubs pa de thams cad gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzlas brjod kyi rim pa

de gang gis stong phrag brgyad bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnams kyi bzlas pa'i grangs dang / nyi ma'i grangs bshad pa yin te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la dad pas rjes

su 'brang ba de rnams kyis skye ba du mar sangs rgyas nyid thob par mi 'gyur te/ gal te de rnams kyis grub kyang tshe 'dir rgyal po'i longs spyod la sogs pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag theg pa chen po'i shing rta la yang dag par zhon pa de rnams kyis nyin gcig tsam gyis kyang 'di ltar sangs

rgyas nyid kyang thob par 'gyur na/ nyi ma mang pos dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ lag na rdo rje shing rta la sogs pa'i theg pa glang po che dang / rta mchog dang ldan pa la ni nam du yang chud zos pa med par mngon par 'dod pa'i yul du phyin pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po yang dag pa'i rjes su

gdams pa dang / legs par ldan pa gang du yang mi gnas par 'gro bas ni rnam par snang mdzad nyid dam/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'am/ gzhan nyid du phyin par rig par bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje de'i phyir theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas pa la ni rnam par rtog pa cung zad dang mi ldan par

'gyur ro/ /des na chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog par yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ /de'i phyir lag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha mo thams cad kyi bdag po rang yin no/ /zhes sgom pas bsgom par bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje de bzhin du lha mo thams cad kyi rdo rje bsgom

pa'i khyad par gang gis las thams cad byas te sangs rgyas nyid sgrub par byed pa slar yang bshad par bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje nyon cig /khro ba dang ldan pa'i sngags pa cung zad tsam byed pa na tshul 'dis bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje gan+d+ha rI'i b+ha gar zhugs te/ phra mo'i sbyor bas rtsa brgyad gcig tu byas te/

rtsa gcig las 'dzag pa dang ldan par rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /sngags pas gal te dbang du bya bar 'dod na des kha dog dmar por rnam par bsam mo/ /zhu ba dmar po de las bdag nyid rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi gzugs su rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi gzugs des sems can
