las ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su/ la las ni tshangs pa'i gzugs su/ la las ni sred med kyi bu'i gzugs su/ la las ni rnam thos kyi bu'i gzugs su nas/ la las ni lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du mthong ste/ rang rang gi tshig brjod pa'i tshul

dag dang / spyod lam sna tshogs su mthong la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de yang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ror ro gcig pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na nam mkha'i khams ni rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad

dang bral ba ste/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba ste/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po 'di ni sems can thams

cad kyi gsos su gyur pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi gsos su gyur pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ me'i khams ni bud shing thams cad sreg pas

nam yang yongs su bas par mi 'gyur lags so/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang mi shes pa'i bud shing thams cad sreg pas nam yang yongs su bas par mi 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ rlung gi khams

ni rdul thams cad sel bar bgyid pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang mi shes pa'i rdul thams cad sel bar mdzad pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ chu'i khams ni sems can thams cad kyi lus sim

par bgyid pa lags so/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rab tu sim par bgyid pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rtsa ba ni gang lags/ mthar thug pa ni gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa

dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/ /lag na rdo rje gang khyod nga la don 'di 'dri ba ni yang legs so/ /de'i phyir nyon la legs par rab tu yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad

do/ /rgyu ni byang chub kyi sems so/ /rtsa ba ni snying rje chen po'o/ /mthar thug pa ni thabs so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la byang chub gang zhe na/ rang gi sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes pa ste/ de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo//

gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la ni chos rdul tsam yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub de ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ de la byang chub par byed pa yang med la/ byang chub par bya ba'ang 'ga' yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub la mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir te/

gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos thams cad kyang mtshan nyid med pa 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gang nas yongs su btsal bar bgyi/ gang gis ni byang chub

mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rang gi sems las yongs su btsal bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems de ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa yin te/ de ni

nang na med/ phyi rol na yang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na yang mi dmigs so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma gzigs/ gzigs par mi 'gyur te/ sngon por ma yin/ ser por ma yin

dmar por ma yin/ dkar por ma yin/ kha dog le brgan du ma yin/ shel gyi kha dog tu ma yin/ thung ngur ma yin/ ring por ma yin/ zlum por ma yin/ gru bzhir ma yin/ snang bar ma yin/ mun par ma yin/ skyes par ma yin/ bud med du ma yin/ ma ning du ma

yin no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems de ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin no/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /

mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'gro ba sems can ris mthun pa'i rang bzhin ma yin no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems de ni mig la mi gnas/ rna ba ma yin/ sna la ma yin/ lce la ma yin/ lus la ma yin/ yid la mi gnas so/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems de ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ de'i phyir rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni sems kyi rang bzhin no/ /sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin te/

gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar na sems dang / nam mkha'i dbyings dang / byang chub 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /de yang snying rje'i rtsa ba can/ thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gzung ba ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar nga

byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi nang du chos gang dang gang ston pa de thams cad ni/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir yin par rig par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu

mo byang chub yongs su shes par 'dod pas rang gi sems nyid yongs su shes par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po ci ltar rang gi sems yongs su shes par bya zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par ram/ kha dog tu'am/ dbyibs su'am/ yul du'am/ gzugs su'am/ tshor bar ram/

'du shes su'am/ 'du byed du'am/ rnam par shes par ram/ bdag tu'am/ bdag gir ram/ gzung bar ram/ 'dzin par ram/ dag par ram/ ma dag par ram/ khams su'am/ skye mched du'am/ rnam pa thams cad kyi bar du yongs su btsal kyang mi

dmigs pa yin te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba chos snang ba'i sgo chos snang ba'i tshul dang po ste/ gang la gnas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshegs chung ngus sgrib pa thams cad spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob

cing / de thob pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas thams cad dang lhan cig 'grogs pa thob par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga dag kyang thob par 'gyur/ skad dang sgra dang dbyangs mtha' yas pa'i gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur/ sems can gyi bsam pa rjes su shes

pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs shing 'khor ba na yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur/ sems can gyi don bya ba dag la yongs su mi skyo bar 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas kyi tshul khrims la rab tu gnas pa dang / log par lta ba rnam par spangs pa

dang / yang dag par lta ba rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba yin no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang sgrib pa thams cad spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ mos pa'i stobs skyes pas tshegs chung dus sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su

rdzogs par byed de/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po mdor na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes yongs su zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa zhes bgyi ba

lags/ byang chub 'byung ba'i sems skyes pa'i/ /mtshan nyid ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ /sems mkhyen pa ni rnams kyi mchog /dpa' chen ye shes las byung ba/ /ji snyed cig las 'das nas ni/ /skye bar 'gyur ba bstan du gsol/ /mgon po sems kyi mtshan nyid

dang / /dus kyang rgya cher bshad du gsol/ /de dag bsod nams ci 'dra dang / /spyod pa ci 'drar 'gyur ba dang / /sems la sems kyi khyad par yang / /thub pa chen pos bstan du gsol/ /de skad gsol nas de yi tshe/ /bcom ldan rnam par snang chen gyis/ /phyag na

rdo rje cher 'byung la/ /legs so bu zhes 'di skad gsungs/ /theg pa chen po'i go 'phang mchog /sems kyi rgyud kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsang ba'i mchog /rtog ge kun gyis mi shes pa/ /thams cad khyod la bshad par bya/ /yid gcig bsdus la

mnyan par gyis/ /sems ni brgya rtsa drug cu las/ /'das nas byang chub nyid kyi phyir/ /bsod nams ches 'byung snying po ste/ /byang chub 'byung ba skye bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha' lta bur dpag med cing / /gos pa med de ci bzhin gnas/ /chos kun gyis ni mi sgul te/ /gzod

nas zhi zhing mtshan nyid med/ /dpag med ye shes kyis bsgrubs pa/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas ston pa/ /mchod dang spyod pas bsgrubs pa'i phyir/ /byang chub phyir ni dang por 'dod/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la 'khor ba thog ma med pa na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ngar 'dzin

pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pas bdag gi khyad par grangs med pa rab tu brtags te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la bdag gi ngo bo nyid la ma dpyad par bdag go zhes ngar 'dzin pa kun nas bslang ngo / /gzhan dag ni dus las byung ba dang / 'dzin pa pos sprul pa dang / nges par

'byung ba dang 'di lta ste/ dbang phyug dang / 'byin pa po dang / dus dang / gtso bo dang / byed pa po dang / byed pa po ma yin pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / tshad ma dang / dag pa dang / ma dag pa dang / nang gi bdag dang / skyes bu dang / khyab bdag dang / srog dang /

gang zag dang / rnam par shes pa dang / kun gzhi dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po dang / gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / shes pa dang / shes bya dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang / brjod par bya ba dang / brjod par bya ba ma yin

par rtog ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po bdag gi khyad par de lta bu la sogs pa rnal 'byor 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag gis thar bar 'dod pas sngon brtags pa yin no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang byis pa so so'i skye bo phyugs dang mtshungs pa rnams las brgya lam na/ res

'ga' zhig chos kyi 'du shes 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/ smyung bar gnas pa la gnas par bya'o/ /zhes de tsam zhig sems la byas te/ mgu ba bskyed nas phyi phyir zhing de nyid la goms par byed de/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ni dge ba'i las skye ba'i sa bon lta bu ste sems dang po'o/ /

de rgyu de nyid kyi mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i nyi ma de dang de dag la pha ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye du dag la sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ 'di ni myu gu lta bu ste gnyis pa'o/ /gzhan yang sbyin pa de nyid mi shes pa dag la yang sbyin par byed de/ 'di ni sdong bu

lta bu ste gsum pa'o/ /gzhan yang sbyin pa de nyid snod du rung ba yongs su tshol zhing sbyin par byed de/ 'di ni lo ma lta bu ste bzhi pa'o/ /gzhan yang sbyin pa de nyid bla ma'am rol mo mkhan la dga' bzhin du sbyin par byed de/ 'di ni me tog lta bu ste lnga pa'o/ /gzhan yang sbyin pa

de nyid yid dga' ba dag la sbyin par byed de/ 'di ni 'bras bu lta bu ste drug pa'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang mtho ris su skye bar bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims bsrung ste/ 'di ni gsos su gyur pa ste bdun pa'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang sems de lta bu nyid kyis

'khor bar rgyu ba na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la la zhig las tshig 'di skad thos te/ lha 'di dag ni lha chen te/ /thams cad la ni bde ba ster/ /de la khyod kyis gus mchod dang / /thams cad 'byor pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de dag kyang ni 'di lta ste/ /dbang phyug dang ni tshangs pa

dang / /de bzhin khyab 'jug bde byed dang / /drag po skem byed de bzhin du/ /nyi ma zla ba chu lha nyid/ /lus ngan nor sbyin brgya byin dang / /mig mi bzang dang sna tshogs 'byung / /gshin rje dus mtshan mya ngan 'das/ /'jig rten gtso zhes bya ba dang / /me dang rnam par 'dud pa'i

bu/ /de bzhin lha mo dka' thub zlog /pad+ma dang ni 'jog po klu/ /nor ldan dang ni dung zhes bya/ /karko Ta ka pad+ma che/ /rigs can dang ni gdengs ka mang / /rtag tu mtha' yas thog ma'i lha/ /de bzhin lha dang drang srong mchog /rig byed rig byed skyes bu yin/ /mkhas

pas mchod pa gyis shig ces/ /de las de 'dra'i tshig thos nas/ /yid ni yang dag mgu gyur te/ /de tshe rab tu gus ldan pas/ /de dag la ni nan tan byed/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo 'khor ba na kun tu 'khyam pa rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa'i mchog yin

te/ 'di ni stobs su gyur pa ste/ sems brgyad par rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad do/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang khyad par rtogs pa ci skad du yongs su bsgrags pa'i khyad par de dang de dag la khyad par du gnas pa rnams la 'ba' zhig pa nyid kyi don du blo skye zhing / de yang yod do

yod do zhes stong pa nyid kho na la dngos por sems te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de dag gis ni stong pa nyid rab tu mi shes so/ /stong pa nyid ni dngos po yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa yang ma yin/ yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin/ gnyi ga yang ma yin te/ de la rtog pa'am/

mi rtog pa yang med na/ de la ci ltar stong pa zhes brtag par bya/ gang dag stong nyid mi shes pa/ /de dag mya ngan 'das mi shes/ /de phyir dngos dang dngos med pa/ /'jig pas stong nyid shes par bya/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan

'das sems kyi khyad par de dag bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems kyi khyad par gyi mtshan nyid nyon cig /gsang ba pa'i bdag

po de la sems 'di ni 'dod chags kyi sems dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems dang / zhe sdang gi sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / gti mug gi sems dang / shes rab kyi sems dang / gtan la phab pa'i sems dang / the tsom gyi sems dang / mun par gyur

pa'i sems dang / snang bar gyur pa'i sems dang / sdud pa'i sems dang / 'thab pa'i sems dang / rtsod pa'i sems dang / mi rtsod pa'i sems dang / lha'i sems dang / lha ma yin gyi sems dang / klu'i sems dang / mi'i sems dang / bud med kyi sems dang / dbang

phyug gi sems dang / tshong pa'i sems dang / zhing pa'i sems dang / chu bo'i sems dang / lteng ka'i sems dang / khron pa'i sems dang / kun tu bsrung ba'i sems dang / ser sna'i sems dang / khyi'i sems dang / byi la'i sems dang / nam mkha' lding gi sems

dang / byi ba'i sems dang / glu'i sems dang / gar gyi sems dang / sil snyan gyi sems dang / khyim gyi sems dang / seng ge'i sems dang / 'ug pa'i sems dang / bya rog gi sems dang / srin po'i sems dang / tsher ma'i sems dang / sa 'og gi sems dang / rlung

gi sems dang / chu'i sems dang / me'i sems dang / 'dam gyi sems dang / rnyog pa'i sems dang / tshon rtsi'i sems dang / shing leb kyi sems dang / 'khrul pa'i sems dang / dug gi sems dang / zhags pa'i sems dang / lcags sgrog gi sems dang / sprin

gyi sems dang / zhing gi sems dang / lan tshwa'i sems dang / spu gri'i sems dang / ri rab lta bu'i sems dang / rgya mtsho lta bu'i sems dang / phug lta bu'i sems dang / skye bar gyur pa'i sems so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la 'dod chags kyi sems gang zhe na/ chags

pa can chos kun tu sten pa'o/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kun tu sten pa'o/ /zhe sdang gi sems gang zhe na/ sdang bas chos kun tu sten pa'o/ /byams pa'i sems gang zhe na/ byams pa dang ldan pas chos sten pa'o/ /

gti mug gi sems gang zhe na/ gang mi dpyod par chos sten pa'o/ /shes rab kyi sems gang zhe na/ khyad par las khyad par gzhan rtogs par bya ste chos sten pa'o/ /gtan la phab pa'i sems gang zhe na/ bka' dang bla ma'i tshig bzhin byed pa nyid do/ /the tshom gyi sems

gang zhe na/ ci ltar yongs su gzung ba nges pa dag la som nyi sten pa nyid do/ /mun par gyur pa'i sems gang zhe na/ som nyi med pa la som nyir 'du shes pa'o/ /snang bar gyur pa'i sems gang zhe na/ som nyi med pa la som nyi med par sten pa'o/ /sdud pa'i sems gang zhe

na/ du ma gcig tu byed pa'o/ /'thab pa'i sems gang zhe na/ phan tshun rtsod pa nyid do/ /rtsod pa'i sems gang zhe na/ gang bdag nyid dang bdag nyid du rtsod pa'o/ /mi rtsod pa'i sems gang zhe na/ mnyam pas mtshungs par lta ba'o/ /lha'i sems gang zhe na/ yid kyis

bdag nyid la rlom sems su byed pa'o/ /lha ma yin gyi sems gang zhe na/ gang 'khor ba nyid la smod pa'o/ /klu'i sems gang zhe na/ gang longs spyod chen po nyid du bya ba'i phyir sems pa'o/ /mi'i sems gang zhe na/ de nyid kyi don du sems pa'o/ /bud med kyi sems gang

zhe na/ 'dod pa kho na'i phyir chos sten pa'o/ /dbang phyug gi sems gang zhe na/ gang bdag gis thams cad bsams so snyam du rlom sems su byed pa'o/ /tshong pa'i sems gang zhe na/ gang bsdu ba byas te rnam par spel nas phyis sten pa'o/ /zhing pa'i sems gang zhe na/

gang thos pa rnam pa du ma tshol zhing phyis sten pa'o/ /chu bo'i sems gang zhe na/ gang mtha' gnyis la ltos shing sten pa'o/ /lteng ka'i sems gang zhe na/ gang sred pas sten pa'o/ /khron pa'i sems gang zhe na/ gang mi zab pa la zab par sems pa'o/ /kun tu bsrung

pa'i sems gang zhe na/ 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go snyam du sems pa'o/ /ser sna'i sems gang zhe na/ bdag nyid bsten cing gzhan la mi ster ba'o/ /byi la'i sems gang zhe na/ gang mchod pa la ltos te sten pa'o/ /khyi'i sems

gang zhe na/ gang chung dus kyang mgu bar 'gyur ba'o/ /nam mkha' lding gi sems gang zhe na/ gang phyogs 'dzin pas chos la sten pa'o/ /byi ba'i sems gang zhe na/ 'ching ba thams cad gcad pa'i phyir sems pa'o/ /glu'i sems gang zhe na/ bdag

gis dbyangs sgra sna tshogs kyi glus sems can rnams gzung bar bya'o snyam pa'o/ /gar gyi sems gang zhe na/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs kyis gzhan dag yang dag par 'dzin pa gzhug go snyam du sems pa'o/ /sil snyan gyi sems gang zhe na/ bdag gis chos kyi

rnga brdung ngo snyam pa'o/ /khyim gyi sems gang zhe na/ bdag gi lus kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir sten pa'o/ /seng ge'i sems gang zhe na/ gang thams cad zil gyis gnon pa sten pa'o/ /'ug pa'i sems gang zhe na/ gang mtshan mo sems pa'o/ /bya rog gi

sems gang zhe na/ gang thams cad du skrag pas sems pa'o/ /srin po'i sems gang zhe na/ dge bas mi dge ba rnams sgrub pa'o/ /tsher ma'i sems gang zhe na/ gang thams cad du 'gyod pa sems pa'o/ /sa 'og gi sems gang zhe na/ sa'i 'og gi don du

sems pa'o/ /rlung gi sems gang zhe na/ gang thams cad du thams cad sgrub pa'o/ /chu'i sems gang zhe na/ gang mi dge ba thams cad bkru ba'i phyir sten pa'o/ /me'i sems gang zhe na/ gang dka' thub nyid kyis gdung bar byed pa'o/ /'dam gyi

sems gang zhe na/ gang bdag gi nyes pas gzhan la skur ba'o/ /rnyog pa'i sems gang zhe na/ gang pha rol gyi nyes pa 'dzin pas sems la rnyog pa skyed pa'o/ /tshon rtsi'i sems gang zhe na/ gang de la chags pa nyid du sten pa'o/ /shing leb kyi sems gang zhe

na gang dge ba'i gzhan spong bas sten pa'o/ /nor ba'i sems gang zhe na/ gzhan bzung zhing gzhan kho nar sems pa'o/ /dug gi sems gang zhe na/ gang shin tu dngos po med pa nyid sems pa'o/ /zhags pa'i sems gang zhe na/ gang thams cad du bdag nyid bcings

shing 'dug pa'o/ /lcags sgrog gi sems gang zhe na/ gang rkang pa gnyis la 'dug ste sems pa'o/ /sprin gyi sems gang zhe na/ gang chu dag la sems pa'o/ /zhing gi sems gang zhe na/ rang gi lus nyid yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'o/ /lan tshwa'i sems gang zhe na/

gang zhig gang gis sems par byed pa de la yang sems pa'o/ /spu gri'i sems gang zhe na/ gang rab tu byung ba tsam la sten pa'o/ /ri rab lta bu'i sems gang zhe na/ gang mtho bar gyur nas sems pa'o/ /rgya mtsho lta bu'i sems gang zhe na/ gang rang gi lus nyid la

mchog tu 'dzin cing 'dug pa'o/ /phug lta bu'i sems gang zhe na/ gang sngar nges par gyur la phyis de nyid kyis 'gyur bar sten pa'o/ /de la skye bar gyur pa'i sems gang zhe na/ gang gi sems 'du byed gang kho na dang skyes pa de kho na dang lhan cig tu 'gro ba'o/ /gsang

ba pa'i bdag po de ltar na gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga gnyis su bsgyur ba byas pas/ 'jig rten pa'i sems brgya drug cu bskal pa gsum gyis 'das nas/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems skye ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'di ni phung po tsam nyid de/ /bdag ni nam yang yod

ma yin/ /dbang po'i grong khyer khams rnams kyis/ /'jig rten don med rnam par nyams/ /yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel 'di/ /nyon mongs las kyis kun nas bslang / /ma rig sa bon las byung ba/ /byed po la sogs rnam par spangs/ /de ltar zhi zhing

shin tu zab/ /rtog ge kun gyis shes par dka'/ /nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon bstan pa'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems la gnas pa rnams la yang phung po la yod do snyam pa'i blo nye bar

skye'o/ /nam phung po dag la 'dod chags dang bral bar skyed pa de'i tshe lbu ba dang / chu'i chu bur dang / sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang mtshungs par 'jig pas rnam par grol bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnam

par spangs pa/ chos nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo zhi ba'i dbyings rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems phyin ci log dang / phyin ci ma log pa'i sems kyi khyad par brgyad dang 'brel pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa'i dra ba dang bral ba 'di ni rnal

'byor pa dag bskal pa gcig gis 'da' bar byed do/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang theg pa chen pos bgrod pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams la chos la bdag med pa'i sems skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag sngon spyad pa spyod cing phung po'i gnas rnam

par 'jig pa na ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pa'i phyir sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / gzugs brnyan dang / brag ca dang / mgal me'i 'khor lo dang / dri za'i grong khyer lta bu'i 'du shes skyes so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de'i phyir de dag gi sems kyi dbang du byas pas chos la

bdag med pa nyid kyang spang bar bya ste/ rang gi sems ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pa'i phyir sems la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs te/ rnal 'byor pa dag 'di yang bskal pa

gnyis kyis 'da' bar byed do/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa bsags

pa rnams la shes rab dang thabs dpag tu med pas yongs su bzung ba/ lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag byas pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis las yang dag par 'das pa/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po dang / nye

dbang la sogs pas phyag byas pa 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rdzas med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ spros pa thams cad las 'das pa/ nam mkha' ltar dpag tu med pa/ chos thams cad kyi go skabs su gyur pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus

ma byas kyi khams dang bral ba/ las dang bya ba med pa/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang bral ba shin tu ngo bo nyid med pa'i sems skye ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni byang chub kyi sems dang po zhes rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs so/ /

de dag nyon mongs las las grol/ /las dang nyon mongs ldan pa'ang yin/ /de dag 'jig rten sbyin gnas te/ /de dag rtag mchod ri mor bya/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang / mos pa yis ni spyod pa'i sa/ /sems gsum rnam par sgom pa ste/ /pha

rol phyin rnams spyod pa dang / /bsdu ba dag ni bzhi po yis/ /mos pa'i sa ni mtshungs pa med/ /dpag tu med cing bsam mi khyab/ /dpag med ye shes 'byung ba ni/ /sems bcu dag gis 'thob par 'gyur/ /ngas gang cung zad brjod pa ni/ /thams cad 'di

yis 'thob par 'gyur/ /de phyir thams cad mkhyen pa yis/ /mos pa zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /blo ldan bskal pa gcig gis ni/ /sa las yang dag 'da' bar 'gyur/ /'di yi yang ni bzhi cha yis/ /mos pa las kyang 'da' bar 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom

ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /mgon po khyab bdag khyod kyis ni/ /sems kyi mtshan nyid bstan lags na/ /dbugs 'byin rnam pa du thob nas/ /mchog skyes de dag dbugs phyin 'gyur/ /de skad gsol nas bcom ldan 'das/ /rnam par

snang mdzad chen po yis/ /de tshe phyag na rdo rje la/ /yid bsdus 'di ni nyon ces gsungs/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la nam byis pa so so'i skye bo dag mi dge ba'i las spangs te dge ba'i las byed pa de'i tshe dge bas dbugs phyin pa yin no/ /nam bdag gi de kho na nyid

yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de'i tshe bdag la brten nas dbugs phyin pa yin no/ /nam phung po yongs su gzung ba byas te rang gi ngo bo nyid la rnam par dpyad nas bdag la brten pa yongs su gtong ba de'i tshe bdag med pas dbugs phyin pa yin no/ /

nam phung po rnams spangs nas chos kyi dmigs pa la gnas pa de'i tshe chos kyi dbugs phyin pa yin no/ /nam chos rnams spangs nas mi skye ba la gnas pa de'i tshe chos la bdag med pas dbugs phyin pa yin no/ /nam phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched thams

cad dang / gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / bdag dang srog la sogs pa dang / chos dang mi skye bdag kyang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid du yang ngo bo nyid med do zhes stong pa'i ye shes skyes pa de'i tshe chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis dbugs phyin pa yin no/ /gsang

ba pa'i bdag po de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa bzhi bcus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams bsgoms te gsang sngags kyi tshul rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgyu ma dang /

smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / gzugs brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / brag ca dang / chu zla dang / chu'i chu bur dang / 'khrul pa dang / mgal me'i 'khor lo lta bur rnam par bsgom mo/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems

dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas 'di ltar so sor brtag par bya ste/ de la sgyu ma gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sman dang sngags kyi sbyor ba byed pa dag gi sbyor ba las dngos po rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs mig dang yid 'phrog pa sngon ma mthong ba dag kyang ston te/ de dag ni phan tshun phyogs bcur

'gro ba dang 'ong ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgyu ma ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin du gsang sngags sbyor bar byed pa dag gi sbyor ba las thams cad 'byung ngo / /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang smig rgyu ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de yang 'du shes kyi

tha snyad du 'dogs shing tha snyad kyang sgrub par byed do/ /de bzhin du 'du shes 'di yang gsang sngags so zhes tha snyad du 'dogs shing tha snyad kyang sgrub par byed do/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag nyid nyin gcig dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam dang /

lo la sogs par 'dug cing bde ba dang sdug bsngal rnam pa mang po myong bar mthong la/ sad na ci yang mi mthong ba de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi tshul 'di yang rmi lam lta bur khong du chud par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi dngos grub 'byung ba ni gzugs

brnyan lta bur rig par bya ste/ dper na gdong dang me long la brten nas bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba ltar/ gsang sngags kyi dngos grub kyang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang grub pa'i gnas ni/ dri za'i grong khyer lta bur blta'o/ /gsang

ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi sgra ni brag ca lta bur rig par bya ste/ dper na sgra la brten nas brag ca 'byung ba ltar gsang sngags kyi tshul 'di yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang zla ba shar na chu'i nang du gzugs brnyan mthong

nas chu zla zhes brjod pa de bzhin du sngags pa de nyid kyang chu zla bzhin du rig sngags 'chang zhes brjod do/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang / ci ltar char pa bab pa na/ chu yi chu bur rnams 'byung ba/ /de bzhin gsang sngags grub pa yi/ /sprul pa rnam pa sna tshogs

'dod/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang / /sems can med cing srog dang ni/ /byed pa po yang med pa ste/ /dngos po thams cad stong pa la/ /'khrul pa kho na snang bar zad/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang / ci ltar 'ga' zhig bdag nyid kyi/ /lag

na mgal me thogs nas ni/ /bskor na 'khor lo ltar snang ba/ /de bzhin stong pa dag las 'byung / /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ 'di ni theg pa chen po'i gzhi/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzhi/ nges pa'i gzhi/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzhi/

mthar gyis theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa'i gzhi ste/ ye shes sna tshogs cher 'byung ba/ /nor gyi dbyig 'di shes na ni/ /kun gyi sems kyi bye brag kyang / /ci bzhin yang dag rab tu shes/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par

byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ sems kyi khyad par rim par phye ba'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i

chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ sems kyis las yang dag par 'das pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thabs dang tshul sna tshogs dag gis bsam pa dang mos pa ci lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la bstan pa de ni ngo mtshar che lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das yang gsang

sngags spyod pa'i tshul snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba bshad du gsol/ de ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can mang po dag gi don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par

snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje dkyil 'khor spyod pa'i tshul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su

rdzogs par byed pa nyon cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi dbyings kyi dgongs pa ma rdzogs shing / sems can gyi khams ma lus pa bsgral bar dam bca' ba mdzad pas/ de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad dang thabs cig yang dag par mol nas

snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sku'i yan lag thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ sa bcu pa'i bar du sems can la phan

pa'i don mdzad pa rnams byung ngo / /byung nas kyang phyogs bcu kun tu bskor te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i nang rang gi gnas su zhugs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje

dkyil 'khor rnam par dgod pa nyon cig /re zhig dang por slob dpon yid byang chub kyi sems la zhugs pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa/ brtan pa snying rje can/ sgyu rtsal dag la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la rtag tu mkhas pa/ theg pa gsum gyi khyad

par shes pa/ gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi don la mkhas pa/ bsam pa shes pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dad pa dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las byed par gnang zhing dbang bskur ba/ rigs btsun gsang sngags spyod pa la/ /mngon par brtson

zhing gtan la phab/ /sbyor la mkhas shing zung thub la/ /byang chub sems la rnam par gnas/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po slob dpon de lta bu ni rgyal ba'i sras yin te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngags so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag

po de la slob dpon la gzhan gyis gsol ba btab kyang rung / yang na bdag gis sems can dag /snod du rung zhing nyes bral ba/ /mos mang brtan la dad pa can/ /gzhan la phan dga' mthong nas ni/ /de lta bu yi slob ma de/ /shes nas slob dpon bdag nyid

kyis/ /ma gsol bar ni de bos te/ /phan 'dod phyir ni 'di skad bya/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin gyis/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang / /de bzhin gang

dag ma byon dang / /da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa dag /de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga mchog bzang 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes/ /gsang sngags

sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /snying rje gyur pa'i yid kyis ni/ /de ltar lan mang gzengs

bstod de/ /slob ma de brtan shes nas ni/ /sa gzhi legs par yongs brtag bya/ /me tog 'bras bu ldan pa'i ri/ /gtsang zhing yid 'ong chu yi gnas/ /de dag dkyil 'khor bri ba yi/ /las la sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags/ /gang na 'bab chu mang po dag /

ngang pa bzhad kyis brgyan yod pa/ /der ni sngags pa blo can gyis/ /snying rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bri/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang rang mgon dang / /de bzhin rgyal ba'i nyan thos kyis/ /sa phyogs gang dag bsnyen pa ni/ /de dag thub pas rtag tu bsngags/ /phyogs

gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /lha khang kun dga' bzang po dang / /khyim dang yang thog nyams dga' dang / /mtshe'u dang skyed mos tshal mdzes dang / /mchod rten gra gang ba lang lhas/ /'bab chu 'dus pa'i mdo dag dang / /lha yi gnas rnams thams cad dang / /

de bzhin khang pa stong par yang / /slob ma dag la phan 'dod phyir/ /nan tan du ni dkyil 'khor bri/ /yang na yid du 'ong ba'i sa/ /gang yang rung bar bri bar bya/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la sa gzhi yongs su spyad par bya ba ni/ rdo dang / bong pa dang / gyo mo dang /

gseg ma med cing skra dang / phub ma dang / sol ba dang / thal ba dang / tsher ma dang / rus pa dang / sdong dum dang / zug rngu bsal ba/ grog sbur dang / srin bu dang / srog chags med cing nyes pa thams cad spangs pa'i gnas ni lha rnams la rab tu shis so/ /

de la tshes grangs dang / rgyu skar dang / gza' dang / byed pa dang / yud tsam bzang po'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa'i nyi ma la snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ltas bzang pos mtshon pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te/ sa'i lha mo la sbran pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis bsgrag

par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par gyi/ /sa dang pha rol phyin dag la/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni/ /rgyal bar bya ste dkyil

'khor bri/ /sa la lag pas reg byas shing / /de ltar lan mang sbran nas ni/ /pus mo gnyis ni sar btsugs nas/ /me tog spos kyis mchod pa bya/ /mchod nas sngags pas de nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal te/ /de nas cho ga 'di dag gis/ /

mkhas pas sa gzhi sbyang bar bya/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas mtshan ma mi mnga' ste/ /chos kyi sku la rnam par bzhugs/ /mtshan med 'dus ma byas pa yi/ /mtshungs

pa med pa'i chos ston na/ /dpa' bo chen po ci slad du/ /mtshan mar bcas pa'i cho ga 'di/ /gsang sngags spyad pa bstan par mdzad/ /'di ni chos nyid tshul ma lags/ /de skad gsol nas bcom ldan 'das/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po yis/ /de tshe phyag

na rdo rje la/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid 'di nyon gsungs/ /chos ni rtog dang bral ba ste/ /kun rtog thams cad spangs pa yin/ /de la sems dang sems byung gi/ /rtog pa rab tu spong bar 'gyur/ /nga yis chos mngon sangs rgyas pa/ /de ni mkha' las byung ba ste/ /log

par rtog pa'i spyod yul ba/ /byis pa rnams kyis mi shes so/ /yul dus mtshan ma la sogs pa/ /mun gyis bsgribs pa rnams 'dod de/ /de dag gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ /cho ga 'di yang brjod pa yin/ /yul med dus kyang med pa ste/ /bya ba med cing byed pa yang / /

chos rnams kun la yong med de/ /chos rnams nyi tshe 'ba' zhig go/ /gsang ba'i bdag po 'on kyang ni/ /sems can dag ni blo zhan cing / /bya ba tsam gyis rmongs pa dag /dngos po'i don la chags pa rnams/ /ma 'ongs dus na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'di lta'i tshul

ni mi shes pas/ /yul dang dus dang bya ba las/ /dge dang mi dge'i mtshan ma yis/ /rmongs pa 'bras bu 'dod byed de/ /sems dpa' chen po de dag phyir/ /cho ga 'di ni brjod pa yin/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la ci skad bstan pa'i gnas gang yang

rung bar sa gzhi rab tu 'thas par bcags te/ ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba dang ba'i gcin du bsres pas byug go/ /de nas sngags 'dis bsang gtor byas te bsngags so/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti sa me/ ga ga na/ sa ma tA nu ga te/ pra kr-i ti/ bi shud+d+he/ d+har+m+ma d+hA

tu bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ de yi 'og tu sngags pa ni/ /langs nas de yi dbus su nga / /pad+ma dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs/ /thor tshugs dang ni dbu rgyan 'chang / /'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pas/ /kun nas yongs su bskor bar bsam/ /de nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

bzhi/ /blo dang ldan pas phyogs su bsam/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog /nyi ma 'char ka lta bur bsam/ /lho ru rgyal ba dpa' bo ni/ /me tog kun rgyas zhes bya ba/ /gser gyi kha dog 'bar bar bcas/ /nyes pa bcom pa ting 'dzin gnas/ /byang phyogs

su ni mi 'khrugs pa/ /nad dang bral ba ting 'dzin gnas/ /nub phyogs 'od dpag med pa ste/ /rgyal ba lnga po 'di rnams ni/ /bsams te de nas sngags pa yis/ /rgyal ba'i gnas dbus 'dug nas su/ /mi g.yo bdag nyid chen po'am/ /yang na 'jig rten

gsum rgyal gyi/ /gsang sngags don kun sgrub pa yis/ /sa ni yongs su gzung bar bya/ /dbus su dkyil 'khor bzang po dag /tsan+dan dag gis bya ba ni/ /dang po gcig ni nga yi yin/ /gnyis pa skyob pa thams cad kyi'o/ /gsum pa de dang mnyam bya ba/ /

the tsom med par yum gyi yin/ /bzhi pa lag na pad+ma'i ste/ /lnga pa phyag na rdo rje'i phyir/ /drug pa mi g.yo mgon gyi ste/ /ma zad 'og tu legs par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams rjes dran nas/ /me tog spos la sogs phul te/ /mnyam par bzhag nas gus

pa ru/ /tshig tu 'di skad smra bar bya/ /mgon po thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/ /thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /sras bcas sang gi gdugs 'das nas/ /sa gzhi yongs su gzung ba mdzod/ /de skad kyi ni tshig smras nas/ /gsang sngags 'di ni

brjod par bya/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA d+hiSh+ThA nA d+hiSh+Tha te/ a tsa le/ bi ma le sma ra Ne/ pra kr-i ti pa ri shud+d+he swA hA/ de nas sngags pa langs nas su/ /snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis ni/ /nub kyi phyogs su gnas nas su/ /nang gi bdag nyid rnam dag pas/ /

byang chub sems ni sems byed cing / /de nyid du ni nyal bar bya/ /de nas sngags pas rmi lam blta/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen nam/ /yang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /sems can rnams la phan bya'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las

rnams la/ /bdag nyid kun rtsol 'bad pa'am/ /bdag nyid la ni 'di skad du/ /sems can chen po bu khyod legs/ /dkyil 'khor myur du bris shig ces/ /spro ba bskyed pa mthong yang rung / /de nas de yi phyi de nyin/ /slob ma dad cing rigs btsun pa/ /

de bzhin dkon mchog gsum la dad/ /zab mo yi ni blo dang ldan/ /spro ba che zhing tshul khrims ldan/ /bzod dang ldan zhing ser sna med/ /dpa' la yi dam brtan pa ni/ /bcu'am brgyad dam bdun nam lnga/ /gcig gnyis bzhi las lhag kyang rung / /

dpyad mi dgos par gzung bar bya/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor 'di'i ming ci lags/ ci'i slad du dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po dkyil

'khor 'di ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba ste/ dkyil ni snying po zhes bya'o/ /'khor ni rdzogs pa ste/ de'i gong na snying por gyur pa gzhan med pas/ de bas na dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'on kyang dkyil 'khor rgyas pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi khams

ma nges pa yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ste/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bskal pa grangs med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa byin gyis brlabs so/ /gsang

ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sems can gcig gi phyir byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma yin/ gnyis kyi phyir ma yin/ gsum gyi phyir ma yin/ 'on kyang thugs rje chen po'i dbang

du gyur ba dag sems can gyi khams ma lus pa yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de dag gis sems can gyi khams rnam pa du ma la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ sems can rnams la chos 'chad par rig par bya'o/ /gsang

ba pa'i bdag po theg pa chen po la goms par ma byas pa rnams ni gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul mthong ngam thos na sems la dga' ba'am/ dang ba cung zad kyang yang dag par mi skye yi/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag gis sngon theg pa chen po gsang sngags spyad pa'i

tshul sgo mtha' yas sgrub pa la goms par byas pa de dag ni rdo rje sems dpa' yin te/ de rnams nyid kyi don gyi phyir grangs kyi tshad 'di byas so/ /'on kyang slob dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pas sems can gyi khams ma lus pa bsgral bar yi dam bca' ba kho nar bya ste/

des byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyur 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir sems can tshad med pa rnams yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ /de nas de dag bos la gsum la skyabs su gtang bar yang bya'o/ /sdig pa mi bya ba rnams kyang bsgo bar bya'o/ /de nas de dag la spos dang me tog la sogs pa

sbyin no/ /de dag dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa yang 'dzin du gzhug go/ /'dzin du bcug nas sngags pa yis/ /de nas so shing dag kyang sbyin/ /rtse gcig mnyam par bzhag pa dag /shar ram byang du kha bstan te/ /u dum bA ra a

shwat+tha/ /shin tu bzang po bsrung byas shing / /me tog dri la sogs bskus pa'i/ /so shing dag ni 'char gzhug go/ /sems can snod rung snod mi rung / /bor ba nyid las brtag par bya/ /de nas lag pa g.yon pa la/ /skud pa mdud pa gsum ldan pa/ /bdag

nyid mnyam par bzhag pa yis/ /legs pa ru ni bcing bar bya/ /de ltar yongs su gzung ldan pa'i/ /slob ma nyes pa med rnams la/ /bsam pa brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ /'di ltar spro ba bskyed par bya/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis/ /rnyed pa mnyam

med de ring rnyed/ /gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa/ /bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni/ /bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun/ /yongs su gzung ste skye bzhin pa/ /de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la/ /sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ /gal te rmi lam dag tu ni/ /gtsug

lag khang dang kun dga' bzang / /khang pa bzang po sna tshogs dang / /de bzhin du ni yang thog dang / /ral gri yid bzhin nor bu dang / /gdugs dang me tog sna tshogs dang / /bud med bzang mo gos dkar can/ /sdug pa'i gnyen dang bu dag dang / /glegs

bam de bzhin bram ze dang / /sangs rgyas dang ni rang sangs rgyas/ /de bzhin rgyal ba'i nyan thos dang / /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /gal te 'bras bu thob pa dang / /mtsho dang rgya mtsho las rgal mthong / /de bzhin du ni nam mkha' las/ /bkra shis

yid du 'ong ba'i tshig /'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar grag /de la sogs pa'i rmi lam ni/ /bzang po zhes ni bya bar brtag /mkhas pas de las bzlog pa yi/ /rmi lam ngan par shes par bya/ /brtul zhugs bzang po khyod rnams kyis/ /nang par thams

cad nga la zlos/ /slob ma de dag rnams la ni/ /de skad bsgo nas chos kyang bshad/ /theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /khyed rnams der ni dong bas na/ /rang byung skal ba chen po pa/ /'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur/ /yod dang med las rnam par 'das/ /nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med/ /zab mo rtog ge thams cad kyis/ /rab tu mi rtogs gnas med pa/ /spros pa kun dang bral ba ste/ /spros pa rnams kyis rnam

par spros/ /las dang bya ba la sogs bral/ /bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi/ /theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di ni/ /tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje 'dzin spros pa med par gnas pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das

dus gsum du sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa gang la byang chub sems dpa' rnams gnas na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje 'dzin spros pa med par

gnas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu lus dang / ngag dang / yid gcig tu 'jug cing chos thams cad la rtsom pa med cing bya ba med pa'i sdom pa gang yin pa de rigs kyi bu nyon cig /de yang gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'

rnams la bdag gi lus yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gis bdag gis lus yongs su gtong ba des ni dngos po gsum yongs su btang ba yin te/ dngos po gsum yongs su btang ba de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang / ngag

dang / yid do/ /rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sdom pas bsdam par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus dang ngag dang yid yongs su ma btang bar bslab pa 'dzin par mi byed do/ /de

nas phyi de nyin bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag byas te/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la bum pa spos chus bkang ba la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas mngon par bsngags te sgo dang por bzhag la mkhas pas skye bo kun la des bsang gtor

bya'o/ /de nas sems sbyang ba'i phyir spos chu gtsang ma blud do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni slob dpon dag /gsang sngags sgrub la 'bad pa na/ /gang gi dus su dkyil 'khor du/ /sems dpa' chen

po byin rlob pa'i/ /dus dang tshod ni kun mkhyen pa/ /smra ba'i mchog gis bka' stsol cig /de skad gsol nas bcom ldan gyis/ /rdo rje 'dzin la bka' stsal pa/ /dkyil 'khor don du gnyer ba la/ /rtag tu mtshan mo bre bar bya// //bam po

gnyis pa/ lag na rdo rje de slob dpon gyis sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas la tshon sna tshogs srad bu thogs te/ bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la/ shar du srad bu bre ba ni/ /lte ba'i thad kar bzung nas su/ /bar snang la

ni gzung bar bya/ /de nas lho phyogs song nas su/ /byang phyogs su ni bre bar bya/ /de nas srad bu gnyis pa ni/ /rang gis blangs nas de nyid du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran cing / /shar phyogs bltas te bre bar bya/ /de nas lho phyogs song nas ni/ /

byang phyogs su ni bre bar bya/ /blo can de nas slar log nas/ /bden bral phyogs su gnas nas ni/ /byang phyogs su ni bre bar bya/ /de nas g.yas su bsgyur bar bya/ /bsgyur te de ru 'dug nas ni/ /lho phyogs su ni bre bar bya/ /de nas gnas de btang nas su/ /me yi

phyogs su gnas nas ni/ /sngags pas gsang sngags cho gar gnas/ /shar du srad bu bre bar bya/ /de nas de bzhin dbang ldan phyogs/ /song nas nub tu kha bltas te/ /rlung gi phyogs kyi bar du ni/ /byang phyogs su ni bre bar bya/ /sngags pa yis ni de lta bur/ /

kun nas gru bzhi lham par bya/ /de nas dbus su zhugs nas su/ /de la cha ni gsum du brtag /sa rnams thams cad kun tu yang / /cha gsum dag tu brtags nas ni/ /cha rnams kyang ni re re la/ /cha gsum du ni rab tu brtag /cha gcig cig ni bskor ba yi/

'khor bar byas te lhag ma yi/ /cha gnyis po ni lha nyid kyi/ /gnas su nges par bya ba yin/ /blo dang ldan pas phyogs bzhi ru/ /so so'i phyogs char sgo khyud ni/ /sdom brtson can gyis nan tan du/ /lha rnams gtso bo'i gnas su bya/ /de ltar rim

pas legs phye ba/ /'di dag thams cad byas nas ni/ /dbus su pad+ma dkar po mchog /de ni snying po zhes su bsgrags/ /dkyil 'khor snying po 'byung ba kun/ /des ni snying po can du byas/ /de yi tshad kyang sor bcu drug /yan chad du ni bshad pa yin/ /'dab ma

brgyad pa legs par rdzogs/ /ze bar ldan pa shin tu bzang / /'dab ma'i bar ni thams cad du/ /kun nas rdo rje bri bar bya/ /de yi snying po'i dbus su ni/ /rgyal mchog gtso bo gser gyi mdog /'bar bcas thor tshugs dbu rgyan can/ /'od zer dag gis kun nas

bskor/ /mgon po nad dang bral ba ni/ /ting nge 'dzin du gnas par bri/ /de yi shar du blo ldan gyis/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya ni/ /gru gsum thams cad thal kar nyid/ /pad+ma'i steng na khor yug tu/ /'od zer dkar pos yongs bskor ba/ /rab tu bsgrims

te bri bar bya/ /de yi byang du mkhas rnams kyis/ /skyob pa dag ni kun gyi yum/ /gser gyi mdog can 'bar dang bcas/ /na bza' dag ni dkar po mnabs/ /kun tu rnam par snang mdzad pa/ /ting nge 'dzin du gnas par bri/ /mgon po yi ni byang phyogs su/ /spyan

ras gzigs dbang dpa' bo ni/ /pad+ma dkar po'i stan la 'dug /dung dang kun+da zla ba 'dra/ /dbu la 'od dpag med bzhugs pa/ /bzhin ni bag tsam 'dzum pa bri/ /de yi g.yas su lha mo ni/ /sgrol ma grags pa chen mo de/ /dge zhing 'jigs pa sel ba ste/ /sngo

bsangs mo la sna tshogs gzugs/ /bud med dar la bab pa'i tshad/ /thal sbyar me tog ut+pal thogs/ /'od zer dag gis kun bskor cing / /gos ni dkar po gyon par bri/ /g.yon du lha mo khro gnyer can/ /sngags de'i phreng ba lag na 'chang / /mig gsum

pa la thor tshugs can/ /kha dog mdog ni dkar mo la/ /'od zer dkar po ser po dang / /dmar po rnams kyis bskor bar bri/ /khro gnyer can dang nye bar ni/ /mthu chen lag na pad+ma thogs/ /brtse ba chen po gos dkar gyon/ /'od zer dag gis bskor ba yi/ /

dpa' bo yang dag bri bya ste/ /de yi pad+ma kha ma bye/ /de yi drung du blo can gyis/ /rig sngags lha mo grags ldan ma/ /gser gyi kha dog lta bu can/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /lag pa g.yon pas pri yang ku'i/ /snye ma yid 'ong 'dzin par bri/ /sgrol

ma yi ni nye 'khor du/ /blo dang ldan pas gos dkar mo/ /thor tshugs can la gos dkar gyon/ /lag na pad+ma thogs par bri/ /de yi 'og tu sngags pa yis/ /rig sngags rgyal po stobs po che/ /kha dog nyi ma 'char ka bzhin/ /pad+ma dkar pos rnam par brgyan/ /

'bar ba'i phreng can mi bzad cing / /spu dag seng ge ltar 'dug pa/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang blo ldan gyi/ /rta mgrin can zhes grags pa bri/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi lho phyogs su/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams kyi/ /phyag rgya yid bzhin nor bu zhes/ /

grags pa skal ba chen po can/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa/ /pad+ma dkar la 'dug par bri/ /mgon po rnam snang mdzad chen gyi/ /lho yi phyogs su rdo rje 'dzin/ /re ba thams cad skong byed pa/ /mdog ni pri yang ku lta bu/ /ljang ser ram ni ma rgad ltar/ /sngo

bsangs mgon po dbu rgyan can/ /sems dpa' chen po rgyan kun gyis/ /rnam par brgyan cing mtha' yas par/ /'jug pa rgya chen rdo rjer bcas/ /'od zer dag gis bskor bar bri/ /de yi g.yas su lha mo'i ming / /mA ma kI zhes bya ba de/ /rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan

pa ste/ /lag na rdo rje thogs pa bri/ /de yi 'og tu lha mo ni/ /rdo rje rtse mo stobs chen de/ /pho nya rnams kyis yongs bskor cing / /bzhin ni bag tsam 'dzum par bri/ /g.yon rol du ni sngags pa yis/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud ces pa/ /lag na rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /rang gi pho

nya rnams kyis bskor/ /pri yang ku ltar ljang ser mdog /rdo rje'i mtshan mas legs mtshan bri/ /lag na rdo rje'i 'og logs su/ /khro zla gtso bo zhes bya ba/ /bgegs chen dgra ni zhi byed pa/ /khro bo 'jig rten gsum du grags/ /mig gsum mche

ba bzhi pa ste/ /kha dog dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra/ /rab tu rgod pa'i sgra yang 'byin/ /rdo rje'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /'khor ni mtha' yas khro bo yi/ /dbang phyug rnams kyis yongs bskor ba/ /lag pa stong phrag brgya dag ni/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs

shing gdengs/ /khro bo chen po 'di 'dra ba/ /pad+ma'i steng na 'dug par bri/ /de yi nub tu song nas ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa mang po dag /lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs/ /kha dog sna tshogs stobs po che/ /'od zer dag gis yongs bskor ba/ /sems can kun

don byed par bri/ /gsang sngags mgon po'i 'og logs su/ /bden bral gyi ni phyogs kyi char/ /mi g.yo zhes bya lag na ni/ /ral gri zhags pa legs par thogs/ /zur phud spyi bo'i g.yon du 'phyang / /rab tu brgyan cing mig gcig yo/ /rang gi 'od kyi

nang na gnas/ /khro dang bcas pas brag la 'dug /bzhin ni khro gnyer rab tu bsnyer/ /byis pa'i gzugs can mkhrang bag can/ /bris nas blo ldan rlung phyogs su/ /song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ni/ /khro bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal/ /'bar ba'i phreng can mi

bzad pa/ /lag na rdo rje rtse bran rgyan/ /bka' lung nod pa ltar 'dug cing / /zad pa'i dus dang 'drar gnas pa/ /nan tan du ni bri bar bya/ /de ltar nang du bri ba ni/ /rgyas dang bcas par bshad pa yin/ /de nas sngags pa phyir byung nas/ /nges par gnyis pa'i cha dag

la/ /shar gyi phyogs kyi nang du ni/ /cha ni gnyis su phye ba la/ /sgo khyud kyi ni nang rol du/ /sngags pas rgyal ba shAkya thub/ /gser gyi kha dog 'bar dang bcas/ /mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan/ /mgon po na bza' ngur smrig mnabs/ /khyab bdag bstan pa'i don

mdzad pa/ /pad+ma dkar po'i stan la bzhugs/ /chos 'chad tshul du bzhugs par bri/ /de yi g.yas su lha mo ni/ /sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba ste/ /lha mo cung zad 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang ba/ /mtshungs med sku ni rab tu dang / /de ni

shAkya thub pa'i yum/ /de yi g.yas su lha mo ni/ /rig sngags mdzod spu zhes grags pa/ /pad+ma'i steng na 'dug pa ste/ /dung zla kun+da lta bu'i mdog /lag na yid bzhin nor bu thogs/ /re ba kun rdzogs byed pa bri/ /de nas sngags pas g.yon rol du/ /shAkya seng

ge skyob pa yi/ /gtsug tor gzi can brtson 'grus che/ /gdugs dkar po dang rgyal ba'i gtsug /gtsug tor rnam par rgyal nyid dang / /gzi brjid phung po skal chen dang / /rnam par 'thor zhes rnam grags pa/ /lnga po yang dag bri bar bya/ /shAkya tog ni mthu chen

gyi/ /gtsug tor lnga po 'di dag ni/ /gnas ni lnga rnams nyid du ni/ /rab tu bsgrims te bri bar bya/ /de yi byang du song nas su/ /gnas gtsang rnams ni bri bar bya/ /dbang phyug kun tu me tog dang / /'od kyi phreng ba nyid dang ni/ /yid mgyogs dang ni rnam grags

te/ /de dag thams cad legs par bri/ /mdzod spu yi ni g.yas logs su/ /gtsug tor chen po cher 'byung dang / /de bzhin gyen du 'byung nyid dang / /sgra dbyangs mtha' yas pa yang ste/ /gtsug tor gsum po kho na ni/ /bsgrims te yang dag bri bar bya/ /gtsug

tor lnga po stobs chen rnams/ /dkar po ser skya ser por bya/ /gsum po gzhan ni dkar po dang / /ser po dang ni dmar por bya/ /kun kyang 'od zer mang po can/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi/ /de dag smon lam stobs chen de/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs

byed pa'o/ /de nas sngags pas me phyogs su/ /me ni drang srong che rnams dang / /bcas shing me yi nang na 'dug /thal ba'i sor ris gsum gyis mtshan/ /dpa' bo thams cad rab tu dmar/ /snying ga sum mdo ris mtshan cing / /me lce 'bar ba'i dbus na 'dug/

bgrang phreng gun+de thogs par bri/ /de nas lho yi phyogs kyi char/ /gshin rje'i gtso bo lag pa na/ /dbyug pa thogs shing ma he zhon/ /kha dog dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra/ /ma mo rnams dang dus mtshan dang / /'chi bdag rnams kyis bskor bar bri/ /bden

bral phyogs su bden bral ni/ /lag na ral gri 'jigs pa bri/ /de nas kyang ni blo ldan pa/ /myur du byang gi phyogs song ste/ /lha yi rgyal po ri rab la/ /'dug cing lha rnams kyis bskor ba/ /lag na rdo rje cod pan can/ /rgyan kun gyis ni brgyan par bri/ /de nas de yi shar

du ni/ /chu lha lag na zhags thogs bri/ /de yi yang ni shar phyogs su/ /nyi ma shing rta'i steng 'dug bri/ /de yi g.yas dang g.yon du ni/ /rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ba bri/ /de yi g.yas su tshangs pa ni/ /gdong bzhi pa la thor tshugs can/ /oM zhes bya ba lhur len pa/ /

ngang pa pad+ma'i steng 'dug bri/ /de yi nub tu bri ba ni/ /sa yi lha dang dbyangs can dang / /khyab 'jug skem byed de bzhin rlung / /bde byed de bzhin zla ba ste/ /nub kyi phyogs su gnas nas ni/ /rab tu nan tan byas te bri/ /bris nas sngags pas de nas ni/ /yid la

'khrul pa med pa ru/ /gsang sngags mgon po'i 'og logs su/ /khro chen gzhan gyis mi thub ces/ /bya ba nyid dang lha mo ni/ /gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang ni/ /sa bdag lag na bum pa thogs/ /gus par yang dag gnas par bri/ /klu chen dga' bo bsnyen dga'

dag /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi/ /sgo drung gnyis su mngon phyogs par/ /rab tu bsgrims te bri bar bya/ /gzhan yang shAkya thub pa yi/ /rgyud rnams kun las dkyil 'khor du/ /sngags dang phyag rgya gang bshad pa/ /de dag kyang ni mkhas pas bri/ /sngags pa de

nas phyir byung nas/ /cha gsum pa ni nges pa la/ /rdo rje dam pa sbyin pa ni/ /gur gum lta bu'i mdog can te/ /spyi bo zur phud lnga dang ldan/ /byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can la/ /ut+pal sngon po rdo rje can/ /lag pa g.yon na thogs pa ste/ /pad+ma dkar po'i stan

la 'dug /rab tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin du gnas/ /'od zer mtshan nyid bzang po yis/ /kun tu 'khor bar sngags pas bri/ /de yi byang du gzhon nu ni/ /dra ba'i 'od can lag pa na/ /rin chen dra ba thogs pa ste/ /sna tshogs pa yi rgyan gyis brgyan/ /pad+ma dmar

po'i stan la 'dug /rgyal ba'i sras la blta ba bri/ /rdo rje dam pa sbyin pa yi/ /g.yon du pho nya mo lnga bri/ /skra can dang ni nye skra can/ /sna tshogs ma dang nor can ma/ /de bzhin 'gugs ma zhes bya ba/ /'di dag blo ldan pho nya mo'o/ /de dag gi ni 'og zad du/ /

phyag brnyan ma ni lnga rnams dang / /gzhon nu dra ba'i 'od can gyi/ /'khor gnyis po yang bri bar bya/ /de nas sngags pas lho phyogs su/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel gtso/ /yid bzhin nor bu thogs pa bri/ /de

yi cha gnyis bor nas ni/ /dpa' bo ngo mtshar can dang ni/ /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /ngan song thams cad spong ba dang / /de bzhin skyong sems blo gros dang / /blo can snying rjes gdungs pa dang / /byams pa mngon du 'byung ba dang / /gdung ba thams

cad zhi byed dang / /de bzhin blo gros bsam yas te/ /mkhas pas brgyad po bri bar bya/ /byang gi phyogs su song nas ni/ /sa yi snying po 'bar dang bcas/ /bzod dang des pa phun tshogs bri/ /de yi stan ni mkhas pa yis/ /'byung khungs kun dang ldan pa yis/ /

rin chen kun gyis nyer brgyan pa/ /de yi steng na rin chen bzhi'i/ /pad+ma yang dag gnas pa ni/ /yid du 'ong ba bsam bya ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po/ /de yi steng na 'dug par bri/ /de yi 'khor ni yon tan gtso/ /mtha' yas shin tu grangs med

de/ /de yi nang na byang chub sems/ /rin chen 'byung gnas rin chen lag /sa 'dzin nyid dang lag na ni/ /rin chen phyag rgya can dang ni/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa nyid/ /grags chen 'di dag bri bar bya/ /de bzhin sngags pas nub phyogs su/ /dpa'

bo nam mkha'i snying po ni/ /gzi brjid chen po gos dkar gyon/ /lag na ral gri thogs bsam ste/ /rgyal sras pad+ma'i stan steng na/ /legs par 'dug par bri bar bya/ /bdag nyid chen po de'i 'khor du/ /grags pa dag kyang bri bar bya/ /de'i

'khor dpa' bo chen po ni/ /nam mkha' dri med blo gros mkha'/ /blo gros rnam dag nyid dang ni/ /spyod pa yi ni blo gros dang / /blo brtan pa zhes bya ba ste/ /de dag rab tu bsgrim bri zhing / /rtag tu dpa' bo 'di rnams dang / /lhan cig bzhin du bsam/ /

de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la ring zhig tu mig mi 'dzums par bltas te/ ched du gleng pa 'di gleng zhing tshig tu smras pa/ 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams/ /

u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin/ /brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo / /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ /bskal pa bye ba du ma ru/ /sdig pa bgyis par gyur pa gang / /de kun dkyil 'khor

'di 'dra ba/ /mthong bas byang bar 'gyur lags na/ /grags pa mtha' yas sngags spyod pa'i/ /tshul la gnas na smos ci 'tshal/ /skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na ni/ /go 'phang bla na med par 'gyur/ /gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la/ /blo gros shin

tu mi g.yo ba/ /de dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu bcad/ /de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / rdo rje 'dzin de dag gis mgrin gcig tu mthun par tshig smras pa/ gsang sngags spyod pa'i dbang gyur pa/ /dpa' bo chen

po legs so legs/ /khyod kyi yid la gang bsam pa/ /mnyam med thams cad mkhyen la zhus/ /sngags rgyud rtogs par shes pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams dang / /sngags spyad 'bras bu la gnas pa/ /bdag cag thams cad dbang du gyur//

de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /tshon zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/ /ci slad 'di ni tshon zhes bgyi/ /tshon ni ji ltar dgye bar bgyi/ /gang zhig thog mar gtang bar bgyi/ /rta babs rnams dang de bzhin du/ /sgo khyud rnams

kyi tshad dang ni/ /sgo yi tshad kyang ci 'drar bgyi/ /mgon po yis ni bshad du gsol/ /lha bshos me tog byug spos dang / /bum pa rnams kyang rgyas par gsungs/ /slob ma ci ltar gzud pa dang / /de ni ci ltar dbang bskur dang / /bla ma la ni yon dbul dang / /

sbyin sreg gnas kyang bdag la gsungs/ /gsang sngags mtshan nyid ci 'dra lags/ /ting nge 'dzin du bzhed pa gang / /de skad gsol nas bcom ldan 'das/ /chos kun dbang phyug thub pa yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad gsungs/ /yid gcig tu ni tshur nyon cig /

theg chen 'bras bu 'byung ba yi/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog /sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis ni/ /gang dag dris pa bshad par bya/ /sems can khams ni zhen byed cing / /'di ni chos dbyings ro yin par/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon

gsungs te/ /de phyir 'di ni tshon zhes bya/ /tshon ni nang nas dgye bar bya/ /phyi rol nas ni tshon mi dgye/ /dkar po thog mar gtang bar bya/ /de yi 'og tu dmar po ste/ /de nas ser po gtang bar bya/ /de yi 'og tu ljang gu gtang / /kun gyi nang rol nag po ste/ /

tshon gyi cho ga de ltar bshad/ /rta babs rnams kyi tshad kyang ni/ /dkyil 'khor dbu ma dang mnyam mo/ /sgo khyud dag kyang de dang mnyam/ /pad+ma sor ni bcu drug bshad/ /dang po'i sgo ni snying po yi/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni mnyam zhes bya/ /'jigs med dag gi

rim gyis ni/ /bskyed de de las lhag shes bya/ /sgo rnams kyi ni bar bar du/ /sgo srung rnams ni gzhag par bya/ /ting nge 'dzin ni mdor na sems/ /yang dag mgu ba yin par bshad/ /sems dpa' chen po khyad par ni/ /yid gcig bsdus la mnyan par gyis/ /

sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin ni/ /stong pa nyid ces rgyal bas gsungs/ /de ni sems yongs shes pa las/ /thob par 'gyur gyi gzhan las min/ /de dag nyid ni spangs pa ste/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi yin par 'dod/ /stong pa chen po zhes bya ste/ /

kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byed pa'o/ /de bas rnam pa thams cad du/ /stong nyid rtag tu dran par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad dang thabs cig tu yang dag par mol nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'

rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin so so'i tshul du gsungs so/ /de'i tshe yang sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyud gcig pa'i stobs kyi shugs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/

byang chub snying por 'dug nas su/ /bdud ni rnam pa bzhi bcom pas/ /de nas dpa' bo chen po zhes/ /tshangs la sogs pa lha tshogs rnams/ /'jigs pa thams cad med pa'i sgra/ /dga' bzhin du ni sgrogs par byed/ /de phyin cad ni nga dpa' bo/ /dpa' bo chen

po zhes su grags/ /skye ba med pa ngas rtogs pa/ /tshig gi spyod yul rnams spangs shing / /nyes pa thams cad med pa ste/ /rgyu dang rkyen dang bral ba yin/ /stong pa'i ye shes mkha' 'dra ba/ /mun pa kun dang bral gyur cing / /shin tu dri med de kho na/ /ci ltar

'byung ba nga las byung / /kun mkhyen tsam gyi tshul du gnas/ /kun mkhyen sangs rgyas mtshan nyid do/ /nga yi de nyid dam pa 'di/ /'jig rten snang bar byed pa ste/ /byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis ni/ /yig 'bru rnams su bstan nas su/ /sems can rnams

la snying brtse'i phyir/ /ngas ni thams cad rab tu bshad/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /ngo mtshar gyur nas mig gdangs te/ /thams cad mkhyen la mgo bo yis/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni tshig 'di smras/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs dang ni/ /shes rab bsam yas

ngo mtshar che/ /spros pa kun dang bral ba yi/ /chos rtogs nas ni rang byung rnams/ /'jig rten kun gyi re ba kun/ /yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ston/ /gsang sngags mtshan nyid de lta bu/ /bden pa gnyis la legs gnas pa/ /sems can kun gyis shes na

ni/ /'jig rten kun gyi mchod gnas 'gyur/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mig mi 'dzums pa'i lta bas bltas nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul ni/ dogs pa dang ni bral ba ru/ /'jig

rten mtshan nyid shes nas ni/ /dgos pa'i sa la gnas de rnams/ /sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa yin/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa'i dbang phyug rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul ni/ chos rnams thams cad mi dmigs shing / /

srid dang skye ba rnam spangs pa'i/ /'jig rten sgyu ma ltar shes nas/ /'jig rten 'jig rten dbang du 'dod/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang nyan thos dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams skye ba dang 'jig par rtogs nas/ mtha' gnyis bshig pas rgyu mi

dmigs pa'i phyir shin tu dngos po med pa'i ye shes mi spyod de/ 'di ni nyan thos rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul lo/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po rang sangs rgyas rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam par bshig nas brjod du med pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas pa rnams ni chos thams cad brjod du med

do snyam pa'i ye shes 'jug ste/ ngag shin tu 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par rig par byed pa 'di ni rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul lo/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang 'jig rten pa rnams rgyu las 'bras bu dang / las las 'byung ba'am ldog

par rtog cing gzhan gyi dbang gis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin kun tu skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni 'jig rten pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul lo/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul/ /yin te de la gnas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas dang ni rang sangs

rgyas/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams dang / /nyan thos des pa sdig bcom par/ /grags pa gang dag yin pa dang / /'jig rten pa yi lha gang yin/ /gsang sngags spyad pa'i cho ga'i tshul/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /dpa' bo de tshe 'chad par byed/ /

de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi mtshan nyid nyon cig /bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom

ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsang sngags ni/ /tshig dang ming dang brda yis mtshan/ /tshig de dbang du gyur pas na/ /gsang sngags don rnams thams cad sgrub/ /kha cig skul ba'i tshig dang

ldan/ /kha cig rang ming thog mar smos/ /hU~M dang phaT dang ldan pa ni/ /gtsug tor rnams kyi yin par bsgrags/ /zung zo choms shig ces pa dang / /snun sod drol cig ces pa ni/ /phyag brnyan rnams dang khro bo yi/ /gsang sngags yin par 'dren pas gsungs/ /

na maHswA hA la sogs ldan/ /ting nge 'dzin ni rtogs pas mtshan/ /zhi ba'i yi ge rnam par dag /re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i/ /gsang sngags sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa'i yin/ /nyan thos rnams kyi gsang sngags ni/ /gcig

po gzhi ni gcig la gnas/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi'ang de bzhin te/ /khyad par dag ni bshad bya na/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par las/ /las tshe rnam par sbyang zhes bya/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang gsang sngags rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni/ sangs rgyas thams

cad kyis ma byas/ byed du ma bcug /rjes su yi rang ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid de ni ye nas gnas pa ste/ de yang 'di ltar

gsang sngags rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi chos nyid do/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe/ chos nyid de tshul sna tshogs dang dgongs pa sna tshogs kyis/

sems can bsam pa sna tshogs pa rnams la tshig sna tshogs pa rnams yig 'bru sna tshogs dang / yul gyi nges pa'i tshig tu brjod pa sna tshogs dang / dbyangs sna tshogs su go ba rnams su byin gyis brlabs te/ gsang sngags kyi tshul 'chad do/ /ci ltar na de bzhin gshegs

pa rnams gsang sngags kyi tshul yig 'bru dag tu byin gyis rlob ce na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bden pa'i tshig gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / dran

pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che bdun dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad gang dag yin pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag

po mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyid kyi bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi stobs dang / sngon gyi smon lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs

kyi byin gyis brlabs nas/ sems can rnams la skal ba ci lta ba bzhin du gsang sngags kyi cho ga yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /gsang sngags kyi cho ga de yang gang zhe na/ gzod nas ma skyes pa'i phyir a ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /dgongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ka

ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /nam mkha' dang 'dra bar dmigs su med pa'i phyir kha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /'gro ba thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ga ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /gcig tu 'phungs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir g+ha ni chos thams cad

kyi sgo'o/ /'chi 'pho thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir tsa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /grib ma thams cad dang mtshungs pa'i phyir tsha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir dza ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /dri ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir dz+ha ni chos thams cad

kyi sgo'o/ /nga rgyal dmigs su med pa'i phyir Ta ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /bskyed pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir Tha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /'khrug pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir Da ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /bslu ba dang yongs su bral ba'i phyir D+ha ni chos thams

cad kyi sgo'o/ /de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ta ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir tha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /'dul ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir da ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir d+ha ni chos thams

cad kyi sgo'o/ /don dam pa'i bden pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir pa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /lbu ba dang 'dra bar snying po med pa'i phyir pha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ngag gi lam dang bral ba'i phyir ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /srid pa thams cad dmigs

su med pa'i phyir b+ha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /'chi ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ma ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /theg pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ya ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /rdul thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ra ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /mtshan

nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir la ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /rang bzhin gyis zhi ba'i phyir sha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /rang bzhin gyis blun pa nyid kyi phyir Sha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /bden pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir sa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /rgyu

dmigs su med pa'i phyir ha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po nga dang nya dang Na dang na dang ma ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang sgyur ba ste/ mthu thams cad dang ldan pa/ rab tu myur bar dgos pa'i don rab tu sgrub par byed pa yin no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag

po gsang sngags kyi tshul ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi don nges pa/

dus gsum las shin tu 'das pa/ nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa ste/ bsam yas sems kyi sa la gnas/ /las dang bya ba dag las byung / /spyad pa'i sa ni rjes thob nas/ /bsam yas 'bras bu sbyin par byed/ /'di ni de nyid dam pa ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis

rab tu bstan/ /gsang sngags cho ga 'di shes nas/ /sngags pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /sgra zhes bya ba de nyid mchog /gsang sngags rnams kyi gsang sngags mtshan/ /sngags pas yid la sems na ni/ /'chi 'pho med pa'i gnas 'thob bo/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so/ /de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs

rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag gsang sngags kyi tshul 'di la dad pa'i sems can de dag kyang thun mong ma lags pa'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad kyi cho ga bshad du gsol/

de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas sngags pa de yis su/ /me tog ser po dkar po dmar/ /yid du 'ong bas nan tan du/ /lha rnams la ni mchod pa bya/ /pad+ma'am yang na ut+pa

la/ /nA ga ge sar pu na ga /tsam pa a sho ti la ka/ pa ta la dang sa la'ang rung / /de la sogs pa'i me tog rnams/ /yid du 'ong zhing blta na sdug /bkra shis pa la sngags pa yis/ /mkhas pas nan tan mchod par bya/ /tsan+dan ta gar spr-i ka dang / /

gur kum dang ni ru rta'ang rung / /spos mchog rab tu bzang po ni/ /sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba dbul/ /a ga ru'am sgron shing ngam/ /ga pur dang ni tsan+dan dang / /sA la'i thang chu bkra shis pa'am/ /shi ri ba sa ka yang rung / /gzhan yang bdug spos sna tshogs pa/ /bkra

shis 'jig rten rnam grags pa/ /yid 'ong sngags pas cho ga bzhin/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nas gzhan yang sems dpa' che/ /lha bshos las kyi cho ga nyon/ /'o thug 'bras chan zho sbyar nas/ /la phug dang ni khur skya dang / /gor bod ka ra yid 'ong

dang / /khaN+Da'i bca' ba bzang po dang / /pu ri ka dang ka ri ka /de bzhin ma thu shi ra dang / /phe na a shog bar ti dang / /par pa ta yang dbul bar bya'o/ de la sogs pa'i bza' ba dang / /shing tog rnams ni sna tshogs dang / /hwags dang li kha ra rnams dang / /bu ram

sbrang rtsi mar dag dang / /btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /zho dang 'o ma rgyas par dbul/ /mar me rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /gtsang zhing shin tu bzang po yi/ /'bru mar rab tu dri zhim pas/ /rab tu bkang ste dbul bar bya/ /phyogs su gdugs dang ba dan rnams/ /

kha dog sna tshogs rab tu bsgreng / /rta babs bzang po rnams kyang ni/ /dril bu dang bcas rab tu dbul/ /yang na yid kyi mchod pa ni/ /thams cad nan tan bskyed de bya/ /de nas bum pa brgyad dam ni/ /bcu drug rgyas par blangs nas su/ /sman dang rin chen thams

cad blugs/ /spos kyi chus ni rab tu bkang / /ldum bu dag gis kha brgyan te/ /de bzhin 'bras bus kha yang dgang / /me tog spos la sogs pas brgyan/ /shin tu bzang po bsrung ba byas/ /mgrin pa ras kyis bcings pa rnams/ /mkhas pas rnam par dgod

par bya/ /lha yi gtso bo rnams la ni/ /ras ni zung re zung re dbul/ /sems dpa' chen po phal rnams la/ /ya re dbul bar rab tu bsgrags/ /mchod pa de ltar byas nas ni/ /slob ma dkyil 'khor drung bkug ste/ /sngags pas chu yis bsang gtor bya/ /

dri dang me tog sbyin par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dran byas nas/ /byang chub sems kyang 'dzin du gzhug /des na rgyal ba'i rigs dge la/ /thams cad rab tu skyes par 'gyur/ /chos kyi dbyings las byung ba yi/ /phyag rgya de dag rnams la bcing / /chos kyi 'khor

lo'ang bcings nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpas byin gyis brlabs/ /de nas sangs rgyas kun gyi ni/ /dam tshig sdom brtson can gyis bcings/ /de tshe sngags kyi cho ga bzhin/ /ras la lan gsum gdab par bya/ /snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis su/ /de dag gi ni gdong yang dgab/ /

dam tshig lan gsum bzlas nas ni/ /spyi bor yi ge ra zhes pa/ /klad kyi kor bcas brjid dang ldan/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba rnam par 'phro/ /zla ba 'char ka lta bu yi/ /kha dog dkar po gzhag par bya/ /skyob pa kun gyi spyan sngar ni/ /de nas me tog 'dor du gzhug /me

tog gang la bab pa de/ /sngags pas de la sbyin par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dang po'i sgo drung du/ /sgo khyud kyi ni dbus kyi cha/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni sgo gnyis kyi/ /bar du slob ma gzung bar bya/ /der gnas pa la cho ga kun/ /rim pa bzhin du legs par bya/ /slob ma sdig

dang bral ba kun/ /de ltar legs par btsud nas ni/ /de dag zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin du bya/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i rgyab rol gyi/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus kyi char/ /ma yengs pa yi sems kyis bya/ /

me thab khru gang tsam gyi ni/ /tshad du rab tu bsgrags pa yin/ /kha ran sor bzhi tshad du bya/ /dbus su rdo rje rab tu brtag /de nas sngags pa'i g.yas logs su/ /sbyin sreg gi ni yo byad gzhag /g.yon gyi phyogs su slob ma rnams/ /tsog tsog por ni 'khod du gzhug/

sdom brtson bdag nyid sa steng du/ /ku sha bting ba'i stan la 'dug /yang na tshon rtsi dmar po mchog /rab tu bzang po blangs nas su/ /de yis me yi gnas rnams kun/ /sngags pas mdo ru bri bar bya/ /ku sha dag gis g.yas phyogs

nas/ /thams cad khor yug dgram pa ni/ /mang pos bskor ba'i tshul du dgram/ /spos kyi chu yis bsang gtor bya/ /de nas sems can phan byed pa'i/ /me ni thab khung nang bsams te/ /brtul zhugs bzang pos dgang blugs mchog /gsang

sngags 'di yis sbyin par bya/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ag+na ye swA hA/ de nas slob ma re re nas/ /mkhas pas lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /g.yas pa'i mthe bong bzung nas su/ /mnyam par bzhag pas sbyin sreg bya/ /yid ni mnyam par bzhag nas su/ /sreg blugs

re re las kyang ni/ /gsang sngags cho ga bzhin zlos shing / /nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ oM ma hA shAn+ta ga ta shAn+ti ka ra pra sha ma d+har+m+ma ni ra dzA ta/ a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba d+har+m+ma sa ma tA prAp+te swA hA/ sbyin sreg rjes la sngags pa yis/ /slob ma rnams la yon bslang ba/ /

gser dang dngul dang rin chen dang / /rta dang de bzhin glang po dang / /rnga mo ba lang ma he gos/ /gzhan yang dngos po ci yang rung / /de tshe slob mas gus par ni/ /dad pa rab tu ldan pa yis/ /sems la dga' ba bskyed nas su/ /bla ma la ni yon dbul lo/ /yang na ci nas bla

ma de/ /rab tu mgu bar 'gyur bar bya/ /de ltar byas nas bdag bsrung ste/ /slob ma de bos bsgo ba ni/ /'di ni bsod nams zhing yin zhes/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /skyob pa rnams ni kun gyis gsungs/ /rnam dag yon tan rgyas pa yi/ /dge 'dun la ni

kun gyis byin/ /dge 'dun la phul 'bras bu che/ /skyes bu mkhas pa gang dag gis/ /dge 'dun la ni yon phul na/ /longs spyod chen po mi zad pa/ /'jig rten 'thad pa skye bar 'gyur/ /de bas thams cad mthun par ni/ /sems la dga' ba bskyed nas su/ /sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i

dge 'dun la/ /ci nus par ni mchod ston bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po dbang bskur ba/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa/ /rgyas pa ru ni bshad

par bya/ /yid gcig bsdus te legs par nyon/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du bar khru do bor nas phyi rol gyi sa la dkyil 'khor gnyis pa gru bzhi pa sgo gcig pa bri'o/ /grwa bzhir rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhi dgod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/

'di lta ste/ spros pa med par gnas pa dang / nam mkha' dri ma med pa dang / dri ma med pa'i mig dang / gos sna tshogs gyon pa rnams so/ /dbus su pad+ma chen po 'dab ma brgyad pa ze ba dang bcas pa gzhag ste/ 'dab ma bzhi la byang chub sems dpa' grogs su gyur pa sngon gyi

smon lam gyi mthu can bzhi bri bar bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / dran pa dang shes bzhin can dang / phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can dang / snying rje can no/ /'dab ma gzhan rnams la ni phyag brnyan bzhi bri ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems

kyi khyad par la spyod pa dang / 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs byed dang / ma chags pa dang / rnam par grol ba'o/ /dbus su ni chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzugs gzhag go/ /de nas rin po che'i bum pa bzhi rin po che dang / sman thams cad blugs pa/ kun tu

bzang po dang / /byams pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan song thams cad spong ba rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ro/ /pad+ma 'dab ma de la ni/ /sngags pa bdag gis de bzhag nas/ /spos dang me tog gis mchod de/ /mar

me mchod yon sbyin par bya/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / /rnga sgra yid du 'ong ba dang / /bkra shis rgya chen snyan pa yi/ /tshig gis legs par mngon dga' bya/ /skyob pa rnams kyi spyan snga ru/ /de ni bsgrims te dbang bskur ro/ /spos dang me tog bzang po yis/

de la yang ni mchod pa bya/ /de nas gser gyi thur ma ni/ /thogs te mdun du 'dug nas su/ slob ma'i snying la 'bab pa'i tshig /'di skad ces ni smra bar bya/ /sngon gyi mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten ling tog bsal ba bzhin/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi

shes pa'i/ /ling tog rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal/ /de nas me long blangs nas su/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dang zhing dag la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las byung ba ste/ /ngo

bo nyid med gnas med pa/ /de ltar mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /de ltar chos 'di shes nas su/ /sems can don ni mnyam med byos/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye/ /de nas rkang pa'i bar 'og tu/ /chos kyi 'khor lo gzhag par bya/ /de nas lag pa g.yas

par yang / /shin tu bzang po'i dung byin te/ /chos kyi dung ni bla med pa/ /kun tu rgyas par bus nas su/ /de ring phan cad 'jig rten la/ /skyob pa rnams kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing / /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis khyod/ /gsang sngags

spyad pa'i tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu shod/ /de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la/ /phan 'dogs byas pa gzo zhes bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang / /khyod la rnam pa kun tu srung / /de nas slob ma de bslang la/ /sngags pa snying rjer gyur pa yi/ /yid kyis nang

du bcug nas ni/ /de la dam tshig bstan par bya/ /de ring phan cad bu khyod kyis/ /dam pa'i chos dang byang chub sems/ /srog gi phyir yang da phyin chad/ /yongs su gtang bar mi bya'o/ /khyod kyis ser sna dang ni gang / /sems can gnod pa mi bya'o/ /dam tshig 'di

dag sangs rgyas kyis/ /brtul zhugs bzang po khyod la bshad/ /ci ltar rang gi srog bsrung ba/ /de ltar khyod kyis 'di dag srungs/ /slob mas bla ma'i rkang pa la/ /dad cing gus pas phyag byas nas/ /shin tu nges pa'i yid kyis ni/ /de dag thams cad khas blang

ngo / /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po 'di'i dam tshig la zhugs par gyur pa de'i bsod nams

ci tsam zhig mngon par 'dus bgyis par rig par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste de bzhin gshegs pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon

par 'dus byas pa ci tsam pa rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams mngon par 'dus byas pa yang de tsam du rig par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po rnam grangs 'dis kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar blta ste/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin
