gshegs pa'i zhal dang thugs las skyes pa'i sras yin par rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag phyogs gang na gnas pa der de bzhin gshegs pa des chen po dgongs mi dgos par 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa

la mchod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis de dag la mchod par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar 'dod pa rnams kyis de dag la blta bar bya'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin de dag dang / kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das deng slan cad rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de rnams la rim gror bgyi zhing mchod par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag

nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su blta bar bgyi ba lags so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag la gzigs nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang rdo rje 'dzin de rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan

pa'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas par 'jug pa rgya chen po las byung ba sna tshogs kyi gzugs kyi nor bu dang 'dra ba/ re ba thams cad yongs su

rdzogs par byed pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa bsags pa/ thogs pa med pa'i rtog pa la gnas pa/ dus gsum du chags pa med pa'i stobs dang ldan pa dag yod do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dzin de

rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab bo/ /bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshod la bab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe ljags kyi dbang po 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rnam

par sprul pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu g.yogs nas/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi tog rgya chen po yongs su dag pa'i rtse mo la blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas 'di ltar de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings khyab pa/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stobs chen mo bsrung ba chen mo 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba b+ha ya bi ga te b+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA khaM rak+Sha

ma hA ba le sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pu N+ya nir dzA te/ hU~M hU~M tra ta tra ta a pra ti ha te swA hA/ sangs rgyas mkhas pa thams cad kyis/ /rig sngags 'di gsungs mod la ni/ /de tshe sangs rgyas zhing 'di dag /rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' de kun gyis/ /ngo mtshar

gyur pa'i mig gdangs nas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar ni/ /yid du 'ong ba'i tshig smras pa/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /bsrung ba rab tu stobs chen 'di/ /sems can thams cad bsrung ba dang / /bskyab cing sba ba'i phyir gsungs te/ /gang gi snying la

bsrung gnas pa/ /de dag la ni 'jigs pa med/ /gsang sngags mthu chen dran byas na/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / /srin po 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ni/ /de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings

rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs nas/ de'i tshe chos kyi dbyings kyi mdzod kyi snying po can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu dam tshig la 'jug pa'i rig sngags 'di byung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA

nAM/ a sa me/ tri sa me/ sa ma ye swA hA/ de nas de ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du dam tshig la 'jug pa'i rig sngags kyi sgra gang zhig thos nas mkhas pa rnams chos thams cad las 'da' bar mi 'gyur

ba grag par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'byung ba'i gsang sngags gsungs pa/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ d+har+m+ma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ badzra At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ rdo rje

sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ badzra ka ba tsa hU~M/ rdo rje go cha'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ta thA ga ta tsak+Shur bya ba lo kA ya swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan no/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ bi shud+d+ha gan+d+hod+d+ha ba swA hA/ byug spos kyi sngags so/ /

na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ma hA mai t+r+ya b+h+yud ga ta swA hA/ me tog gi sngags so/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ d+har+m+ma d+hA twa nu ga ta swA hA/ bdug spos kyi sngags so/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ra tsi s+pha ra Na a ba b+hA sa ga ga not+ta re b+h+yaHswA hA/ mar me'i sngags so/ /na maHsa man+ta

bud d+hA nAM/ ga ga na sa ma sa ma swA hA/ mchod yon gyi sngags so/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ga ga na nAn+da s+pha ra Na bi shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma nir dza ta swA hA/ gtsug tor gyi sngags so/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ pra tsaN+Da badzra dz+wa la bi s+phu ra hU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i go cha'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA

nAM/ dz+wA la mA lin ta thA ga ta ra tsi swA hA/ kun tu 'bar ba'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ma hA ta thA ga ta dzi hwa s+ya d+har+m+ma pra tiSh+Thi ta swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags kyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor du dgod pa'i sngags kyi mdzod do// //bam po gsum pa/

de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag na rdo rjes zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na/ dkyil 'khor bri ba'i tshe na ni/ /bgegs rnams zhi bar 'gyur ba lags/ /gsang sngags sgrub pa'i tshe na yang / /log 'dren rnams ni ma mchis 'gyur/ /gsang sngags

rnams kyang ci ltar bsgrub/ /de yi 'bras bu ci 'drar 'gyur/ /de skad gsol nas de yi tshe/ /bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad chen gyis/ /'di skad ces ni bka' stsal to/ /sems dpa' chen po legs so legs/ /khyod kyis yongs su dris pa gang / /thams cad khyod la

bstan par bya/ /sngon cad ser sna bsten pa'i phyir/ /bgegs ni rang gi sems las byung / /de yi rgyu ni gzhig pa'i phyir/ /gang du sems dang sems byung ba'i/ /rtog pa thams cad spong ba dang / /rnam par rtog pa las byung ba'i/ /spros pa thams cad 'gag 'gyur

ba'i/ /byang chub sems zhes bshad pa yin/ /sngags pas byang chub sems dran zhing / /mi g.yo ba ni yid la bzlas/ /de yi phyag rgya bcings na ni/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la rlung bcing ba 'di nyon cig /a

zhes bya bar bdag bsgyur te/ /ha zhes bya bar yid la bzlas/ /rlung gi phyogs su gnas nas ni/ /sa la spos kyi thig le dag /bdun nyid legs par byas nas su/ /kham phor gyis ni dgab par bya/ /kham phor ri rab chen po ru/ /yang dang yang du bsam par bya/ /

de yi steng du a zhes pa/ /klad kor bcas pa rgyas par bsam/ /rlung bcing chen po de lta bu/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad/ /sems dpa' chen po chu yi yang / /yid gcig bsdus te mnyan par gyis/ /sngags pas ra zhes bya ba ni/ /thams cad dmar po

stobs chen bsam/ /'bar ba'i phreng can mi bzad pa/ /khro bo lag na ral gri thogs/ /sa la sprin gyi gzugs bris nas/ /ral gri'i phyag rgyas gdab par bya/ /phyogs kun nas ni langs pa'i sprin/ /de ma thag tu 'jig par 'gyur/ /yang na sngags pa mi g.yeng bas/ /

de dag phur bus gdab bya ste/ /mkhas pa rdo rjer gyur nas su/ /thams cad rdo rje phur bus btab/ /yang na bgegs rnams thams cad ni/ /zhi bar bya ba yang bshad de/ /sngags pa dkyil 'khor dbus gnas nas/ /mi g.yo stobs chen gsang sngags ni/ /shin

tu mi bzad gsang sngags kyi/ /dkyil 'khor dag la gnas par bsam/ /de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/ /rkang pa g.yon pas spyi bor gzer/ /'on tang de ni zhir 'gyur ba'am/ /dogs pa med par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas su/ /

ske tse dug khrag bsres pa yis/ /byugs nas sngags pas bskams nas ni/ /gdon de myur du 'tshig par 'gyur/ /de ni me la bskams pa dang / /dug gis bskus na nges par ni/ /tshangs pa'am 'on te brgya byin yang / /de yi mod la myur du 'tshig /de nas bcom

ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na bdag gis 'di ltar mjal to/ /bcom ldan 'das rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas la gnas na lha rnams byin gyis rlob par byed do/ /de nyid du gnas na de

bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' las kyang 'gal bar mi bgyid do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rang gi rigs la gnas pa de ni gsang sngags thams cad kyi dam tshig lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa

spyod pa rnams kyis kyang rang gi gnas la gnas nas kyang don thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de de bzhin te/ ci skad smras pa de bzhin no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gzhan yang gang gis kha dog gang gsungs

pa/ /de nyid de yi dkyil 'khor te/ /lha yi gzugs ni de lta bur/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan/ /de la gsang ba pa'i bdag po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can blo zhan pa ma dad pa gang dag bstan pa 'di la dad par mi 'gyur zhing yid gnyis dang som

nyi mang ba/ thos pa tsam snying por 'dzin pa/ sgrub pa la mi phyogs pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni bdag nyid kyang ma rung la gzhan yang phung bar byed pa yin no/ /'di skad du 'di ni phyi rol pa rnams la yod de/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa ni ma yin no zhes smra bar 'gyur

gyi/ mi blun po de dag gis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/ chos thams cad la mnga' brnyes pa/ sems can gyi don rtogs par thugs su chud pa des/ sngon sems can rnams la phan par bzhed nas/ 'di dag thams cad bshad do zhes bya bar ni mi shes

so/ /chos rnams kyi ni chos kyi mtshan/ /blun po des ni de mi shes/ /chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid ni/ /stong pa nyid du yang dag gsungs/ /sngags pa rtag tu der gnas nas/ /rab tu nges par las bya'o/ /bgegs zhi bar bya ba'i rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o// //

de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin de dag dang / kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal nas/ snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i sgo ci ltar rtogs pa

rang rang gi tshig tu brjod pa'i tshig gis gsang sngags rnams smra bar 'dod nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / rdo rje 'dzin de dag la mi nyams pa'i chos nyid du byin gyis brlabs nas bka'

stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi dbyings ci ltar rtogs pa bzhin sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyong ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams smros shig /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas

stobs thogs pa med pa'i gsang sngags smras pa/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ sa man+tA nu ga ti ba ra dza d+har+m+ma nir dzA ta ma hA ma hA swA hA/ kun tu bzang po'i'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byams pa chen po kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas

rang gi snying po smras pa/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a dza tan dza yA sar+b+ba satwa A sha yA nu ga ta swA hA/ byams pa'i 'o/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po rnam par dag pa'i yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang sngags smras pa/ na maHsa

man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ A kA sha sa ma tA nu ga ta bi tsi tra~M ba ra d+ha ra swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po'i'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba snying rje chen po'i snying stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang sngags smras pa/ na maHsa man+ta bud

d+hA nAM/ A sa tA hr-i ta ang+b+hud ga ta trA~M trA~M rA~M rA~M swA hA/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i 'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kun tu spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi snying po 'khor dang bcas pa smras pa/

na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki ta kA ru NA mA yA ra ra ra hU~M dzaHswA hA/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ dzaM dzaM sa swA hA/ mthu chen thob kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ kA ru Nong+b+ha be tA re tA ri Ni swA hA/ lha mo sgrol ma'i'o/ /na maH

sa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ sar+b+ba b+ha ya trA sa ni hU~Ms+pho Ta ya swA hA/ khro gnyer can ma'i'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ta thA ga ta bi sha ya saM b+ha be/ pad+ma mA li ni swA hA/ gos dkar can ma'i'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ hU~M kha da ban+d+ha s+pho Ta ya swA hA/ rta mgrin gyi'o/ /de nas byang chub

sems dpa' sa'i snying po rdo rje mi shigs pa rtog pa'i yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang sngags smras pa/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ha ha ha su ta nu swA hA/ sa'i snying po'i'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas kyi

byin gyi rlabs rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ he he he/ ku mA ra ka /bi muk+ti/ sa tha s+thi ti/ sma ra sma ra/ pra ti ta na swA hA/ 'jam dpal gyi'o/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po

phyag na rdo rje mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi snying po 'khor dang bcas pa smras pa/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M/ phyag na rdo rje'i'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ tri Ta tri Ta/ dza yan+ti swA hA/ mA ma kI'i'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ hU~M ban+d+ha

ya ban+d+ha ya/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ badzrong+b+ha be sar+b+ba tra a pra ti ha te swA hA/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ hrIHhU~M phaT swA hA/ khro zla gtso bo'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ sar+b+ba d+ha r+m+ma ni r+b+hed ni badzra su tsi ba ra de swA hA/ rdo rje rtse mo'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ dzaM dzaM

swA hA/ rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ he he kiny+tsi rA ya si gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na khA da khA da pa ri pU ra ya sa pra ti dz+nyA na swA hA/ phyag brnyan thams cad kyi'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa rin po che'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas

nyid kyi snying po 'khor dang bcas pa dag gsungs pa/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ sar+b+ba kle sha ni shud d+hA na sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma ba shi ta prA p+ta ga ga na/ sa ma sa ma swA hA/ shAkya thub pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ba ra de ba ra prAp+te hUM/ mdzod spu'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ba~M ba~M hU~M hU~M phaT

swA hA/ gtsug tor thams cad kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ /d+h+riM d+h+riM riM riM dzri dzri swA hA/ khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a pa rA dzi ta dzA la na ti dz+ha Ti ta swA hA/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ pri thi byai swA hA/ sa'i 'o/ /

na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ biSh+Na be swA hA/ khyab 'jug gi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ru drA ya swA hA/ drag po'i'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ bA ya be swA hA/ rlung lha'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ sa ra swa t+yai swA hA/ dbyangs can gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ rAk+Sha sA d+hi pa

ta ye swA hA/ bden bral gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ bai ba satwA ya swA hA/ gshin rje'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ mr-i ta ye swA hA/ 'chi bdag gi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ kA la rA tri ye swA hA/ dus mtshan gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ matri b+h+yaHswA hA/

ma mo rnams kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ sha krA ya swA hA/ brgya byin gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a pAM pa ta ye swA hA/ chu lha'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ A di t+yA ya swA hA/ nyi ma'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ pra dza pa ta

ye swA hA/ tshangs pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ tsan+d+rA ya swA hA/ zla ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ me b+ha sha ni ye swA hA/ dga' bo dang bsnyen dga' bo'i'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bstan pa don yod par grub par

bzhed nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsungs pa/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ga ga na ba ra lak+Sha Ne ga ga na sa ma sar+b+bo da ga ta ti sa ra saM b+ha be dz+wa la na mo a mo g+hA nAn swA hA/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi

yum nam mkha'i spyan gyi'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bgegs thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gzi brjid 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bgegs chen po 'joms pa'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA

NAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hU~M/ trag ha mA/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ ha ha ha/ bisma ye/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga na bi Sha ya saM b+ha ya trai lokya bi dza ya hU~M dza swA hA/ khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ he tu pra t+ya ya bi ga te d+har+m+ma

ni rA dza ta hU~M/ nyan thos rnams kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ tha/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa hr-i da yaM ni be sha ni na maHsar+b+ba bid+yA swA hA/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyi'i snying po'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ lo ka lo

ka ka rA ya/ sar+b+ba de ba/ nA ga /yak+Sha/ gan+d+har bA/ a su ra/ ga ru Da/ kin ra/ ma ho ra ga hr-i da yan/ n+ya ka ri Sha ya bi tsi tra ga ti swA hA/ lha la sogs pa spyi'i snying po'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ sarba thA/ bI ma ti/ bi ki ra Na/ d+har+m+ma d+hA tu nir dzA ta saM saM ha

swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ dun+dAn+ta ma hA ro Sha Na khA Ta ya sar+b+bAn ta thA ga ta A dz+nyAM ku ru swA hA/ sgo srung gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ he ma hA pra tsan+Da a b+hi mu kha grih+Na khA da ya/ kiny+tsi rA ya si sa ma ya ma

nu sma ra swA hA/ sgo srung mngon du phyogs pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ sar+b+ba tra a nu ga te/ ban+d+ha sI mAM/ ma hA sa ma ya nir dzA te sma ra Ne/ a pra ti ha te/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /tsa ra tsa ra/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ da sha di shan sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ a nu ga te/ pra ba ra d+har+m+ma lab+ng+ha bi dza ye b+ha ga ba ti

bi ku ri bi ku le le lu bu pri swA hA/ mtshams chen mo gcod pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a/ byang chub kyi'o/ /A spyod pa'i 'o/ /oM rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i 'o/ /a mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ hA/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam

par rgyal ba'i'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ hAM/ 'phags pa mi g.yo mgon gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ sa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ba/ phyag na

rdo rje'i'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ maM/ 'jam dpal gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ga/ nam mkha'i spyan gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ raM/ chos kyi dbyings kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ khAM/ dpa' bo chen po'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ dzaM/

chu'i dbang po'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ taM/ lha mo sgrol ma'i'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ hrIH/ khro gnyer can ma'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ paM/ gos dkar can gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ saM/ mthu chen thob kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ haM/

rta mgrin gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ yaM/ grags 'dzin ma'i'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ saM/ phyag na rin chen gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ dzA/ dra ba'i 'od kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ b+ha/ shAkya thub pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ hA~M n+ya~M ru~M/

gtsug tor gsum gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ laM/ gdugs dkar po'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ shaM/ gtsug tor rgyal ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ saM/ gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ triM/ gzi brjid phung po'i 'o/ /

na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ hU~M/ rnam par 'thor ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ hU~M/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ bI/ sa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ki li/ skra can ma'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ di li/ nye skra can ma'i 'o/ /

na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ mi li/ sna tshogs ma'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ hi li/ nor ldan ma'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ha sa nAM/ ngo mtshar can gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ra sa nAM/ sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta

bud d+hA nAM/ dar+sha nAM/ ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ bi ha sa nAM/ yongs su skyong sems blo gros kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ThaM/ byams pa chen po mngon par 'byung ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ yaM/ snying rje gdungs pa'i 'o/ /na maH

sa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ i/ gdung ba thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ aM/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros can gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ tra~M/ rin chen 'byung gnas kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ShaM/ phyag na rin chen gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta

bud d+hA nAM/ TaM/ sa 'dzin gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a~M/ gzungs thob pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ D+haM/ phyag na rin chen phyag rgya'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ naM/ bsam pa brtan pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ hAM/ nam mkha' dri med kyi'o//

na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ rAM/ nam mkha'i blo gros kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ga taM/ blo gros rnam par dag pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ng+hI~M/ spyod pa'i blo gros kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ hU~M/ brtan pa'i blo gros kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA

nAM/ ng+h+ri~M shri~M ha~M bra~M/ phyag brnyan rnams kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ k+Sha da ha ra ya~M ka~M /byang chub sems dpa' ji skad gsungs pa rnams kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ma no mA ye d+har+m+ma saM b+ha be bi b+ha be ka Tha ne saM sa ne/ gnas gtsang ma pa rnams kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/

kra~M ke ri/ srin po rnams kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ hrIHha/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ yak+Sha bIr+ya d+ha ri/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ mi tsi mi tsi/ sha za mo rnams kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ gu~M gu~M i~M i~M/ 'byung po

rnams kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ra Ta~M ra Ta~M/ bra~M Ta~M bra~M Ta~M/ lha ma yin rnams kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ga ra laM bi ra laM/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ha sa nAM/ bI a sa nAM/ mi'am ci rnams kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a ti tsa lA

ra na ma no mai/ mi rnams kyi'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po ngas de la sogs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags bshad de/ de la gsang sngags thams cad kyi/ /snying po des pas mnyan par gyis/ /a zhes bya ba sngags kun gyi/ /snying po yin par yang dag bshad/ /de la gsang sngags

kun gnas te/ /de ltar sngags rnams rnam par nges/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ spyi'i gsang sngags kyi mdzod rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub

sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags ci ltar sgrub pa dang / bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa 'di nyon cig /yi ge dang ni yi ger sbyar/ /de bzhin gzhi las gzhir gyur pa/ /shin tu bsdams pas yid la ni/ /bzlas brjod 'bum

phrag gcig bya'o/ /yi ge byang chub sems yin te/ /gnyis pa sgra zhes bya ba yin/ /gzhi ni rang gi lha gzhag pa/ /rang gi lus kyi gnas la bya/ /gzhi gnyis pa ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rkang gnyis mchog tu shes par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa/ /

sngags pas de la gnas par bsam/ /yi ge rnams ni bzhin/ /de yi dbus su legs par dgod/ /slar sdud pa yi tshig gis non/ /srog dang rtsol ba rnam par sbyangs/ /srog ces bya ba rlung du bshad/ /rtsol ba dran pa zhes bya ste/ /de gnyis

bsdams pa byas nas su/ /sngon du bsnyen pa legs par bya/ /de nas sngags pas zla gcig tu/ /shin tu bsdams te bzlas brjod bya/ /gsang sngags sngon du spyad pa ni/ /gzhi gcig nas ni gcig tu 'jug /grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /sngar

spyad pa zhes bshad pa yin/ /de phyin cad ni gang cung zad/ /me tog spos la sogs dbul zhing / /sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bya'i phyir/ /de tshe byang chub tu yang bsngo/ /sngags pas 'jigs med de lta bu/ /zla gnyis pa la bzlas brjod bya/ /de nas zla ba nya ba'i

tshe/ /mi de sgrub la 'jug par bya/ /ri rtse dang ni ba lang lhas/ /de bzhin 'bab chu'i mdo dag dang / /lam gyi bzhi mdo mtshan gcig dang / /ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gnas su/ /dkyil 'khor nan tan bri bya ba/ /thams cad rdo rje'i khang par byas/ /des ni der gnas

bsrung byas nas/ /sgrub pa la ni nan tan bya/ /der ni mtshan mo nam phyed dam/ /yang na nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe/ /'di lta'i ltas rnams 'byung 'gyur te/ /blo dang ldan pas de shes bya/ /hU~M zhes pa dang rnga sgra dang / /de bzhin sa ni g.yo ba dang / /yid du 'ong ba'i

tshig kyang rung / /de ni nam mkha' las grag na/ /mtshan ma dag ni de rnams kyis/ /yid bzhin rjes grub shes bya ste/ /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog rnams kyis/ /de yi 'bras bur yang dag bshad/ /de ltar sngags kyi tshul gnas pa/ /de ni nges par sangs

rgyas 'gyur/ /de bas rnam pa thams cad du/ /sngags nyid rtag tu dran par bya/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas mthu chen gyis/ /de ni dran par bya ba'ang bshad/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/

'jig rten pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rim par phye ba'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa la gzigs nas/ re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ dus gsum mtha' yas pa'i sgo nges

pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i chos kyi tshig rnams gsungs so/ /mkha' ltar dri med ngo bo nyid med pa/ /rnam mang ye shes sna tshogs sbyin par byed/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu stong pa nyid/ /rkyen la rag las zab cing blta bar dka'/ /khyad par 'gro ba rnams la

rtag pa ru/ /rnam par bsams pa'i 'bras bu mchog sbyin byed/ /ji ltar nam mkha' chags med spyod yul can/ /'gro ba kun gyi gnas su gyur pa ltar/ /de bzhin rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid 'di/ /srid gsum ma lus 'byor pa 'byung bar byed/ /mchog skyes

mkhas pa gang zhig 'dir spyod na/ /rgyal ba kun dang spyod yul gcig par 'gyur/ /rgyal bas ci skad gsungs pa'i chos nyid ni/ /shin tu rnam dag thams cad snang byed pa/ /de las go 'phang rnyed dka' gzhan med do/ /yangs pa'i chos ni zab la 'grib med cing / /

mnyam med 'jig rten phan byed de la ni/ /rnam rtog rnam par spangs te spyad par gyis/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor tshogs pa la gzigs nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje

'dzin rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag gang gis na sems can rnams mthong ba'i chos kho na la dga' ba dang mgu ba thob nas bde ba la reg par 'gyur ba rang rang gi chos kyi dbyings kyi mthu rlabs su gyur pa/ dngos grub sgrub pa'i tshig rnams ston cig /de skad ces

bka' stsal pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal nas/ chos kyi rjes bka' ci skad stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das nyid la gsol ba btab pa bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du dngos grub sgrub pa'i tshig

rnams bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bstan du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang bdag cag rang gis rtogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bshad pa de ni rab tu dka' lags so/ /de ltar lags pas ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang

bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis legs par rab tu bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis rdo rje 'dzin de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so/ /de

bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la phan yon che ba'i chos gcig yod pa ni 'di lta ste/ ngo tsha shes pa'o/ /ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo ni mthong ba'i chos 'di la chos gnyis rab tu myur bar 'byung ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ mi bya

ba'i las mi byed pa dang / dam pa rnams kyis bsngags pa'o/ /yang gnyis te/ khong du ma chud pa khong du chud pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs pa thob par 'gyur ba'o/ /yang gnyis te/ tshul khrims la rab tu gnas par 'gyur

ba dang / lha dang mi rnams su skye ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na legs par rab tu yid la zung shig dang / 'di lta ste/ sgrub par sbyor ba'i tshig gang rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams gsang sngags rnams

las myur du gsang sngags kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba/ gsang sngags sgrub pa 'grub par sbyor ba'i tshig rnams bshad do/ /de la dang por re zhig dkyil 'khor mthong ba/ bla mas gsang sngags bsgrub par gnang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ dad pa can ser sna med pa/

snying rje can dul ba rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa/ sdom pa bzung ba/ rang gi bslab pa la gnas pa/ /thabs la mkhas shing rab tu brtan/ /dus dang dus ma yin pa'ang shes/ /'jigs pa med cing mkhas la gtong / /bzod dang ldan

zhing byams pa'i yid/ /gsang sngags spyod la rab tu brtson/ /gsang sngags de nyid don la mkhas/ /bsam gtan byed la dga' ba yin/ /sgrub pa po ni sgrub la shis/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug la myos par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags

yod de/ des 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad myos pas brgyal bar byed cing / me tog mang po sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sa phyogs nyams dga' ba rnams kyang ston la/ yongs su spyad pa dang nye bar spyad pa rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs rnams kyang mngon par sprul nas/ gzhan

'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang sbyin la/ bdag nyid kyang yongs su spyod do/ /'di lta ste/ lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la yid mgyogs zhes bya ba'i rig sngags yod de/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can gyi dgos pa byed cing / nye bar

spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa thams cad kyang mngon par sprul nas/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la yang sbyin la bdag nyid kyang kun tu spyod do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na mig 'phrul mkhan ni gsang sngags rnams kyis kun dga'i ra ba dang / mtsho dang / 'bab

chu dang / mi la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs ston to/ /'di lta ste dper na/ lha ma yin rnams ni gsang sngags kyi sgyu ma rnams ston to/ /'di lta ste dper na/ gsang sngags dag gis ni dug dang rims la sogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste ma mo zhes bya

ba'i lha mo rnams ni gsang sngags kyis sems can rnams la nad 'go ba gtong ngo / /'di lta ste dper na/ gsang sngags kyis ni me'i tsha ba med par byas nas grang bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag dpe'i tshig 'di rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi mthu la mngon par dad par

bya'o/ /gsang sngags kyi mthu de yang gang zhe na/ gsang sngags rnams las byung ba yang ma yin/ rdzas las 'jug pa yang ma yin/ sbyor ba pos las dmigs pa yang ma yin mod kyi/ rigs kyi bu dag 'on kyang gsang sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi chos nyid 'byung ba las 'da' bar yang

mi 'gyur te/ dus gsum las 'das pa'i phyir dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa las mngon par grub pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na chos nyid kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par khong du chud pas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad

par gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi rjes su 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dus gsum du chags pa med pa'i stobs kyi gzhi byin gyis rlob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa'i snying po can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa ci snyed yod pa rnam par rig par byed pa'i sgra rnams las chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyi stobs/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i stobs/ yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mos pa las byung ba/ gnas skabs bzhi dbyangs gcig las byung bas chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyab par byas te/ nam mkha' dang mnyam par gyur nas byung ba/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA/ a A a~M aH/ yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas kyi snying po de dag byung ma thag tu/ de nas yang chos kyi dbyings thams cad nges par sgrogs pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi snying po'i tshig gis mtshan pa rnam par rig pa'i dbyangs kyi sgra gcig nas gcig tu mngon par grag go/ /byang

chub sems dpas de thos nas/ /ngo mtshar gyur pa'i mig phye ste/ /kun mkhyen bsnyun dang bral ba la/ /tshig snyan 'di skad ces gsol to/ /e ma'o gsang sngags spyad pa las/ /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog rnams kyis/ /gang gis 'di kun khyab pa yi/ /ye

shes yangs pa chen po byung / /de bas rnam pa thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i snying po la/ /nang gi bdag nyid rnam dag pas/ /rtag tu mngon par brtson par bya/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi snying po rnams sgrub pa byung ste/ skyed

mos tshal lam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ phug gam/ yid gang du dben pa der byang chub kyi sems bsgom zhing / nam mtshan ma ma byung gi bar de srid du 'dug par bya'o/ /de nas snying po de dag las gang rung ba cig gzung ste/ the tsom med par gyur gyi bar du gzhi bsgrub par

bya'o/ /de nas snying po snying gar bzhag nas yid bsgrub par bya ste/ shin tu rnam par dag pa/ dri ma med pa brtan pa rab tu mi g.yo ba/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ me long lta bu/ rab tu phra ba la mngon par blta zhing rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor bas rang gi lus rang gi lha'i lus su mthong

gi bar du bya'o/ /gzhi gnyis pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me long gi dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi nang na pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po la bzhugs pa phug na bzhugs pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa/ thor tshugs dang dbu rgyan dang 'od zer mtha' yas pas bskor ba/ rtog

pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba/ nam mkha' bzhin gzod ma nas zhi ba ste/ de la sgra gnas par bsam zhing / mnyam par gzhag pas bzlas brjod bya/ /de nas sngon du bsnyen pa ni/ /'bum phrag gcig tu bya bar bshad/ /de nas zla ba gnyis pa la/ /me tog dri la

sogs pa dbul/ /sems can rnams la rnam mang po'i/ /phan pa nye bar sgrub byed cing / /rnyed dang ma rnyed rnam spangs te/ /zla ba gzhan la bzlas brjod bya/ /de la de ru sbyor ba 'di/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsam par bya/ /bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni/ /sems can

thams cad bde gyur cig /thams cad nad kyang med par shog /yang na de bzhin gshegs bsngags pa'i/ /'dod pa phun sum tshogs gyur cig /yang na sems can thams cad kyang / /re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyis su/ /ma thogs par ni

grub par shog /dud 'gro gcig la gcig za ba'i/ /sdug bsngal nam yang 'byung ma gyur/ /rnams la zas skom sogs/ /thogs pa med par 'byung bar shog /sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gang / /mi bzad rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /bdag gi bsod

nams mthu yis ni/ /de dag myur du zhi bar gyur/ /sems can sdug bsngal thams cad la/ /snying rje chen po bskyed nas ni/ /bsgrub pa de dang gzhan dag kyang / /des ni yang dang yang du bsam/ /ci ltar bsams pa 'grub bya'i phyir/ /byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas gsum

gyis/ /de dag thams cad byin brlab cing / /yid la sngags kyang bzlas brjod bya/ /bdag gi bsod nams stobs dang ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin stobs dang / /chos kyi dbyings kyi stobs kyis su/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pas/ /don rnams gang dag

bsams pa kun/ /sems can khams ni ma lus 'dir/ /de dag thams cad ci rigs par/ /thogs pa med par 'byung gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stobs nam mkha' dang 'dra ba nam mkha'i mdzod 'byung ba gsungs so/ /na maHsar+b+ba

ta thA ga te b+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tad khaM uT+ga te s+pha ra Na i maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ 'di lan gsum bzlas na ci ltar bsams pa'i don thams cad thogs pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas zla ba nya ba'i tshe/ /mi de sgrub la 'jug par bya/ /ri rtse dang ni ba lang lhas/ /chu mdo'am yang na dur

khrod dam/ /lam gyi bzhi mdo'am shing gcig drung / /ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gnas su/ /bgegs rnams thams cad myos 'gyur ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor des pas mnyan par gyis/ /kun tu gru bzhi lham pa ste/ /sgo gcig pa la mu ran can/ /thams cad kha dog ser

po yis/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mchog bris nas/ /rdo rje sbrel ba'i tshul gyis su/ /rdo rje phan tshun 'brel bar bya/ /sgor ni sgo srung gnyis bri ba/ /gdul dka' dang ni mngon phyogs gnyis/ /mig dmar khro dang bcas pa la/ /khros shing sdigs par byed pa bri/ /mdung rtse

gsum sa grwa rnams su/ /nan tan du ni bri bar bya/ /dbus su rdo rje'i gdan yid 'ong / /kha ni kun tu blta ba bri/ /de'i steng pad+ma chen po ni/ /'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas/ /rgyal ba kun la phyag byas nas/ /smon lam nye bar sgrub byed cing / /phyag na rdo rje blo

can gyi/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings nas su/ /der ni bsrung byas der 'dug ste/ /sbyangs pa'i rdzas ni blangs nas su/ /nang gi bdag nyid rnam dag pas/ /mtshan gcig thal byung bzlas brjod bya/ /der ni nam gyi phyed dus sam/ /yang na nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe/ /rdzas de yongs su

'gyur ba ni/ /'bar phreng can gyi gzi brjid bzhin/ /sngags pa rang gis de blangs na/ /nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bskal par gnas shing gzi brjid che/ /rgyal sras de ni 'dod na 'chi/ /'jig rten khams ni gzhan du'ang 'gro/ /gtso bo sna tshogs gzugs

'chang ba/ /rdzas las byung ba'i sngags bsgrubs pas/ /dpal ldan mchod pa rab tu byed/ /'di ni nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i/ /rdzas kyi dngos grub yin par bshad/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la brtag pa 'di rgyu mtshan du mdzad nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs

pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par thugs su chud pa rnams kyi brtag pa de nyid rang bzhin gyis stong par mkhyen kyang thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs kyis 'dus ma byas pa gdags par btags te/ yongs

su bsgyur ba'i tshul du mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mthu rlabs po che sems can rnams la nges par ston te/ des de rnams yid rab tu dga' zhing tshe ring po yang rab tu thob nas/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag gis rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa/ sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod cing 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i lam 'di grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas/ gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul gyi cho ga thugs dgyes bzhin du 'chad

do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang bskal pa du mar stsol zhing 'bad de bya dka' ba rnams brtsams kyang 'thob par mi 'gyur ba de byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi tshe 'di gcig kho na la 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag

po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan nam/ ral gri'am/ gdugs sam/ mchil lham mam/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'am/ lig bu mig gam/ gi'u wang blangs te/ bzlas

brjod sum 'bum byas la de ltar bsgrubs na de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs dang ldan pas yid la 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams bsgrubs na/ de dag rang gi sems kyi dbang tsam kho nas yongs su 'grub par

'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag rgyu las 'bras bu mngon par 'dod pa'i mi blun po de dag ni/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags rnams kyi gsang sngags mtshan nyid rab tu mi shes pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyu ni byed par ma gsungs te/ /'bras bu'ang de

la yod ma yin/ /rgyu ni rgyu yis stong pa na/ /de ni ci ltar rgyur yang 'gyur/ /de bas gsang sngags 'bras bu ni/ /rgyu dang las bral shes par bya/ /gang tshe mtshan ma med pa yi/ /ting 'dzin ci lta bzhin reg pa/ /de tshe sngags pas dngos grub ni/ /yid las yang dag byung

ba 'thob/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzhi rnams dngos grub tu bsgrub pa'i tshig gang gis rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams mthong ba'i chos nyid la rab tu dga' zhing bde

ba la reg par gnas la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang 'gal bar mi 'gyur ba de yang bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings lags te/ de yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan to/ /bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas na chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa rtogs par khong du chud par bgyi 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces gsol pa

dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po legs so legs so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su dri bar sems pa de ni yang legs so/ /de'i phyir nyon la legs par rab tu yid la zung

shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la a zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa 'byung

ste/ gtsug lag khang ngam phug gam/ gnas gang yang rung ste yan lag thams cad du a zhes bya ba gzhag la bzlas brjod sum 'bum bya'o/ /de nas zla ba nya ba'i tshe ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas la ci srid du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'am/ 'jam dpal lam/ rdo rje 'dzin

chen po gang yang rung ba zhig 'ongs te/ mgo la nyug gam legs so zhes zer gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'i/ de nas phyag byas te mchod yon phul na byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sems yang ba dang / lus yang ba goms par bya zhing bzlas brjod

byas na de'i lus rnam par dag pa dang / sems rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /a zhes bya ba rnam par bzhag ste/ bzlas brjod byas na rna ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /'on te srog gzung bar 'dod na a zhes bya ba srog dang lhan cig tu byas la dus gsum du bsam pa byas na yun ring

du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyi steng du klad kor gzhag na gnas pa dang 'gro ba'i dug thams cad 'byin to/ /de nas gzi can dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ a zhes byas pa bdag tu byas/ /pa las de bzhin mi dbang po/ /gcig la pad+ma gzhag par bya/ /gzhan la yang ni dung bzhag

ste/ /gcig la gcig ni gdong bltas na/ /de yi mod la dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa la gzigs nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa rnams

kyi thugs las byung ba zhes bya ba/ las dang bya bas rnam par rol pa spyod pa'i rol mo rim par phye ba rgyas pa khams bzhi yang dag par bsdu bar bsdus pa/ sems kyi rgyal po la gnas pa/ nam mkha' ltar kun tu khyab pa/ mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu mang ba/ nyan thos dang

rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon sum pa/ gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ las sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa yod

kyis/ de nyon la legs par rab tu yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do/ /lag na rdo rje de la spyod pa'i rol mo las dang bya ba mngon par 'grub pa'i 'bras bu phal che ba/ lus can kun kyi mngon sum pa gang zhe na/ cho ga shes pas thog mar ni/ /bdag gi de nyid

rim bzhin bya/ /sngags pa snga ma bzhin 'dug la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dran byas te/ /bdag nyid a zhes bya ba ni/ /klad kor bcas dang rgyas byas pa/ /thams cad shin tu ser zhing bzang / /gru bzhi rdo rjes mtshan byas te/ /sngags pas der gnas rdzogs pa yis/ /

sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo bsam/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /bdag gi de nyid yin par gsungs/ /nam zhig sngags pas bdag gi ni/ /de nyid dogs pa med gyur pa/ /de tshe 'jig rten thams cad la/ /phan pa byed pa nyid du 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar sna tshogs dag

dang ldan/ /mig 'phrul can gyi gnas la 'dug /sngags pa nam zhig mnyam bzhag na/ /srid pa rab tu dog pa na/ /thog med dus nas mi shes pas/ /bsags pa'i las de kun zad 'gyur/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ /sems de nam zhig sgom byed pa/ /de tshe'ang

sngags pa rnal 'byor pa/ /chu yis pad+ma lta bur ni/ /dge dang mi dge 'bras 'byung ba'i/ /las kyi rtog pas mi gos na/ /'di bdag nyid ni rgyal mchog tu/ /bsgyur na smos kyang ci zhig dgos// //bam po bzhi pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang

mdzad bdud bzhi las rgyal ba rdo rje rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje'i yi ge'i tshig bdud bzhi las rgyal bar byed pa/ rgyud drug las rnam par grol bar byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di rnams gsungs so/ /

na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a bI ra hU~M kha~M/ de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dzin de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ mig mi 'dzums

par thams cad mkhyen pa la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshig 'di skad ces brjod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi nor gyi dbyig /'dis ni gang dag sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams dang / /rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos

pa/ /mkhas pas de dag 'jig rten 'dir/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla med pa/ /dpe med ye shes thob nas su/ /rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs rnam 'phrul pas/ /sa steng kun tu rnam par spyod/ /de bas 'di dag so so yi/ /cho ga rgyas pa dag dang las/ /sna tshogs dgod pa thams

cad kyang / /bstan pa 'di la bshad du gsol/ /des ni gsang sngags spyod pa yi/ /theg chen bla na med pa la/ /sems can rnams ni dga' bzhin du/ /mthong ba'i chos la gnas par 'gyur/ /de skad gsol nas bcom ldan gyis/ /'jam pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal

pa/ /khyed rnams mthun par rtse gcig tu/ /mnyam par zhog la 'di nyon cig /de'i tshe sa gzhi rdo rje chen por byin gyis brlabs te/ nyid kyi sku las byang chub kyi snying po nye bar bstan par bzhed nas gsungs pa/ a ni mchog tu shes bya ba/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor ldan pa ste/ /

phyi rol dang ni nang du yang / /rdo rje dkyil 'khor shes par bya/ /der 'dug nas ni thams cad bsam/ /rnal 'byor gnas zhes bshad pa yin/ /a ni srog gi dam pa ste/ /'gugs par byed pa'i mchog tu bshad/ /nam zhig klad kor gyis mnan na/ /lus can kun gyi

sel bar 'gyur/ /sngags pas nam zhig zla gcig tu/ /rdo rje can gyis rgya bcings nas/ /dus gsum bzlas brjod byas na ni/ /mi shes grong khyer 'joms par 'gyur/ /lha dang lha min rnams kyis kyang / /mi phyed shin tu brtan par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid rnyed pa grub bya'i phyir/ /rgyas

pa'i las ni gang cung zad/ /de kun rtag tu sngags pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus su bya/ /gser gyi kha dog 'bar dang bcas/ /thor tshugs dbu rgyan 'chang ba yi/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting 'dzin zhugs/ /dbang chen gyi ni gzhi zhes bya/ /rdo rje pad+ma ral gri dang / /de

bzhin dang par bshad pa dang / /gser dag dang ni sa dag dang / /yang na yid bzhin nor bu'ang rung / /de la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ /dbang chen du ni bsgoms te bsgrub/ /mnan pa dag kyang bshad par bya/ /'di ni khyod kyis mnyam bzhag nyon/ /sngags pas mdor na ri rab ni/ /

rtse mo brgyad pa bsam par bya/ /de yi steng du pad+ma gzhag /de yi rjes la rdo rje'o/ /de'i steng rnal 'byor pa yis ni/ /yi ge dam pa gtso bo ste/ /de yis spyi bor mnan na ni/ /de ni mi g.yo gnas par 'gyur/ /sman la yang ni lan brgya ru/ /bzlas brjod byas te mis 'thungs na/ /

sngon gyi las las byung ba yi/ /de yi nad rnams 'byang bar 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang des pa yis/ /ba zhes bya ba dam pa nyon/ /gangs dang 'o ma dung 'dra ba/ /lte ba'i dbus nas byung ba ste/ /pad+ma dkar po 'dab ma ni/ /de yi dbus na rab tu gnas/ /mgon po dam pa rab

tu zhi/ /ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od dang 'dra/ /de yi dkyil 'khor ngo mtshar can/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad/ /kun tu dkar po bsam par bya/ /khyud kor rim pa dgus kyang bskor/ /gdung ba thams cad zhi byed pa/ /smug zil 'dus pa'i nang na gnas/ /'o

ma mu tig phreng dkar dang / /shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba'i/ /chu rgyun rnams kyis khor yug tu/ /kun nas rab tu 'bab pa bzhin/ /sngags pas yid la bsams na ni/ /gdung ba kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /mnyam par gzhag pas dngos 'di rnams/ /

dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bsgrub par bya/ /mar sar 'o ma mu tig phreng / /de bzhin khyu mchog shel kyang rung / /zho 'am yang na chu yang rung / /de la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ /dngos grub sna tshogs grub phyir bsgrub/ /tshe ni ring bar 'gyur ba dang / /gzugs ni ngo mtshar cher 'gyur

dang / /nad rnams kun las thar ba dang / /skal ba bzang po mchog 'gyur dang / /yid rno 'dzin par nus pa dang / /shes rab shin tu dri med pa/ /sgrub pa'i rdzas ni 'di rnams kyis/ /de dag thams cad myur du 'grub/ /dkyil 'khor dpal dang ldan pa 'di/ /zhi bar byed

par bshad pa yin/ /klad kyi kor dang bcas byas na/ /sel bar byed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /ra zhes bya ba yang dag mchog /'od can rnams kyi 'od ces bya/ /des ni las rnams gang cung zad/ /mtshams med lnga las byung ba yang / /rnal 'byor shin tu mnyam gzhag nas/ /

bsams na de kun zad par 'gyur/ /yid 'ong thams cad rab tu dmar/ /gru gsum pa yi tshul du gnas/ /zhi ba 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs/ /sum mdo'i ris mtshan snying gar gzhag /rnal 'byor pa ni der 'dug nas/ /ra ni klad kor bcas par bsam/ /mi 'jigs

pas ni ci rigs par/ /dngos po de dag des sgrub bo/ /nyi ma dang ni gza' kun dang / /de bzhin bsgrims te me dang ni/ /dbang du bya ba'i rdzas rnams dang / /yang na 'khon par 'gyur ba dang / /bskam pa dang ni gsad pa dang / /de bzhin dgar dang gnod pa dag /me dang lhan

cig 'di sbyar na/ /de dag thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /ha zhes bya ba dam pa mchog /rlung ni thams cad yang dag 'byung / /rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu dang / /gang gis sa bon rnams skye ba/ /'di ni klad kor bcas sbyar na/ /de dag thams cad 'jig par byed/ /de yi gzugs

kyang bshad pa ni/ /kha dog nag la 'od po che/ /mi bzad 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs/ /kun tu yang ni rnam par 'phrog /mkhas pas smin ma'i mtshams su ni/ /dkyil 'khor la ni gnas par bsam/ /de ni mthing ga zla gam 'dra/ /tog dang bcas par ba dan

g.yo/ /yi ge rab tu mi 'gyur ba/ /sngags pas der gnas bsam par bya/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /gang gis mthong ba kho na la/ /sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'i/ /dngos po rnams ni de tshe bsgrub/ /mkha' la 'gro ba nyid dang ni/ /yang na rdzu 'phrul rkang

pa dang / /lha yi mig dang rna ba dang / /sngags pas de bzhin 'thob pa dang / /mi snang ba la sogs kun dang / /dbye ba dag kyang gang gsungs pa/ /sngags pa mnyam par gzhag pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor gnas na de kun byed/ /'di ni snying po byang chub 'dir/ /byang chub

sems dpa' grags chen rnams/ /rgyu kun dmigs su med sgo nas/ /bdud las rnam par rgyal bar byed/ /rgyu med pas na 'bras bu'ang med/ /las kyang yod pa ma yin te/ /dngos po de gsum med pas na/ /stong pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas mthu chen gyis/ /de'i gzugs yang dag bshad pa ni/ /klad kor bcas par ldan pa ste/ /kha~M ni stong pa'i mchog ces bya/ /ral gri phyag rgyar ldan pa yis/ /bsgrub par bya ba nges par bsgrub/ /ral gri zhags pa 'khor lo dang / /lcags mda' de bzhin tho ba ste/ /rdzas

de rnams dang ldan na ni/ /go 'phang dam pa sgrub par byed/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po nam byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod

pas bdag nyid a zhes bya ba'i rang gi ngo bor bsgyur nas/ phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar gyur cing / bong ba dang rdo ba dang gser du mtshungs la/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa'i nyes pa rnams dang / sdig pa'i las rnam par spangs pa/ de tshe de ni

dag 'gyur ba/ /thub pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin/ /des ni las rnams thams cad nus/ /nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /de nas gzhan sngags rnal 'byor la/ /gzhol zhing cho ga shes pa yis/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /ba zhes bya

ba'i las bya'o/ /snying rje las byung sems kyis ni/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal la dmigs nas/ /mgon po de yis bdag nyid kyi/ /lus ni thams cad nyid du yang / /gangs dang ba yi 'o ma ltar/ /dkar ba'i rgyun gyis yongs su dgang / /de tshe nges pa bskyed nas su/ /yan lag

rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /ba spu'i bu ga kun nas kyang / /shin tu dri med chu rgyun dbyung / /chu yis sa ni ma lus pa/ /'di dag yongs su dgang bar bya/ /gang gis chu 'di 'thungs pa'am/ /lag pas kyang ni reg kyang rung / /de kun nges par byang chub tu/ /'gyur te 'di la dogs

pa med/ /yan lag kun tu ra zhes pa/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba zhi bas 'khrigs/ /kun tu rnam par 'phro ba ni/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsam/ /de tshe rnal 'byor pa yis phyir/ /'bar ba kun tu snang byed pa/ /btang na ra yis rnam sprul pas/ /sngags pa 'dod pa bzhin du

byed/ /ra zhes bya ba ro stod du/ /ba zhes bya ba lte ba khung / /'bar ba dang ni chu 'bab pa/ /de tshe cig char ston par 'gyur/ /dmyal ba grang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams/ /ras ni shin tu zhi bar byed/ /sngags pa sngags kyi tshul gnas pas/ /bas kyang tsha la sogs pa zhi/ /ha

zhes bya ba ba dan bcas/ /ra zhes bya ba'i 'og tu gzhag /sdig dang ldan pa'i mi rnams kyang / /de yis las rnams myur du bsgrub/ /sngags pa dbang chen la 'dug nas/ /chu yi las ni brtsam par bya/ /sel ba la sogs thams cad kyang / /byed 'gyur 'di la the tsom med/ /

rlung ni kun tu 'gro bar gsungs/ /thams cad 'jig par byed pa'ang de/ /rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i/ /las rnams dbye ba las byung ba/ /gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /cho ga 'di yis rab tu bya/ /yid yongs su sbyong zhing bzlas brjod byas na yid rnam par dag par 'gyur

ro/ /lus yang bar goms par byed cing 'chag bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /tsog pur 'dug la a zhes bya ba rnam par bzhag ste/ zla ba gcig tu bzlas brjod byas na lha'i rna ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po dngos grub

kyi go 'phang de lta bu la sogs pa dag ni yid las byung ba yin no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po rnam par bsams pa tsam kho nas dngos po gzugs can ma yin pa rnams kyi 'du byed rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs rnams las thams cad kyi sa bon gyi bya ba tshig tu brjod pa tsam las 'byung ba

la ltos/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rjes su mthun pa sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mthun pa sems can yang dag par mgu bar mdzad pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' las thams cad dang gsang sngags spyad pa spyod pa rnams

kyi mdun na gzugs brnyan lta bur bzhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de ni rnam par mi rtog cing yid kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ dus dang yul dang bya ba dang las dang chos dang chos ma yin pa rnams spangs kyang / gsang sngags spyod pa las byung ba'i/ /thams

cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang stsol/ /de bas kun mkhyen dngos grub dang / /go 'phang mchog kyang bsgrub par bya/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /ngo mtshar gyur nas mig bgrad de/ /de tshe rdo rje 'od zer ni/ /me stag 'phro ba 'drar gsor zhing / /sangs rgyas zhing ni 'di thams

cad/ /kun tu snang bar byas nas su/ /chos kun dbang phyug thub pa la/ /tshig snyan 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sngags kyi 'jug pa bshad lags na/ /'jug pa de yang ma rtogs na/ /gsang sngags gang nas 'ong ba dang / /gang du 'gro ba gtso khyod kyis/ /de kun bdag la bshad

du gsol/ /go 'phang dam pa khyod las med/ /khyod ni ci ltar chu rnams kyi/ /rgya mtsho bzhin du chos kun gnas/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po dkyil 'khor gyi/ /gnas ni yid

ces bshad pa yin/ /snying ni gsang sngags gnas yin par/ /shes na 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /dkar po ser po dmar po gang / /yid kyis sems par byed pa ste/ /de la yongs su gcod pa gang / /de ni sems kyi byed pa yin/ /sems ni mgu nas nges

gyur pa/ /de ni snying zhes bshad pa yin/ /der gnas pa yi gsang sngags rnams/ /'bras bu rgya cher ster bar 'gyur/ /de ru pad+ma bsam pa ni/ /'dab ma brgyad pa ze bar bcas/ /a zhes bya ba 'bar phreng 'khrigs/ /bzang po de ru gnas pa ni/ /zhi ba kun tu rnam par

g.yo/ /gtso bo sna tshogs gzugs mnga' ba/ /glog stong dag ni 'khyug pa bzhin/ /snang ba kun tu ston pa ni/ /me long phug na gnas pa bzhin/ /chu yi zla ba'i rnam pa bzhin/ /thams cad na yang mdun na gnas/ /sngags pa gsang sngags gnas 'dug pas/ /yid ni de ltar

shes nas su/ /de nas sngags pas stong du yang / /klad pa'i rgyas kyi dbus su ni/ /klad kor bcas pa'i mtshan ma can/ /a zhes bya ba der bsams te/ /shel dang zla ba gangs 'dra ba/ /dri med dag pa mthong ba ni/ /zhi ba chos kyi rang bzhin sku/ /thams cad kyi ni gzhi

zhes bya/ /de las gsang sngags dngos grub ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs can thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas mthong na/ /mtho ris dang ni byang grol 'thob/ /ra zhes bya ba mar me bzhin/ /'bar ba mig tu bzhag nas su/ /mgrin pa cung zad dgu por byas/ /lce

yang dkan la sbyar nas ni/ /snying ga'i dbus su rnam blta zhing / /mnyam par bzhag ste yid la blta/ /dri med shin tu rnam dag pa/ /rtag tu me long bzhin du gnas/ /de nyid yid kyi yang dag par/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs/ /yid kyis snang byas lam la ni/ /rnam

par shes pa snang bar 'gyur/ /de nas sngags pas rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo mthong bar 'gyur/ /de mthong sngags pas dngos grub ni/ /rab tu rtag par thob par 'gyur/ /de nas gong du bsgyur nas su/ /yi ge yongs su bsam pa ni/ /la zhes bya ba klad kor

bcas/ /mig gi gnas su bsam par bya/ /'di kun stong par mthong na ni/ /go 'phang mi nyams thob par 'gyur/ /ye shes rlabs po che 'am ni/ /yang na mngon shes lnga po dang / /rig sngags 'chang 'gyur dngos grub dang / /tshe ring gzhon nur 'gyur ba gang / /gal te

thob par 'dod na ni/ /ci srid 'di ni ma bsnyen par/ /de srid thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags ye shes las byung ba/ /'di ni de nyid ye shes mchog /byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi nor gyi dbyig /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'

dang / /nyan thos des pa dag dang ni/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mchog gyur pa/ /ye shes dpe med thob nas su/ /de yis sa steng thams cad na/ /gnas shing de la gtam yang zer/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis

rlob pa las/ dngos grub bsgrub pa'i de kho na nyid rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das lha'i gzugs gang gis byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo

nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams lha'i gzugs la dmigs nas bdag nyid rang gi lha'i gzugs su bsgyur bas the tsom ma mchis par dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'i lha'i gzugs byin gyis rlob pa bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das

rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang khyod nga la don 'di yongs su 'dri ba ni legs so legs so/ /de'i phyir legs par rab tu yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan

'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la lha'i gzugs ni rnam pa gsum ste/ yi ge dang phyag rgya dang gzugs so/ /

de la yi ge la yang rnam pa gnyis te/ sgra dang byang chub kyi sems so/ /phyag rgya'i gzugs la yang rnam pa gnyis te/ gzugs dang bcas pa dang gzugs dang bcas pa ma yin pa'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lha'i gzugs kyang rnam pa gnyis te/ yongs

su dag pa dang yongs su ma dag pa'o/ /de la yongs su dag pa ni mi rtog pa'i ngo bo ste/ mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /yongs su ma dag pa ni mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i gzugs te/ kha dog dang dbyibs so/ /de la lha'i gzugs rnam pa gnyis kyis dgos pa rnam pa

gnyis 'grub par 'gyur te/ mtshan ma dang bcas pas ni mtshan ma dang bcas pa'o/ /mtshan ma med pas ni mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i dngos grub kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mar bcas pas mtshan bcas kyi/ /dngos grub rgyal ba dam pa bzhed/ /mtshan ma med la

gnas pas ni/ /mtshan ma can yang bsgrub tu rung / /de bas rnam pa thams cad du/ /mtshan ma med pa bsten par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ lha'i ting nge 'dzin gtan la dbab pa rim par

phye ba'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrub par 'dod

pas 'di ltar bsam par bya'o/ /mtshan ma rnams gang nas byung / ci bdag gi lus sam/ bdag gi sems sam bdag gi yid las byung / de la lus ni las las skyes pa ste/ rtswa dang shing dang bong ba lta bu ngo bo nyid kyis bya ba med pa/ blun pa'am phyi rol gyi rnam pa lta bu la

bzos byas pa'i gzugs lta bur brtag par bya'o/ /ci ltar bzos byas pa'i gzugs de la mi zhig gis khros te/ me'am/ dug gam/ mtshon tam/ chu'am/ rdo rjes bshig gam/ bsregs sam/ bcad kyang mi dga' ba cung zad kyang med la/ bza' ba'am/

btung ba'am/ bkru ba'am/ byug pa'am/ spos sam/ phreng ba'am/ gos sam/ tsan+dan nam/ ga bur la sogs pa lha dang mi'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod kyang mi de la dga' bar 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i gzugs de

la rang gi nga rgyal kun nas blang ba'i phyin ci log gis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pa las byung ba'i mchod pa'am/ gnod par byed pa'i mi gang yin pa de ni byis pa'i rang bzhin can yin no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar lus la lus kyi rjes su song ba'i dran pa ngo bo nyid kyis

stong pa bsgom par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang sems ni ngo bo nyid med pa/ mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong par bsam par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems la ni dus gsum med do/ /dus gsum dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni

ngo bo nyid kyis mtshan ma dang bral ba'o snyam du bsam par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams yid mtshan ma dang bcas par rtog ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa'i tshig so/ /yang dag pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni

ma skyes pa'o zhes bya bar ni rab tu mi shes so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas de ltar bsams na mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po nam mtshan ma med

pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsang sngags rnams mngon du phyogs shing gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/

mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rim par phye ba'o// //gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang bzlas brjod gsang ba bshad par bya'o/ /gcig pus gcig gam gcig gis gcig /yid kyis bzlas brjod bya ba'am/ yang na shub bu rnam gnyis pa/ /rnal

'byor mchog gis brtag par bya/ /sngags pa yan lag nyams sbyar bar/ /bzlas brjod gzhan du mi bya'o/ /phyi dang nang gi sbyor ba yis/ /yan lag bzhi pa ngas bshad pa/ /de yang 'jig rten pa yi ste/ /dmigs pa can ni bla med pa'o/ /slar sdud

pa yi tshig gis non/ /lha yi rjes su song ba'i yid/ /bshubs te bzlas brjod byed pa'i mchog /dmigs pa can la bstan pa yin/ /yid kyi 'jig rten 'das shes bya/ /slar sdud la sogs rnam par spangs/ /lha dang gcig tu byed pa dang / /tha dad ma yin 'dzin

pa yi/ /yid kyis rang bzhin dbyer med bya/ /gzhan du bya ba ma yin no/ /gsang sngags grangs ni sum 'bum du/ /phal cher ngas ni bshad pa dag /lus can sdig dang bral ba yi/ /sngags pa rnam par dag pa la/ /bzlas brjod grangs ni bstan pa ste/ /gzhan du

bya ba ma yin no/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzlas brjod kyi de kho na nyid rim par phye ba'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang

mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa la gzigs nas/ byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i spyan gnyis kyis kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad la gzigs te/ bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par

zhugs ma thag tu yan lag thams cad nas dus gsum du ma chags pa'i stobs can zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'byung ngo / /tad+ya thA/ ga ga na sa me/ a pra ti sa me/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma tA nu ga ga te/ ga ga na ba ra lak+Sha Ne swA hA/ rigs kyi bu rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gnyis su med pa'i spyod yul can te/ 'di yis byin brlabs sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams/ /gang du sdug bsngal 'gag 'gyur ba'i/ /chos nyid chags med thob par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dgongs nas/ bdag nyid dang phyag na rdo rje gnyi ga gzod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs te/ phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa'

gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas so sor nye bar gnas pa'i yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor spyad pa rim par phye ba rgyas par nyon cig /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag

na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal te/ rdo rje'i pad+ma'i stan de las rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul du babs nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ phyag 'tshal byang chub sems khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal byang chub 'byung khyod la/ /spyod gzugs khyod dang sa dang ni/ /pha rol phyin la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /phyag 'tshal thog mar byed khyod la/ /stong pa nyid la 'dud phyag 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes de skad du mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje bdag cag la thugs

brtse ba'i slad du/ gang dag dang ldan na bdag cag rnams sems can gyi don bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / gsang sngags spyad pa ci skad gsungs pa bzhin yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad

kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nga ni 'jig rten dang po yi/ /'jig rten mgon zhes bsgrags pa yin/ /bla med gzod nas zhi ba ni/ /mnyam pa med pa'i chos bshad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag

gsungs nas/ byin gyi rlabs gang gis byin du brlabs na byang chub sems dpa' de rnams dang / rdo rje 'dzin de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la bzhugs pa nam mkha' bzhin du spros pa med pa/ spyod pa la gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyi

mtshan nyid las kyi rnam par smin pa bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi yan lag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thams cad nas 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang / nyan thos dang

rang sangs rgyas dang / bsam pa dang bsam gtan du bya ba dang / dngos grub bsgrub par mngon par brtson pa thams cad kyi srog dang 'dra ba/ yi ge thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa/ srog tu gyur pa/ skyabs su gyur pa/ dpung gnyen du gyur pa 'di byung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta bud

d+hA nAM/ a/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa so sor nye bar gnas pa yin te/ chos thams cad ni

a zhes bya ba'i sgo nas 'jug go/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong bar 'dod pa dang / mchod par 'dod la byang chub kyi sems mngon sum bya bar 'dod

pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'grogs par 'dod pa/ sems can rnams kyi don bya bar 'dod pa/ dngos grub mngon par 'dod pa/ rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying po 'di la brtson

par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'di'i cho ga dgod pa dang / lha'i gnas gtan la dbab pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par sprul pa dang / gsang sngags spyad pa dang / bsam par bya ba

gsungs pa de la slob dpon gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo a zhes bya ba la gnas te srad bu blangs la/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas nas srad bu shar phyogs logs su bres te g.yas su bskor la/ byang phyogs su kha bltas nas srad bu bres te/ nub phyogs su kha

bltas la bsgyur te thig gdab bo/ /de nas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' lag na rdo rjer de'i phyag rgya'am/ yi ge ba zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs te/ nang du zhugs la snying po'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la yang 'di ltar bdag nyid gzod ma

nas zhi ba/ gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyi gzugs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs snying po nyid kyi rang gi ngo bor byin gyis brlabs la/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa mngon du byed cing srad bu bres la/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor de las sum gnyis lha'i gnas su

bzhag ste/ sum cha 'khor sar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor lhag ma gnyis kyang de bzhin du rnam par phye la lha'i gnas bsham par bya'o/ /de nas yang bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du de'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs la/ chos kyi dbyings rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs

te/ thog mar tshon rtsi dkar po blangs la 'di ltar byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /sems can khams ni rnam sbyong ba/ /'di ni bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs/ /nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /de ltar blo can gyis bsams na/ /der ni ra zhes

bya ba yang / /zhi ba 'bar ba'i phreng can mdog /dung zla kun+da 'dra ba bsam/ /de nas tshon rtsi gnyis pa ni/ /dmar po blangs nas nan tan du/ /yi ge a zhes bya ba ni/ /'bar ba klad kor bcas par bsam/ /rgyal ba thub dka' dam pa ste/ /nyi ma dang por 'char ba bzhin/ /

de nas sngags pas tshon gsum pa/ /kha dog ser po blang bar bya/ /mkhas pas de nas ga zhes pa/ /de tshe cho ga bzhin du bsam/ /de bzhin gser 'od thub pa ni/ /gser gyi kha dog 'bar dang bcas/ /ting 'dzin gnas shing sdig bcom pa/ /kun tu rnam

par snang ba yin/ /de nas mar gad 'dra ba yi/ /tshon rtsi 'khor ba las sgrol ba/ /ba zhes bya ba de ru gzhag /byang chub snying po'i thub chen te/ /dpa' bo kha dog ljang 'dra ba/ /kun tu 'jigs pa med par byed/ /de nas tshon rtsi nag po de/ /mkhas pa yis ni blangs nas

su/ /der ni ha zhes bya ba bsam/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba rnam par 'phro/ /dus mtha'i me ltar mi bzad pa/ /lag na rdo rje rtse bran rgyan/ /bdud sde sdang ba thams cad la/ /rnam pa kun tu sdigs par byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de'i tshe ting nge

'dzin de las bzhengs nas mtha' yas rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi yul las byung ba 'di phyung ngo / /na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH/ a sa me ba ra me/ a tsa le/ ga ga ne/ sma ra Ne/ sarba trA nu ga te swA hA/ de nas tshon gyi cho ga byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklags sam/

phyag byas te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di lan brgyad du bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas langs te dkyil 'khor bskor la nang du zhugs nas/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis sgrub pa po la dmigs te/ bdag nyid ba zhes bya bas las kyi rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis

brlabs la/ rdo rje dam pa sbyin pa dang lhan cig tu snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /de la nang gi dkyil 'khor gtan la dbab pa ni 'di yin te/ dbus su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po pad+ma dkar po la bzhugs pa/ dbu thor tshugs dang dbu rgyan

can/ dar ram ras kyi smad g.yogs dang / dar la'i stod g.yogs mnabs pa/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa/ phyag rgya'am gzugs sam yi ge'i 'brur bri'o/ /a/ shar phyogs su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos sku'i ngo bo a zhes bya ba klad kor

dang bcas pa'o/ /a~M/ dbang ldan phyogs su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum bcom ldan 'das ma nam mkha'i spyan bri'o/ /yang na yi ge ga zhes bya ba bri'o/ /ga /me'i phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu'am yi ge ka zhes bya ba bri'o//

ka /byang phyogs su lag na pad+ma 'khor byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dag dang lhan cig tu pad+ma'i phyag rgya'am/ yi ge sa zhes bya ba bri'o/ /sa/ lho phyogs su cha gsum bor te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'am

yi ge ba zhes bya ba bri'o/ /ba/ de'i cha gsum bor la rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o/ /de la yi ge'i 'bru ni/ hU~M/ de nas bden bral gyi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'og logs su mi g.yo ba pha bong gi steng na 'dug pa/ lag na

ral gri dang zhags pa thogs pa/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa/ bgegs thams cad la bsdigs pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o/ /de'i yi ge'i 'bru ni ha~M/ rlung gi phyogs su 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba bgegs chen po 'joms pa/ gyen du 'bar

ba'i phreng ba can/ rab tu 'jig pa chen po'i dus kyi me'i gzugs 'dra ba/ 'jigs pa yang 'jigs par byed pa/ lag na rdo rje 'od 'phro ba can thogs pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi ge bri'o/ /de la yi ge'i 'bru ni 'di'o/ /ha/ de nas phyogs bzhir srung ba chen mo bzhi dgod do/ /

de la shar phyogs su mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i srung ba chen mo gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba gos dkar po gyon pa/ yid tsam khro bo'i gdong lag na dbyug pa thogs pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o/ /de la yi ge'i 'bru ni 'di'o/ /tsa/ byang phyogs su ni 'jigs pa thams cad med par

byed pa zhes bya ba'i srung ba kha dog dkar mo/ lag na ral gri thogs shing gos dkar po gyon pa/ 'bar ba dang bcas pa 'jigs pa thams cad med pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o/ /de la yi ge'i 'bru ni 'di'o/ /pa/ nub phyogs su gdul dka' zhes bya ba'i srung ba/ a sho ka

dmar po'i mdog 'dra ba/ gos dmar po gyon pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la blta ba de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o/ /de la yi ge'i 'bru ni 'di'o/ /sa/ lho phyogs su ma thul ba rdo rjes 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i srung ba chen mo kha dog nag

mo/ bzhin khro gnyer bsnyer ba/ smad g.yogs nag po gyon pa thor tshugs dang cod pan can thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rang gi 'bar bas mngon par snang bar byed pa/ lag na dbyug pa thogs pa/ bgegs chen po med par byed pa'i phyag rgya'am/

yi ger bri'o/ /de la yi ge'i 'bru ni 'di'o/ /k+Sha/ de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas pa/ phyag brnyan dang bcas par pad+ma dkar po la 'dug par bri'o/ /de ltar blo can gyis bkod nas/ /sngags pa sngags la gzhol ba yis/ /cho ga bzhin du phyir byung nas/ /gnyis

pa'i cha ni nges pa la/ /shAkya'i rigs ni dga' byed pa/ /thub pa'i rgyal po bri bar bya/ /mgon po na bza' ngur smrig mnabs/ /mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan/ /bstan pa yi ni don mdzad lha/ /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /sngags pas phyag rgya dgod pa

ni/ /lhung bzed chos gos la sogs pa'am/ /yang na mkhas pas yi ger bzhag/ /de yi cho ga dam pa 'di'o/ /b+ha/ de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid du byin gyis brlabs la/ byang chub kyi sems su gyur pa'i yid kyis cha gsum bor

te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad lan gsum rjes su dran par byas nas tshon de nyid blangs te/ shar phyogs kyi cha gsum par rdo rje dam pa sbyin pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can lag pa g.yon pa na ut+pal mthing ga'i steng na rdo rje can thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/

dar ram ras kyi smad g.yogs gyon pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs can/ kha dog gur gum lta bu/ spyi bor zur phud lnga pa de'i phyag rgya 'am yi ger bri'o/ /de'i sngags ni 'di'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ma~M/ de'i g.yas phyogs su dra ba can gyi 'od gzhon nu'i gzugs can rnam pa

thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ lag na rin po che'i dra ba'am/ lcags kyu thogs pa phyag rgya'am yi ge'i 'brur bri'o/ /de la yi ge'i 'bru ni 'di'o/ /tsha/ de nas lho phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba/ thor

tshugs dang cod pan can/ lag na yid bzhin gyi nor bu thogs pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o/ /de la yi ge'i 'bru ni 'di'o/ /A/ de nas byang phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po zhes bya ba sku mdog ljang gu/ lag na pad+ma thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis

brgyan pa/ de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o/ /de la yi ge ni 'di'o/ /i/ nub phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ gos dkar po gyon pa 'bar ba dang bcas pa/ lag na ral gri thogs pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi

ger bri'o/ /de la yi ge'i 'bru ni 'di'o/ /I/ chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba yi/ /sngags pa de nas 'dug nas su/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi/ /byang chub sems su gyur pa'i yid/ /shar phyogs kha bltas gnas nas ni/ /rdo rje can gyi rgya bcings nas/ /de nas

las kyi rdo rjer gyur/ /nan tan du ni mchod pa bya/ /kun tu khyab pa'i yid kyis su/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig ces bya'i rgya bstan nas/ /gsang sngags lan gsum bzlas par bya/ /slob ma gtsang ma cho ga bzhin/ /bos te dkyil 'khor mdun du ni/ /de

dag gsum la skyabs su btang / /de nas byang chub sems kyang bskyed/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi/ /phyag rgya de dag kun la bcing / /de nas chos kyi 'khor lo'i bcing / /yid kyis de yi gzugs bsgyur te/ /ras kyis gdong pa bkab nas su/ /snying rjer gyur pa'i yid

kyis su/ /byang chub tshogs ni rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /lag pa stong par mi bya'o/ /dam tshig gi ni dam pa 'di/ /de dag kun gyi rna bar bsgrags/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam tshig ni/ /de nas de la bdag gis bcing / /byang chub sems gyur yid kyis su/ /de nas me tog

'dor du gzhug /me tog gang du bab gyur pa/ /de ni sngags pas de la sbyin/ /lus can kun la dam tshig phyir/ /cho ga de ltar rab tu bya/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /gtso bo de la yang zhus pa/ /mgon po smra ba'i mchog gyur pas/ /dbang bskur ba yi cho ga gsungs/ /

de skad gsol nas bcom ldan 'das/ /chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad gsungs/ /chos rnams kun la dbang ba'i phyir/ /cho ga'i mchog ni ngas bshad kyis/ /yid gcig bsdus te cho ga nyon/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la slob

dpon gyis bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su de'i sngags sam/ phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab bo/ /de nas slob ma rnams bos la chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po la gzhag ste/ yan lag kun 'byung ba'i phyag rgya bcings la/ byang chub sems dpa' chen

po bzhis byin gyis brlabs pa/ rin po che sna bzhi'i bum pa'i chus spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /a ni klad kor bcas pa ru/ /mkhas pas spyi bor bzhag nas ni/ /a zhes bya ba snying gar gzhag /ra zhes bya ba brang du gzhag /yang na a ni kun tu gzhag /gser gyi

kha dog 'bar dang bcas/ /thor tshugs dang ni dbu rgyan can/ /pad+ma dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs/ /rgyal ba'i mchog ni ting 'dzin gnas/ /yi ge'i 'khor lo rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i

'khor 'dus pa la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan du gyur pa chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i mtshan mar gyur pa'i phyag rgya rim

par phye ba rgyas pa gang gis brgyan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ 'gro ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i mtshan mas btab pas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding

dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams 'byol bar 'gyur zhing / de rnams kyang de dag gi ngag nyan par 'gyur ba yod kyis/ de nyon la legs par rab tu yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /

bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab bo/ /bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshod la bab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe stobs thogs pa med pa'i gnas byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rig sngags kyi rgyal mo thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs can/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i stobs can/ dam tshig la 'jug par byed pa/ stobs gsum dang ldan pa byung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a

sa me tri sa me/ sa ma ye swA hA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par ston par byed pa/ chos gsum gyi lam gyi mtshams las mi 'da' bar byed pa/ sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de yin

te/ de'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin no/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la/ mthe bo gnyis bsgreng ngo / /rgya 'di phyag rgya chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa kun gyi yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni/ /phyag rgya 'di la rab tu gnas/ /lag pa dag ni gnyis ka yang / /
