blo dang ldan pas khu tshur bcangs/ /mthe bo gnyis ni nang du gzhug /mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya/ /rgya 'di phyag rgya chen po ste/ /chos dbyings rnam par spyod pa'o/ /gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ d+har+m+ma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis kyi

sor mo thams cad bzlog ste bsnol la mthe bo gnyis sprad do/ /phyag rgya dpal dang ldan pa 'di/ /chos kyi 'khor lo zhes su bsgrags/ /'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyi/ /'khor lo rab tu 'di bskor ro/ /gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ badzra At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/

de bzhin du lag pa gnyis phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis mthe bo gnyis kyi steng du gzhag ste/ ral gri lta bur bya'o/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya chen po ral gri'i rgya/ /'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa yi/ /'jig tshogs lta ba gcod par byed/ /gsang

sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ma hA khaD+ga bi ra dza d+har+m+ma san+da r+shi ka sa ha dza sad kA ya dr-iSh+Ti ts+tshe da ka ta thA ga tA d+hi muk+ti nir dzA ta bi rA ga d+har+m+ma nir dzA ta hU~M/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar te/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis mthe bo gnyis dkris pa dung lta

bur bya'o/ /phyag rgya dpal ldan dam pa 'di/ /chos kyi dung zhes rnam par bsgrags/ /'dis ni 'jig rten 'di dag na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /zhi ba mya ngan 'das 'gro ba/ /rdul dang bral ba'i chos 'chad do/ /gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta

bud d+hA nAM/ sar+b+ba thA o~M/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo kun thal mo sbyar ba las brgyang ste dril bu lta bur byas la/ mthe bo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis rtse gcig tu sprad de/ mdzub mo gnyis dang gung mo sprad do/ /pad+ma dam pa dpal ldan 'di/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa

thams cad kyi/ /mi shigs rdo rje'i gdan yin te/ /der ni 'dren pa 'tshang rgya zhing / /rgyal ba sras rnams thams cad ni/ /'di las skye dang byang chub 'gyur/ /gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la/ gung mo

gnyis gshibs te bsgreng la/ mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste ngos gnyis su gzhag la rdo rje ltar bya/ mthe bo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsgreng ste gzhag /srin lag gnyis lag pa'i nang du gzhug go/ /phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i rgya/ /mi shes grong khyer 'jig pa ste/ /sangs rgyas

rnams kyi ye shes 'di/ /nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs te bstan/ /gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ hU~M/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gshibs te bsgreng / mdzub mo gnyis ngos nas bkug ste sbyar ro/ /gtsug tor phyag rgya rgya chen te/ /

gtsug tor zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/ /'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /rgyal ba mchog tu 'gyur ba yin/ /'di'i sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ hU~M hU~M/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la smin mtshams su gzhag go/ /rgyal ba dam pas phyag rgya 'di/ /

mdzod spu zhes ni rab tu bsgrags/ /'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis su/ /rgyal ba mchog tu 'gyur ba yin/ /'di'i sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a ha~M dzaH/ blo ldan rnal 'byor tshul gnas te/ /lag gnyis lte ba'i thad kar ni/ /lhung bzed 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya/ /

lhung bzed phyag rgya zhes su bsgrags/ /rgya 'di shAkya thub pa'i ste/ /lhung bzed chen po zhes bya'o/ /'di'i gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ b+ha/ de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa lta bur bya'o/ /sems can kun la mi 'jigs

pa/ /de yis rab tu sbyin par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rgya chen de bcings na/ /mi 'jigs phyag rgya zhes bsgrags so/ /'di'i sngags ni/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ sar+b+ba thA dzi na dzi na b+ha ya nA sha na swA hA/ de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa smad de dam pa sbyin pa ltar bya'o/ /'di

ni dam pa sbyin rgya zhes/ /'jig rten mgon po rnams kyis bsgrags/ /'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis su/ /rgyal mchog dam pa stsol bar 'gyur/ /'di'i gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ba ra da badzra At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M swA hA/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te

mdzub mo brkyang la dpral ba khro gnyer lta bur bya'o/ /phyag rgya chen po rgya chen 'di/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi/ /bdud ni rnam par bsdigs zhes bya/ /phung byed thams cad 'jig par byed/ /'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis su/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad dang / /

bgegs dang log 'dren gzhan dag kyang / /the tshom med par rab tu 'byer/ /'di'i gsang sngags ni 'di'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ma hA ba la ba ti da sha ba la te dzod+b+ha be ma hA mai t+r+ya ng+h+yu da ga te swA hA/ de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gnyis dang srin lag

gnyis brkyang ste/ mthe bo de drung du gzhag go/ /'di ni sangs rgyas mgon rnams kyi/ /thugs rje las byung spyan yin te/ /mig gi steng du mkhas pas gzhag /de las sangs rgyas spyan du 'gyur/ /'di'i gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ga ga na ba ra lak+Sha Na

ka ru Na mA ya ta thA ga ta tsak+ShuHswA hA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la/ sor mo rnams phan tshun bsnol ba'i khu tshur bcings te/ mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng la bkug ste sprad la zlum por bya/ 'di ni zhags pa mchog ces grags/ /sdang ba thams cad

'jig par byed/ /sngags pas 'di bcings de yi tshe/ /rtag tu sdang ba bcings par 'gyur/ /'di'i gsang sngags ni 'di yin no/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ he he ma hA pA sha pra sa ro dA r+ya satwa d+hA tu bi mo tsa ka /ta thA ga ta a d+hi muk+ti ni ra dza ta swA hA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis

gcig tu sbyar te/ khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo bsgreng ste/ tshigs gsum pa bkug la lhag ma rnams ni gdu bu'i tshul du gnas par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi/ /lcags kyu zhes ni 'di bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /sa bcu dag

la gnas pa dang / /sdang bar sems pa gzhan dag kyang / /thams cad rab tu 'gugs par byed/ /'di'i gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a sar+b+ba tra a pra ti ha ta ta thA ga ta/ aM ku sha bo d+hi tsAr+ya pa ri pU ra ka swA hA/ lcags kyu'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis bkug

ste de nyid du sbyar ro/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ dz+nyA no d+b+ha ba swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis bsgreng la lhag ma rnams de bzhin du gzhag go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i lte ba'i phyag rgya ste/

gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a mr-i tod+d+ha ba swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las mthe'u chung bsgreng la lhag ma rnams de bzhin du gzhag go/ /rked pa'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ta thA ga ta ga ti saM b+ha ba swA hA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khong

stong du sbyar la/ mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste nang du gzhug /srin lag gnyis kyang de bzhin du bya/ mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis cung zad dgug /gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ngo / /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi phyag rgya ste/ 'di'i gsang sngags ni/ na maH

sa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ra~M ra~M ra~M swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis phyung la bsgreng ste gzhag go/ /mtshams chen po gcad pa'i phyag rgya ste/ 'di'i gsang sngags ni 'di yin no/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ be lu pu ri bi ku ri bi ku le swA hA/ mtshams chen po gcad pa'o/ /de nyid

las gung mo gnyis bkug la mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ngo / /srung ba chen po'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba b+ha ye bi ga te b+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA haM khaM rak+Sha ma hA ba le sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pu N+ya nir dzA te hU~M hU~M tra Ta tra Ta/ a pra ti ha te swA hA/

mi bzod pa zhes bya ba bsrung ba chen mo'o/ /de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis brkyang la mthe bong gnyis nang du gzhug go/ /kun tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ dz+wA la mA li ni ta thA ga ta artsi swA hA/ kun tu 'bar ba'o/ /de bzhin du lag

pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis ngos nas dkri'o/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i go cha'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ pra tsaN+Da badzra dza ya bi s+phu ra hU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i go cha'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo

gnyis dang mthe bo gnyis gcig tu sbyar ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ta thA ga ta dzi hwa sid+d+hi d+har+m+ma pra tiSh+Thi te swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags so/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis dang srin lag

gnyis bkug la nang du sbyar/ mthe bo gnyis bsgreng la cung zad bkug ste/ rtse mo gung mo la phyogs par bya/ mthe'u chung gnyis ni brgyang la mthe bo gnyis snga ma bzhin no/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal chen po'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA

nAM/ ta thA ga ta ma hA bA k+t+re bi dz+nyA na ma ho da ya swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal lo/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo bkrol la/ nang du bcug ste dgu bor byas la bstod de gzung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mche ba'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ta thA

ga ta ma hA da~M Sh+T+ra sa ra sa rA gra sa ma pra b+hA ka sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta bi Sha ya saM b+ha ba swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mche ba'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ste gzung la tshigs gsum pa dgug go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa'i phyag

rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a tsin+ta an+d+hu ta rU pa pA ba ga saM pra ti bid+yA bi shud+d+ha swa ra swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa'o/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu thal mo khong stong du sbyar te mthe bo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du

bcug la gcig tu sprad do/ /'di ni stobs bcu'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ namaHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ da sha ba la ga d+ha ra hU~M sa~M dza~M swA hA/ stobs bcu'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse mor mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste sbyar ro/ /dran pa nye

bar gzhag pa'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ta thA ga ta smr-i ti satwa hi ta a b+h+yung+ga ta ga ga na sa ma sa ma swA hA/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis mthe bo'i steng du gzung ngo / /gsang sngags la/

na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma sa ma tA prAp+ta ta thA ga ta a nu ga ta swA hA/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis gung mo gnyis dkris la lhag ma rnams ni de bzhin du

gzhag go/ /kun tu bzang po'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ sa man+tA nu ga ta bi rA dza d+har+m+ma nir dzA ta ma hA ma hA swA hA/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi nang

du bkug la gzhag /lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no/ /'di'i gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a tsi teny+dza ya sar+b+ba satwA sha yA nu ga ta swA hA/ byams pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bo gnyis nang du gzhug go/ /gsang sngags la/

na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ A kA sha sa ma tA nu ga ta bi tsi traM ba ra d+ha ra swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug la/ mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis dang lhan cig tu sbyar ro/ /gsang sngags

la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a ta satwa hi ta a b+h+yung+ga ta tra~M tra~M ra~M ra~M swA hA/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// //bam po lnga pa/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la sor mo thams cad dril bu 'dra bar kha dbye/ mthe bo gnyis dang

mthe'u chung gnyis gcig tu sbyar/ lhag ma rnams ni pad+ma lta bur bya'o/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki ta ka ru NA mA ya ra ra ra hU~M dzaHswA hA/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis

thal mo khong stong du sbyar la pad+ma kha ma bye ba lta bur bya'o/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ dza~M dza~M sa swA hA/ mthu chen po thob pa'i pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo can du

bsgreng ste/ mthe bo gnyis kyang de'i drung du gzhag go/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ tA re tA re Ni ka ru Nong+b+ha be swA hA/ lha mo sgrol ma'i 'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis gcus te bsgreng ngo / /lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa

man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ sar+b+ba b+hA ba san trA sa ni hU~M s+pho Ta ya swA hA/ khro gnyer can ma'i 'o/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la/ srin lag gnyis dang mthe bo gnyis nang du gzhug go/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ta thA ga ta bi Sha ya sam+b+ha ba pad+ma mA lI nI swA hA/

gos dkar can gyi'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bo gnyis gyen du bsgreng la mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo de'i drung du bar nas gang tsam gyis chod par gzhag go/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ khA da b+hany+dzas+pho Ta ya swA hA/ rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /phyag rgya

de nyid las srin lag gnyis dang / mthe'u chung gnyis kyang gyen du bsgreng la lhag ma rnams ni de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs pa'i tshul du gzhag go/ /de'i gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ha ha ha su na ta nu swA hA/ sa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /

de bzhin du lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la/ gung mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis dkris te/ mdzub mo gnyis kyang mthe bong gnyis kyi steng du bkug ste gzhag /lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ he he ku mA ra ka bi muk+ti

pa the sti Sh+Tha te/ sma ra sma ra pra ti dz+nyA na swA hA/ 'jam dpal gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo dgug go/ /dra ba'i 'od kyi lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ he he ku mA ra ya ga ta swa b+hA ba s+thi ta swA hA/

dra ba'i 'od kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /phyag rgya de nyid las sor mo thams cad dgu bor bya'o/ /gzhon nu dri ma med kyi 'od kyi ut+pa la'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ he he ku mA ra bi tsi tra ga ti ku mA ra/ pra ti dz+nyA ma nu sma ra swA hA/

dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis gshibs te gyen du bsgreng ngo / /skra can gyi phyag rgya ste gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ he he ku mA ri kle sha ts+tshe da ya A dz+nyA nAn sma ra pra ti dz+nyA na swA hA/

skra can gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gyen du bsgreng ste mdung rtse lta bur bya/ nye skra can gyi mdung rtse'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ baMn+d+ha ya adz+nyA he ku mA ri ke swA hA/ nye skra can gyi mdung rtse'i phyag rgya dang gsang

sngags so/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs te/ gung mo gnyis brkyang la mdzub mo gnyis ngos su sbyar sna tshogs ma'i dbyug pa'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ he ku mA ri ke A dz+nyA na pu ra bi dwaM sa ni swA hA/ de bzhin du lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs la srin

lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsgreng ngo / /nor can gyi rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ he s+phu ra dz+nyA na ke tu swA hA/ nor can gyi rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la/ mdzub mo bsgreng ste rtse mo

dgug go/ /'gugs ma'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ A kar+Sha ya sar+b+baM ku ru A dz+nyA na ku mA ra s+ya swA hA/ 'gugs ma'i lcags kyo'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la/ mdzub mo gnyis

bsgreng ste tshigs gsum pa dgug go/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a bi sma ya ni ye swA hA/ phyag brnyan ma rnams kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te/ gung mo bsgreng la tshigs gsum pa dgug go/ /

ngo mtshar can gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ bi ma ti ts+tshe da ka swA hA/ ngo mtshar gyi rdo rje phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa'i dpung pa bstod la/ lag pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa lta bur bya/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin

pa'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a b+ha yan+dA ta swA hA/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /lag pa de nyid mas yar 'dren pa'i tshul du bya'o/ /ngan song spong ba'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a

b+h+yung d+ha ra satwa d+hA tu na swA hA/ ngan song spong ba'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /lag pa de nyid brang du gzhag go/ /yongs su skyong sems blo gros kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ he ma hA ma hA sma ra pra ti dz+nyA swA hA/ yongs su skyong sems blo gros kyi phyag rgya

dang gsang sngags so/ /lag pa de nyid me tog 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya'o/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ satwe baj+rod+d+ha ba swA hA/ byams pa 'byung ba'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /lag pa de nyid snying gar gzhag la gung mo nang du dgug go/ /gsang sngags la/

na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ka ru Nod+b+ha ba swA hA/ snying rjes brlan pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa'i tshul du bya'o/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ he he ba ra da ba ra prAp+ta swA hA/ gdung ba thams cad zhi bar byed

pa'i 'o/ /lag pa de nyid yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa'i tshul du'o/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ sar+b+ba sha pa ri pU ra ka swA hA/ blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la/ gung mo'i sor

mo gnyis phyung ste brkyang ngo / /sa'i snying po'i me tog gi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ha ha ha bisma ye swA hA/ sa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la/ sor mo gsum brkyang ngo / /rin chen 'byung gnas

kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ he he ma hA ma hA swA hA/ rin chen 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /lag pa de nyid las srin lag brkyang ste gyen du bsgreng ngo / /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ rad+b+ha ba swA hA/ phyag na rin

chen gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis bsnol te rgyab sbyar la/ g.yon pa'i mthe bos g.yas pa'i mthe'u chung 'khyud de/ de bzhin du g.yas pas kyang g.yon pa la 'khyud la lhag ma rnams rdo rje lta bur bya'o/ /sa 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags

la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ d+ha ra NI prAp+ta swA hA/ sa 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /phyag na rin chen phyag rgya ni rdo rje rtse lnga ste snga ma bzhin no/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ rat+na nir dzA te swA hA/ phyag na rin chen gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ phyag

rgya de nyid las sor mo rnams dgod par bya'o/ /bsam pa brtan pa'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ namaHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ badzra saM b+ha ba swA hA/ bsam pa brtan pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /lag pa gnyis de bzhin du bya ba ni nam mkha'i snying po'i ral gri'i

phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ namaHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ga ga na nAn+ta tsa ra swA hA/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du byas pa ni nam mkha'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/

tsakra brti swA hA/ nam mkha'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /dung gi phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du byas pa ni rnam par dag pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ d+har+m+ma saM b+ha ba swA hA/ rnam par dag pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags

so/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du byas pa ni spyod pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ pad+ma mA lA ya swA hA/ spyod pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /ut+pa la'i phyag rgya snga ma bzhin las kha ma bye bar byas pa ni nam mkha' dri ma

med pa'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ dz+nyA nod+b+ha ba swA hA/ nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /rdo rje snga ma bzhin du byas pa ni brtan pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ badzra kA ra swA hA/

brtan pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te/ srin lag gnyis nang du bcug la gung mo dang / mthe bong gnyis dang / mthe'u chung gnyis bsgreng ste mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i ngos su bkug la bar nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par gzhag

go/ /phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya ste rdo rje'o/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAn/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du gzhug go /mA ma kI'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/

tri Ta tri Ta dza yan+ti swA hA/ mA ma kI'i 'o/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad la sor mo rnams phan tshun bsnol te gcus la bsdams te/ g.yon pa'i mthe bos g.yas pa'i mthe bo mnan la bsdam mo/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/

hU~M ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ badzrod+b+ha be/ sar+b+ba tra pra ti ha te swA hA/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bo gnyis cung zad bkug la mdzub mo gnyis kyang de la phyogs par bya'o/ /rdo rje khro zla gtso bo'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags

la/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ hrIHhU~M phaT swA hA/ khro zla gtso bo'i 'o/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs mdzub mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ngo / /rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma ni da na badzrA sU tsi ba ra de swA hA/ rdo rje rtse

mo'i 'o/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la snying gar gzhag go/ /rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ Ta ya badzra saM b+ha be swA hA/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs pa'i mdzub mo gyen du bsgreng ste khros pa

bzhin du bsdigs par bya ba ni gdul dka'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ dur dAn+ta ma hA ro Sha Na lA da ya sar+b+ban ku ru ta thA ga ta A dz+nyA na swA hA/ gdul dka'i 'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la gdab pa'i thabs su bya'o/ /mngon phyogs kyi tho ba'i phyag rgya

ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ he a b+hi mu kha ma hA tsaN+Da grIh+Na khA da ya kiny+tsi ra ya si sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/ mngon phyogs kyi'o/ /snga ma bzhin lhung bzed 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas pa ni shAkya thub pa'i lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/

sar+b+ba kle sha ni sU da na sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma pa shI ta prAp+ta ga ga na sa ma swA hA/ shAkya thub pa'i 'o/ /mdzod spu'i phyag rgya ni snga ma bzhin no/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo kun rtse mo sbyar te spyi bo'i steng du gzhag go/ /gtsug tor thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/

ba~M ba~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ gtsug tor thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs la gung mo dang mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung gi rtse mor mthe bo gzhag la g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis g.yon pa'i mthil du gzhug /

mthe bo yang snga ma bzhin du bya'o/ /mi g.yo mgon gyi phyag rgya ral gri shubs su bcug pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i ni rdo rje ste/ snga ma bzhin no/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug go/ /gung

mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste/ gung mo'i tshigs gsum par gzhag /mthe bo gnyis mig lta bur bya/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yum gyi phyag rgya ste gtsug tor ro/ /lag pa g.yon pa brkyang ste kha sbub ste/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur

bcangs la mdzub mos gdugs lta bur gzung ngo / /gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya ste/ gdugs so/ /kha~M/ gtsug tor rgyal ba'i ni ral gri ste snga ma bzhin no/ /sha~M/ rnam par rgyal ba'i 'khor lo ste snga ma bzhin no/ /si~M/ /rnam par 'thor ba'i lcags kyu ste/ lag pa

g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo bkug ste gzhag go /hU~M/ gzi brjid phung po'i ni gtsug tor te snga ma bzhin no/ /gsang sngags la/ tr-iM/ cher 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes su grags/ u~M/ gyen du 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ni/ /pad+ma bzang po'i snga

ma bzhin/ /tu~M/ /mtha' yas pa yi dbyangs sgra ni/ /dung ni yin par ngas bshad do/ /ru~M/ /lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la smin mtshams su gzhag pa ni mdzod spu'i phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o/ /spyan gyi ni gtsug tor snga ma bzhin te/ bye brag tu rdo rjes mtshan pa'o/ /

ga/ lag pa g.yas pa pad+ma 'dzin pa'i thabs su snying gar gzhag la/ lag pa g.yon pa thal mo bsnun pa'i tshul du brkyang pa ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /gsang sngags ni/ d+hiM d+hiM riM riM dzi ri dzi ri/ lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mthe bo gnyis gyen du bsgreng ba las

dgug go/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i kha'i phyag rgya'o/ /a pa ra dzi ta dza yan+ti Ti te swA hA/ lag pa g.yas pa 'gram par bstan pa ni dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo dang mdzub mo gnyis gcus pa lta bur gzung ngo / /kun tu me tog gi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag

rgya de nyid las mthe bo nang du gzhug go/ /'od kyi phreng ba can gyi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis me tog 'dzin pa lta bur bya'o/ /yid mgyogs kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i srin lag gi steng du mthe bo gzhag la/ mdzub mo

dang gung mo dang mthe'u chung gsum brkyang ste rna ba'i steng du gzhag go/ /lag pa g.yon pa yang de bzhin du bya/ sgra rnam par sgrogs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la/ mthe bo gnyis rtse sprad de zlum po bya/ sor mo lhag ma rnams kyi rtse mo dgug pa ni bum pa'i

phyag rgya'o/ /de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul du byas la mthe bo nang du gzhag pa ni mi gnyer ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa de nyid mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa lta bur byas la mthe'u chung gi tshigs gnyis par gzhag go/ /drang srong rnams kyi spyi'i phyag rgya ste/

ni ci ltar rigs par bya'o/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug ste/ lhag ma rnams gcig tu bsdus la bstod de gzung ba ni gshin rje'i be con gyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa kha bub ste/ dril bu 'dra bar byas pa ni

'chi bdag gi phyag rgya ste dril bu'o/ /de bzhin du lag pa g.yon khu tshur bcangs la/ mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis bsgreng ba ni dus mtshan mo'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gyen du bsgreng ba ni drag mo'i phyag rgya ste tri shU la'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las pad+ma 'dzin pa'i tshul

du byas pa ni tshangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gung mo'i rgyab kyi tshigs gsum por sprad pa ni gzhon nu ma'i mdung thung gi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo mthe bo'i rtse mor gzhag go/ /khyab 'jug ma'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid

las mthe bo gyen du bsgreng ngo / /phag mo'i phyag rgya ste tho ba'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las lag pa snod lta bur bya'o/ /tsa muN+Di'i phyag rgya ste thod pa'o/ /bden bral gyi phyag rgya ral gri ni snga ma bzhin no/ /khyab 'jug gi phyag rgya 'khor lo yang snga ma bzhin no/ /de bzhin du lag pa

gnyis g.yon phyogs nas bstod de bskor ba ni dga' bo dang bsnyen dga' bo'i sprin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las sor mo gsum gyen du bsgreng ba ni bde byed kyi mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las sor mo de dag drang por byas pa ni u ma pa ti s+ya'i phyag rgya'o/ /

zla ba'i phyag rgya ni pad+ma snga ma bzhin te/ khyad par du dkar po bya'o/ /lag pa de nyid gnyis ka gshibs te bkan la mdzub mo dang srin lag gnyis ngos su dgug go/ /nyi ma'i phyag rgya ste shing rta'o/ /lag pa de gnyis ka gcig tu thal mo sbyar la gung mo dang / srin lag gnyis gzhu

'dra bar bya'o/ /rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /ba dan gyi phyag rgya ni snga ma bzhin te rlung gi'o/ /de bzhin du lag pa g.yon pa lte ba'i phyogs su bkan la sor mo gnyis bsgreng ste gzung ngo / /lag pa g.yas pa de la phyogs par byas te/ pi bang len pa lta bur byas

pa ni dbyangs can gyi phyag rgya ste pi bang ngo / /chu lha'i phyag rgya ni zhags pa ste snga ma bzhin no/ /dbyangs can gyi phyag rgya ste de nyid las mdzub mo dgug go/ /lha ma yin rnams kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ga ra la yaM swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid

las srin lag brkyang ngo / /dri za'i phyag rgya ste gsang sngags la/ bi shud+d+ha swa ra ba hi ne swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo dgug go/ /gnod sbyin thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ yak+She shwa ra swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis rtse mo sbyar

ro/ /gnod sbyin ma rnams kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ yak+Sha bid+yA d+hA rI swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo brkyang ngo / /sha za rnams kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ pi shA tse ga ti swA hA/ gung mo de nyid bkug la gzung ngo / /sha za mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang

sngags la/ mi tsi mi tsi swA hA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la mthe bo gnyis gyen du bsgreng ste gzung ngo / /gza' thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ gra he shwar+ya prAp+ta dz+yo tir ma ya swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo dang mthe bo

gnyis bzlog ste sbyar ro/ /rgyu skar thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ nak+Sha dra ni ra nA da nI ye swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis bkug ste lag mthil du gzhag go/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA

nAM/ rAk+sha sA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ srin po rnams kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /lag pa g.yas pa khar gzhag ste lce la reg par bya'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ hrIHha/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bu la sogs

pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa las byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan mar gyur pa'i phyag rgya rab 'byam rnams te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'on kyang ci tsam du yan lag bskyod pa de dag kun phyag rgya rgyas par rig par bya'o/ /ci tsam

du lce bskyod pa de dag kun kyang gsang sngags bstan par rig par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i

sa la gnas te dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /gzhan du byas na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / byang chub kyang bslus par 'gyur te/ dam tshig las 'das pas nges par ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub

pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ phyag rgya rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po thams cad du 'jug pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs nyon cig /gsang ba

pa'i bdag po de la byang chub sems dpas a zhes bya ba la gnas te/ dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a/ na maHsa man+ta bud+hA NAM/ sa/ na maHsa man+ta badzra NAM/ ba/ ka kha ga g+ha/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha/ Ta Tha Da D+ha/ ta tha da d+ha/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/

ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ nga nya Na na/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ sA/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ bA/ kA khA gA g+hA/ tsA tshA dzA dz+hA/ TA ThA DA D+hA/ tA thA dA d+hA/ pA phA bA b+hA mA/ yA rA lA wA/ shA ShA sA hA/ dA nyA NA nA/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a~M/ na maH

sa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ sa~M/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ pa~M/ ka~M kha~M ga~M g+ha~M/ tsa~M tsha~M dza~M dz+ha~M/ Ta~M Tha~M Da~M D+ha~M/ ta~M tha~M da~M d+ha~M/ pa~M pha~M ba~M b+ha~M ma~M/ ya~M ra~M la~M wa~M/ sha~M Sha~M sa~M ha~M/ nga~M nya~M Na~M na~M/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ aH/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ saH/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ baH/ ka kha ga g+ha/ tsa tsha dza

dz+ha/ Ta Tha Da D+ha/ ta tha da d+ha/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ nga nya Na na/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar na 'di ni yi ge'i tshul la mkhas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs te/ gsang sngags kyi tshul la rnam par gnas pa'i cho ga /lha

yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i rol mo ste/ 'das pa dang da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang bshad 'chad 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po ngas ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam gang dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa thams cad du 'jug pa'i sgo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi 'chad pa ma mthong ngo / /gsang

ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas/ gsang sngags kyi cho ga shes par 'dod na thams cad du 'jug pa'i sgo chos kyi rnam grangs la mngon par brtson par bya'o/ /ka dang tsa dang Ta dang ta dang pa rnams

thog ma dang tha ma dang / dbus dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs la 'jug pas byang chub dang spyod pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa dang bcas par thob par byed do/ /de bas na gsang sngags kyi cho ga la dang po la sogs pa'i tha snyad dang

ldan par gyur pa de dag nyid thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus dang lhan cig tu gyur par shes par bya ste/ gsang sngags kyi tshig re re la ci ltar 'dod par nges par sbyar bar bya'o/ /blo yis rnam par rtogs na ni/ /de dag bla med gnas mchog ste/ /de ltar 'di ni 'khor lo

gcig ste 'khor lo bzhin du yongs su 'khor ba ni yi ge'i 'khor lo'o/ /sngags pas yi ge'i 'khor lo de shes na rtag tu ci ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo bskor ba bzhin du rnam par mdzes par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad du 'jug pa'i sgo chos

kyi yi ge'i tshul rim par phye ba'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis sems can gyi khams thams cad la gzigs nas/ chos kyi dbyings mi zad pa bkod pa bstan pa dang gsang sngags kyi spyad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di nyid kyis

sems can rnams ma lus pa gdon par thugs dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi mdzod kyi mthu rlabs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnyam pa nyid bkod pa'i snying po can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms

par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de nyid kyi tshe sems can gyi khams ma lus pa nges par 'byung bar byed pa'i sgo ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin las dang tshe dang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu za ba dang / zar 'jug pa'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs

dang / nga ro dang / 'gro ba dang / spyod pa dang / nges pa'i tshig brjod pa sems can thams cad so so so sor yang dag par mgu bar byed pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par bskyed pa'i sku rnams byung bar gyur to/ /byung nas kyang nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi

khams rab 'byam rnams su sgra dbyangs gcig gis chos kyi dbyings khyab par rnam par rig par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di sgrogs par gyur to/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid gang las ni/ /chos rnams dag ni thams cad dang /

sangs rgyas rnams dang nyan thos dang / /rang rgyal skyob pa rnams dang ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dang / /de bzhin rgyal ba mchog rnams dang / /sems can snod kyi 'jig rten dag /btags pa rim pa bzhin 'byung zhing / /chos rnams skye dang gnas

pa dag /gang las rtag tu 'byung 'gyur ba/ /shes rab thabs dang ldan 'gyur zhing / /yid gnyis som nyi dang bral ba/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab bshad pa'i/ /lam 'di khyed kyis bsgom par gyis/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chos kyi

dbyings las byung ba de dag gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rang gi sku rnam par rig par byed pa/ sprul pa'i sprin gyis yongs su bkang nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kyi dbang tsam gyis ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig nas gcig

tu brgyud pa byin gyis brlabs te/ rang rang gi chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas su zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dgod pa lha rnams kyi

gnas yang dag par gnas par bsam pa sa bon dang bcas pas mtshan pa yod kyis/ de nyon la legs par rab tu yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la nyan to/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ dang por sngags pas dkyil 'khor de/ /rang gi lus la dgod byas te/ /rkang pa nas ni chu so la/ /thug gi bar du sa yir bsam/ /de nas grong du snying ga'i bar/ /sdom brtson can gyis chu yir bsam/ /chu yi yan cad

me yi ste/ /me yi yan cad rlung yin no/ /bsams nas de nas mkhas pa yis/ /sa la gzugs brnyan gzhag par bya/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sa la zhugs nas chos mnyam pa nyid la bltas te/ ma 'ongs pa'i

skye bo rnams la brtags nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po the tsom thams cad gcod par byed pa 'di smras so/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a sa ma pa ti d+har+m+ma d+hA tu kA r+ya ga ti ga tA nAM/ sar+b+ba thA/ a~M kha~M a~M a/ sa~M sa ha~M ha/ ra~M ra ba~M ba swA hA/ hU~M ma hA swA hA/ ra~M ra swA hA/ gsang ba pa'i

bdag po phyag na rdo rjes gsang sngags kyi rgyal po chen po 'di smras ma thag tu de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bor bzhag nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /

rigs kyi bu gang khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sa la zhugs nas/ thams cad du gsang sngags kyi tshul la mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la snang bar bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di

smras pa legs so legs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs te/ tshig bcu gnyis po 'di dag gis chos kyi dbyings rnam par dpyad cing bdud bzhi

pham par byas nas chos kyi dbyings nas byung ba 'di dag gnas gsum nas byung ste/ bdud sdig can rnams btul bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid brnyes nas nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir sku tshad med pa brnyes par gyur/ de

bzhin du gsung dang thugs tshad med pa yang brnyes par gyur to/ /de ltar ye shes tshad med pa dang ldan zhing / chos thams cad la dbang thob pas 'di ltar gsang sngags kyi rgyal po tshig bcu gnyis po 'di dag nyid las brtsams te/ chos 'chad do/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyang

bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pas na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin du snang ngo / /thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad la/ /sngags spyad tshig mchog zhus shig dang / /cho ga

rgyas pa bka' stsal to/ /nged kyang sngon ni 'di rnams kyis/ /bla med byang chub rtogs nas su/ /mya ngan 'das lam 'gro ba yi/ /mnyam pa med pa'i chos bshad pa/ /'jig rten khams na bzhugs pa yi/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams dpang du gyur/ /de nas

dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /bsam pa mchog rab mgu gyur pa/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis byin brlabs pas/ /'di skad ces ni tshig smras pa/ /chos 'di rnams ni mtshan nyid med/ /ngo bo nyid med gnas med pa/ /las dang tshe las rnam par grol/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas 'dra bar 'dod/ /thugs rjes mnga' ni mdzad pa yi/ /mgon po rnams kyi thabs kyis ni/ /rnam par sprul nas chos rnams kyi/ /mtshan nyid 'di dag rtogs par 'gyur/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes ched du brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de smras nas/

ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams la bltas te/ snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i the tsom gcad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la zhus pa/ sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /kun mkhyen snyun dang bral ba'o/ /the tsom thams cad

gcod mdzad pa/ /'dren pa khyed la zhu ba ni/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngon rol du/ /ci zhig bgyi ba 'dren pas gsungs/ /thub pa chen po slob dpon dang / /slob ma'ang rnam pa du ru bshad/ /sa gzhi ci 'drar 'tshal bar bgyi/ /de yang ci ltar sbyang bar bgyi/ /ci ltar sa ni

dag par 'gyur/ /ci ltar de ni brtan pa lags/ /slob ma'i dgos pa gang gis bgyi/ /sbyang ba'ang 'dren pas bka' stsol cig /dag pa'i mtshan ma ci 'dra dang / /gang gis de dag bsrung bar bgyi/ /sa ni gang gis byin gyis brlab/ /der ni dang po gang gis brtag /sa

yi cha las thig gdab pa'i/ /srad bu rnam pa du 'tshal bgyi/ /mchod pa rnam pa dur 'tshal bgyi/ /me tog bdug spos ci 'drar dang / /me tog dang ni bdug spos dag /ci ltar dbul ba 'dren pas gsung / /lha bshos sbyin sreg las rnams kyang / /gang dag las ni

ji ltar bgyi/ /lha rnams kyi ni gdan dag kyang / /gang la gang gis bgyi ba gsungs/ /kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs rnams kyang / /bzhin du mgon pos gsungs/ /lha rnams dang ni phyag rgya dang / /gdan gyi tshad kyang bshad du gsol/ /phyag rgya rnams

ni gang nas byung / /ci phyir phyag rgya zhes kyang bgyi/ /dbang bskur rnam pa du 'tshal bgyi/ /dam tshig rnam pa du zhig mchis/ /sngags spyad pa la brtson pa yi/ /sngags pa byang chub sems dpa' dang / /thams cad mkhyen par ci ltar 'gyur/ /ci ltar bden pa mthong bar

'gyur/ /dngos grub rnam pa du 'tshal bgyi/ /grub pa'i dus kyang bka' stsol cig /grub nas nam mkhar 'gro ba dang / /ci ltar mi snang 'gyur ba dang / /gtso bo lus 'di ma bor bar/ /ci ltar lha yi lus thob 'gyur/ /sprul pa rnams ni sna tshogs pa/ /de la gang nas 'byung

bar 'gyur/ /nyi zla me dang phyogs rnams dang / /rgyu skar gza' dang skar ma dang / /yud tsam dang ni thang cig dang / /rga dang 'chi dang rgud pa dang / /ltas ngan dag ni thams cad kyang / /de la ci ltar 'byung mi 'gyur/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo sangs rgyas dang / /sngags pa ci ltar

'bral mi 'gyur/ /sbyin sreg las dang me dag dang / /tshim par bgyi ba du 'tshal bgyi/ /lha rnams kyang ni so so yi/ /ngo bo nyid ni 'dren pas gsungs/ /'jig rten pa yi sngags rnams dang / /de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /tshad dang 'bras bu grangs rnams dang / /ting nge

'dzin gyi khyad par dang / /las kyi rnam pa gang du smin/ /ci ltar rnam par smin mi 'gyur/ /sngags pa rnams ni nam zhig na/ /las dang tshe las rnam grol 'gyur/ /de nas kun mkhyen rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bcom ldan snyun dang bral ba yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad gsungs/ /

snying rje chen po'i rtsa las 'byung / /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dgod pa/ /lha rnams kyi ni rnam nges pa/ /theg pa chen po'i go 'phang mchog /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rab gsung ba/ /dpa' bo cher 'byung khyod kyis gang / /yongs su dris pa de legs so/ /lag na rdo rje stobs

chen la/ /mdor ni bsdus nas bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngon rol du/ /bya ba rnams ni des pas nyon/ /so so'i las rnams 'dod pa yis/ /tshul shes pas ni ci rigs par/ /rang gi ting 'dzin la gnas te/ /rig sngags rgyal po stobs po che/ /yan

lag bcu gnyis tshig 'byung ba/ /bzhin du bzlas brjod bya/ /gsang sngags phyag rgya rtogs shes pa'i/ /slob dpon rnam pa gnyis shes bya/ /zab dang mi zab bye brag las/ /de yi mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /zab mo rgya cher shes par bya/ /lus can rnams ni yid

mi rton/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras mchog ste/ /mthong ba'i chos ni rnam par spangs/ /gnyis pa mthong ba'i chos rnams kyis/ /myos par gyur pa dmigs pa can/ /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog rnams kyis/ /'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor kun/ /de yis

bri bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rjes su gnang zhing dbang yang bskur/ /dus dang dus min bye brag las/ /slob ma rnam bzhir shes bya ste/ /gcig ni de yi mod las bsgrub/ /gnyis su bsgrub dang gnyi gar min/ /mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa yi/ /slob

ma de ni rgyal ba'i mchog /sa ni dang por shes bya ba/ /sems kyi sar ni bshad par bya/ /sbyang ba sngar ni bstan pa ste/ /de yis de ni yongs su sbyang / /nam zhig nyes dang bral ba na/ /sems kyi sa ni mi 'jigs pa/ /de tshe de ni dag pa ste/ /nyes pa thams cad

rnam par spangs/ /mngon par byang chub mthong bas na/ /de ltar de ni brtan zhes bya/ /de las gzhan du sa sbyong ba/ /de ni dag par mi 'gyur ro/ /sngags pa rtog la gnas nas su/ /gang zhig sa sbyong byed pa ni/ /byang chub sems ni rnam spangs pas/ /gsang

ba'i bdag po de mi 'dag /de bas rtog pa rnam spangs nas/ /sa kun rnam par sbyang bar bya/ /nga yis dkyil 'khor rnams kyi ni/ /cho ga rgyas pa gang bstan pa/ /de dag thog mar bstan pa ni/ /rmongs pa rnams kyis mi shes te/ /rtog pa sdug bsngal rgyur gyur pa/ /ci

srid ma spangs bar du ni/ /'jig rten 'di nas sangs rgyas min/ /kun mkhyen zhes kyang mi bya'o/ /slob ma rnams la nan tan du/ /byang chub sems kyis sbyang bar bya/ /bsrung ba mi g.yo mgon po'am/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas bya/ /slob ma nam

zhig dmigs pa yis/ /nam yang g.yos par mi 'gyur ba/ /de tshe dri med nam mkha' bzhin/ /yang dag par ni dag par 'gyur/ /sa byin gyis brlab dang po ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bya bar bshad/ /gnyis pa sems kyi dbang gis te/ /'dir ni gzhan du mi bya'o/ /

srad bu rnam pa bzhir bshad de/ /dkar po ser po dmar po dang / /nag po zhes ni bya bar brjod/ /lnga pa nam mkha' lta bur bshad/ /bar snang la ni bzung nas su/ /der ni dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/ /srad bu dag ni gnyis pa yis/ /sa la dkyil 'khor dgod par

bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad dang / /de sras blo can rnams kyi gdan/ /pad+ma yid las byung ba'i mchog /bkra shis 'jig rten rnams kyi sngags/ /rang rgyal dang ni dgra bcom pa/ /phyogs gcig shes par gang grags pa/ /de dag stan du shes bya ba/ /pad+ma

las byung 'dab ma'o/ /'jig rten gyi ni lha rnams gang / /tshangs la sogs pa 'jig rten grags/ /de dag stan ni pad+ma dmar/ /rgyal po rnams kyis bsngags pa'o/ /phal pa rnams kyi ci rigs par/ /sa yi bye brag dag las sam/ /mchod pa rnam bzhir shes bya ste/ /phyag

'tshal thal mo sbyar ba dang / /de bzhin byams dang snying rje dang / /me tog bdug spos 'jig rten pa'i/ /sor mo las byung me tog rnams/ /skyob pa kun la dbul bar bya/ /yan lag kun 'byung phyag rgya ni/ /bcings nas byang chub sems bsgoms te/ /so sor mgon po thams cad

dang / /de sras rnams la nan tan bya'o/ /'di ni skyon med me tog ste/ /rab tu bsung zhim rnam par mdzes/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ljon shing rnams/ /rgyal ba mchod pa'i phyir byung ba/ /ting 'dzin dbang gis sgyur ba yi/ /sngags kyis de dag byin gyis brlabs/ /chos kyi dbyings

las byung ba yi/ /sprin mang rgya che dam pa rnams/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni/ /de tshe rtag tu char bzhin 'bab/ /lha rnams phal pa gzhan la ni/ /me tog 'di rnams bsgrags pa ste/ /rang gi sngags rgyud rgyas shes pas/ /ci ltar rigs pa dbul bar bya/ /de bzhin

me tog byug spos rnams/ /ci ltar rigs par rnam par bsam/ /mthe bo srin lag sbyar ba ni/ /bkra shis pa zhes bshad pa ste/ /de yis me tog de blangs nas/ /rang gi snying ga'i phyogs nas dbul/ /'jig rten pa yi lha rnams la/ /lte ba'i thad ka nas zhes bya/ /bdug

spos rdo rje khu tshur ram/ /yang na pad+ma'i phreng ba yis/ /bar snang la ni bzung nas su/ /'jig rten mgon skyob rnams la dbul/ /de las gzhan pa 'jig rten pa'i/ /lha rnams la ni bzhin/ /phyi dang nang gi bye brag gis/ /sbyin sreg rnam pa gnyis shes bya/ /

las dang tshe las rnam par grol/ /slar yang sa bon 'byung ba ste/ /las 'dod pa yis sbyin sreg bya/ /nang gi sbyin sreg zhes su bshad/ /phyi rol gyi ni gsum ldan zhing / /gnas gsum dang ni gsum la gnas/ /las gsum gyi ni las grub pa/ /'jig rten pa yi sbyin

sreg mchog /sbyin sreg las ni mi shes pas/ /gang dag gzhan du byed pa ni/ /sngags kyi shes pa spangs pa ste/ /glen des 'bras bu mi thob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsang sngags dang / /de bzhin rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs/ /dkar dang ser du shes par

bya/ /phyag na rdo rje thams cad pa/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gsang sngags ni/ /las kyi bye brag dag las dkar/ /kun tu gru bzhi lham pa dang / /bzhin du zlum po dang / /gru gsum dang ni zla gam 'dra/ /dbyibs ni legs par bshad pa yin/ /gzugs ni gnyis

su shes bya ste/ /bud med dang ni skyes pa nyid/ /yang na kun tu thams cad kyi/ /kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs rnams te/ /bsam yas ye shes las byung ba/ /de bas de rnams bsam yas te/ /ye shes mkhyen gyi ye shes ni/ /sems can don phyir tha dad gyur/ /yid

kyi rgya ni ci tsam pa/ /stan dang phyag rgya dag dang ni/ /lha yi tshad kyang bzhin/ /de tsam du ni shes par bya/ /sangs rgyas gang nas byung ba nas/ /phyag rgya rnams kyang de nas byung / /chos las byung ba'i slob ma rnams/ /chos kyi phyag rgyas gdab par bya/ /

de bas mdor na chos kyi dbyings/ /mtshan ma phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /dbang bskur gsum du shes bya ste/ /de bas nan tan mnyan par gyis/ /phyag rgyas gang zhig dbang bskur ba/ /las dang bya ba spangs pa ste/ /skyob pa rnams kyi dbang bskur ba/ /de ni mchog ste dang po

yin/ /gnyis pa las dang bya ba yis/ /kun nas bslang bar yang dag bshad/ /gsum pa yid kyir shes bya ste/ /yul dang dus ni spangs pa'o/ /bla ma legs par mgu byas nas/ /phan par byed pa gang smras pa'i/ /dbang bskur 'di ni mchog yin par/ /rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsgrags/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdor na ni/ /dam tshig can rnams lngar bshad de/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni mthong ba las/ /dam tshig shes pa gcig ces bya/ /de la phyag rgya mi bstan cing / /sngags kyang sbyin par mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems kyi

bye brag las/ /sngags dang phyag rgya yongs su bzung / /dkyil 'khor mthong zhes bya ba 'di/ /dam tshig can gnyis shes bya ste/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni phyag rgya mthong / /las dang bya ba la yang sbyar/ /bla mas lung ni ma byin pa/ /de yang dam tshig shes par bshad/ /phyag

rgya dkyil 'khor bri ba rnams/ /de tshe cho ga bzhin du bstan/ /gsang ba'i ye shes 'byung ba yi/ /dbang bskur med pa'i sngags pa'ang yin/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sngags pa cho gas dbang bskur ba/ /dam tshig shes pa lngar shes bya/ /dam tshig can zhes

gzhan mi bya/ /brtul zhugs bzang po byang chub phyir/ /gang zhig sems ni bsgom pa na/ /sngags pa gnas gsum mi dmigs pa/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin/ /thabs kyi snying stobs bskyed nas su/ /sems can don la sbyor ba na/ /dmigs su med pa'i spyod thob

pa/ /rgyal ba'i mchog tu shes par bya/ /thog ma nas ni zhi ba'i chos/ /ngo bo nyid ni med pa la/ /gang gis sems ni ri rab bzhin/ /gnas pa de ni bden pa mthong / /'di bden 'di ni yang dag pa/ /de bzhin du ni mi bslu ba/ /ci ltar sangs rgyas bden gzigs pa/ /

de bzhin sngon ni ngas mthong ba'i/ /byang chub sems thob gang yin de/ /dngos grub de las gzhan ci dgos/ /de las gzhan du'ang dngos grub ni/ /rnam pa dag ni lngar 'dod de/ /spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / /de bzhin sa ni gnon pa dang / /'jig rten mngon shes lngar

'dod dang / /sangs rgyas nyid dang gang gzhan no/ /rgyud las rgyud du gyur pa yi/ /las ni ci srid ma nyams shing / /rnam smin rnam par mi smin pa/ /dngos grub dag gi dus su 'dod/ /mdor na gang tshe dus gcig tu/ /las dang skye ba 'phangs gyur pa/ /de tshe'ang sngags

pas dngos grub ni/ /yid las yang dag byung ba 'thob// //bam po drug pa/ grub nas mkha' la 'gro ba ni/ /ci ltar sgyu ma 'jigs med bzhin/ /sngags kyi dra bas rmongs byed pa/ /ci ltar mig 'phrul chen po bzhin/ /gang la lus dang ngag med pa/ /dri za'i

grong khyer ci bzhin te/ /de bzhin mi snang 'gyur zhes bya/ /de ni de na gnas pa yin/ /ci ltar nyal ba'i rmi lam na/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su phyin/ /lus kyang spangs pa ma yin la/ /de nyid kyis kyang de ma song / /de bzhin rnal 'byor nyid kyis kyang / /sngags

pa sngags la gnas pa dag /bsod nams bya ba'i las rnams kyis/ /'ja' dang 'dra ba'i lus kyang 'thob/ /lus dang ngag yid las byung ba'i/ /gsang sngags yid bzhin nor bu 'dra/ /de las rnam par bsams pa'i don/ /ma brtags par yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /

ci ltar nam mkha' phyogs rnams su/ /'dus byas spyod yul thams cad kyis/ /mi gos de bzhin sngags pa yang / /rtog pa'i spyod yul kun gyis so/ /'di kun 'du shes tsam du ni/ /nam zhig de ltar bsgoms gyur cing / /rnam par bsgoms na sngags pa de/ /

rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lhan cig dga'/ /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bo yis/ /sbyin sreg gnyis su bshad pa ni/ /phyi rol gyi dang nang gi ste/ /de yang tshim par bya dang bcas/ /lha rnams kyi ni so so yi/ /rang bzhin yongs su mkhyen nas su/ /

'jig rten pa yi sngags rnams kyi/ /tshad dag legs par gsungs pa ni/ /dbang phyug la sogs mthu chen rnams/ /bkur ba'i lha rnams gang yin pa/ /de dag gis ni gang byas pa'i/ /sngags dang phyag rgya stobs chen rnams/ /'bras bu phal cher 'phral du ster/ /tshad

ni bshad pa de yin no/ /'on kyang skye dang 'jig pa yi/ /chos can de dag brtan pa med/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i sngags rnams kyi/ /thog ma'i byed pa med pa'o/ /las dang skye ba kun bcad pa/ /nyes pa gsum bral rgyal ba dang / /rang rgyal bse ru lta bu dang / /de bzhin

rgyal ba'i nyan thos dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang / /gsang sngags tshad ni sngon bshad pa/ /dus gsum las ni shin tu 'das/ /rten cing 'brel pa las byung ba/ /mthong dang ma mthong 'bras bu can/ /ngag yid lus las byung ba'o/ /'jig rten pa yi 'bras

bu'i tshad/ /bskal pa gcig tu bshad pa yin/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ /gsang sngags 'bras bu bskal pa 'das/ /sangs rgyas drang srong chen po dang / /rgyal sras rnams kyi ting 'dzin ni/ /mtshan ma med cing dag pa'o/ /'jig rten pa yi mtshan mar

bcas/ /rnam par smin pa 'di nyid la/ /las kyi 'bras bu smin 'gyur ba/ /nam zhig dngos grub thob pa na/ /de tshe las kyang ldog par 'gyur/ /sems ni ngo bo nyid med phyir/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu rnams spangs shing / /las dang tshe las rnam grol ba/ /nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur

ba yin/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang phyag rgya'i gzugs su dgod pa rim par phye ba lha rnams gnas pa byin gyis rlob pa/ ting nge 'dzin lnga rtogs pa byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa/ chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa/ spyod yul

du gyur pa/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa bsgral bar yi dam bcas pa rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de nyon la legs par rab tu yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom

ldan 'das ji ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po dang por yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor dgod pa rim par phye ba gang

lags/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor grangs med pa byung ba gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba/ snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod kyis/ de bri ba'i cho ga nyon cig /kun tu gru bzhi lham pa la/ /sgo gcig pa ni stegs bur

bcas/ /bzang po rdo rje rnams kyis mtshan/ /dbus su rdo rje rtse brgyad pa/ /de'i steng pad+ma bri ba ni/ /sa bon dang bcas rgyas par byas/ /de yi steng du pad+ma che/ /phyag rgya klad kor gyis mdzes byas/ /'dab ma brgyad rnams legs par rdzogs/ /ze bar bcas pa

shin tu bzang / /'dab ma rnams ni thams cad la/ /yan lag bcu gnyis tshig bkod pa/ /de rnams dbus na mgon bzhugs pa/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi 'khor rnams kyis/ /kho ra khor yug yongs bskor ba/ /snying rje

las byung dkyil 'khor 'di/ /mchog tu shes par bya ba ste/ /lung bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams dang ni/ /las dang lus dang dngos grub dang / /dgod pa rnams kyang des pa yis/ /'di las byung ba shes par bya/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams

kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra zhing mdog /dung lta bu yi dbus na ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gru gsum pa/ /pad+ma dkar po'i steng na gnas/ /klad kor bcas pa'i mtshan gyis btab/ /rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan pa ste/ /dpyad mi dgos pas kun nas ni/ /

'od zer dag ni gnyis bya ba/ /gsang sngags mgon las byung nas su/ /de ni phyogs bcu rnams su song / /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang / /spyan ras gzigs dbang dkyil 'khor ni/ /nges pas nan tan mnyan par gyis/ /kun tu gru bzhi lham pa la/ /dbus

su dung 'dra gzhag par bya/ /de yi steng du pad+ma ni/ /sa bon bcas byas rgyas par bri/ /de'i steng du yang rdo rje che/ /rdo rje las kyang pad+ma che/ /thams cad sa bon rnams kyis mtshan/ /rang gi sa bon legs par sbyar/ /sgrol ma dang ni khro gnyer can/ /de bzhin gos dkar can

dang ni/ /rig sngags longs spyod can ma dang / /mthu chen thob pa'ang nan tan bya/ /dpal rnams kun dang phyag brnyan ma/ /dkyil 'khor 'di yi dbus su ni/ /phyag rgya'i mtshan ma dbang thob rnams/ /khyad par du ni bri bar bya/ /rta mgrin can gyi bya ba ni/ /gru gsum tshul

du 'dug pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor mtshan ma bzang pos btab/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i kha dog 'dra/ /rig sngags rgyal dang bcas par ni/ /mkhas pas rnam par dgod par bya/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang khyod nyid kyi dkyil 'khor mdor bshad par bya'o/ /kun tu gru

bzhi lham pa la/ /rdo rje'i mtshan ma rnams kyis mtshan/ /thams cad ser po yid du 'ong / /dbus na pad+ma rab tu gnas/ /de yi dbus su bya ba ni/ /bum pa zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba/ /'di ni mtshan ma rnams kyis mtshan/ /klad kor gyis kyang rnam par brgyan/ /de steng du yang rlung

chen ni/ /dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra ba'i mdog /ba dan g.yo ba sngags pas bya/ /klad kor gyis kyang rnam par brgyan/ /de steng du yang gru gsum pa/ /rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can te/ /'jig par byed pa'i me 'dra ba/ /sum mdo'i ris mtshan mtshan gyis btab/ /'bar

phreng 'khrigs pa 'jigs 'jigs lta/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i gzugs 'dra ba'o/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma che/ /dus mtha'i me 'od 'dra ba'o/ /pad chen steng du rdo rje ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'phro ba can/ /hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgra dang ldan/ /dam pa sa bon rnams kyis mtshan/ /dpa' bo

khyod kyi dkyil 'khor 'di/ /rgyal ba'i gtso bo rnams kyis gsungs/ /mA ma kI dang lu gu rgyud/ /de bzhin rdo rje'i rigs las byung / /rdo rje lcags kyu rdo rje rtse/ /gsang sngags rgyal po mthu chen dag /dkyil 'khor chen po'i nang du ni/ /kun kyang khongs su chud par bya/ /las

rnams shin tu 'grub bya'i phyir/ /phyag rgya dkyil 'khor sa bon dang / /kha dog khyad par bzhin/ /de dag ci ltar rigs par bya'o/ /de nas gzhan yang rdo rje 'dzin/ /chen po gtsor bshad 'di rnams te/ /nam mkha' dri med rdo rjes 'khor/ /rdo rje mche ba des pa dang / /

rnam par grags pa skal chen dang / /rdo rje mgon po mchog 'dzin dang / /rdo rje zhi ba rdo rje che/ /rdo rje mthing ga rdo rje gzhan/ /rdo rje pad+ma yangs pa'i mig /rdo rje bzang po rdo rje nyid/ /spros pa med par gnas pa dang / /nam mkha' mtha' yas 'gro ba'o/ /de rnams dkyil

'khor bshad pa ni/ /dkar po ser po dmar po dang / /nag po yin par yang dag bshad/ /de nas gzhan yang phyag rgya'i gzugs/ /rtse gsum pa dang rtse gcig pa/ /gzhan yang gnyis dang gnyis ma yin/ /phreng ba lta bu de bzhin gzhan/ /kha dog bye brag las shes bya/ /

'di rnams kun kyang mthu chen te/ /rnam par rgyal dang ldan pa'o/ /mi g.yo mgon gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /rlung dang me yi yin par 'dod/ /nga yi drung gi 'og logs su/ /bden bral gyi ni phyogs char bri/ /rang gi sa bon mtshan mar ldan/ /ral gri phyag rgya legs par sbyar/ /

yang na zhags pa bya yang rung / /blo ldan de yis bri bar bya/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal gyi'ang / /bye brag tu ni rlung gi dbus/ /rdo rje can gyi mtshan dang ldan/ /gnas gsum dag la 'dug pa'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yum

gyi gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor dgod pa 'byung ste/ de la re zhig dkyil 'khor ni/ /gser gyi kha dog gru bzhi pa/ /rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan pa ste/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor dam pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang lha mo'i gzugs/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma che/ /thams cad ser po 'bar

dang bcas/ /der yang gtsug tor gzhag pa ni/ /cha gsum la ni gnas par bya/ /dbus ma'i cha ni bor nas su/ /der yang spyan ni bri bar bya/ /rang gi 'od 'bar dbus na gnas/ /mdor na sa bon ldan par bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi/ /yid

bzhin nor bu rgyal bas gsungs/ /de yi dkyil 'khor bshad pa ni/ /chu yi yin te thams cad sgo/ /shin tu dri med rab tu zhi/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o/ /de nas shAkya seng ge'i yang / /des pas dkyil 'khor mnyan par gyis/ /der ni dbang chen zhes bya ba/ /kha

dog ser pos nye bar brgyan/ /kun tu gru bzhi lham pa la/ /dbus su rdo rje snga ma bzhin/ /de yi steng du pad+ma ni/ /kun tu kha dog ser po gzhag /de steng lhung bzed chen po ste/ /rdo rjes mtshan pa 'bar dang bcas/ /yang na chos gos 'khar gsil dag /bzhin du

gzhag par bya/ /gtsug tor lnga po gang bsgrags pa/ /de rnams phyag rgya shes bya ba/ /gdugs dkar pos ni gdugs su bya/ /rgyal ba'i gtsug tor blo ldan ni/ /mtshan ma ral grir gzhag pa ni/ /'od zer rnams ni 'phro bar bya/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i 'khor lo yin/ /rnam

par 'thor ba'i lcags kyur 'dod/ /gzi brjid phung po skal chen gyi/ /gtsug tor bzang po yin par 'dod/ /cher 'byung ba'i ni rdo rje yin/ /mngon par 'byung ba pad mar 'dod/ /dung ni mtha' yas sgra dbyangs kyi/ /kha dog bye brag las shes bya/ /mdzod spu'i yid bzhin nor bu

yin/ /spyan gyi yang ni 'di nyon cig /gtsug tor thams cad ser po ste/ /rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan par byed/ /gzhan gyis mi thub ma yis ni/ /lag pa ngo mtshar pad+ma can/ /gzhan gyis mi thub zhes bya ba'i/ /kha chen pad+ma gnag la gnas/ /gtsang mar gnas pa gang grags

pa/ /gtsang mar rtogs pa'i spyod yul can/ /de dag gi ni phyag rgya yi/ /mtshan nyid dgod pa des pas nyon/ /sems dpa'i lag dang dge ba'i lag /'dzum pa'i lag kyang de bzhin gzhan/ /lag na me tog nam mkha'i lag /cho ga rgyas par bri bar bya/ /sa yi lha mo'i bum

pa ste/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor rdo rjes mtshan/ /gnyer ba'i lag pa me yi ste/ /drang srong rnams dang bcas par bri/ /'od srung dang ni gau ta ma/ /mar+k+ka Na dang gar+g+ga dang / /bsis+tha dang ang+gi ras/ /me yi gnas kyi nang na 'dug /rig byed lag par nan tan du/ /de dag

bzhin du bri/ /gshin rje'i be con bri ba ni/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor nang na 'dug /'chi bdag gi ni dril bu yin/ /dus mtshan phyag rgya ba dan no/ /drag po'i chung ma'i mdung rtse gsum/ /tshangs pa'i chung ma'i pad+mar dran/ /gzhon nu'i chung ma'i mdung thung yin/ /khyab 'jug chung

ma'i 'khor lo nyid/ /gshin rje'i chung ma'i tho bar shes/ /'jigs byed chung ma'i mi thod yin/ /de dag rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /nang du chud par bya ba ni/ /bya rgod bya rog de bzhin khyi/ /wa rnams kyis kyang yongs bskor bar/ /las rnams grub par 'dod pa yis/ /ci

ltar rigs par bri bar bya/ /bden bral gyi ni ral grir bri/ /khyab 'jug gi ni 'khor lor bya/ /skem byed kyi ni mdung thung yin/ /dga' bo nye dga' gnyis kyi sprin/ /gnyis ka'i glog dang bcas par te/ /gzugs ni mdog sngo chu dang bcas/ /shAkya seng ge'i dkyil 'khor

gyi/ /sgo yi phyogs ni gnyis su dgod/ /bde byed kyi ni mdung rtse gsum/ /dka' zlog rtse gsum gdengs por bshad/ /bum pa dkar po pad+mar bcas/ /zla ba'i phyag rgya yin par dran/ /nyi ma'i dbang chen dkyil 'khor la/ /gnas pa'i shing rta yin zhes bya/ /rgyal

dang rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /dbang chen mtshan ma'i gzhu can no/ /rlung gi phyogs su rlung rnams kyi/ /ba dan phyag rgya bri bar bya/ /dbyangs can gyi ni pi bang yin/ /chu ni zhags pa 'dzin par bri/ /bdag nyid chen po de'i dkyil 'khor/ /chu yi yin par shes par bya/ /sa bon

rnams kyis btab pa dang / /mtshan ma rnams kyis mtshan par bya'o/ /shAkya tog gi dkyil 'khor du/ /de la sogs pa'i mtshan rnams kyis/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni bzhin/ /de dbus phyag rgya gzhag pa ni/ /sa bon rnams dang bcas par bya/ /gzhan yang

mchog sbyin rdo rje yi/ /dkyil 'khor nan tan mnyan par gyis/ /kun tu gru bzhi lham pa la/ /rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan pa ste/ /de yi dbus su bya ba ni/ /dkyil 'khor me las byung ba'o/ /de'i dbus phyag rgya gzhag pa ni/ /ut+pal zhes bya gzugs bzang ba/ /

'jam dbyangs blo dang ldan pa yi/ /rang gi sngags kyis gzi bskyed pa/ /de yi gnas ni cho ga bzhin/ /rang gi sa bon nyid kyis btab/ /mtha' ma kho ra khor yug tu/ /ut+pal rnams kyis khebs par bya/ /de yi dbus su bri ba ni/ /dpa' bo 'di rnams bzhin/ /de la dra

ba can gyi 'od kyi phyag rgya ni lcags kyu'o/ /gzhon nu rin chen cod pan gyi ni rin po che'o/ /gzhon nu dri med 'od kyi ni ut+pal kha ma bye ba'o/ /'jam dbyangs blo dang ldan pa yi/ /mngag gzhug mar ni gang grags pa/ /de rnams kyi ni 'jigs med pas/ /ci ltar rigs par shes bya

ba/ /skra can gyi ni phyag rgya ni/ /ral gri yin par shes par bya/ /nye skra can gyi mdung rtse gsum/ /sna tshogs ma yi dbyug par bshad/ /nor ldan ma yi rgyal mtshan gsungs/ /'gugs ma yi ni lcags kyu yin/ /de dag thams cad ut+pa la'i/ /mtshan ma dag gis

mtshan par bya/ /ci skad gsungs pa'i phyag brnyan ma/ /de dag phyag rgya gang gi na/ /lho yi phyogs su nan tan du/ /sgrib pa rnam sel brtson 'grus che'i/ /phyag rgya legs par bri ba ni/ /yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba/ /me yi dkyil 'khor nang na 'dug /'khor dang

bcas pa bzhin/ /'khor rnams kyi ni rgyas pa ru/ /phyag rgya 'di rnams shes par bya/ /ngo mtshar can gyi phyag rgya ni/ /bum pa'i steng na rdo rje rtse gcig pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ni mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i lag pa'o/ /ngan song thams cad spong ba'i ni lag pa

mas yar gyen du 'dren pa lta bur bya'o/ /skyong sems blo gros kyi snying rje'i lag pa brang du gzhag pa'o/ /byams pa chen po gyen du 'byung ba'i ni me tog 'dzin pa'i lag pa'o/ /blo can snying rjes gdungs pa'i ni lag pa snying gar gzhag la gung mo nang du dgug pa'o/ /gdung ba thams cad

zhi bar byed pa'i ni lag pa mchog sbyin pa'i sor mo rnams las chu'i rgyun 'dzag pa'o/ /blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i lag pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu thogs pa'o/ /de dag thams cad kyang pad+ma la gnas shing dkyil 'khor gyi nang du chud par bya'o/ /byang phyogs su sa'i

snying po'i phyag rgya ni/ dbang chen dkyil 'khor nang gnas pa/ /stan ni snga ma bzhin du gzhag /de'i steng pad+ma chen po ste/ /kha dog kun ldan 'bar dang bcas/ /de'i steng ba dan chen po ste/ /rtse la rin chen chen po gzhag /de ni gzugs kyi mchog yin te/ /phyag rgya'i gzugs

su 'dir bshad do/ /de yi 'khor ni grangs med pa/ /gtso bo'i yon tan mtha' yas te/ /de la de rnams phyag rgya yang / /nan tan bskyed de bri ba ni/ /rin chen 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje rtse gsum pa rin po che'i steng na 'dug pa'o/ /rin chen lag gi ni rdo rje rtse gcig

pa rin po che'i steng na 'dug pa'o/ /sa 'dzin gyi ni rdo rje kha gnyis pa rin po che'i steng na 'dug pa'o/ /phyag na rin chen phyag rgya ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa rin po che'i steng na 'dug pa'o/ /bsam pa brtan pa'i ni rdo rje rgya gram rin po che'i steng na 'dug pa ste/ phyag rgya thams cad kyang dkyil

'khor gyi nang du chud par bya'o/ /nub phyogs su nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya ni/ chu yi dkyil 'khor yid 'ong bar/ /pad+ma dkar po stan chen la/ /de'i dbus ral gri zhags pa ni/ /so ni shin tu rno ba'i mchog /rang gi sa bon rnams kyis btab/ /mkhas pas der ni

gzhag par bya/ /de yi 'khor rnams bri ba ni/ /phyag rgya'i gzugs rnams bzhin/ /de la nam mkha' dri med kyi phyag rgya ni/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'khor lo mtshan dang bcas pa'o/ /nam mkha'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na dung ngo / /

rnam par dag pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya ni pad+ma dkar po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na 'dug pa'o/ /spyod pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na dung gi steng na ut+pa la gzhag pa'o/ /blo gros brtan pa'i phyag rgya yang rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na rdo rje pad+ma'i steng

na 'dug pa'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga

gsungs pa/ kun tu bslab pa'i sngags pa ni/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la mkhas pas/ /de tshe slob ma'i sdig pa kun/ /cho ga bzhin du bsreg par bya/ /ci nas slar yang mi skye bar/ /de yi 'tsho ba'ang bsreg par bya/ /bsregs te thal bar gyur nas kyang / /de ni slar

yang gso bar bya/ /yi ge yis ni mi 'gyur bsreg /'tsho bas slar yang gso bar bya/ /'tsho bas thams cad gsos nas ni/ /kun tu dag cing dri ma med/ /yan lag bcu gnyis tshig rnams ni/ /de yi mod la dgod par bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams

dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam tshig 'di/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang nyan thos dang / /'jig rten rnams kyis bkur ba yin/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /dam tshig 'di ni sus rig pa/ /rgyud rnams kun tu zhugs pa dang / /dkyil 'khor kun la

dbang ba yin/ /sngags 'chang de ni nga dang 'dra/ /dam tshig can ni gzhan mi bya/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa rim par phye ba'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/ byang chub

sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams cho ga gang dag gis bdag nyid lha'i gzugs su brtan par gyur par shes pa dang / shes nas kyang rang gi lha'i tshul du

gnas nas/ dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba gsang ba'i phyag rgya brgyad po gsang ba dang bcas pa/ lha'i gnas byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ba/ rang gi gsang sngags kyis mtshan pa/ dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du bya ba yod de/ phyag rgya brgyad po de yang

gang zhe na/ lag pa gnyis khong stong du sbyar la mthe'u chung gnyis dang mdzub mo gnyis 'bar ba lta bur dgyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi gzi brjid 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ste/ de'i dkyil 'khor ni gru gsum la sum mdo'i ris mtshan can 'bar ba dang bcas pa'o/ /gsang sngags

ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ra~M ra swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste/ mthe bo'i steng du ba dan lta bur gzung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje mi shigs pa'i phyag rgya ste/ dkyil 'khor ni yi ge 'bar ba 'dra ba rdo rje 'bar ba dang bcas pa'o/ /gsang sngags

ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ba~M ba swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo dang srin lag gnyis brkyang la/ lhag ma rnams snga ma bzhin du gzhag go/ /pad+mo'i sbubs kyi phyag rgya ste/ dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba/ pad+ma'i mtshan ma can no/ /gsang sngags ni/

na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ saM sa swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis 'og tu gzhug go/ /sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs bkod pa'i rgyan gyi phyag rgya ste/ dkyil 'khor ni zla ba gang ba lta bu ba dan dang bcas pa klad kor gnyis pas mtshan pa'o/ /gsang sngags ni/ na maH

sa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ha~M ha swA hA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khong stong du thal mo sbyar la/ mthe bo gnyis so sor phye ste lhag ma rnams cung zad tsam snyim pa lta bur bya'o/ /'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi yan lag thams cad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ste/ dkyil 'khor ni bum pa zla ba

'dra ba rdo rjes mtshan pa'o/ /gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ aM a swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gnyis bkug la lhag ma rnams de bzhin du gzhag go/ /'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya ste/ de'i dkyil 'khor ni 'ja' 'dra ba mtshan ma thams

cad dang ldan pa'o/ /rdo rje'i ba dan 'phyar ba'o/ /gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ bud+d+ha d+hA ra Ni smr-i ti ba la d+hA ra NI ka ri d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya/ sa b+ha ga ba te/ A kA rA bA ti a sa me swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gnyis phyung ste mthe'u chung gnyis gung mo gnyis

kyis bkug la spyi bor sbyar ro/ /'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi chos gnas pa'i phyag rgya ste/ dkyil 'khor ni nam mkha'i kha dog thams cad dang ldan pa klad kor gnyis kyis mtshan pa'o/ /gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a be da be d+yA+e a swA hA/ phyag

rgya de nyid las gung mo gnyis phan tshun bsnol mar gzung ngo / /'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rnal 'byor 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ste/ de'i dkyil 'khor ni nam mkha' ste/ khyad par du sngo la klad kor can snyems pa dang bcas pa'o/ /gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ ma hA

yo ga yo gI nI yo ge shwa rA/ khany+dza ri ke swA hA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di dag ni gsang ba pa'i phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rab tu gsang ba yin gyis/ dbang bskur ba dang / cho rigs btsun pa dang / spro ba can dang / yi dam la brtan pa dang / bla ma la gus

pa dang / byas pa gzo ba dang / gtsang sbra che ba dang / bdag gi lus dang srog la yang mi lta ba ma gtogs pa gzhan du su la yang ma sbyin cig /rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ gsang ba'i phyag rgya brgyad

rim par phye ba'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po de'i tshe ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams la gzigs nas/ thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag

tu/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gnas shing / sgo khyud dang rta babs rin po che sna lngas rab tu rnam par spras pas brgyan pa/ ba dan kha dog du ma dang ldan pa bsgreng bas rgya che ba/ rin po che chen po'i bla re bres pa/ rin po che'i dril

bu dang / rnga ma dkar po dang / dar dang gos mang po dpyangs pa/ rin po che'i ka ba phyogs brgyad du btsugs pa/ pad+ma'i mtshe'u chu dri zhim po yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas yongs su gang ba/ ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang / bzhad kyi sgra grag pa dus thams cad pa'i me tog sna tshogs

kyi shing ljon pas phyogs brgyad du brgyan pa/ rin po che sna lnga'i phreng ba dang srad bus legs par bskor ba/ sa gzhi ka tsa lin da 'jam po ltar reg na bde zhing rab tu 'jam pa dang / rnga sgra dang sil snyan gyi sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa rnam pa du ma grag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mang

po'i bsod nams kyis bsags pa'i stan dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang yid las byung ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa las byung ba/ chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i mtshan mas mtshan pa yang byung bar gyur to/ /de'i dbus

na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang mos pa ci lta ba bzhin du mgu bar mdzad par bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i yan lag thams cad nas sku cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu la mos pa las

byung ba/ kha dog dang dbyibs rnam pa du mas bdag gi sku brgyan pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsod nams kyis rnam par bskyed pa dag

byung bar gyur to/ /de dag byung nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sgra mngon par go bar mdzad cing ched du gleng ba 'di glengs so/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab thabs ni bsam mi khyab/ /gnas med pa ni rtogs gyur nas/ /gnas dang

bcas pa'i chos kyang 'chad/ /gang dag gis ni chos rnams kyi/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid rnyed med pa/ /shes pa des ni 'dren kun gyis/ /gang brnyes rnyed pa thob par 'gyur/ /de dag gis ched du gleng ba de ched du glengs nas de dag slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku bsam

gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nang gi dkyil 'khor nyon cig /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lus kyi sa gzhi gang yin pa de chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi sngags dang phyag rgya'i byin gyi

rlabs kyis byin du brlab par bya ste/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bdag las kyi rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs te/ rdul thams cad dang bral ba/ bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / shed can dang / shed

las skyes pa dang / byed pa po la sogs pa'i zug rngu'i skyon dang bral ba la/ gru bzhi la sgo bzhi dang ldan pa/ nub phyogs kyi sgo rtag tu phye ba/ sgo khyud dang stegs bus brgyan pa'i dbus na pad+mo'i rgyal po chen po yid las byung ba/ 'dab ma brgyad pa sdong bu dang bcas pa/ ze ba rgyas

shing shin tu mdzes par byung ba de'i dbus na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa/ sems kyi sa las yang dag par 'das pa/ sems kyi sa rjes su thob pa/ 'dod pa'i 'bras bu khyad par can stsol bar bsam mo/ /de'i

shar phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i tog go/ /lho phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po'o/ /byang phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra can no/ /nub phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa'o/ /shar lho'i phyogs

mtshams su ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'o/ /byang shar mtshams su ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go/ /lho nub kyi mtshams su ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'o/ /nub byang gi mtshams su ni byams pa'o/ /ze ba kun la ni byang chub sems dpa'i yum dang

pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams bri'o/ /'og tu ni rig sngags dang khro bo'i tshogs rnams bri'o/ /sdong bu la ni phyag na rdo rje'o/ /lhag ma rnams ni rgya mtsho chen po'o/ /mar me me tog bdug spos dang / /bshos dang bdug pa yid las byung / /lus can rnams kyi

dam tshig phyir/ /thams cad sngags pas bsam par bya/ /'og gi sa gzhi thams cad la/ /lha la sogs pa grangs med pa'ang / /bdag nyid chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /sngags pas nan tan bskyed de bri/ /rang gi lus ni bdag nyid kyis/ /ra zhes bya bas rnam sbyangs

nas/ /sngags pa rnal 'byor stan la 'dug /de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran zhing / /slob ma rnams kyi spyi bor ni/ /klad kor bcas pa'i a bzhag ste/ /'jigs pa med pa'i bdag lus la/ /de nas me tog 'dor du gzhug /brtags nas de la bstan par bya/ /yang na de la

rig sngags sbyin/ /lus can rnams kyi dam tshig phyir/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor gtso bor 'dod/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du gzud pa la 'jug pa'i rim par phye ba rgyas

pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag na rdo rjes gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi don du tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rig sngags kyi brtul zhugs zhus pa/ ci ltar brtul zhugs spyad pa lags/ /

tshul khrims la gnas ci lta bu/ /gang na ci ltar gnas kyang rung / /ma chags par ni ci ltar spyod/ /dus ni ci srid lon gyur na/ /brtul zhugs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de'i mthu ci lags 'tshal bar gyis/ /gnas ni gang du bgyi ba lags/ /dus dang yul

dang bya ba las/ /chos dang chos min rnam spangs par/ /de ni ci ltar myur du 'gyur/ /tshad kyang 'dren pas bka' stsol cig /gang gis dngos grub thob 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon bstan pa/ /ma 'ongs 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

rkang gnyis gtso/ /thams cad mkhyen la bdag zhu ba/ /rgyal ba'i gtso bo dpang du bzhugs/ /de skad gsol nas bcom ldan 'das/ /rnam snang mdzad chen de yi tshe/ /sems can rnams la brtse ba'i phyir/ /'di skad kyi ni tshig gsungs so/ /lag na rdo rje mthu bo che/ /

sems dpa' chen po dpa' bo legs/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i/ /brtul zhugs dam pa brtan par bya'o/ /'jig rten la ni phan byed pa'i/ /dngos grub gang gis thob 'gyur ba/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs las byung ba'i/ /brtul zhugs sangs rgyas bzhin

du gnas/ /bdag gi de nyid bskyed nas ni/ /rtag tu the tshom med pa'i yid/ /gang tshe rtag tu mnyam bzhag pa/ /de tshe brtul zhugs spyad pa yin/ /byang chub sems dang chos rnams dang / /bslab dang las dang 'bras bu gang / /mtshan nyid gcig tu ldan

'gyur cing / /las dang bya ba rnam spangs pa'i/ /tshul khrims sangs rgyas bzhin zhes bya/ /tshul khrims ldan zhes gzhan mi bya/ /chos rnams kun la dbang thob cing / /sems can don rtogs khong du chud/ /gser dang bong rdo mnyam gyur na/ /de ni myur du ma chags spyod/ /

gsang sngags kyi ni grangs dag las/ /'bum grangs ci snyed bstan gyur pa/ /dus ni de srid lon gyur na/ /brtul zhugs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /dbang chen gyi ni dngos po yis/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ /rdo rje can gyi rgya bcings la/ /zas su rtag tu 'o

ma 'thung / /srog dang rtsol ba rab bsdams nas/ /sngags pas zla ba gcig tu bzlas/ /de nas zla ba gnyis pa la/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor dang ldan par/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas su/ /de tshe zas su chu btung ngo / /de nas zla ba gsum pa la/ /me yi ngos la gzhol byas te/ /

ma blangs pa yi zas za zhing / /ral gri phyag rgya dang ldan pas/ /lus dang ngag yid las byung ba'i/ /sdig pa thams cad bsreg par bya/ /bzhi la rlung dang ldan byas te/ /zas su rtag tu rlung bza'o/ /de nas 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcing / /mnyam par gzhag ste gsang sngags

bzlas/ /dbang chen dang ni chu'i ngos la/ /rnal 'byor gzhol ba 'dug nas su/ /zla ba yar gyi ngo la ni/ /de nas zla ba lnga pa la/ /rnyed dang ma rnyed rnam spangs te/ /sngags pa kun tu chags med na/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin du 'gyur/ /rlung dang mer ni ldan byas nas/ /

nyes pa kun dang rnam bral zhing / /rnyed dang ma rnyed rnam spangs te/ /zla ba gzhan la bzlas brjod bya/ /brgya byin tshangs la sogs pa'i lha/ /sha za lto 'phye srin po rnams/ /rgyang ring nas ni phyag 'tshal zhing / /thams cad srung ba'ang byed par 'gyur/ /de dag thams cad bka' nyan

cing / /de yi bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /sman dang mi dang lha rnams dang / /rig sngags rnams dang gsang sngags kun/ /ci dag bgyi zhes tshig smra zhing / /de yi drung du 'khod par 'gyur/ /bgegs dang log 'dren ma rungs dang / /srin po dang ni ma mo rnams/ /gsang
