sbyar/ /rdzogs sangs sems can mnyes gshin pas/ /rgyas pa yang ni yang dag gsungs/ /cho ga sna tshogs zas dang ni/ /sna tshogs las ni legs sbyar ba/ /phyogs kyi khyad par gsungs pa dang / /de nas yang ni me yi thab/ /gzhan yang cung zad ci gsungs pa/ /byang

chub snying po sogs gsungs pa/ /bdag nyid rnyed pa legs 'tsho ba/ /de dag thams cad rgyas par sbyar/ /'di kun yang dag bshad pa ni/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i rnam 'phrul yin/ /sa bcu gnas kyi dbang phyug dang / /gang yang sus kyang mi nus pa/ /'di kun mod la myur du ni/ /dran

pa tsam gyis kyang bsgrub bya/ /khro bo che bdag bsam mi khyab/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab tu gsungs/ /de yi 'bras bu bsam mi khyab/ /gang zhig lag tu chud gyur pa/ /de yi ngan song stongs par 'gyur/ /'jigs pa thams cad 'khrigs pa dang / /bgegs chen yang ni

'jigs par byed/ /gang yang nad ni thams cad 'dod/ /'jigs pa 'di ni thams cad dang / /sdig pa thams cad kun du 'khrigs/ /'di ni dran pa 'ba' zhig gis/ /de dag thams cad med par 'gyur/ /'jigs pa thams cad 'khrigs pa dang / /thams cad

ldan pa'i 'khor bltas na/ /sa stengs yid ni mchog tu bde/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang / /ngo mtshar spyan rgyas pa phye nas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa blo ldan gyis/ /snyan pa yi ni tshig gis gsol/ /dpa' bo sems dpa' chen po legs/ /rdo rje'i rigs las yang dag

'byung / /byas shes khyod ni sangs rgyas kun/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i sras gcig khyod/ /bdag nyid chen po mi g.yo ba'i/ /rtog pa 'di ru gsungs pa gang / /gang gi lag tu chud gyur pa/ /de yi lag na dngos grub gnas/ /yon tan bsam mi khyab ldan pa'i/ /bsam gyis mi

khyab sgrub pa'i thabs/ /ngo mtshar du ma dang ldan pa/ /gsang sngags 'di ni 'chang ba po/ /bdag cag kyang ni de bka' nyan/ /lha dang lha min bcas pa'i klu/ /rgyab phyogs rjes su 'brang bar ni/ /sngags pa de la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sems can thams cad skal / /

mnyes dga' bar ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bgegs su gyur pa thams cad ni/ /sngags pa'i bka' sgo byed par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bgegs thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i rdo rje kun du 'bar bar byed pa'i me lce 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas re zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu 'gul/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg /kun du rab tu ldeg /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/

kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun du rab tu chem chem mo/ /de nas re zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid bgegs thams cad dang / log par 'dren pa rnams dang / gang yang kha cig 'di na gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa gzhan gyi srog 'phrog cing glags

tshol ba'i srin po dang / 'jigs pa'i gzugs can log par 'dren pa de rnams rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis bsregs shing gnas med la/ gang yang sangs rgyas chos la ni/ /gus pa yis ni skyabs song bas/ /gang zhig skye bo de lus la/ /sdug bsngal ci

yang yod ma yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ sngar med pa yi bgegs kyi gzugs/ /bsgrub bya ba yi cho ga ni/ /phyag na rdo rje tshur la nyon/ /mi shes pa yi sems bsgribs pas/ /rgyud ni mi shes par gyur pa/ /de ni

bgegs kyis zil mnan cing / /'dir ni sngags la dad ldan na/ /sel ba ru ni gyur pa ste/ /yangs pa yi ni mchog tu 'gyur/ /las kyis rgyud dang 'bras bu ni/ /legs byas nyes byas de bzhin du/ /log pa'i rgyal po zil mnan cing / /de dag thams cad brnyas pa byed/ /

log pa'i kun rtog mang po yis/ /dmyal bar myur du skye bar 'gyur/ /ltas ngan las kyi 'bras bu kun/ /de nas gso sbyong yod ma yin/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das

bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ bgegs rnams kyi snga na med pa'i gzugs su gyur pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i byis pa'i sems can rnams shes rab chung bas/ bgegs rnams sngar med pa'i 'byung ba'i rgyu mi 'tshal bas na de rnams bsal bar bya ba'i

phyir/ gtso bos bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ bgegs rnams zhags pas bcings pas ni/ /sngon gyi las la rag las yin/ /ser sna goms pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'dod pa'i dngos po la gnod

pas/ /sems ni rtog pa'i skyon gyis ni/ /sngags pa la ni bgegs skye 'gyur/ /de rnams gzhom par bya ba'i phyir/ /sems ni byang chub gtad par bya/ /bgegs rnams thams cad rnam par 'jig /thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba'i zom/ /gang yang sdig pa cung zad pa/ /

thog med srid pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /byang chub sems kyi mthu yis su/ /de dag thams cad zad par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni sems chen po/ /sems kyi nyes pa rnam par spangs/ /thog ma med pa'i sdig pa'i skyon/ /nags mtshams me yis sreg par

'gyur/ /sngags pas sems la mkhas pas na/ /las rnams thams cad bsreg par 'gyur/ /'di ltar byang chub sems 'dzin na/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig byang chub sems bskyed pa/ /gos med dri ma med cing brtan/ /the tshom med pa nyid du ni/ /

de yi dngos grub lag na gnas/ /byang chub sems ni ma bskyed cing / /dad dang brtson 'grus rnam par spangs/ /skyes bu bka' bsgo byed pa ni/ /'dis ni dngos grub yod ma yin/ /phyag na rdo rje byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa dam tshig 'dis sngags pas sngags bsgrubs

na bgegs rnams bgegs byed par mi 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyag na rdo rje de ni lha dang 'jig rten pa rnams kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os yin no/ /slar brjod cing dgongs te/ bgegs dang / log par 'dren pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / dang / sha

za rnams shin tu rgyang ring po nas sa stengs su sngags 'chang ba mthong bas spro ba bskyed de phyag byed do/ /skyon rnams thams cad rnam par grol/ /bsod nams thams cad shin tu bsags/ /byang chub tshogs ni yang dag ldan/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /de nas phyag na

rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na bgegs kyi sngar gyi gzugs kyi gzugs rnams sgrub pa po la sbyar ba la ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po gang gi tshe sngags pa bgegs kyis zil

gyis mnan pa de'i tshe rims dang tshad pa'i nad dang / bkres skom du gyur cing snyom las la dga' la nges pa log ste the tshom za bar 'gyur ro/ /nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / bdag nyid kyi lha kha phyir bltas shing lha rnams ni dmigs kyis sel bar byed pa de'i tshe gsang ba'i bdag po

sngags pa bgegs kyis zil gyis mnan pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /gsang ba'i bdag po de'i tshe slob dpon gyis bgegs thams cad zlog par byed pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo mgon po'i dkyil 'khor bris te/ bgegs thams cad bcom nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de

la gsang ba'i bdag po dkyil 'khor ni 'di yin te/ khor yug tu ni gru bzhi ste/ kha khyer kun nas khor yug tu'o/ /rdo rje bcing ba'i sbyor ba nyid/ /rdo rje phan tshun bcings sbrel bya/ /khru brgyad dang ni bzhi dang lnga/ /bcu dang bcu drug pa nyid dam/ /khru gang 'am ni khru gnyis pa/ /

ji ltar 'byor pa mdzes par bya/ /de ru sgo gcig pa yin te/ /rdo rje'i gur ni sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje'i ra ba kun du bskor/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar bya/ /de yi dbus su dpa' bo ni/ /pad+ma'i steng na yang dag bzhugs/ /de yi shar du sangs rgyas kyi/ /yum ni nam mkha'i spyan yin no/ /

de yi g.yon du bri bya ba/ /nam mkha'i dri med rdo rje can/ /g.yas kyi phyogs su shugs chen po/ /'phro ba rdo rje phreng ba can/ /dpa' bo chen po g.yon phyogs su/ /rdo rje phyag can rdo rje can/ /dpa' bo chen po g.yas ngos su/ /khro chen snyems tshul zhes bya ba/ /'og tu ngos

su mgon po ni/ /mi g.yo ba ni stobs chen po/ /khro bo chen po ral gri'i phyag /khams gsum rnams ni gcod par byed/ /sgo yi phyogs su bri bya ba/ /mthong dga' mngon phyogs de bzhin no/ /de ltar 'di dag kun byas na/ /kha dog nag dang dmar po ru/ /khro ba'i gzugs

ni gzhag nas su/ /bum pa rnams ni mngon par bsngags/ /kha ni ba glang la sogs brgyan/ /kha nas sa bon gyis bkang ste/ /mgrin pa gos kyis yang dag bcings/ /me tog chun 'phyang nye bar spras/ /rin chen sna lnga 'bru sna lnga/ /sman chen po ni yang dag ldan/ /dri

chu yis ni rab tu bkang / /lha rnams thams cad dgod par bya/ /dri dang me tog sogs dge bas/ /ji ltar rnyed pas mchod par bya/ /mi g.yo bdag nyid chen po yis/ /dbang bskur bas ni rab tu bya/ /de ru dkyil 'khor gnyis po ni/ /dkyil 'khor mngon par phyogs de

nas/ /kun nas gru bzhi pa yin te/ /khru do pa'am khru bzhi pa/ /dbus su pad+ma bri bar bya/ /bar du rdo rje rnam 'phro ba/ /rdo rje'i phreng bas khor yug tu/ /rdo rje bcing pas bskor bar bya/ /de yi dkyil du bzhag nas ni/ /'dir ni 'bad pas dbang bskur bya/ /mi g.yo

bdag nyid chen po yis/ /ral gri'i phyag rgya de nas bcing / /snying ga nas ni snying gar sbyin/ /kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba can/ /bgegs rnams kun las rnam grol nas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dngos grub 'thob/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam par grol/ /bgegs ni thams cad rnam par spangs/ /

chos kun yon tan gyis brgyan pa/ /ji bzhin 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'thob/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/ khro bo'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' bsgo mdzad pa can mthu stobs chen pos gsang

ba'i rtog pa gang gis sgrub pa po rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ba/ sems can mang po'i don du phan pa dang bde ba byed par 'gyur ba/ bgegs thams cad rnam par spangs pa sngags kyang 'grub par 'gyur ba de bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/ bde bar

gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/ /lag na rdo rje slar yang legs so/ /khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan zhing bde ba'i phyir dang / ma 'ongs pa'i

sems can gyi don gyi phyir khro bo'i rgyal po chen po thams cad du thogs pa med pa/ rtul phod pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su gnang ba/ las thams cad byed par nus pa/ dngos grub sgrub par byed pa yongs su 'dri bar byed pa legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang

nga yis bshad do/ /de la lag na rdo rje slob dpon de bzhin gshegs pa'i go 'phang la gnas pas khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya ste/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /de la bcom ldan dpa' bo che/ /chos ni thams cad yang dag ldan/ /

de yi g.yas dang g.yon ngos su/ /nam mkha' dri med shugs chen po/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa gnyis bri bya/ /'og tu khro bo chen po ni/ /mi g.yo ba ni stobs po che/ /phyag na ral gri zur gyis gzigs/ /'chi bdag mthar byed mngon sum bzhin/ /me yi dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa/ /

rlung dang lhan cig sbyar bar bya/ /mkhas pas dri dang me tog sogs/ /snga ma bzhin du mchod nas su/ /ngo mtshar bkra shis thams cad kyis/ /sngags pas mngon par dbang bskur bya/ /phyag rgya de ni bdag nyid kyis/ /slob dpon blo dang ldan pa yi/ /bla ma la ni yon phul nas/ /sbyin

sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ /ri yi rtse mor gyur pa dang / /phyugs lhas chu 'gram bzhi mdo'i lam/ /me ni gnas pa nyid dag gam/ /dur khrod dang ni gzhi gnas su/ /slong mo'i zas ni za ba dang / /yang na 'dab ma btsos pa nyid/ /dben pa'i gnas su mi smra bas/ /'bum

phrag gsum du bzlas brjod pa/ /sngon du bsnyen pa bshad pa yin/ /mtshan ma cho ga bzhin shes nas/ /mkhas pas dngos grub sgrub par byed/ /ral gri'i cho ga bzhin bya ba/ /chag gas med pa sor bzhi pa/ /mthe'u chung sor gnyis dang bcas pa/ /sgrub pa'i rang bzhin

shing las byas/ /lte bar rnam pa sna tshogs bri/ /ba yi rnam lngas bkrus nas su/ /dri dang me tog sogs kyis mchod/ /sngags pas dkyil 'khor bris nas su/ /snga ma de bzhin de bsgrub bya/ /sngags pas pad+ma'i stan gnas te/ /ral gri yu ba nas thogs pa/ /

khro bo sgom par ldan pa yis/ /gsang sngags g.yeng ba med par bzla/ /mtshan mo phyed dam yang na de/ /nyi ma shar ba'i dus nyid du/ /ral gri rab tu 'bar gyur nas/ /thams cad du ni snang bar byed/ /rig pa lus ni rjes nas su/ /nam mkha' spyod yul dag tu 'gyur/ /

bar gyi bskal par kun du gnas/ /rang 'dod dus na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rig 'dzin rgyal po kun dang ni/ /rig pa 'dzin pa kun gyis mchod/ /lha yi bzhon pa sna tshogs pa/ /lha yi tshogs ni bsten pa yin/ /de nas zhags pa sgrub par 'dod na sngar bzhin du 'bum phrag

gsum bzlas nas de bzhin du gser ram dngul lam zangs kyi rang bzhin gyi zhags pa byas te/ mtshan ma shes nas dkyil 'khor bris te bsgrubs na de bzhin du rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi bskal par gnas so/ /

de ltar ral gri dang / rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu dang / gi'u wang dang / gdugs dang / lcags kyu bsgrubs par gyur na de bzhin du 'grub po/ /de nas rgyal po dbang du bya bar 'dod na ku sha'i rang bzhin la gzugs brnyan byas nas rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la ji srid rgyal po rang

nyid 'ongs nas 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas lha sgrub par 'dod na thang shing gi rang bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan byas la ji srid du lha 'ongs kyi bar de srid du bzlas pa bya'o/ /'ongs nas smra ba sgrub par byed de sngags pa gang 'dod pa de gnang bar ster ro/ /

de bzhin du klu sgrub par 'dod pas nA ga ge sar gyi shing las klu'i gzugs brnyan byas nas sngar gyi bzhin du 'bum phrag gsum bzlas te/ ji srid du klu thams cad dbang du gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de bzhin du gnod sbyin sgrub par 'dod pas gser las gnod sbyin gyi gzugs

byas la sngar bzhin du 'bum phrag gsum bzlas te ji srid du gnod sbyin thams cad 'ongs te bka' bsgo sgrub par byed pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas dri za sgrub par 'dod pas 'od ma'i rang bzhin las dri za'i gzugs brnyan byas la sngar bzhin du 'bum phrag gsum bzlas te ji

srid du dri za 'ongs nas smra bar 'gyur ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas par bya'o/ /de bzhin du nam mkha' lding sgrub par 'dod pas 'jim pa'i rang bzhin las nam mkha' lding byas la sngar bzhin du 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na nam mkha' lding thams cad bka' stsal pa bzhin byed do/ /de ltar

srin po sgrub par 'dod pas dur khrod kyi sol bas srin po'i gzugs bris la rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te ji srid du srin po thams cad smra ba sgrub par byed pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de ltar skyes pa dang bud med rnams kyang kun du sbyar na de bzhin du 'grub po/ /de ltar lag na rdo rje ji lta ji

ltar khro bo'i rgyal po 'di sbyar na de lta de ltar las thams cad byed do/ /thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i mthu chen po khro bo'i rgyal po chen po 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su gnang bar gyur pa las thams cad yang dag par ldan pa bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po

'di la rtog pa thams cad kyi cho ga sbyar bar bya'o/ /byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa dang / ma dad pa dang / som nyi za ba rnams spangs nas gnang ba thob par gyur pas rtog pa thams cad kyi cho ga sbyar bar bya'o/ /dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / gsad pa dang skem pa rnams la ji

lta ji ltar kun du sbyar ba de lta de ltar don yod pa thogs pa med pa 'di sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs dang ni/ /bgegs kyi sngon gyi gzugs brnyan rnams/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bshad du gsol/ /bsgrub par bya ba po'i cho ga /bgegs ni sna tshogs pa nyon cig /rtag tu sems ni g.yeng 'gyur zhing / /gsang sngags rnams ni kha phyir blta/ /bzlas pa bsam gtan dga' ba min/ /gnas dang lha yi las rnams dang / /sbyin sreg

dbang bskur las dang ni/ /lha rnams kha ni phyi ru blta/ /sngags pa bgegs la mngon par 'tshe/ /yi dam med par gyur pa dang / /yul gzhan gyi ni rnam par rtog /rnam rtog mang po 'byung ba dang / /dad pa med cing snyom las che/ /de bzhin yan lag 'bigs par byed/ /

dus kyi dbang gis rnam par bsgyings/ /khro ba can ni nyid du 'byung / /the tshom dag ni skye 'gyur zhing / /slar yang de yi dngos grub med/ /de la sogs pa'i skyon rnams ni/ /bgegs kyi gzugs su bstan pa yin/ /rtsod dang brang 'gro klu dang ni/ /yams ni 'byung bar gyur pa

dang / /rims dang tsha nad bgegs kyis nyen/ /de bzhin du ni sgrub pa po/ /gza' yi dkyil 'khor dge ba ru/ /dbang ni rab tu bskur bar bya/ /de ltar sbyangs pa'i sngags pa yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'jigs med par/ /slar yang rang gi yi dam lha/ /sbyin

sreg dang bcas bsgom par bya/ /til rnams dang ni mar rnams ni/ /mnyam par bzhag pas stong phrag bsreg /gsang sngags kyis ni tshim bya zhing / /sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin du bya/ /mngon par 'dod pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /slar yang mnyes pa brtsam par

bya/ /de nas yang ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /bcom ldan slar yang bka' stsal pa/ /bgegs rnams snga na med pa'i gzugs/ /phan pa'i yid kyis tshur la nyon/ /dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs la yang / /cho ga'i las rnams sbyar bar bya/ /gang tshe ngo mtshar can gyi las/ /sngags

pa mkhas pa yis ni bya/ /gang gi skyon dang ldan pa yi/ /bgegs dang log par 'dren pa rnams/ /sems can rnams la bgegs byed pa/ /mi bzad 'jigs pas 'jigs par byed/ /gnas sogs cho ga nyams pa dang / /de bzhin lha nyid gzir ba dang / /sngags

rnams 'gom par byed pa'i don/ /bdag nyid chen po gzi brjid 'bar/ /gang du gtor ma'i cho ga las/ /cho ga bzhin du gyur par bya/ /gang du mchod pa byas gyur dang / /gang zhig brnyas pa zhi bar 'gyur/ /rlung char de bzhin sol ba dang / /yi ge hU~M gi sgra sgrogs shing / /

gnas gcig sngar ni sgra 'byin dang / /glog 'khyug pa yi sgra dang ni/ /me yis bsreg cing cher 'jigs pa'i/ /glang chen mi bzad sgra skad 'don/ /bong bu rnga mo spre'u 'dra ba/ /shin tu mi bzad ro langs rnams/ /ha ha'i sgra ni rab tu sgrogs/ /'bar ba'i me yis dkrigs pa'i

'od/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzugs can rnams/ /la lar mched nas 'bar zhing byung / /seng ge'i sgra ni sgra chen po/ /sna tshogs gzugs can rnam par 'phrul/ /skrag pa yang ni skyed par byed/ /mi g.yo ba ni stobs po che/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rab tu sbyar/ /nus pas yang ni

'joms par byed/ /sngags kyis rmongs par byed 'gyur zhing / /mi bzad pa rnams rengs par byed/ /yi ge ha yi gzugs can dbyibs/ /me yi tshul ltar rigs pa ste/ /brtson chen thams cad dmar po ste/ /skyon rnams 'joms pa ral gri'i phyag /gdug pa thams cad

sdigs mdzub pa/ /g.yon pa'i phyag na zhags pa bsnams/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba'i dkyil na bzhugs/ /bskal pa'i me ni bzhin du gnas/ /hU~M sgra phaT kyi sgra dang bcas/ /mche ba gtsigs shing zur mig gzigs/ /gdug pa thams cad phyogs bcu ru/ /yi ge hU~M ni khro

bo bcu/ /phyogs kun du ni brlag par 'gyur/ /ha ha rab tu sgrogs par byed/ /rdo rje'i me yis bsregs pa dang / /phan tshun du ni 'tshe 'gyur zhing / /phyogs kun du ni brlag par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid rnal 'byor la gnas nas/ /dpa' bo chen po'i go 'phang 'thob/ /khro bo'i rgyal po

rab tu sbyar/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad la/ /yi ge ha yi me yi tshul/ /mngon sum bzhin du 'joms par byed/ /yi ge hU~M gi sgra dang ldan/ /log par 'dren pa thams cad 'joms/ /yi ge hU~M ni rlung gi tshul/ /sprin rum gtibs pa mnyam pa'i 'od/ /sprin gyi yi ge hU~M

'ur gyis/ /gdug pa thams cad 'thor bar byed/ /yi ge ha ni me yi tshul/ /rab tu 'bar ba rdo rje'i phyag /yi ge hU~M gi sgra dang ldan/ /lta stangs thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /bdag nyid yi ge har byas nas/ /thams cad dmar zhing khros dang bcas/ /'jigs pa'i sgra can cher 'jigs

pa/ /phyag na zhags pa khros dang bcas/ /sngags 'chang zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bkug nas ni/ /bcings nas rab tu skrag par bya/ /yang na bgegs rnams thams cad la/ /shin tu gtum shing

khros pa yis/ /de rnams kyi ni gzugs byas te/ /zhags pa'i phyag rgyas bkug nas su/ /brdeg par bya zhing rtog par bya/ /gcad pa dang ni bsreg par bya/ /bgegs rnams thams cad brlag par 'gyur/ /tshangs pa mdun na gnas gyur kyang / /de ma thag tu byer nas ni/ /the

tshom med par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /yang na bgegs rnams thams cad ni/ /gdul ba slar yang bshad par bya/ /sa la bgegs ni bris nas su/ /mgo bo rkang pas mnan cing gzir/ /nyen nas rab tu 'dar gyur te/ /the tshom med par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /yang na bgegs rnams thams

cad ni/ /tshar gcad pa ni slar yang bshad/ /'dzin pa yi ni rang bzhin las/ /de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas su/ /sngags pas de ni mes gdungs na/ /'di ni myur du bsregs pas 'dzin/ /brgya byin dang mtshungs bgegs kyang ni/ /de yi mod la myur du 'gro/ /de

bzhin nyid du bgegs gzhan rnams/ /thun mong du ni yang bshad bya/ /sngags pas khros dang bcas pa yis/ /de rnams gzugs ni yang dag bya/ /ske tshe dang ni dug gis bskus/ /lan tshwas kyang ni byug par bya/ /me la yang ni bsregs pa yi/ /de yi mod la myur du 'tshig /yang

na bgegs rnams thams cad ni/ /phur bus gdab pa slar yang bshad/ /de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas su/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab par bya/ /btab pas rab tu zhi 'gyur zhing / /the tshom med par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /yang na bgegs rnams thams cad kyi/ /rengs pa yang ni

bshad par bya/ /de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas su/ /lus la ri rab rnam par bsam/ /lcog brgyad dang ni ldan pa yi/ /rdo rjes yang dag mnan par bya/ /de nas rab tu zhi 'gyur zhing / /'chi bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /lha tshangs pa yi bgegs rnams kyang / /myur du mi

g.yo brtan par gnas/ /de nas kun gyis kun thams cad/ /spyi yi las ni spyad par bya/ /de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas su/ /sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ /mtshon gyis gtub cing bcad nas su/ /rkang pa nas brtsams sbyin sreg bya/ /bcad par gyur pas de ma

thag /brlag par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /de ltar kun la kun du ni/ /mkhas pas las ni bya bas na/ /kha cig gdug pa'i sems ldan pa'i/ /bgegs rnams thams cad brlag par 'gyur/ /rdeg cing gcod la phur bus 'debs/ /'bigs shing de bzhin rtog par byed/ /

bsreg dang gang yang tshar gcod gzhan/ /byang chub sems kyis brgyan pa yi/ /sngags pas de dag thams cad bya/ /shin tu gdug pa'i sems rnams ni/ /pha rol srog ni gcod par byed/ /sems can rnams ni rnam par 'tshe/ /gang zhig phan pa nyid kyi gzhi/ /snying rje chen po

bskyed nas su/ /sangs rgyas chos ni rjes dran par/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ji bzhin brjod/ /gdug pa'i las ni bya ba yin/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /ngo mtshar spyan phye rgyas pa yis/ /chos kyi dbang phyug thub pa yi/ /snyan pa'i tshig gis bka' stsal pa/ /e ma'o

sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab/ /sems can mi phan byed pa yi/ /ji srid ming ni bgags nas su/ /de srid blo ni ngan 'gro yi/ /phan dang mi phan rnam rtog rnams/ /mnar med sdug bsngal gzhol ba ru/ /rab tu zhugs nas 'gro bar

'gyur/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes slar yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su gnang bar gyur pa/ sngags dang phyag rgya dang sngags kyi rim par phye ba gang myur ba nyid du phyag rgya'i

mtshan pas mtshan pa/ lha thams cad dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams lhan cig sbyar bas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ba'i don yod cing thogs pa med par gyur pa bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces

bka' stsal to/ /legs so legs so/ /lag na rdo rje slar yang legs so/ /da legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di nyon

cig ces bka' stsal to/ /rkang pa mnyam par gzhag pas gnas/ /phyag 'tshal ba yi thal mo sbyar/ /mthe bong dag ni gnas byas nas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gdud par bya/ /rdo rje bkod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /thal mo steng du brkyang bar bya/ /slar yang mdun du bya ba yin/ /slar

yang thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /rgyab nyid du ni gzhag par bya/ /thal mo bkod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /slar yang mdun du bya ba yin/ /khros pas hU~M gi sgra sgrogs shing / /bdud kyi rigs la bsdigs par bya/ /rkang pa bkod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /lag pa dag ni gnyis ka yang / /gnyis ka'i

sdigs mdzub sbyor ba yis/ /bgegs dang log par 'dren pa rnams/ /sdig pa thams cad kun 'byung ba'i/ /sdigs mdzub kyis ni 'byer bar 'gyur/ /slar yang rkang pa bgrad nas su/ /rdo rje'i sa gzhir gzhag par bya/ /sa 'og rim bdun bar du ni/ /thams cad

du ni sbyar bar bya/ /lag pa sbyar ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /rkang pa ya gcig sa la gnas/ /de bzhin du ma bu phra mo ru/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'joms par byed/ /ma bsgrubs pa la rab tu sbyar/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi ral gri 'byung / /gang zhig bkod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /klad la

yongs su bskor bar bya/ /yi ge hU~M gi sgra sgrogs shing / /ral gri phyag rgya bcing bar byed/ /gnyis pa shubs kyi rtse mo nas/ /bstan la gnod pa byed pa dang / /sngags pa bla ma ngan smra zer/ /gang dag sems can gzhan la 'tshe/ /gang yang lha la smod par byed/ /lha dang gsang ba pa dang

sprul/ /lha min srin po 'jigs su rung / /de rnams thams cad gzhom par bya/ /gnod pa de yang lan gnyis gsum/ /gus pas gal te bzod gsol na/ /gsang sngags tshogs ni de mnyes na/ /ji bzhin 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'thob/ /slar yang rdo rje rkang pa yis/ /rkang pa mnyam

par gzhag nas gnas/ /lag pa phan tshun khu tshur bcing / /mdzub mo sbyar ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /dpral ba'i steng du bzlog la gzhag /rkang pa bkod de sbyar ba dang / /ya sos ma mchu mnan te khros/ /'brug gi hU~M gi sgra sgrogs pa/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'gems par ni/ /

yi ge hU~M gis the tshom med/ /rdo rje'i lta stangs 'bar ba che/ /gdug pa thams cad rnam par 'joms/ /thig le zhes ni bsgrags pa yis/ /phyag rgya don kun sgrub par byed/ /sngags pa gang zhig sgrub pa ni/ /gang dang gang ni rab sbyar ba/ /de dang de ru don yod par/ /byed par 'gyur te

the tshom med/ /rdo rje rkang pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rkang pa steng du gdeg par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun la gus phyag bya/ /sor mo phan tshun khu tshur bcang / /kha yi tshul du byas nas ni/ /kha yi thad kar sbyar bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs dang ni/ /de bzhin du yang las rnams dang / /

phyogs kun las ni byung ba yi/ /sprin chen yang ni 'dus nas su/ /'brug chen sgra ni rab tu ldir/ /der yang glog ni 'khyug pa dang / /sku chen po ni ha ha sgrogs/ /char gyi rgyun ni yang dag 'bab/ /dus mtha' lta bur yang dag byung / /'di ni kha ru gzhug par bya/ /mi bzad pa yi sku

chen gyis/ /kha yi phyag rgya'ang 'dzin par byed/ /bzung ba tsam gyis brlag pa ru/ /ma lus par ni 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas khro bo rab 'bar ba/ /gzi brjid chen po zhal che ba/ /'di ni bkug nas zos pa na/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po thams cad brlag /khro bo mi g.yo ba yi sku/ /ji lta ji

ltar rab sbyar nas/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs can bgegs srin po/ /de lta de ltar brlag par 'gyur/ /kha yi phyag rgya sbyor ldan pas/ /sngags pas kun du sbyar bar bya/ /'di ni don yod thogs pa med/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu mchod/ /slar yang rdo rje'i rkang pa sbyar/ /phyag

'tshal thal mo spyi bor sbyar/ /sngon bzhin rkang pa mnyam byas nas/ /rkang pa bteg nas g.yeng bar bya/ /lag pa yang ni phan tshun du/ /g.yas pa dang ni g.yon pa na/ /zhags pa ral gri thogs nas su/ /rdo rje dor nas yang dag gnas/ /g.yon pa sa yi cha la gzhag /g.yas pa

mtshon cha dang bcas kyang / /zhags pas bkug ste bzhag nas ni/ /ral gris gzugs brnyan bcad na ni/ /tshangs pa 'am ni brgya byin yang / /de ma thag tu myur bar gcod/ /'di ni dpal ldan zhags pa bsnams/ /ral gri'i phyag rgya sbyar ba yis/ /sngags pas sbyar ba tsam

gyis ni/ /gdug pa thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /thal mo btab ste sbyar nas su/ /'khor lo lta bur rab bskor bya/ /sngags pas bskor zhing drangs nas ni/ /rkang pa sngar bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /phyag 'tshal ba yi thal mo sbyar/ /phan tshun so sor khu tshur bcing / /gnyis ka'i mdzub

mo rtse sbyar te/ /rdo rje rtse gcig rnam par bya/ /gdug pa kun la gdab pa dang / /'bigs par yang dag brjod pa yin/ /bgegs rnams thams cad rlag byed pa'i/ /bsrung ba la sogs rab tu sbyar/ /lag pa gnyis ni mnyam byas nas/ /khu tshur sbyar te bcing bar bya/ /gung mo rtse mo

sprad de sbyar/ /mdzub mo rdo rje'i rnam par bya/ /gung mo la sbyar rdo rje ni/ /phyag rgya chen po'i phyag rgya ste/ /gdug pa thams cad rlag par byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di

skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/ /ji snyed pa'i don yod pa'i thogs pa med pa stobs gnon pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po mi bzad pa'i phyag rgya ji lta ji ltar sgrub pa pos sbyar ba de lta de ltar dngos grub ster bar byed pa/ bgegs thams cad 'joms

par byed pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs 'di sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i phyir bdag kyang bshad par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gang de'i dus la bab par sems na shod cig /de nas byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba thob ste/ bsam pa thams cad la mnyes gshin pa'i rol pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas/ dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /

bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas re zhig 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang ba chen pos snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rdo rje 'chang gi skus gang bar byas nas/ phyogs bcur bskor te/ slar yang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku la zhugs par 'gyur/

khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i sgrub thabs su gyur pa rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams nyon cig /lo 'dab la sogs pa za zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas zhag gsum 'dug nas ras bris kyi mdun du mchod pa chen po byas te/ de'i mdun du nim pa'i yam shing gis me spar te/

mar gyis btags pa'i yungs kar dkar po snying po'i sngags kyis stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya ste/ sngon du bsnyen pa byas pas so/ /de la khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i sgrub thabs ni 'di yin te/ dkyil 'khor bris nas ral gri'i phyag rgya bcings te/ skyil krung bcas nas ji srid

du rig pa 'dzin par gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mchod cing bskal par gnas la 'dod pa'i 'chi ba'i dus med de sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du spyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing sems can thams cad kyi don byed do/ /slar

yang 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pa byas na gang 'dod pa'i las rnams thams cad byed do/ /tshig rnal mar 'bebs so/ /shing sgyel bar byed do/ /nam mkha' nas 'dab chags ltung bar byed do/ /mtshe'u skems par byed do/ /rlung gzhan du byed do/ /zla ba gzas zin

pa'i nub mo 'dug nas ba lci sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor byas la dri zhim po'i me tog sil ma bkram ste ras bris sam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam gyi spyan sngar se'u dang rigs mthun pa'i mar srang gcig zangs ma'i snod du bcug ste seng ldeng gi me spar te gdung

zhing bzlas pas dngos grub gsum 'byung ngo / /de nas ri'i rtse mor gnas bcas te/ zas mi za bar bzlas pa 'bum byas na gter mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /phyugs ngas zhi bar 'dod na 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong phrag gcig bsregs pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rtsa dUr ba mngar

gsum gyis btags nas sbyin sreg 'bum byas na phyugs ngas chen po zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma rnams zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags te sbyin sreg 'bum byas na mchog gsol ba gsum mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rgya mtshor 'gro ba na chu klung gi chu'i nang du zhugs te 'bum phrag

gsum bzlas na yul du phyin par 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ba'i kha dog gi me tog bsregs na de lta bu'i kha dog gi gos rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /so ba bsregs pas so ba'ang mi zad par 'gyur ro/ /nas kyi sbyin sreg gis khyim bdag chen por 'gyur ro/ /pri yang kus dbang du byed do/ /

spos shing gis 'khor g.yog mang bar 'gyur ro/ /mngar gsum gyis btags pa'i bil ba'i 'bras bu sbyin sreg 'bum byas na rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /ras bris kyi cho ga ji bzhin pa ni 'di yin te 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhal gcig pa dpa' bo'i na bza' ngur smrig mnabs pa

zur mig gis gzigs pa'i phyag na ral gri dang zhags pa bsnams pa/ khro gnyer rim par ldan pa'i zhal 'jig rten gsum 'jigs par mdzad pa ngur smrig mnabs pa bri bar bya'o/ /de nas rgya mtshor song ste ras bris bkram nas lus la gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dogs

pa med cing lkugs pa slong mo za bas 'bum phrag lnga bzla'o/ /tha ma'i nyin zhag 'dug nas tsa na ka'i yam shing gis khri phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na mi g.yo ba mthong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa yang nye bar spyod la ting nge 'dzin rnyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /

yang na dur khrod kyi ras la 'phags pa mi g.yo mgon po bris la bdag nyid kyi khrag gis spyan phye ba bri bar bya'o/ /sgrub pa po shar du phyogs te phyi nas ras bris kha sprod du dgram ste dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos rlon pa bgos te lkugs pas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/ /mar ngo'i

tshes brgyad kyi zhag la 'dug ste/ 'byung po thams cad la sha'i gtor ma byin nas ro chen po'i steng du khri phrag gcig bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas ro de'i lus 'gul bar 'gyur te/ 'jigs par mi bya'o/ /de nas kha'i nang du pad+ma kha phye ba'i lte ba mthong bar 'gyur te blangs nas bzung bas

rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur zhing lha'i gzugs kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du spyod do/ /yang na ras bris kyi mdun du zla ba drug tu thun gsum du bzlas shing ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas a ga ru'i bdug pas bdugs na yul gyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /rgyal mtshan la stong phrag gcig

bsngags nas dmag gi mngon du bzung na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs g.yul nyes par 'gyur ro/ /dmag tshogs rengs par 'dod pas sku chen po sku mdog ser po zhal bzhi la phyag bzhi pa mdog mi sdug pa/ mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs su rung ba 'bar ba'i phreng ba dkrigs pas pha

rol gyi dpung bzung ba lta bur bsam pa 'am/ bris nas bstan na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rengs par 'gyur ro/ /rtsod par 'dod pas khwa dang 'ug pa'i sgros sbyin sreg byas na rtsod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dgra bo myos par 'dod pas sreg blugs 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sbyin sreg

byas pas mi g.yo ba'i mngag gzhug pas mgul nas bcings te lho'i phyogs su khyer nas myos shing khrag tu skyug cing skrag par dgra'i lus bltas pas rigs rgyud dang bcas pa brlag par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rus pa la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags nas btags na gang gi ming

nas smos pa de'i mod du rims kyis btab par 'gyur ro/ /nim pa'i 'bras bu mar khus btags nas sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma gsum gyis dgra bo brlag par 'gyur ro/ /tshwa dang 'jim pas dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan byas la myos byed kyi tsher mas btsugs te gtubs shing bcad pa'i

sbyin sreg byas na de ma thag tu brlag par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bo'i ming nas smos shing sa la ma ri zhes bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs pas dgra bo dbul bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang du bya bar 'dod na lan tshwa'i rang bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan byas te gcad nas sbyin sreg byas na skyes bu chen po

nyi ma bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/ /dzA ti kha 'bus pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na gnod sbyin mo dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'phrul byed kyi 'dab mas sbyin sreg byas pas smyo bar 'gyur ro/ /lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg gis lha'i bu mo yang 'gugs so/ /gu gul gyi sbyin sreg gis rgyal

po thob par 'gyur ro/ /ras bris gzhan gyi cho ga 'di yin te/ dbus su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i g.yas su 'jam dpal rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yon du rdo rje 'dzin pa zhal cung zad 'dzum pa phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa bri bar bya'o/ /de'i spyan sngar 'bum

phrag lnga bzlas pas las thams cad byed nus par 'gyur te/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs la nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /spyan gyi phyag rgya bcings te khros pas yi ge hU~M la sogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sngags bzlas pas dgra bo gdon chen pos 'dzin pa 'am nges par brlag par

'gyur ro/ /dur khrod kyi thal ba la lan 'bum bzlas nas gang la byin pa de bran du 'gyur ro/ /gi'u wang la lan bdun bzlas nas thig le byas pas skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur zhing mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /bgegs thams cad dang log par 'dren pa la sogs pa

'bar bar 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid la bkod nas dpag tshad brgya nas kyang tshangs pa dang srin po grol bar byed do/ /sbrul nag pos zin pa zla ba drug nas mnan par 'dod na khros pas ral gri'i phyag rgya bris la lto 'phye chen po'i rigs ldan gyis bskor te/ de

nas ral gri la stong phrag gcig mngon par bsngags nas dbus su de lta bur 'bar ba 'dra ba dgod par bya ste de nad pa la bstan na nges par 'jug go/ /'phags pa mi g.yo ba spyan gcig pa'i snying po thun gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na rtag tu 'brel par 'gyur ro/ /dben pa'i sa phyogs

su zan gyi chang bu byin na mchog chen po stsol bar 'gyur te/ snying po'i phyag rgya bcings te khros pas/ yi ge hU~M bzlas na sprin dral bar byed do/ /tsher ma skye tshes btags pa'i sbyin sreg byas na rlung gi char pa gtun shing ltar 'jog go/ /sgrub pa po la bsrung ba chen po byed do/ /mi rnams

rkang pa g.yon pa mnan pas bsgrubs na bka' nyan par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang mi rnams kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas gcad na 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang mi thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas de lcags kyi phur bus btab pas phur bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'ching bar 'dod

par gyur na skud pa ser po la mngon par bsngags te gzugs dkris nas bcings par 'gyur ro/ /btsir bar 'dod na lha la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan byas nas steng du spang leb kyis mnan na btsir bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas brdeg par 'dod na mi la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan byas te

re'u slud bus brabs na dgu zhing 'ongs nas bka' bsgo byed do/ /gnon par 'dod na lha dang mi thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan byas te spang leb la sogs pas mnan na gnon par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar khro bo'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di ji lta ji ltar sbyor ba de lta de ltar las gzhan ngo

mtshar che ba yang stong phrag byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i sngags bka' stsal pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba bi shwa mu kha b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba thA/ o~M tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M trAT ma hA tsaN+Da a tsa la kA Na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ a pra

ti ha ta/ ta thA ga tA dz+nyAM sma ra hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes slar yang khro bo chen po thogs pa med pa'i cho ga'i snying po dpa' bo gcig pa bka' stsal pa/ na maHs+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nA~M/ ta thA ga tA nA~M hA~M/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal ma thag tu de nas skad cig

de la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang ba chen pos snang bar byas nas de la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gang bdud dang bdud chen po 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs can dang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa de khro bo chen po'i gzi brjid kyis bsregs par gyur/ gang dang gang rang

rang gi der song ste bcom ldan 'das bskyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bsregs pa las bskyab tu gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis rang rang gi zhing rnams kyi bgegs chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag khro bo chen po

mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa mdzad pa/ gdug pa thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa dran par gyis shig /gzhan du khyod rnams kyi mgo bo phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rjes tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig sgyu ma lta bur sems

skyed cig /sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems skyed cig /sems can sdig pa thams cad dang bral ba dran par gyis shig /rigs kyi bu dag khro bo'i rgyal po chen po sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba dran par gyis shig /de nas gdug pa de thams cad khro

bo'i rgyal po chen po de nyid la skyabs su song ste bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sa'i phyogs su nye bar gnod par mi bgyid do/ /gang na khro bo'i rgyal po chen po 'di nyid bzhugs pa de bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /nye bar dgos pa bskyed do/ /nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad kyang gzhom par bgyi'o/ /

zhes dam tshig byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du lhags nas 'dug go/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes slar yang khro bo'i rgyal po chen po spyod pa'i cho ga yang sgrub pa po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen po 'di gang lkugs

pas mi bzlog par yal ga dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu za ba 'am/ chu dang / rlung za bar gyur pa'i skye bos dben pa'i gnas su bzlas pa bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po don yod cing thogs pa med pa 'di dkon mchog gsum la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa

nga rgyal che ba mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyi gdug pa'i srin po la sogs pa sbyar bar bya'o/ /phan pa'i sems kyis byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed par dad pas dkon mchog gsum la dang bar gyur par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rtog pa gzhan gyi cho gas kyang dman pa'i sems can sdug bsngal

ba rnams ni sbyar bar mi bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la mos shing dad pa la khro bo'i rgyal po chen po sbyar bar bya'o/ /mtshams med pa lnga byed pas kyang gdon mi za bar cho ga ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob po zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de

nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /thugs rje dang ni ldan pa'i thugs/ /sems can khams ni ma lus pa/ /'di kun rnam par gzigs nas su/ /'gro la phan pa mdzad pa can/ /snyan pa yi ni tshig gis gsol/ /bcom ldan chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /khyod nyid gcig pu dbang phyug gtso/ /

khyod nyid gcig pu kun mkhyen de/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i nam mkha' can/ /khyod ni skyob med sems can gyi/ /skyob pa dpung gnyen thams cad yin/ /sems can kun gyi khyod gcig pu/ /mchog tu mnyes gshin pa yi pha/ /nyon mongs nad rnams gso mdzad pa/ /sman pa'i rgyal

po khyod gcig pu/ /khyod ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /gtso bo mchog tu gzhol ba yin/ /bdag la 'dir ni khyod gcig pu/ /gtso bo bdag la gzhan ma mchis/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /gang zhig bdag nyid khyod la zhu/ /thugs rje dang ni ldan pa'i thugs/ /mgon

po de ni bdag la gsungs/ /sems can ji ltar bde bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar sdug bsngal rten can du/ /gang gis 'dir ni gyur pa yin/ /de rnams bdag la gtso bos gsungs/ /rgyal po mi rgod chom rkun dang / /de bzhin du ni me dang chu/ /nad dang mu ge bdud rnams dang / /de bzhin dus min

'chi bas 'jigs/ /char ches pa dang char mi 'bab/ /rtag tu yams kyis 'tshe bas te/ /mgon po 'di ru ji ltar yang / /brgya la mi 'gyur ba zhig yin/ /dpal gyis mdzes par brgyan pa yi/ /dbang du bya ba nyid dang ni/ /sems can thams cad brtse bar ni/ /thams cad ji ltar 'byung

bar 'gyur/ /ngan dog ngan pa de ji ltar/ /ji ltar lus po dman par 'gyur/ /du ba'i mdog can hrud hrud po/ /de nas g.yeng ba nyid dag ni/ /sngags pa dag la 'byung mi 'gyur/ /nye bar 'tshe ba rnam par spangs/ /'di kun ji ltar brtse ba legs/ /longs spyod dang yang longs spyod 'phel/ /

nyal ba dang ni 'dug pa dang / /'gro ba 'am ni 'dug pa na/ /sngags pa ji ltar bde ba ru/ /de ni rtag tu 'gyur ba yin/ /de la lha ni mngon spyod cing / /rjes su 'brel ba ji ltar 'gyur/ /las kyi dngos grub ji ltar ni/ /myur ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ /srin po lto 'phye grul bum dang / /yi

dgas gcan gzan sbrul de bzhin/ /gang yang rtag tu 'tshe bas 'debs/ /ji ltar 'tshe bas mi 'gyur lags/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa 'am/ /de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod kyi/ /las ni ji ltar myur grub nas/ /don yod par ni 'gyur ba lags/ /'di kun skal ba chen po ni/ /da ltar

yang ni gsung bar rigs/ /chos kyi dbang phyug thub pa yis/ /'di skad kyi ni tshig gsan nas/ /phyag na rdo rje des chen la/ /snyan pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa/ /legs so bu gcig dpa' bo che/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /rdzu 'phrul che nyid slar yang legs/ /nga yi bstan la

khyod nyid de/ /khyod nyid gcig pu bdag gi sras/ /rtag tu rjes su 'phel byed pa/ /nga yi bstan pa bsrung ba yang / /khyod nyid kyi yang lag na gnas/ /rgyal ba'i sras po khyod gcig pu/ /gtso bo dbang phyug kha lo sgyur/ /khyod nyid gcig pu la rag las/ /byang chub thams cad lag mthil gnas/ /

gang zhig khyod kyis zhus pa yis/ /bu gcig 'di ni ngo mtshar to/ /gsang ba mchog gi rmad du byung / /ma lus par ni bshad par bya/ /gang zhig bdag gi snying la gnas/ /de ni gzhan gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /chos rnams kun gyi gsang ba yang / /de nas gzhan du ma gsungs pa/ /dpa' bo khyod la ma

lus par/ /bshad par bya yis tshur la nyon/ /gang gis dngos grub myur thob pa'i/ /gsang ba gang zhig gnas pa yang / /mchog gi gzugs can lhan cig tu/ /sa stengs 'di ni rnam par gnas/ /gtsug lag khang ni sna tshogs mdog /de bzhin sna tshogs gzugs 'chang

ba/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po mthu che ba/ /de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po 'chang / /rgyal ba'i chos rnams yang dag ldan/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu gzhol/ /'di rnams mchod cing yang mchod la/ /gnod pa byed pa sreg par 'gyur/ /de ni rgyal ba'i bden pas bcing / /sems can thams cad

dbang du byed/ /'khrig pa brten par gyur pa dang / /me ni gang zhig sdig byed pa/ /tshangs spyod dang ni de bzhin gzhan/ /sa stengs skye bo gang cung zad/ /'di kun 'dir ni rnam par 'tshe/ /lha rnams kyi yang de bzhin grong / /gdug cing mdog sdug pa yi lus/ /gnod sems bdag nyid rnam par

'tshe/ /brtan dang g.yo ba phyag 'tshal nas/ /'jig rten 'di ni rnam par spangs/ /sa stengs bstan pa ma gtogs par/ /de rnams bstan pa cung zad med/ /gang gis bde ba myong byed pa/ /khyod kyis kyang ni mnyan par rigs/ /sngags pas dang po kun byas nas/ /rdzogs sangs

rgyas ni nyi ma'i 'od/ /kun mkhyen dbang phyug blo dang ldan/ /spros pa thams cad 'di las gzhan/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos/ /gdod nas zhi ba chen po'i gnas/ /skyon rnams thams cad rnam par grol/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byed/ /'di ni dkon mchog gsum gtso

bo/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed/ /gza' rnams gzugs dang mtshan ma dang / /cha byad dang ni dbyibs nyid kyang / /brtan dang g.yo bas mi shes pas/ /bshad par bya yis bu khyod nyon/ /bdag gis ye shes gnas pa 'di/ /mdzes pa'i tshul can rmad du byung / /sa yi dkyil

'khor kun du ni/ /bu gcig kho bos ma gsungs so/ /gza' rnams kyi ni mchog gi gzugs/ /mchog tu rmad 'byung bsam mi khyab/ /mchog tu mdzes par gyur pa ste/ /khros shing bzhin mi sdug pa yi/ /mdzes pa'i gzugs can la brten nas/ /rang nyid mdzes shing phan par gnas/ /

gang tshe gzugs ni bsam mi khyab/ /mchog tu mdzes par gyur pa ste/ /de tshe 'di ni bsam mi khyab/ /drang srong bsam gtan spyod yul min/ /zhi ba sems can la bya zhing / /khros pa nyid ni khros pa nyid/ /sems can la 'di zhi ba ru/ /de yi tshe na kun du spyod/ /sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin du/ /dge

'dun mkhas pas mchod byas na/ /de yi gzugs ni nyer mtshon te/ /de yi tshe na mchod par bya/ /zhi ba zhi ba shes par bya/ /rgyas pa yang ni rim ji bzhin/ /mngon spyod zhes bya ba 'di dang / /dbang du bya ba'i gzugs mtshan nyid/ /'di dag thams cad mdor bsdus na/ /de ni rgyas par gsungs pa yin/ /

shin tu mnyam par gzhag mchod pas/ /zhi ba la sogs 'di yang min/ /phun sum tshogs pa kun byed pa'i/ /dkon mchog gsum ni mngon du mchod/ /yid ni bsdams par gyur pa dang / /dbang po lnga ni bsdams pa yis/ /dri ma dkar chen zhag tu lon/ /lus la bsgos nas khrus kyis

brgyan/ /shin tu dben zhing phyugs med par/ /'di ni 'ong bar song nas ni/ /ba lci la sogs rtag tu byugs/ /dri yis nye bar byugs nas ni/ /kha dog ser dang dmar ba dang / /dkar po'am de bzhin ljang gu dang / /nag po yang dag gsungs pa yin/ /kha dog yongs su bzung byas nas/ /

mkhas pas ji ltar rig pa nyid/ /yid du 'ong ba'i dkyil 'khor bya/ /sangs rgyas ser po bya ba ste/ /chos ni dkar po nyid du bya/ /dge 'dun ljang gur bya ba ste/ /gsang ba 'di ni yang dag grags/ /gza' rnams kha dog bye ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni nye bar mtshon/ /mkhas pas de yi

'og tu ni/ /sngags pa'i lus ni rtag tu bya/ /phyag rgya 'chang ba'i phyogs bris te/ /rang gi phyag rgya kha dog mtshan/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni tshad dag ni/ /sor mo bcu drug rab tu grags/ /yang na gang ltar yid dga' ba/ /de ltar yang dag brtsam par bya/ /kha dog ji ltar nyer mtshon pa/ /dri

dang me tog la sogs dbul/ /mnyam par gzhag pas so so ru/ /'di rnams kyi ni gsang sngags bzlas/ /sems ni rtse gcig gyur pa yis/ /bde gshegs bdag nyid bsgoms nas su/ /gza' rnams so sor mdun gnas nas/ /gsang sngags brjod par bya ba yin/ /de

nas gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed/ /na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga b+hak+ti swA hA/ sar+b+ba tra ya~M/ AHA di t+ya/ su bi shud d+h+yaH/ nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gnon po dang / mig dmar gyi'o/ /bi bud+ha pha ka /

gza' lhag gi'o/ /oM b+ho ga spa da yaH/ phur bu'i 'o/ /oM a su ro d+ha ma hoH/ pa sangs kyi'o/ /oM kr-iSh+Na bar+N+Na pha ka /spen pa'i 'o/ /oM bi kr-i ta bak+t+ra ru tsi swA hA/ sgra gcan gyi'o/ /yang ni gsang sngags re re ni/ /bdun phrag brgya rtsa bdun du bzlas/ /sna tshogs gzugs can gza' rnams ni/ /de

ltar thams cad mchod par bya/ /skal skye bar 'gyur ba dang / /longs spyod rgya chen stsol bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po mi rgod chom rkun sogs/ /srin po lto 'phye grul bum rnams/ /de kun 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ /de yi 'jigs pa nam yang min/ /nad rnams kun las rnam par grol/ /

sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par spangs/ /thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang 'thob/ /the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gang yang gzir ba nyid 'gyur ba/ /gzir ba'i rang bzhin 'gyur ba gnas/ /cho ga bzhin du mchod pa yis/ /phan pa de la 'byung mi 'gyur/ /rtag tu bde bas

gnas gyur cing / /brtser ldan sems can mnyes gshin pa/ /sems ni dang zhing mnyes pa ste/ /sems can kun la phan par dga'/ /dngos grub las ni phan yon ni/ /zhi ba'i sems ni mnyam par gzhag /de yi phyi rol btsun par brten/ /kun gyi gtso bo dbang phyug ste/ /rgyal

po sgyu 'phrul chen po dang / /gdug pa'i sems can 'dul byed par/ /the tshom med par 'byung 'gyur te/ /rgyal ba bden pa gsung bas gsungs/ /char ches pa dang char mi 'bab/ /mu ge byung dang rtsod par song / /dkyil 'khor mchod par gyur pa na/ /de la de ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ /zhi ba

dang ni rgyas pa dang / /gal te las 'di rtsom pa na/ /dri ni cho ga bzhin gsungs pas/ /dang por 'dir ni mchod par bya/ /'di ni sdig dang ldan pas kyang / /de ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /nad rnams kun las rnam par grol/ /nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /sdig pa thams cad

rnam par grol/ /rtsod pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /thams cad rtag tu bde bar ni/ /the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de ltar mchod pa'i cho ga yis/ /gal te bsod nams byas mchod na/ /lha yi tshogs rnams kun mnyes nas/ /dngos grub rgya chen stsol bar 'gyur/ /gdug

pa'i log par 'dren pa kun/ /srin po 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rnams/ /sngags pa bzlas par brtson pa la/ /de ni de la 'tshe mi byed/ /rtag tu sna tshogs nad med cing / /longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa ru/ /de ni rtag tu 'gyur ba ste/ /cho ga bzhin du mchod pa yis/ /rgyal po

yang ni dbang du 'gyur/ /gang yang gdug pa stobs po che/ /'jigs pa'i gza' sogs thams cad dang / /mkha' 'gro ma yang stobs chen mo/ /de la kun du phyag 'tshal bar/ /the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de ltar rnam pa thams cad kyis/ /thams cad du ni mchod nas

su/ /bde ba nyid du kun du shes/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rnam par spangs/ /sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pas mdzes/ /de bzhin rtag tu rgyal por bcas/ /thams cad du ni snyan par smra/ /kun kyang dbang phyug rnam par brgyan/ /mchog tu skal ba bzang 'gyur ba/ /de ni kun du

the tshom med/ /de skad gsungs nas rnal 'byor che/ /thub pa chos kun dbang phyug ni/ /cang mi gsung ba nyid du gyur/ /de tshe 'khor rnams 'di skad gsol/ /dpa' bo chen po sems dpa' legs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i rims nad bral/ /sngags kyi de nyid don nges pa/ /thams

cad ma lus pa ru gsungs/ /mgon po sems can shin tu med/ /spyan snga ru ni brjod pa'i tshul/ /gsang sngags rgya mtsho rgya chen las/ /snying po 'di ni btus nas bsdus/ /thob pas 'jigs med 'di mngon 'gyur/ /de kun the tshom med pa ru/ /sa 'og gnas pa kun byas nas/ /

sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol/ /bde ba thams cad yang dag ldan/ /de tshe thams cad 'byung 'gyur zhing / /nad rnams thams cad rnam par spangs/ /gdug pa 'jigs pa'i gzugs can dang / /srin po gang yang mche ba can/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya mthong ba yis/ /de dag thams cad

brlag par 'gyur/ /gza' mchod pa rab 'byam gyi rim par phye ba'o// //mi g.yo mgon po zhes bya ba/ /sems can rjes su srung bar byed/ /'jam pa'i dpal gyi dkyil 'khor ston/ /de tshe dngos grub mdzes pa kun/ /rdo rje

ral gri sogs de bzhin/ /phyis kyi dkyil 'khor nang du ni/ /sngags pas cho ga bzhin du bsgrub/ /las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/ /sa gzhi dag par yang dag blta/ /slob ma rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /'bad pas dkyil 'khor kun du bri/ /kun nas khru

tshad lnga yin te/ /khyams kyis so sor rnam par brgyan/ /rta babs rnam par btsugs pa ni/ /nub kyi sgo ni bsgom par bya/ /sgo yi las ni 'jigs med par/ /byang phyogs kyi ni rab tu bya/ /gzhan du gang zhig rab byed na/ /ring por mi thogs nges par brlag /sngar

gyi bzhin du cho ga yis/ /gru bzhi ru ni thig gdab bya/ /sgo khyud dang ni khyams dang ldan/ /snam bus kyang ni yang dag brgyan/ /de nas sngags pas dbus kyi char/ /ral gri'i phyag rgya gzugs bzang ldan/ /me yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rin chen rdo bar legs par

gnas/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba gzi brjid 'khrigs/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /rang gi sa bon sa bon gyis/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsgom bya bri/ /'di ni byin gyis brlabs ba'i sngags/ /na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaH/ he he he/ A dz+nyA

pa ri mArga Na A gats+tsha b+ha ga ban sI g+h+raM swA hA/ de yi byang du bri ba ni/ /bum pa rdo rje mtshan ma can/ /zhi ba 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs/ /'jig rten gtso bo de rang bzhin/ /lho yi phyogs su mgon po yis/ /rdo rje 'bad pas bri bar bya/ /me yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /phyag

na rdo rje blo ldan pas/ /dbang ldan phyogs la brten nas ni/ /mdzes pa'i gzugs brnyan phyag rgya bri/ /rin chen rdo bar bzhugs shing 'bar/ /yid bzhin nor bu zhes su bshad/ /khro rgyal phyag rgya rtul phod rol/ /steng du pad+ma bris nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad

de ru bzhugs/ /me yi phyogs la brten nas ni/ /rab tu 'bad pas rdo rje bri/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'jigs su rung / /pad+ma la ni rab tu bzhugs/ /blo dang ldan pas 'og tu ni/ /khro bo'i rgyal po mngag gzhug bri/ /rdo rje rdo ba'i steng na gnas/ /rdo rje 'bar bas

yongs su bskor/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus son par/ /rtag tu 'bar bas 'khrigs pa yi/ /zhags pa'i phyag rgya de la bri/ /de nas gnyis pa'i cha la ni/ /pho nya mo ni kun nas bri/ /brtan pa zhes bya'i pho nya mo/ /byang phyogs su ni yang dag gnas/ /

chu yi dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par/ /mkha' gsod ma ni de la bri/ /lho yi phyogs su rnam 'jigs ma/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs/ /bgegs rnams kun nas 'jigs par byed/ /'jig pa yi ni me ltar 'bar/ /'khor lo rdo ba'i steng du bri/ /

de yi g.yog 'khor dag gi don/ /rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya/ /mkha' gsod ma ni snam bu la/ /gtun shing dang ni tho ba nyid/ /rab tu 'bad pas bri bar bya/ /slar yang nub phyogs su son par/ /bcom ldan ma ni 'jigs pa bri/ /mdzod spu zhes ni bshad pa

yi/ /phyag rgya shar gyi cha la bri/ /lha mo pad dkar steng na bzhugs/ /rin chen phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /de ltar kun nas nges la ni/ /sngags pas phyag rgya dge ba'i tshogs/ /rang gi sa bon nges sbyar bas/ /dkyil 'khor mchog gi rmad du byung / /sngags

pas 'di kun cho ga bzhin/ /dri dang me tog sogs dgyes mchod/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ /lag pa thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /sor mo gung gi nang nyid du/ /dpal ldan phyag rgya 'di 'chang ba/ /pad+ma'i mdzod ces mngon

par bshad/ /skyob pa thams cad mngon sum du/ /dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob par byed/ /sngags ni 'di'o/ /na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba su khe b+h+yaH/ hU~M hU~M/ baHbaHma~M ma~M swA hA/ sngags 'dis phyag rgya dang ldan par spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su

gsol ba la sogs pa cho ga bzhin du bya'o/ /'di ni 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po ste/ bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir dang / dam pa'i chos gnas pa dang / sems can rnams bsrung ba'i phyir mchog tu gsang ba'i mi g.yo mgon

po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs so/ /gang 'dir bzhugs nas phyogs na phyag rgya'i ye shes legs par bslabs na/ rgyud thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po dkyil 'khor du mchog tu zhugs pa yin no/ /'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor 'di su la yang

bshad par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dkyil 'khor 'di ni mchog tu gsungs pa yin pas so/ /sngags pa gang zhig gzhan du byed/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga nyams pa yis/ /slob ma dang bcas gdon mi za/ /the tshom med par brlag par 'gyur/ /

de nas 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pas mtshams bcing bar bya ste gzhan du ma yin no/ /slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor bris te zhugs nas/ tsham ngam gyi las rnams la slob ma sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes slar yang 'jam dpal

gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal nyon cig /pha rol gyi stobs dpag tu med pa gnon pa'i ras ris kyi cho ga ni rin lhag pa bcal ba'i ras skra la sogs pa dang bral ba blangs te/ khro bo'i rgyal po dpa' bo gcig pa lag pa

g.yas pa bteg pa/ zhabs g.yas pa steng du bteg pa/ zhabs g.yon pa yang gyen du bsgreng ba/ phyag g.yon pa sdigs mdzub kyis bsdigs par mdzad pa/ zhal rnam par mi sdug pa nang steng du 'bar bar gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pas steng nas phyag

gnyis kyis dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/ me tog rgyal po ni byang du'o/ /g.yas su ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad/ 'og tu ni sgrub pa pos spos kyi snod kyis lag pa sgreng ba/ khro bo'i rgyal po la blta ba bri'o/ /'jam dpal mi g.yo

mgon po 'di ras ris kyi cho ga sems can rnams la phan par 'dod pas bdag gis bshad do/ /'jam dpal mi g.yo mgon po'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga gang thabs sla bas dngos grub chen po thob pa nyon cig /'dir dang por re zhig /sngags kyi sgor byang

chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpas/ gangs ri la sogs pa yid dga' ba'i gnas rnams su gcig pu slong mo za zhing ras bris 'di'i spyan sngar sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig bya'o/ /de nas ri rtse'i zom la gnas bcas te/ 'bum

phrag gsum bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas nya la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas mtshan rangs par bzlas pa bya'o/ /nang par tho rangs sam nyi ma shar nas mtshan ma rnams 'byung ste/ nyi ma 'gyur ldog byed cing mun par yang 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bzhir ha ha

zhes sgrogs pa'i sgra chen po thos par 'gyur ro/ /khro bo'i rgyal po me tog gi chun 'phyang g.yo bar 'gyur ba dang / sa gzhi g.yo zhing 'brug gi sgra chem chem sgrogs pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis me tog gi char 'bebs so/ /'di'i drung du khro bo'i

rgyal po chen po rang nyid lha thams cad dang klu la sogs pas bskor nas byon no/ /de'i dus su dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas yon chab phul te phyag byas nas gnas par bya'o/ /de nas khro bo'i rgyal po gsung bar 'gyur te bu gcig

mchog sbyin par bya'o zhes pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ mi snang ba 'am/ gang 'dod pa de blang bar bya'o/ /gal te rig 'dzin du 'gyur na brgyad gnyis lo lon pa'i cha byad lag na ral gri thogs pa/ lha'i bzhon pa la bcibs

pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa mang pos bskor ba/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis/ bkur sti chen pos phyag byed pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams mang pos bskor ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mchod pa byed par 'gyur te/ bskal

par 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na mig sman grub par 'dod na lig bu mig dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / ru rta rnams gcig tu byas nas zangs kyi snod du bcug ste/ zla ba gzas zin pa na ji srid du du ba byung ba de srid du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de

mig la bskus na 'dod pa'i khams su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas ral gri sgrub par 'dod na/ ral gri chag gas med pa thogs te mar ngo'i brgyad dam bcu bzhi la ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas/ bsrung ba'i ral gri lag pa g.yas su thogs la ji

srid du 'phro bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas pa bya'o/ /'bar ba 'am/ 'phro ba na rang gcig pu rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /'bar bas ni rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /thogs pa med pas pha rol gyi stobs gnon pa gang gi drung du mthong na mthong

ba de dang ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa sgrub par 'dod na/ khro chu'i lcags kyi rdo rje sor bcu drug pa/ ngos gnyis ka rtse gsum pa tsan+dan dmar pos byugs la/ cho 'phrul gyi zla ba'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ ras ris la mchod

pa rgya chen po byas la nyi ma re re bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nag nya la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas mar gyi mar me brgya tham pa spar te/ ku sha'i chun po la nye bar 'dug la/ rdo rje lag pa gnyis kas gzung nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas nas/ de bzung

bas 'khor dang bcas pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar 'khor lo dang mdung la sogs pa'i mtshon cha rnams dang / gos dang / mchil lham dang / tshangs skud la sogs pa rtog pa gzhan gyi cho ga yang bsgrub par bya'o/ /

snga ma bzhin du dngos grub gsum 'byung ngo / /de nas nor sgrub par 'dod na/ seng ldeng gi yam shing rnams zho dang mar gyis sbags nas stong phrag brgyad sreg blugs byas na nor stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i 'gram du song nas tsan+dan gyis

sbags pa'i pad+ma rnams stong phrag brgyad cu chu bo la bskur na pad+ma'i phung po dang mnyam pa'i nor thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ a ga ru'i yam shing rnams zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags nas sreg blugs byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/ /

gsum po des btags pa'i 'bras bsregs na sngags mi zad par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ mngar gsum gyis btags pa'i gu gul gyi ril bus sreg blugs bsregs pas dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mya ngan med kyi yam shing gis ni

gnod sbyin mo dbang du 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po la yungs kar gyi sreg blugs byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/ /rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi 'gram du song nas pad+ma 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na dpal 'dus nas nor stsol ba 'am/ yul phyogs

gcig pa'i rgyal srid ster ro/ /de nas 'bum phrag gsum byas nas byin nas stengs kun gyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /'bum phrag lnga byin na 'dzam bu gling gi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /lha ma yin gyi bu ga'i sgor ras ris bzhag nas 'bum phrag gsum

bzlas na sngags thams cad 'byung ste/ dogs pa med par zhugs na bcud kyis len la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de nyid du gnas na khyab 'jug gi 'khor los 'jigs pa bya ba 'byung ngo / /yar ngo'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te dzA

ti'i me tog stong phrag brgyad du bcom ldan 'das kyi mthe bor reg par bya'o/ /ci srid du zhabs kyi mthe bong las 'od zer byung gi bar du btags na sgrub pa po'i lus de ma thag tu mi snang zhing dbu skra lcang lo 'khyil par 'gyur ro/ /'khor dang bcas pa rig pa 'dzin

pa'i rgyal po thob par 'gyur te bskal par gnas so/ /sa la pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa gcig bris te de'i steng du 'dug nas stong phrag brgya bzlas nas gzhi gar gnas pad+mar gnas te 'khor stong dang ldan pa bskal par gnas so/ /de nas gter blang bar 'dod

na gang na gter yod pa de ru bum pa skud pa nag pos dkris la tsan+dan gyis byugs la chus bkang ste stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags nas der gzhag par bya'o/ /sa de gas nas chu yis sa la gtor la khru gang tsam sa la brkos te blang bar bya'o/ /

de nas seng ge sgrub na grog mkhar gyi sa la seng ge byas la gi'u wang gis byugs la dkyil 'khor du gzhag ste/ mchod pa chen po byas la ji srid du g.yo ba'i bar du bzlas na seng ger 'gyur te rgyab tu zhon pas skra li ba 'khyil bar 'gyur zhing bdag nyid snga ltas thob

nas lo khri phrag gcig tu 'tsho'o/ /'jam dpal 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa gsungs pa'i cho ga 'di bsgrubs na de ni myur bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad bcom ldan

'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de/ rjes su yi rang nas stan las langs nas song ngo / /'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po chen po mi g.yo ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs dpag tu med pa pha rol gnon pas 'dul bar gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i

rtog pa rdzogs so// //me nyag rgyal po'i bka' lung gis/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po u la sha ma rak+Shi ta'i zhal snga nas lots+tsha ba glan dge slong dar ma blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te/ dge slong yon tan rdo rjes gsol ba btab pa'o// //phyis su'ang chos

kyi rgyal po bkra shis rab brtan dpal bzang po'i bkas bskul ba bzhin/ lo tsA ba dge slong chos skyong bzang pos rgya'i dpe la legs par gtugs te gtan la phab pa dang / slar yang mi'i dbang po chen po bkra shis rab brtan sog po 'phags kyi zhal snga nas kyi sku

ring la/ dge slong A nan+da mang+ga laM gyis dpal 'khor bde chen gyi gtsug lag khang du/ bi kra ma la shI la'i gtsug lag gi rgya dpe la gtugs nas/ mi 'chos su mi rung ba rnams legs par bcos te dag par bgyis pa'o// //
